mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsun+da de bI nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lha mo skul byed ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang

mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das lha mo skul byed ma mthu dang stobs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang pha rol gnon pa grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags shing bstod pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag rnam pa thams cad kyi

thams cad du dge bar mdzod cig /na maHsap+tA nAM/ saM myak+sam bud d+ha ko TI nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa le tsu le/ tsun+de swA hA/ brtson 'grus chen po/ thogs pa med pa 'dul ba/ stobs che ba/ pha rol gnon pa che ba/ phyag na ral gri dang / dgra sta dang / lcags kyu dang /

zhags pa bsnams pa/ khro mo chen mo/ khro mo chen mo'i dbang phyug ma/ drag po'i gzugs can ma/ zhal ras mtha' yas ma/ phyag stong mnga' ma/ /ma pham ma/ gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ don yod ma/ gdul bar dka' ma/ mig stong ma/ de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs ma/ lha thams cad kyis phyag byas shing mchod pa rab tu grub ma/ rdo rje sen mo can/ rdo rje rdo rjes 'dren ma/ rdo rje'i mtshon cha can/ rdo rje'i sku can ma/ rdo rje'i khu tshur ma/ rdo rje'i spyan gdangs pa'i stangs stabs can ma/

drag shul can ma lags kyang drag shul can gyi gzugs can du sgyur bar ston par mdzad ma/ sku rdo rje dang bai DUr+ya'i rgyan gyis brgyan ma/ oM b+ha ga ba ti/ tsun+de hUM hUM/ krUM krUM/ mrUM mrUM/ srUM srUM/ rUM rUM/ A be sha ya/ gr-ih+Na grih+Na/ gr-ih+NA pa ya/ gr-ih+NA pa ya/ ha ra ha ra/ b+hany+dza

b+hany+dza/ sa ra sa ra/ ma ra ma ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ pa tsa pa tsa/ da ha da ha/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ sdang ba'i gdon dang / rims zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / zhag bzhi pa dang / zhag bdun pa dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / yud tsam pa dang /

'byung pa dang / ro langs dang / dang / sha za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / mngal las skyes pa dang / las las skyes pa dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas pa 'di dag dang / sdang ba gang dag bdag la 'tshe ba dang / gdug pa de

dag thams cad/ saM d+ha ya saM d+ha ya/ marda ya marda ya/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ tA pa ya tA pa ya/ uta sA d+ha ya uta sA d+ha ya/ ha na ha na badzre Na/ sa ra sa ra daN+De na/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ khak+ke na/ hUM hUM hUM/ tsUM tsUM tsUM/ drUM drUM drUM/ oM tsa le tsu le tsun+de sarba aR+tha sA d+ha ya swA hA/ bcom
ldan 'das 'phags pa lha mo skul byed ma'i mthu dang byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ 'phags pa lha mo skul byed ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya su mu khan nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das byang

chub kyi shing drung na byang chub kyi snying po'i mchod rten chen po na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la sogs pa nyan thos chen po thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs

te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang yang thabs cig go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad du gsol/ gang gis sems can rnams la snang ba bgyi bar 'gyur ba dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams cad kyis gnod pa mi bgya bar bsrung ba dang / bskyab

par 'gyur ba dang / 'di lta ste/ lha'i dbang po rnams dang / klu'i dbang po rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rnams dang / srin po'i dbang po rnams dang / 'byung po'i dbang po rnams kyis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa dang / mtshon dang / dug dang / byad kyis

gnod par mi 'gyur ba dang / phar mchi'am/ slar mchi'am/ nyal lam/ gnyid kyis log gam/ smyos sam/ rab tu smyos kyang rung / thams cad du yang skyob par 'gyur ba de dag gi don du de lta bu'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams bshad du gsol/ ji ltar bdag rtag tu de

bzhin gshegs pa'i rim gro 'tshal ba dang / rtag tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su skyob par 'tshal ba dang / de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi don dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'thab pa dang / mtshang

'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / nad dang / dus ma lags pa'i 'gum pa las bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes gsol ba

btab pa thugs su chud nas/ de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje khyod sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa legs so legs so/ /de'i phyir lag na rdo rje khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / sgo

bzang po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya'o/ /u gu mu gu ba li ni/ ban d+ha ni/ ba la tsa ma na/ ba hu ba hu ba hu li brtA ya swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur pa'i gzungs sngags gzhi rnams bka' stsal to/ /de bzhin gshegs pas kyang gzung bar

'gyur ro/ /byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ badzrI badzrI badzrI badzI d+ha ri/ badzra pA Ni/ badzrI d+ha ri/ tsakra badzri/ tsakra d+ha ri/ pa Tu d+hi d+hi ri/ b+hi ri/ mu ri/ tsi ri/ a hu ri/ b+ha ga/ b+hi b+hi ri/ shi ri tra/ shi ri/ ru ru tse ru ru tse/ tsa ri tsa ri/ da ri tsa le/ tsu ri mu ri/ paN+Da re/

sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba 'gog pa nas rmi lam ngan pa'i bar du 'gog par byed pa/ tad+ya thA/ ban d+hi da/ ga ga ra Ni/ murta ni/ pra murta ni/ nA sha ni/ pra nA sha ni/ nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa ni rmi lam ngan pa'i bar

du 'gog par byed pa/ 'di lta ste/ nA sha ni/ nA sha ni/ ban+d+ha ni/ ban+d+ha ni/ ts+tshin+da ni/ ts+tshin+da ni/ tsi re mi re/ ma he ha da ni/ ba ni ba re/ kha re be re/ bi ri bi ri/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ su Sha Ni/ shar Ni/ ba ru ba ri Ni/ par hUM ye/ brah+ma tsA ri Ni/ in+d+ra ba ti/ d+hi d+hi rI ya Ni/ na mo ma he shwa ra ya Ni/ r-i shi/ bany+dza ni

pA pa dza ha ni/ kA la pa ti ni/ b+hu ta pa da ni/ sa t+ya ga the/ so ma bA di/ so ma pra b+he swA hA/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ tad+ya thA/ ha ra ha ra ha ra hA Ni swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ i Di ta ga Di ta ba di da/ a ye na/ a ri bany+dza ni ka kI rta ni/ pu tra dad hA ni/ marga a b+hi ro ha ni/ hu sa ba ti/ mu pa ba ti/

hi li hi li/ ya thA pa dzu ya/ ya thA ag+Ni ya thA ba ra na tsa/ ya thA na la/ ya thA na la/ ya thA badzra Na/ ya thA hr-i da ya swA hA/ lag na rdo rje 'di ni sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs te/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs rjes sems can rnams kyi don du bshad do/ /ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin

gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa dang / bden pa'i thugs dam gyis rnam par bzhag bzhin du nga yang 'chad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skyes bu chen po'i mtshan smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer

byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'od zer gyi snang ba byung ngo / /'od zer gyi snang ba des bskul bas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas chas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir byon nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ shAkya

thub pa khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi don du sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gzungs sngags gzhi rnams snang bar byed pa/ mchog tu dga' bar byed pa/ dran par byed pa/ bshad par byed pa legs so legs so/ /bdag cag gis kyang byin gyis brlab bo/ /

legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs sngags gzhi 'di dag 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i yon tan gyi phan yon nyi shur shes par bya ste/ nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas

thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ba dang / ngan song du 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad med par 'gyur ba dang / tshe ring bar 'gyur ba dang / ring du 'tsho zhing grags pa dang ldan pa dang / longs spyod dang ldan pa

dang / stobs dang ldan pa dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu nad med pa dang ldan pa dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dgyes shing thugs su chud par 'gyur ba dang / lha thams cad kyis bsams par

'gyur ba dang / dge bar spyod par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i don la rab tu brtson pa dang / snang bar byed par 'gyur ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / mi 'jigs par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i

rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsang ba'i gnas kyi gzungs sngags gzhi 'di rnams gsungs shing / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin

no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs sngags gzhi rnams

bshad par bgyi'o/ /su zhig sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa de rnam par 'tshe ba thams cad las bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ shi khi shi khi shi khi shi ka/ tsi tsi tsi tsi/ b+ha b+ha b+ha b+ha/ ru ru ru ru/

dzi dzi dzi dzi/ gra gra gra gra/ hri hri hri hri/ ha ha ha ha/ ma ma ma ma/ ha na ha na me/ sarba pra t+yar+tha kA/ da ha da ha me/ sarba sha tra ba/ pa tsa pa tsa me/ sarba a hi te Shi na swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes

bya ba byin te/ lag na rdo rje sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dngos grub dam pa'i gzungs sngags gzhi rnams smras pa legs so legs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig

sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa de'i spu'i khung bu rnams su mdangs thams cad stsal bar bgyi bar bshad par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li tsi li swA hA/ bra h+ma swA re swA hA/ bra h+ma a ba su garbe/ a kalpe/ pu Sha saM sta re swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan

'das 'di ni gang nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs sngags gzhi rnams lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan

'das bdag gis kyang gang gi tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di dag 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs sngags gzhi rnams bshad par bgyi'o/ /

tad+ya thA/ bo d+hi tsit+te/ ba ra Ni/ da mA ra Na De/ dit+ti dit+ti/ gau ri/ gan d+hA ri/ sar ma tan ta/ badzra tu la ni/ dz+wA la mA li ni/ tsakra bA ka/ sha ba re/ sha ba re/ sha ma re/ sha ma re swA hA/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po

'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi

rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ puSh+pe su puSh+pe/ sho d+ha ni/ saM sho d+ha ni/ d+hu ma ba re ha re/

Ar+ya pra shaste/ shAn+te/ nir muk+te/ maM ga l+ye/ hi ra N+ya gar+b+he sta ra sta pa swA hA/ de nas 'byung po'i ma mo 'phrog mas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags

'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa dang / yid la bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ pi li sib pi li/ si li/ ma hA

pi pi li/ si me li si/ gu ru Ne/ gu ru gu Ne/ ma hA ku ru Ne phu swA hA/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lngas rtsen bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo

bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ aT+Te phu/ baT+Te phu/ naT+Te phu/ ku na T+Tephu/ ma naT+Ta phu/ muT+Ta ta ha ke phu/ shri phu/ b+haM ge phu/ maM ke phu swA hA/ de nas

bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de

la bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyang ba dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / dug gzhil bar bgyi'o/ /mtshams bcad par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ he badzre/ he badzre/ hI hA/ bi si bi si/

ma hA bi si phu swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu dbang phyug chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs

kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hu lu hu lu hu lu hu lu lu lu/ sarba b+hU ta pra ti She d+ha naM ka ro mi swA hA/ de nas sde dpon gzhon nus bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom

ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gtsang ma 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang bar

bgyi ba'i slad du gzungs sngags gzhi 'di rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ hi li hi li/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ tu ru tu ru/ tu ru tu ru/ sarba b+hU ta pra ti She d+ha naM ka ro mi swA hA/ de nas lha'i bu zla 'od kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de

bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gtsang ma 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang

bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ aM ge/ baM ge/ tsaM ge hi ni/ Di Di/ di di/ tsi tsi phu swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang

gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ha te/ bi ha te/ ni ha te/ sarba pra t+ya/ rI kA pra t+yA/ mi tra shud d+he/

muk+te/ bi muk+ti/ bi ma le/ nirma le pra b+ha swa re/ pra b+ha ka re phu swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs

tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ dz+wa le dz+wa le/ ma hA dz+wa le/ dz+wa le ni/ uk+ke/ muk+ke/ sha me/ pra sha me/ ma hA pra sha me/ sha me sa mA d+he/ ma hA sa mA d+he/ sa mA ba d+he/ dz+wa le/

ma hA dz+wa le/ dz+wa le ba me phu swA hA/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon kha ba can gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i

chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ u duM ba re/ u duM ba re/ duM be/ pra duM be/ byA brde/ A nag+he/ sa mA d+he/ ma hA sa mA d+he/ nI le

nI le/ nI la ke she/ ke shi ni/ ku le ku le/ ma hA ku le/ nI la ku le/ sid+d+hi/ sid+d+he/ ma no hA re/ aT+Te/ baT+Te/ naT+Te/ ku naT+Te/ sa ma the/ ba ba la/ ku tse/ dAn+te/ nI la ka she/ ku le/ nI la/ d+han+te/ dzAM gu le/ hu she/ mU she/ ba laM ku she/ ha la ku she/ pha la mu tse swA hA/ de nas

gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bde ba'i ri gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags

'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ nir ma le/ maM ga le/ hi ra N+ya gar+b+he/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/ ka maSh+tsi ni/ yu bi ra dze/ ku Ta ku Ta/ kaM ba le/ brah+ma/

brah+ma swa re/ brah+ma sid d+he/ sid d+hi ma no ra the phu swA hA/ de nas lha mo chen mo rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i

chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/

badzre/ badzre/ ma hA badzre/ badzra da ni/ bud+d+ha badzra/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te badzre/ su bud+d+he/ ni bud+d+he/ ba hu bud+d+he/ bi shiSh+Ta bud+d+he/ shud+d+he/ bud+d+he/ bud+d+he/ nI shaM grA ma Ni/ dzaM ge le/ a la se/ te li me/ ti le/ ti li le/ marge/ shAn+ta/ shAn+ta/ gA mI ni phu swA hA/ de nas byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i sdes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la

bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi le badzre/ hi hi badzre/ he he badzra/ ya ba ki ri ki ri badzra swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ aN+Da re/ paN+Da re/ shwe te/ paN+Da ra ba si ni/ kin+nare/ ka rA de/ ke yU re/ i ha bud+d+he/ ta twa bud+d+he/ b+hU dze b+hU dze/ b+hU dzaM ga me/ b+hU dza pA pa te/ b+ha ye b+ha ye/ b+ha ya a gra ba te/ bi

nI bi nI/ shi ri pa the/ shi ba pa the/ A di t+ya pa the/ te dze te dza ba to/ A kA sha pa the phu swA hA/ de nas rdo rje pho nya mos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang gang sgo bzang po

zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ku Te ku Te/ ku Ti ni/ ku Ta ku Ta re swA hA/ nI li nI le/ nI la ke

she swA hA/ pI te pI te/ pI ta ke she swA hA/ lo hi te lo hi te/ lo hi ta ke she swA hA/ a ba dA de/ a ba dA de/ a ba dA ta ke ni swA hA/ many+dziSh+The many+dziSh+The/ many+dziSh+The ke she swA hA/ tsakre tsakre/ badzra tsakre swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang

nas/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin te bzhin dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis lha dang / 'jig rten skyong ba khyod kyis sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang / bsrung ba'i phyir

gzungs sngags gzhi 'di dag legs par brjod pa legs so legs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i chos

kyi rnam grangs tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lha'i dbang po dang / klu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po

dang / mi'am ci'i dbang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po thams cad kyis bsams par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor

de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen

gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ba hu pu tra pra ti sa ra nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bu mang po rton pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/

sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom

ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag deng 'dir rgyal po gsal rgyal dang 'thab rtsod mtshang brus te bkye bar gyur na/ bcom ldan

'das de la bdag gis ji ltar sgrub par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khyim bdag de'i phyir khyod kyis bu mang po rton pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'di zung shig /chongs shig /

lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /tad+ya thA/ da De/ ba da De/ u pa da Da da De/ u pa da De da Da/ gam b+hi rI/ a brta ne/ ni brta ne/ d+ha hi d+ha hi/ a brta ni/ bdag gi/ sarbe shA na karmi/ kA nA~M/ pra t+yar+thi kA nA~M/ pra t+ya mo tri NA~M/ tsak+Shurmo hA nA~M/ ka ro mi/ shro tra mo hA nA~M ka ro mi/

dzi hwA grA NAM ka ro mi/ dzi hwA ma hA dzaM b+hA nA~M/ sta~M b+hA nA~M/ mo hA nA~M/ pra mo hA nA~M/ khyim bdag gang la la zhig bu mang po rton pa'i gzungs 'di skud pa dmar po la lan bdun sngags te/ lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo gcig la bcings na de'i lus la dug dang / mtshon dang / nad dang /

rims nad dang / rims drag pos mi tshugs so/ /'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa rnams kyi lan thebs par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs

pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa bu mang po rton pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sa p+ta be tA Da ka nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa ro langs bdun pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das

rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang yang thabs cig go/ /de'i tshe na mu stegs can kun tu rgyu ba rnams kyis bcom

ldan 'das la gnod par bya ba'i phyir/ ro langs chen po bdun btang bar gyur to/ /de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ba las de dag gis glags ma rnyed/ dmigs pa ma rnyed do/ /de dag gis glags ma rnyed/ dmigs pa ma rnyed nas de dag tshe dang ldan pa

kun dga' bo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i lus la reg go/ /reg ma thag tu kun dga' bo de sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ drag pa tsha ba shi la thug pa'i tshor ba rnams dang ldan par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems te/

bdag ni sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ drag pa tsha ba/ shi la thug pa'i tshor ba rnams dang ldan na bcom ldan 'das des ma dgongs so/ /bdag 'di ltar nyam nga bar gyur na de bzhin gshegs pas ma dgongs so snyam mo/ /de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan

pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thag mi ring ba zhig na 'dug par gyur to/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de lta bu de tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos thos so/ /de nas de gnyis tshe dang

ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ drag pa/ tsha ba'i tshor ba myong nas bdag la de bzhin gshegs pas ma dgongs so zhes ci de skad ces smra'am/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang

ldan pa kun dga' bos de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gi lus la tshor ba dang ldan pa ni dper na sog les mgo bo gshags pa ltar kun dga' bo la reg pa yang de dang 'dra'o/ /kun dga' bo ma 'jigs shig /bdag cag gis khyod khri'i

steng du bzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du bskur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de khyod la yongs su skyob par mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nyal khri'i steng du bzhag nas/

bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du bzhag go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod ci sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ drag pa/ tsha ba'i tshor bas thebs sam/ btsun pa

bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so/ /kun dga' bo khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/ /kun dga' bo khyod la reg pa'i ro langs chen po stobs che ba/ gdul dka' ba/ mthong na gnod pa bdun yod de/ bdun gang zhe na/

'di lta ste/ phreng ba 'dzin ces bya ba dang / nor bu 'dzin dang / gtum po dang / gdol pa dang / rma bya'i snying dang / tshe zad dang / la ba can te/ ro langs chen po bdun po de dag ni stobs che ba/ gdul dka' ba/ bsnyen par dka' ba/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che

ba'o/ /kun dga' bo ro langs re res kyang 'dod na rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang 'phen to/ /ri'i rgyal po ri rab yungs 'bru tsam du rnam par 'jig go/ /steng du bltas na sa 'gas par byed do/ /phyogs su bltas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs

mtshams su bltas na mes sreg par byed do/ /de dag gis khyod la reg go/ /de lta mod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang / chos thos pa'i gus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis da dung du khyod kyi lus 'tsho ba yin no/ /kun dga' bos gsol

pa/ bcom ldan 'das legs par bsal du gsol/ phyir bzlog tu gsol/ phyag rgya bcing du gsol/ skud pas bcing du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bstan par

bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ha ra ma hA gA re/ g+ha sa ra ba ti/ d+ha ra d+ha ri/ d+ha ra Ni tsho ra tsho ra Ni/ ka ro ti ti/ kot+ta sa mA d+hi ni/ sa ma ra sa ra Ni/ sa ra na ko ta mi ti/ sam+b+ha be/ b+ha ba na/ nA ga re/ b+ha da nI/ sA dA niti swA hA/ kun dga' bo gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag lan lnga

bcu rtsa gnyis bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa lnga bcu rtsa gnyis bor na brjed byed thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi snying la gnod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /gdon thams cad kyis byas pa las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das legs so/ /de ltar mdzod

cig /slar yang mi 'chi bar mdzad du gsol/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir nyon la legs par yang zung shig /tad+ya thA/ bad tsa le ba le/ ma hA bad tsa le ba le/ b+hi li b+hi li/ ma hA b+hi ri NI/ ni mi ri ni/ ha na ha na ha ti ri/ ma tsa thA/ ma bi tsa ra thA/ ti re s+thi ra mu le/ ma tha ni rma ba ni/ tsA la ni/

mA ka nI/ dzaM b+ha ni/ pI dA ni/ b+ha ya swa kr-i ni/ b+ha ga ba ti/ ta thA ga ta/ bi ta the/ ti bi g+ha d+ha re/ pa ra pra de/ ha re tiSh+Tha/ nI la ba sa ni swA hA/ kun dga' bo ro langs 'di dag ni 'tshog pa/ sdang ba/ gtum por gyur pa/ gsod par gyur pa'o/ /de la rig sngags 'dis ke mo ru ka'i

skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor ro/ /des na 'byung po chen po shin tu 'khrugs par 'gyur ro/ /'dis thams cad kyang sdang bar 'gyur/ 'dzem par 'gyur/ zhi bar 'gyur zhing / 'dis 'byung po thams cad kyang dbang du 'gyur

'dis 'byung po thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo nyon cig dang bstan par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ da ra da ra da ra/ ka ra ka ra ka ra/ ma hA kak+kar/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa da tsa ra/ ma hA tsa da tsa ra/ ha la ha la ha la/ hi li hi li/ hu lu hu lu/ hi re bi re/ ki ri bi ri/ bai rai bi tsi

ni/ ka raM ka ri/ sarba b+hU tA nAn/ pra dzaM b+ha ni/ nI la ba ra ba sa ni/ tsa ts+tshu/ tsakra tsakra/ a yu d+he swA hA/ kun dga' bo 'di dag ni gnod sbyin thams cad dang / srin po thams cad dang / gsang sngags thams cad dang / dang / byad dang / sdig pa rab tu zhi bar

byed pa'o/ /rgyal pos bkrabs pa dang / la gcan pa phyir zlog par byed do/ /de la rig sngags 'di skud pa dmar po la lan sum cu rtsa bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa sum cu rtsa bdun bor na thams cad rengs par byas par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo gsang sngags

kyi tshig 'di dag zung shig /chongs shig /legs par rab tu yid la zung shig /rjes su sbyor bar gyis shig /de lta bas na kun dga' bo khyod kyis dran pa dang ldan pas gzung bar bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha d+ha ra/ kha ra kha ra/ ma hA kha ra/ ma hA ba le/ ba la nA sha ni/ goT+TA

nI/ kuT+Ta nI/ saM hA re/ ku Ta daM Sh+Te/ ka kha kha re/ ma kuT+Ta d+ha re Ni/ mu luk+ka/ k+She ni ka kai nI ke /sa mesma shA ni/ ki ni/ gi ri Ni/ b+ho gi si ri/ sa sA be tA Ta/ ku mA ra ka/ kr-i te swA si/ kin ni bi bud+d+ha si/ bi bud d+h+ya/ bi bud d+h+ya/ gr-i hAM b+hai/ kr-i ta b+hai ra ba/ bi kr-i ta

b+hai ra ba/ ma hA ba ye/ kr-i twa na/ ha ri si/ kin na mA ra ya si/ ki na na sarba de ba/ nA ga/ yak+Sha/ gan+d+ha r+b+he/ a su ra/ sarba a su ra/ sarba b+ha ya sha ma na/ maM sa ra swA hA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags 'di sbyin sreg gam/ skud pas bcings na 'dod pa'i mthar gtogs pa

thams cad 'jig par byed/ ltung bar byed/ za bar byed do/ /kun dga' bo ro langs thams cad rengs par byed pa'i rig sngags zung shig /tad+ya thA/ se me le/ ma hA ha ha le/ ha ra d+ha re/ g+ho ra d+ha re/ d+ha rat+ti/ rit+ti/ bi rot+ti/ ku nat+ti/ ku ta ni/ saM go tsa ni/ ka tsa ri/ kha tsa ri/ ma

ra ni/ hu hu/ ma re Na/ ma hA mA la d+ha re/ na yo na ma ti swA hA/ kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dmod pa drag po dang mtshungs shing 'dra ste/ 'byung po thams cad rnam par bshig pa'i phyir bal gtsang ma'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa bzhir bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud

pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi bor na/ log 'dren thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag zung shig /legs par rab tu gzung bar gyis shig /kun dga' bo gsang sngags 'di gang yang rung bas gzung bar mi nus so/ /kun dga'

bo de lta bas na legs par gzung bar gyis shig /tad+ya thA/ tsa ts+tsha ra/ tsa ts+tsha ra/ ma hA tsa ts+tsha ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bu ru bu ru/ ma hA bu ru/ saM b+ha le/ ma hA saM b+ha le/ ma hA ba le swA hA/ kun dga' bo lha dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas/ dge sbyong dang / bram

ze dang / skye dgur bcas pa'i 'jig rten na gang zhig gsang sngags 'di la mi spro ba ni ngas rjes su ma mthong ste/ srung ba dang / rjes su 'brang ba yin no/ /gsang sngags 'di ni mi bzad pa ste/ sreg par byed/ 'tshed par byed/ 'ching bar byed/ 'joms par byed/

'bar bar byed pa yin te/ rig sngags lan drug cu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa drug cu rtsa gcig por na sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed/ rig sngags gcod par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

bcom ldan 'das legs so/ /legs par bzung lags so/ /mdud pa dor du gsol/ phyag rgya gzhag par mdzad du gsol/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir/ tad+ya thA/ b+ha b+ha re/ b+ha re/ b+ha ra Ni ha ra pra ha re/ ha ra ni/ ku tha ni ta Ti/ le ts+tsha dad ti/ tshangs pas byas pa'i rig sngags

gcad do/ /dbang phyug chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /khyab 'jug gis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /brgya byin gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /rgyal po chen po bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon gyis byas pa'i

rig sngags gcad do/ /zla ba dang nyi mas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /gza' dang nyi mas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /gza' dang rgyu skar gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phyogs nas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phyogs mtshams nas byas

pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /steng nas byas pa dang 'og nas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /lhas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /klus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /gnod sbyin gyis byas pa dang / nam mkha' lding gis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /

grul bum gyis byas pa dang / tshor ba pas byas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gdol pas byas pa dang / kla klo dang / ri khrod pas byas pa dang / seng ge dang /

sbrul gyis byas pa dang / 'gro lding ba'i yid kyis byas pa dang / g.yung pos byas pa dang / to sa la pas byas pa dang / mud ga ri khrod pas byas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi rig sngags 'chang bas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /tad+ya thA/ ga ga gA ra li phu/

ma hA ga ga gA ra li phu/ bi she phu/ sha par sid d+hi phu/ tsaN+DA le phu/ ma hA tsaN+DA li phu/ tso gi phu/ tsi mi ri phu/ tsi tsi mi re phu/ tsakre phu/ tsakra d+ha re phu/ kr-iSh+Ne phu/ kriSh+Ne ru pe phu/ tsaN+De phu/ so ge phu/ pany+tsa Ta li phu/ pany+tsa li phu/ b+hi me phu/ b+hi pA pa le phu/ piM ge

le phu/ piM ga la/ ak+She phu/ a nan+te phu/ sa min+te phu/ nA sha nI phu/ ts+tshe da ni phu/ bdi ts+tshe da ni phu swA hA/ kri sa ni/ bak+Sha ni/ mA ra ni/ pin+da ni/ bin d+ya naM/ bak+Sha ni/ nA shA ni/ khAd d+ya ka naM/ gA la b+hi nA shA nI/ dA hA ma si b+hasma b+hasma/ ma sa ni/ ban+d+ha ni swA hA/

kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni mtshan mo gzi brjid 'phrog par byed pa'o/ /kun dga' bo nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe/ ro langs chen po gnod byed ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de ston gyi dus kyi tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi rjes su zhugs nas/

gang 'od zer de dag gis gang la reg pa 'od zer gyi dra bas reg nas rims su 'gyur te de yang bcad do/ /kun dga' bo ro langs kha gcig pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdu bar bya'o/ /klu'i rgyal pos 'dzin ces bya ba yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdu

bar bya'o/ /klu thams cad dang / grul bum thams cad dang / dang / sha za thams cad kyang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/ nam mkha' lding yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/ nor 'dzin yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/ rlung lha yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/ sgyu

ma len gyi bu pa ro pa Ti/ she ru dro yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/ phung po 'dzin dang mdung thung 'dzin kyang de bzhin du bsdus/ de bzhin du blon po dang bcas pa dang / 'khor dang bcas pa yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus so/ /kun nas dpag tshad brgya dag tu/ /nga yis

chad pa dag byas pas/ /nga la 'byung pos byar ci yod/ /nga yis sdang ba thams cad bcom/ /gsod par gyur pa stobs po che/ /ro langs dag gis byar ci yod/ /de dag kyang ni nga'i zhags pas/ /kun nas yongs su bskor ba yin/ /zhags pa

kun gyis de dag kyang / /rmugs shing shin tu rmongs par byas/ /'di yis bdag gis kun 'grub cing / /gsang sngags tshig rnams grub gyur cig /na maHsid d+hA nAn/ sid d+hu na tu man+t+ra pA da swa sti re me sarba sa twA nAny+tsa swA hA/ sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs

gang dang / /dgra bcom rnams kyi stobs gang dang / /dam pa'i chos kyi gzi brjid kyis/ /bde legs su ni rab gyur cig /'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi gzi yis rtag tu 'jigs pa thams cad la swA hA/ cho ga ni lan drug cu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/

kai me ru dang / bal gtsang ma la sogs pa'i skud pa dmar po la mdud pa dor ro/ /de bzhin du byab pa yang bya'o/ /'byung po thams cad dang / brjed byed dang / sems rnam par g.yeng byed la sogs pa dang / dug byin pa dang / dug byas pa dang / rkang gnyis

pa dang / rkang bzhi pa rnams la kun tu 'gro ba grub pa'i mchog yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom

ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa ro langs bdun pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha sing+ha dang / ban+de ye shes snying po'i sdes bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra sing+ha dang / zhu

chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya b+ha dra rA trI nA ma sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mtshan mo bzang po zhes bya ba'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub

sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe dge slong zhig rgyal po'i khab kyi chu ta la po ta'i 'gram na 'dug go/ /de nas

lha kha dog mchog dang ldan pa zhig nam sros nas dge slong de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas chu ta la po ta'i 'gram thams cad snang bar byas te dge slong de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /dge slong khyod kyis mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde shes sam/ des 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha bdag

gis ni mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde ma 'tshal na/ lha khyod kyis mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde mkhyen tam mi mkhyen/ des 'di skad ces smras so/ /dge slong bdag gis kyang mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde mi shes so/ /lha 'o na mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde 'tshal ba de lta bu

su mchis/ des 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa 'di na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs kyis/ khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de khyod la ji ltar lung bstan pa de bzhin du zung

la brtson par gyis shig ces smras nas lha de de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas dge slong de nang par langs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs

gcig tu 'dug nas dge slong des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa mdang dgung rmongs nas bdag gi der lha kha dog mchog dang ldan pa zhig bdag ga la ba der mchis te/ chab ta la po ta'i 'gram thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab pas

snang bar bgyis nas bdag la 'di skad ces mchi'o/ /dge slong khyod kyis mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde shes sam/ bdag gis de la 'di skad ces bgyis so/ /lha bdag gis ni mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde ma 'tshal na/ lha khyod kyis mtshan mo bzang po'i

mdo sde mkhyen tam mi mkhyen/ de bdag la 'di skad ces mchi'o/ /dge slong bdag gis kyang mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde mi shes so/ /lha 'o na mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde 'tshal ba de lta bu su mchis/ des 'di skad ces mchi'o/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka

gnas pa 'di na bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song la zhus te bcom ldan 'das kyis de khyed la ji ltar lung bstan pa de bzhin du 'di zung la brtson par gyis shig ces smras nas lha de de nyid du mi gda' bar gyur to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag 'di yongs su zhu'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ dge slong khyod kyis lha de shes sam/ dge slong des gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag gis lha de ma 'tshal to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu de ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi ded dpon te tsan+dan zhes bya'o/ /dge slong des gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag kyang

mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde thos par 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong khyod de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /dge slong chos gsum dang ldan na dge slong mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde la gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /gsum

gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'das pa la rjes su phrad par mi byed pa dang / ma 'ongs pa la re ba med pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyis mi phrogs par gnas pa'i chos can te/ chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na dge slong mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde la gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad ces gsungs nas/ ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad du gsung ngo / /'das pa rjes su phrad mi byed/ /ma 'ongs pa la re ba med/ /'das pa gang yin de 'gags te/ /ma 'ongs de ni ma phyin pa'o/ /gang dag da ltar byung

ba'i chos/ /de dang de la rab bltas nas/ /rnam par rtog pas mi phrogs par/ /de dag mkhas pas khong du chud/ /sang tsam 'chi 'am su shes kyis/ /de ring nyid du rtun de bya/ /'chi bdag sde chen de dang ni/ /bdag tu shes pa ma yin no/ /sems can kun dang srog chags kun/ /'byung

po kun dang thams cad kyang / /bde ba 'ba' zhig 'grub 'gyur te/ /thams cad nyon mongs med par shog /thams cad bzang por mthong gyur te/ /gang dag sdig par ma gyur cig /de ltar gnas shing rab brtson la/ /nyin mtshan snyom las med pas na/ /de phyir mtshan mo bzang po yi/ /

mdo sde thub pas rtag tu gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad rjes su bsrung ba'i phyir mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde 'di bshad nas/ 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gsungs so/ /tad+ya thA/ bi ni bi ra Ni/ pa ni pU ra ni/ bud+d+ha marte/ ma ni ni/ Ni Ni Ni Ni/ Ti Ti

Ti Ti/ pa ra Ti/ gau ri/ gan+d+ha ri/ tsaN+Da li/ ma ta~M gi/ puk+ka si/ b+ha ma ni/ dra mi dri/ dra mi dri/ sha ba ri/ sa ra lam b+he/ hI na ma d+ha ma d+ha tra ra ni/ ma ho la na/ da la ba ni/ da la ba ni/ da la bad te/ ma hA da li ni/ tsa li ni/ muSh+Te tsakra pA ti/ ma hA tsakra pA ti/ sha ba ri sha ba ri/ ma hA sha ba ri/

b+hu tsid gi ni/ b+hU tsi rang gi ni/ ni mi/ ni mong gi ri/ ni min d+hi ni/ b+hU b+ha ni swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ e Tu Tu Tu Tu/ na Tu mir+Ni/ kir+Ni/ eng ku/ sid da ta ri/ tsa la lu/ naM tu/ nar lam lu/ gal lu/ A ba tra no ne/ she ku ni ra ba rad sa le/ tar ke/ ta re/ ta rod tu/ nor tu/ ti la la lu/ b+hU ta ba ti ya/

ba ta yi ye swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ a ra gar+De/ na ra gar+De/ pa~M su ka/ pA yi ye/ ka po ta ka pa yi ye ye ta bo d+ha ne swA hA/ dge slong rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis sems can thams cad rjes su bsrung ba'i phyir mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo dang / tshig dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang /

'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags gzhi 'chang ngam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ yid la byed dam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston na/ de'i lus la mes mi tshugs par 'gyur/ dug gis ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin/ chus ma yin/ rgyal po'i

chad pas ma yin/ rkun po'i chad pas ma yin te/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par yang mi 'gyur zhing / nges par mya ngan las 'das par nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dang gang du skyes par yang / /mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo bklags na/ /skye ba dran dang dgra bcom dang / /

dbang phyug tu yang nges par 'gyur/ /lan cig gis ni gnas kun du/ /dus min 'chi dang bar ma dor/ /bdag gis bdag la mi sbyor bar/ /dus min 'chi dang chos ma yin/ /sems can thams cad srung zhing sel/ /nad dang mya ngan 'jigs skye dang / /

rmi lam mi shes mya ngan du/ /brjod na dpal du byed par 'gyur/ /gang gis bris te skyes pa dang / /bud med lus la btags na ni/ /skal ba bzang dang gzi brjid dang / /de yi dpal yang skye bar 'gyur/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyis su/ /mi dge cung zad gang byas pa/ /

de dag thams cad bzang po'i mdos/ /dus ma yin par 'chi las skyob/ /rgyal po chu dang me dang glog /chom po nad dang dgra dag dang / /g.yul sprod pa dang 'thab par yang / /bzang po dran na skyob par byed/ /rig pa bzang po 'di dang ni/ /gsang sngags 'di dag rtag brjod na/ /

mi dag mi zhum gnas kun du/ /de bas 'di ni yid kyis brjod/ /'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal nas rig sngags 'di dag brjod par bya ste/ rig sngags

'dis bdag 'byor par gyur cig /tad+ya thA/ ni mi ni min d+hi re/ ti mi ti ming gi li/ trai lo ki ni/ a lo ki ni/ tri shU la d+ha ra Ni/ a ku pi Ni kri mi kri ti/ ko li ko li/ kud to kud to/ ku to ki si/ ku ti/ ku pi ti/ bdag dang sems can thams cad lag na rdo rje dang lhan cig tu 'jigs pa

thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / dug thams cad dang / rims thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / gdug pas zin pa thams cad dang / chom rkun thams cad dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad dang / 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang /

rnyog pa dang / sdig pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba thams cad dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis ngan par spyad pa thams cad dang / thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig /tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ tsi li/ i li mi li/ bi shI tsa na/ par+Na

sha ba ri/ tsi li tsi li swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dang /

sha zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa mtshan mo bzang po zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes
bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya o dzaHprat+yaM gi ra Ni sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mdangs phyir 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i

mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis

mdangs phyir 'phrog pa'i rig sngags zung shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /kun dga' bo gang la la zhig mdangs phyir 'phrog pa'i rig sngags 'chang ngam/ ston tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed na/ de'i mdangs phyir mi 'phrogs shing / 'phrog

par mi 'gyur ro/ /phrogs na yang phyir yang dag par gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /tad+ya thA/ phi phi le phi le me/ phi lu meM ge/ phi lu ma hi/ balgu ma ti/ sA ra ba ti/ k+Shi ra ba ti/ ku ru mA ti/ u

ta ba la ni/ go ri/ gan+d+ha ri/ tsau ri/ tsaN+Da li/ stu re stu ba re/ in+d+ra mA li ni/ dza la ni/ so bA ke tri k+Sho Sha me sA ga re/ ma hA sA ga re/ phu ru tse/ phu ru tsu re/ sa ne ma ne/ da ba phe/ da dam pa phe/ hu lu hu lu swA hA/ rig sngags 'di bka' stsal ba na/ stong gsum

gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos pa nas/ 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs pa'i bar du gyur to/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyang / kye ma'o sdug bsngal lo/ /kye ma'o nyam thag

go zhes ngu zhing skad chen po sgra chen po 'byin cing 'khod do/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ngas bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis mdangs phyir 'phrog pa'i rig sngags 'di gsungs pa'i bden pa dang /

bden pa'i tshig des ngas bsrung bar bya'o/ /bde legs su 'gyur ba'i bar du'o/ /de'i mdangs 'phrog par bya'o/ /phyir dbrog par bya'o/ /nye bar bsgrub par bya'o/ /gnod sbyin gyis zin tam/ mi dang mi ma yin pas zin na dus de dang / tshod de dang / yud tsam de la mdangs 'phrog go/

phyir mi 'phrog go/ /rnam par 'jug go/ /gal te 'phrog cing phyir mi 'phrog par mi byed de/ gnas na 'dug bzhin du rnam par mi 'jig cing / yang 'joms par 'dod dam/ 'phrog par 'dod par gyur na/ des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa nyan thos kyi tshogs dang

bcas pa de mi mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa mdangs phyir 'phrog pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo

rdzogs so// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsak+Shur bi sho d+ha ni nA ma bi d+yA man+t+ra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mig rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i grong rdal bzang po zhig na shAkya rnams kyi nang na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe sta du sa zhes bya ba na shAkya bde ba zhes bya ba sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa/ chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa/ sangs rgyas la skyabs

su song / chos la skyabs su song / dge 'dun la skyabs su song / sangs rgyas la gcig tu phyogs/ chos la gcig tu phyogs/ dge 'dun la gcig tu phyogs/ sangs rgyas la nem nur med cing the tshom med/ chos dang / dge 'dun dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang /

'gog pa dang / lam la nem nur med cing the tshom med la bden pa mthong ba/ 'bras bu thob pa/ mngon par rtogs par gyur pa/ mtshon cha dang / dbyig pa bor ba zhig gnas pa de'i mig la snang ba dang / mi snang ba'i gzugs rnams snang bar ma gyur nas/ de sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das la dad pa skyes te yid la byed cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snang ba mdzad pa/ sgron ma 'dzin pa/ gsal ba 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde bar gshegs pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa gsal bar mdzad

du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mig rnam par sbyong du gsol zhes byas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das lha'i gnas pa la bzhugs pa/ lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas shAkya bde bas tshig de skad brjod pa gsan to/ /gsan nas kyang ting nge 'dzin de las

bzhengs te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la mig rnam par sbyong ba'i rig sngags 'dis shAkya bde ba la bsrung ba gyis shig /yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs

su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug bsad pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / sa bcing ba gyis shig /de dang de bzhin du 'khor bzhi po dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang /

dge bsnyen ma rnams dang / sems can gzhan gyi mig kyang rnam par sbyongs shig /mig gi sbubs rnam par sbyongs shig /mig gi skyon med par gyis shig /tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ ki li mi li/ hi li te mi li/ hu yA hu yA hu yA ma ni/ hu lu hu lu hu lu/

hu du hu du hu du/ tsak+Shur me bi sho d+ha ya swA hA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo mig rnam par sbyong ba 'di ni mig gi skyon dang / rlung gi skyon dang / mkhris pa'i skyon dang / bad kan gyi skyon dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa'i skyon sel te/ tshul khrims kyi bden

pa dang / brtul zhugs kyi bden pa dang / drang srong rnams kyi bden pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang / kun 'byung gi bden pa dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa dang / lam gyi bden pa dang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyi bden pa dang /

rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bden pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bden pas shAkya bde ba'i mig na bar ma gyur cig /mchi ma 'dzag par ma gyur cig /kun tu mchi ma 'dzag par ma gyur cig /bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi mig rnam par dag par

gyur cig swA hA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo mig rnam par sbyong ba 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drug gis gsungs pa'o/ /nga yang da ltar 'chad de/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha rnams kyi bdag po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang rjes

su yi rang ngo / /kun dga' bo gang gis rig sngags 'di dus gsum du brjod na de la thibs por 'gyur ba'am/ rab rib bam/ ling tog gam/ mig nad sngon por mthong ba'am/ mig gi yul gyi skyon lha las gyur ba rnams sam/ klu las gyur pa rnams sam/ dri za las

gyur pa rnams sam/ gnod sbyin las gyur pa rnams sam/ srin po las gyur pa rnams sam/ sha za las gyur pa rnams sam/ byad las gyur pa rnams sam/ ro langs las gyur pa rnams sam/ ro langs dang byad las gyur pa rnams sam/ kun tu rgyu las gyur ba rnams

sam/ kun tu rgyu dang ro langs las gyur pa rnams kyis tshugs par 'gyur ba ni lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na ngas ma

mthong ste de ni gnas med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol nas/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams bzung ste/ kun chub par byas nas shAkya bde ba ga la ba der song ste/ bde ba mig rnam par

sbyong ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pas khyod la bskur gyis nyin re zhing dus gsum du dran par gyis shig ces de la rgyas par smras so/ /shAkya bde bas thos ma thag kho nar mig rnam par dag ste/ mig rnam par dag pas dri ma med pa'i mig gis

thams cad mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / shAkya bde ba dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa mig rnam

par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags rdzogs so// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ak+Shi ro ga pra sha ma ni sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mig nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nag po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po 'dir mig nad dag byung na de dag la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nag po mig nad kyi sngags kyi tshig 'di dag yod de/ tad+ya thA/ ru d+hi re phuH/ ru d+hi ra ak+Shi phuH/ ru d+hi ra piM ga le phuH/ bA te

phuH/ ba te le phuH/ han+te phuH/ mA~M sa dun+da b+hi phuH/ pad+ma ak+Shi phuH/ pad+ma daN+Da hi ra NI ye phuHswA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nag po yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /cho ga

ni 'di yin te/ srad bu dkar po la lan bdun bzlas pa byas te mdud pa bdun dor ro/ /chu la lan bdun bzlas pa byas la lag pas bya bas na mig nad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa mig nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo rdzogs so// //

@#/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ar+sha pra sha ma ni sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gzhang 'brum rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das

rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa'i tshal na dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bco lnga'i gso sbyong zla ba nya ba de nyid kyi tshe dge 'dun gyi mdun du gdan bshams pa la bzhugs

so/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na rnga yab thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs nas/

bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'di na dge slong gzhang 'brum can mang po dag gzhang 'brum gyi bro nad kyis gzir te/ sdug bsngal mi bzad pa drag po mi bde ba yid du

mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzhang 'brum sel ba'i mdo 'di

long shig /kun dga' bo gang la la zhig gis gzhang 'brum sel ba'i mdo'i ming dang / tshig dang / yi ge shes na de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gzhang 'brum gyi nad kyis btab par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs bdun gyi bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ a lan+te/ a ma le/

shwa li tsi ni ku she sam+b+ha be swA hA/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ byang phyogs na ri'i rgyal po gangs zhes bya ba de na sA la'i shing rnam par rgyal byed ces bya ba de'i me tog gsum yod de/ gcig ni 'phel ba zhes bya/ gnyis pa ni 'jam pa zhes bya/ gsum pa ni skam po zhes bya ste/ ji ltar

de bskams pa de bzhin du sems can rnams kyi rlung gi 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig /mkhris pa'i 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig /bad kan gyi 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig /mi gtsang ba'i 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig /khrag gi 'brum bu bskams par gyur

cig /'dus pa'i 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig /de bzhin du bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi bad kan gyi 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig /mi gtsang ba'i 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig /khrag gi 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig /'dus pa'i 'brum bu bskams

par gyur cig /sna'i 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig /'phyang ba'i 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig /tad+ya thA/ sha me sha mA ne/ sha me sha mA ne swA hA/ na bar ma gyur cig /rengs par ma gyur cig /sgra 'byung bar ma gyur cig /'dzag par ma gyur cig /sdug bsngal

bar ma gyur cig /rab tu sdug bsngal bar ma gyur cig /zag par ma gyur cig /rab tu zag par ma gyur cig /'di nyid du zad pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / med par gyur cig /sa'i 'og tu song shig /na mo b+ha ga ba te/ bud+d+ha ya sa t+ya bA tI na~M/ sid+d+h+yan+tu man+t+ra pa deHswA hA/

bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /de la cho ga ni 'di yin te/ bklags pas grub pa 'di srad bu dmar po la lan bdun bzlas pa byas la/ mdud pa bdun

bor te mgul du gdags so/ /'phags pa gzhang 'brum rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba ro ga pra sha ma ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/

bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /

kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston cig /tad+ya thA/ tsi le mi/ tsi le mi/ pa na ko ki li/ shrI ma ti/ kuN+Da li/ dun+du b+hi/ in+d+ra ni mu khe swA hA/ 'di dag ni zas ma zhu ba dang / sbos pa dang / khrag dang mkhris pa 'dres pa dang /

gzhang 'brum gyis btab pa dang / gzhang nad can dang / za khu dang / lud pa can dang / rims nad can dang / klad pa na ba dang / gzhogs phyed na ba dang / kyis zin pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi yin te/ kun dga' bo gang gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag

las 'gal bar byed pa de ni ngas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ma mthong ngo / /tshe zad pa ni ma gtogs so/ /gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas ni sems can

thams cad kyi mchog go/ /'dod chags dang bral ba ni chos thams cad kyi mchog go/ /dge 'dun ni tshogs thams cad kyi mchog go/ /bden pa'i tshig dang / bden pa'i ngag 'dis bdag gis zos pa dang / 'thungs pa dang / 'chos pa dang / myangs pa rnams legs par bde

bar zhu bar gyur cig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// //

@#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje bla ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ badzra badzra/ ma hA badzra sarba b+h+ya d+hi ha na ha na badzre na swA hA/ 'phags pa nad thams cad

rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// @#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa 'od dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ i li mi ti me li/ ha ne su ha ne/ che ge mo zhig dz+wa ra ban+d+hA mi/ e ka hi kaM /tri hi kaM/ tsa turtsa ka~M /

ni t+ya dz+wa raM swA hA/ cho ga ni 'di bris te mgul du btags na rims nad med par byed do/ /rims nad zhi ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dz+wa ra pra sha ma ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rims nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i

gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal na bzhugs te/ de nas dge slong zhig bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/

phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas dge slong des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di na sems can rims nad kyis rnam par gtses pa dag

mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsrung du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snam logs su gzigs te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo phyogs 'di na me lce phreng ba zhes pa'i rims gnas te/ de sems can rnams la nyin gcig

pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa'i tshul gyis rnam par 'tshe bar byed de/ de bsrung ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di dag yin no/ /tad+ya thA/ dz+wa la ni dz+wa la ni/ pra dz+wa la ni/ pra ti pa ni/ pra sha ma ni/ bdag gi rims nad song shig /ma 'dug cig/

swA hA/ bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis 'jig rten na sangs rgyas bla na med pa dang / 'jig rten na chos dang / dge 'dun bla na med pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des bdag gi rims nad song shig /ma 'dug cig swA hA/ sid+d+h+yan+tu man+t+ra pa dai/ /

ta ra tu/ bid+ya taM brah+ma a nu mo te swA hA/ skud pa nag po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig dor ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par

bstod do/ /'phags pa rims nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shA la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //

@#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ he b+ha ga bA na many+dzu shrI ku mA ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ ba la bi d+hi dz+nya/ sarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ nA gai sti tiSh+Tha sarba satwA nAM swA hA/ 'brum bu'i nad zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// @#/ /mdangs phyir mi 'phrog pa

zhes bya ba bai DUr+ya'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM ma ma rak+Sha/ sA ga re ma hA sA ga re/ pu ru tse pu ru tsu ru/ sa ma ne me/ de ba be hu lu hu lu swA hA/ gla rtsi dang / shu dag dang / b+hi su nag po la lde gu byas te/ lkog mar thig le byas te sngags lan bdun bzlas na/ 'byung

po rnams kyis de'i mdangs 'phrog pa lta ci smos kyi/ blta bar yang mi nus so rdzogs so// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bai shA lI pra be sha ma hA sU traM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo chen po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub

sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dam bu'i khrod na gzings pa'i 'dug gnas na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo

yangs pa'i grong khyer ga la ba der 'dong ngo / /btsun pa de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das yul bri dzir yul rgyu zhing gshegs te/ yangs pa'i grong khyer du byon nas yangs pa'i grong

khyer gyi a mra srung ba'i tshal na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yangs pa'i grong khyer du song la phyin nas sgo'i them pa la rkang pa zhog ste/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smros

shig /bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsams pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ slob pa thams cad kyis

bsams pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ chos kyis bsams pa/ tshangs pas bsams pa/ tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/ dbang pos bsams pa/ lhas

bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/ /muny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/

muny+tsa ta/ ma 'dug cig /yams kyi nad rnam par zhi bar gyur cig /nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ sangs rgyas lha chen po lha'i yang lha/ lha'i bla ma/ gshegs shing / dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / dbang bdag

dang bcas pa rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong / lha 'bum phrag du ma dag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po 'bum

phrag du ma dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ongs te/ de dag khyed rnams la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur ru 'ong gis/ /nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ myur du byed cig /khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar

gyur cig /gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la srung bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig /lus la yang 'jug par gyis shig /sangs rgyas shig /sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/ su mu su mu/ su mu su mu/ su mu/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/

su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru

mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu rU ri ti/ ri ri ri ri ri ri/ rI rI rI rI rI rI/ ti mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri ti/ ha si mi ri/ mI rI ti/ mi ti/ si sI/ si mI/ ka~M ka ra/ ka ra ka ta/ ka~M ka ra/ ka~M ka tsa/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka

rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka ro tI ti/ ku ri sha~M ka~M ka ra/ ka~M ka ri she/ ri ri ri ri ri ri/ ti re te phu swA/ ri pu ri pu/ ri pu ri pu/ ri pu ri pu/ ri pu/ nA thA nA nA thA tha/ ri pu/ ri pu/ nA thA tha/ nirgats+tsha ta/ ri pu/ ri pu/ nirgats+tsha ta/ pa yA tha/ ri pU/ ri pU/ pa lA ya ta/

sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/ sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa dang ldan pa/ byams pa la gnas pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa/ dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs kyis k+Shi phran ni rgats+tsha ta swA hA/ sangs rgyas kyi

ye shes kyi mchog dang / chos nyid kyis lha thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal ba'i gsang sngags kyis gzhi 'di 'di dag ni grub pa'o/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o/ /gang la ser sna rnam chags pa/ /rnam bcom dri ma med mdzad cing / /

thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/ /thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing / /chos rnams thams cad ston pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten/ /sems

can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi/ /thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun/ /bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'khor bar

'khor ba yi/ /sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing / /gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/ /gtsang zhing bslu ba mi mnga' la/ /gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /

dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pa/ /phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing / /don grub tshogs kyang grub pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni/ /nags tshal bcas pa rab g.yos shing / /sems can thams cad rab dga' des/ /khyed la

bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /byang chub snying por gshegs pa na/ sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing / /bdud yid mi bder gyur pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnam gsung ba/ /thub pa'i snyam pa gang

byung des/ /khyed la bde legs byed par 'gyur/ /yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed/ /thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing / /tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad/ /brgya byin lhar bcas

bde legs dang / /'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni/ /khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig /sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang / /lha rnams kyis ni bsams pa yis/ /khyed rnams don 'dod gang yin pa/ /don de grub gyur cig /rkang gnyis khyed chag bde legs

shog /rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog /khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog /phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog /nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/ /nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing / /khyed cag kun tu bde legs shog /khyed cag sdig

par ma gyur cig /sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis/ /yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis/ /sdang sems ldan pa rnams byed cig /snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khor/ /sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis/ /'jig

rten mi phan byed pa rnams/ /grong khyer 'dir ni gtong gyur cig /sems can kun dang srog chags kun/ /'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun/ /bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig /thams cad nad rnams med par shog /kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig /gang yang

sdig par ma gyur cig /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur te/ /sa dang bar snang dag la gnas pa rnams/ /skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog /nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig /de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa de

ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas yangs pa'i grong khyer du song ste/ sgo'i them pa la rkang pa bzhag nas gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/ /bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten

la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ rangs sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsams pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams

cad kyis bsams pa/ chos kyis bsams pa/ tshangs bas bsams pa/ tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/ dbang pos bsams pa/ lhas bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/ lha ma yin thams cad kyis

bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/ /muny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/ muny+tsa ta/ ma 'dug

shig/ yams kyi nad thams cad zhi bar gyur cig /nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ sangs rgyas lha chen po lha'i yang lha/ lha'i bla ma gshegs shing / dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / dbang bdag dang bcas

pa rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong / lha stong phrag du ma dag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po brgya

stong mang po dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ongs te/ de dag khyed la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur gyis/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ nirgats+tsha ta/ myur du byer cig /khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig /

gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la srung bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig /lus la yang 'jug par gyis shig /sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/ su mu/ su mu/ su mu/ su mu/ su mu/ su mu ru/

su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru

mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu rU ri ti/ ri ri ri ri/ riri/ rI rI rI rI/ rI rI ti/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi rI ti/ ha si mi mi rI ti/ sI si ma/ ka~M ka rA/ ka ra ka ta/ ka ra ka ra ka ra/ ka tsa/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/

ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka ro tI ti ku ri sho ka~M ka rA/ ka~M ka rI she/ ri ri ri ri/ riri rI/ ta ra te pu swA/ ri pu/ ri pu/ ri pu/ ri pu/ ri pu/ ri pu/ ri pu/ ri pu/ nA thA/ nA nA thA thA/ ri pu ri pu/ na thA thA/ nirgats+tsha ta/ ri pu ri

pu/ nirgats+tsha ta/ pa la yA tra/ ri pu ri pu/ pa la yA tra/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa dang ldan pa/ byams pa la gnas pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa/ dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa/

gshegs kyis k+Shi phran nirgats+tsha ta swA hA/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mchog dang / chos nyid kyis lha thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o/ /gang la ser sna rnam

chags pa/ /rnam bcom dri ma med mdzad cing / /thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/ /thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing / /chos rnams thams cad ston pa des/ /khyed la bde legs

mdzad par 'gyur/ /ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi/ /thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun/ /bu gcig bzhin du rtag

bskyangs des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi/ /sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing / /gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/ /gtsang zhing bslu

ba mi mnga' la/ /gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pas/ /phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing / /don grub tshogs kyang grub pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /

gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni/ /nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos shing / /sems can thams cad rab dga' des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /byang chub snying por gang zhig gis/ /sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing / /bdud yid mi bder gyur pa des/ /

khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnam gsung ba/ /thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed/ /thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing / /

tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa des/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad/ /brgya byin lhar bcas bde legs dang / /'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni/ /khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig /sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang / /

lha rnams kyis ni bsams pa yis/ /khyed kyi don 'dod gang yin pa/ /don de de ring grub gyur cig /rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog /rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog /khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog /phyir ldog dag kyang bde legs

shog/ /nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/ /nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing / /khyed cag kun du bde legs shog /khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis/ /yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis/ /sdang sems

ldan pa rnams byer cig /snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod/ /sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis/ /'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams/ /grong khyer 'dir ni gtong gyur cig /sems can kun dang srog chags kun/ /

'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun/ /bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig /thams cad nad rnams med par shog /kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig /gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing / /

sa dang bar snang dag la gnas pa rnams/ /skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog /nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig /'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de

ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsau ra bi d+h+wa na sa na nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mi rgod rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag

'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das zham 'bring ba tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thabs cig tu lus 'phags ri la gshegs pa'i tshe/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mi rgod phal po che zhig rgyang ring mo nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang skrag

ste spu zing zhes byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das mi rgod dag cig go/ /bde bar gshegs pa mi rgod dag cig go/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod mi rgod rnams kyis 'jigs sam/ gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das 'jigs lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa 'jigs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod mi rgod rnams kyis ma 'jigs shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gti mug chen po'i tshogs rab tu 'joms

pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /tad+ya thA/ a nu lo me/ pra ti lo me/ a nu lo ma/ pra ti lo ma/ a tiM ke/ pra tiM ke/ pa~M ke/ a ti paM ke/ gau ri/ gan+d+ha ri/ tsaN+Da li/ ma taM gi/ pUk+ka si/ ri mi ri mi/ rid d+hi ma tsi baSh+Ti ti tsau ra pra dan du/ bis+tha han tu/ b+ha man tu/ mA mi yan tu/ yA

bad+g+ran+thi na muny+tsa mi swA hA/ kun dga' bo ngas dpag tshad bcu tshun chad kun tu bsrung ba dang / mi rgod thams cad dang / ri gseb kyi grong mi thams cad dang / gseb lam srung ba thams cad dang / gnod par sems pa thams cad kyi rkang pa bcing bar byas so/ /rmugs

par byas so/ /rengs par byas so/ /ji ltar rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo bskor ba'am/ ji ltar rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor ba ltar mi rgod rnams 'dar bar gyur cig /rengs par gyur cig /mgo rmongs par gyur cig /mdud pa ma grol ba'i bar du mchi bar

ma gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /cho ga ni shing kun dang / bong bu'i spu bsres te/ bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i srad bu la

lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o/ /yang na gos kyi mtha' ma la mdud pa bor te/ bde bar phyin nas dgrol bar bya'o/ /'di ni grub pa'o/ /'phags pa mi rgod rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba an+ta ra sa~M grA sa d+hA ra NI man+t+ra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad sel ba'i gzungs sngags/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bzlas brjod byed pa de la ni dug dang / mtshon gyis 'chi ba dang / ltogs pa dang / mtshon brgyab pa dang / gcan gzan ma rungs pas za ba dang /

mes tshig pa dang / chur 'chi ba dang / 'go ba'i rims gzhan ya nga ba dang / mdze'i nad dang / gsor mi rung ba'i nad ya nga ba dang / g.yang la lhung ba dang / gzhan gyi byad dang / zas kyis brnangs pa dang / bdag rang gis gsod pa dang / de ltar gshis ngan du 'chi ba
