brjod drag skad mdun du lta/ /sa gsum g.yo byed zla gam stabs/ /rkang g.yon brkyang ba'i stabs dang ni/ /ha ha brjod cing zhabs rgya bcing / /phan tshun bsnol nas bgegs la bsnun/ /'khor lo phyag rgya phye mar bya/ /rkang g.yas brkyang ba'i stabs dang ni/ /rdo rje

thal mo mkha' la bsnun/ /khro gnyer mig can ma mchu mnan/ /yan lag gnyis gnyis me ltar sprad/ /rkang pa mnyam stabs hUM sgra can/ /lag gnyis sdigs mdzub phyag rgya'o/ /rkang gnyis mnyam du bzhag pa las/ /g.yas kyi g.yon bskor lte ba yin/ /

mdun du g.yas te rgyab tu g.yon/ /gya tshom gsum gsum mnan pa ni/ /rtse gsum yin te rtse gsum rgya/ /lag pa steng brkyang dbyig bsgreng ltar/ /bgegs la bsnun zhing 'bru tshugs blta/ /g.yas su tho ba hUM brjod brdeg /g.yon pa snying ga'i sdigs mdzub

ste/ /gnyis ka bgrad pa 'khor lo bya/ /nub bltas rkang pa mnyam bzhag nas/ /mdun g.yas rgyab dang g.yon phyogs su/ /g.yon pas bgegs gsum mnan bya zhing / /rim pas me dang ral gri dang / /sdigs mdzub zhags pa phyogs bzhir bcing / /ha hUM

drag brjod brjid gnon rgya/ /rkang gnyis pus 'khyud lag pa gnyis/ /gru mo bsgyur na thig gis mnan/ /bgegs bskrad phyir ni 'bru tshugs blta/ /rtse gcig rdo rje stabs su bcad/ /rkang pa g.yas g.yon res kyis bskor/ /lho byang g.yon te shar nub g.yas/ /

brkyang zhing drag tu brdab par bya/ /rgyab nas drang dang tho ba dang / /rdo rje dang ni zhags pa'i rgya/ /phyogs bzhir bya ste 'khor lo'i stabs/ /phyag rgya dang ni stang stabs kyis/ /phyogs skyong rnams kyang skrag byed na/ /'byung po'i tshogs 'joms smos ci dgos/ /thams cad dbang

du sdud par byed/ /de nas phyogs bcu bcing ba yi/ /rkang stabs khyad par bshad par bya/ /shar du rkang pa mnyam pa yis/ /rdo rje thal mo gyen du brdeg /lhor ni rkang rting sprad de ga dang / /hUM sgrogs thal mo mdun rgyab sbyar/ /nub tu rkang sprad lag pa gnyis/ /so sor sdigs

mdzub gyen du brkyang / /byang du ral gri'i phyag rgya dang / /rkang pa ya gcig sa la bsgreng / /khu tshur mdzub sbyar dpral bar bzlog /rkang gnyis mnyam byas res kyis phyar/ /mche gtsigs hUM sgrags khro gnyer blta/ /byang shar thig ler grags pa'i rgya/ /khu tshur mthe'u

chung mche ba'i rgya/ /rkang pa res bteg shar lhor phye/ /lho nub rkang gnyis res kyis brdab/ /zhags pas 'debs dang ral gris gcod/ /nub byang rkang gnyis brdab pa dang / /lag gnyis mtheb sprad 'khor lo bskor/ /yang na tshe gcig phyag rgyas gdab/ /

stang stabs thams cad ha hUM sgrogs/ /de nas rig sngags bzlog pa yi/ /phyag rgya cho ga bshad par bya/ /khu tshur gung mo brkyang rtse sprad/ /mdzub gnyis de yi 'gram du bcang / /sngags dang phyag rgya thams cad kyis/ /lha klu srin po gnod sbyin dang / /mkha'

'gro 'byung po mi ma yin/ /gsod dang skrod de me ltar mdzad/ /'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las sngags dang phyag rgya'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //bla na med pa'i ras ris sku/ /cho ga de nas bshad par bya/ /bris sku 'dod pas

thams cad du/ /dge ba'i ras btsal nas kyang / /bkrus te sngags kyis bsrung byas la/ /ngur smrig tu ni bsgyur bar bya/ /rgyud dal zhing dul bag yod/ /chos thos ri mo mkhas la sgrin/ /sred chung yid gzhungs khro med pas/ /sen rtsi shun

kan tsha la sbyar/ /spong dang mu zi kan ltar ljang / /ba bla kra ni bla na ser/ /li khri sgo nga mtshal spags dmar/ /rams dang mthing shun bru nir sngo/ /sbyig dang any+dza nag po ste/ /she twa dag kyang dkar por 'gyur/ /sa snod so btang skags snyigs byug /pir

'jam rab 'bring tha ma bri/ /rgyal dang sa ri nam gru dang / /snron snrubs smin drug lha mtshams shis/ /de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /thub pa'i dge ba ras ris la/ /dbus su byang chub shing mchog drung / /gser mdog 'khor lo sgyur ba'i chas/ /

chos 'chad phyag rgya ngur smrig mnabs/ /logs su 'dab rgyal po gnyis/ /snyim pa me tog bkang ba'i gzugs/ /g.yas su 'jig rten dbang po dkar/ /ngur smrig gyon pas thal mo sbyar/ /de yi zhabs su mi g.yo ba/ /spyan gsum

khros pa klu yis brgyan/ /na ra'i stod g.yogs stag smad dkris/ /rin chen rgyan can do ker can/ /rdo ba dmar po'i khri steng na/ /ral gri dang ni zhags pa dang / /g.yon pa cung zad brkyang ste bzhengs/ /gtso bo'i g.yon gyi phyogs cha la/ /rdo rje 'dzin sngo

ngur smrig can/ /rdo rje dang ni zhags pa 'chang / /de yi 'og tu sgrub po ni/ /pus btsugs spos kyi khang bu 'dzin/ /gtso bo'i zhabs su khro bo che/ /nag po khams gsum brtan pa yi/ /lag gnyis rin chen khri la bteg /gtso bo sna tshogs pad+ma ste/ /

'jig rten dbang dang khro bo yi/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang bsgrub pa'i sngo/ /yan lag lnga pa sdong po gcig /klu yi bu mo mdzes ma gnyis/ /pang gis 'khyud de 'dzin par mdzad/ /zhi ba rgyas pa dbang gi phyir/ /de nas bris sku yang dag bshad/ /dbus su shAkya thub

pa dang / /g.yas su 'phags pa 'jam dpal te/ /g.yon du phyag na rdo rje'o/ /bsnyen pa'i don du ras ris ni/ /shin tu blta dka' gsus po che/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi klu yis brgyan/ /kha nas khrag 'dzag lce 'dril ba/ /mche gtsigs hriHsgra

cher sgrogs pa/ /spyan gsum nyi ma shar ka'i 'od/ /ngur smrig man bas pa char sprin mdog /sku la thod rlon phreng ba can/ /dbu la thod pa tshar bzhis brgyan/ /g.yon du rin chen zur phud 'phyang / /bskal pa'i me 'od 'bar ba yis/ /phyogs kyi bgegs

tshogs sreg par mdzad/ /g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje ste/ /gnyis pas ral gri 'od 'bar 'chang / /g.yon gyi dang po rdo rje zhags/ /gnyis pa sdigs mdzub brkyang ste mdzad/ /rin chen rdo yi khri stengs su/ /bgegs kyi rgyal po mnan nas kyang / /g.yon brkyang

pa yi gar gyis gnas/ /de yi mdun du zhi ba'i byed/ /spos khang bzung ba'i sgrub po bri/ /ci 'byor rgyun du mchod par bya/ /mngon spyod bsgrub pa'i ras ris ni/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /dur khrod ras la mi g.yo ba/ /mdog nag spyan gsum zur mig lta/ /

ngur smrig gos gyon khro gnyer ldan/ /ral gri dang ni zhags pa 'chang / /bris nas bdag gi khrag gis ni/ /spyan phye gsol ba btab par bya/ /ri mo 'di ni rig 'dzin kyang / /sgrub po mngon spyod smos ci dgos/ /yang na sna tshogs las kyi phyir/ /mthing ga na ra'i

rgyan can ni/ /brkyang bskum rdo rje dril bu 'dzin/ /pad+ma zla ba la bzhugs bri/ /dmag dpung rengs pa'i ras ris ni/ /gser mdog khro bo mi g.yo ba/ /mi sdug mche ba gtsigs pa'i sku/ /'bar phreng 'khrigs pa'i 'od ldan pa/ /zhal bzhi phyag kyang bzhi pa ste/ /

ral gri zhags pa dang por 'dzin/ /rin po che dang sdigs mdzub 'og /zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi snying gar ro/ /de nas rig 'dzin dngos grub kyi/ /ras ris bri ba yang dag bshad/ /mi g.yo khro bo zhal gcig pa/ /mdangs bzang zar ma'i me tog mdog /ral gri

zhags pa sdigs mdzub can/ /pus mo g.yas bteg g.yon pa ni/ /sa la cung zad btsugs par mdzad/ /mkha' la lha yi bu gnyis kyis/ /dbugs 'byin mdzad pa nyams dga'i gzugs/ /g.yas su rnam snang mdzad bri ste/ /g.yon du 'od dpag med pa'o/ /

de mdun sgrub po nyid kyang bri/ /gang yang rig ma thams cad la/ /mchod de me tog gtor nas kyang / /spyan phye na bza' gsol byas te/ /rten 'brel sngags kyis rab gnas bya/ /de rjes smon lam gdab pa ni/ /oM ldan bdag gis bsags pa yi/ /bsod nams

grangs med gzhal mi lang / /des ni 'gro ba ma lus pa/ /bla med go 'phang thob par shog /sems can dmyal ba dud 'gro dang / /gang dag grangs med rnams/ /bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis ni/ /thams cad bde dang ldan gyur cig /gang yang

lha mi dbul phongs dang / /mi nad mu ge dgra chom sogs/ /bdag gi bsod nams mthu yis ni/ /de dag thams cad bral gyur shog /ji snyed sems can thams cad rnams/ /de snyed sdug bsngal rgya mtsho kun/ /sna tshogs de dag kun zhi nas/ /'ga' yang sdug

bsngal med par shog /sems can gang dag lus ngag yid/ /mi dge spyod pa bral gyur nas/ /dge ba phun tshogs spyod gyur te/ /kun kyang bde ldan thob gyur shog /de nas rgyal sras kun btud de/ /lag na dri dang me tog sogs/ /mchod pa'i yo byad

kun thogs nas/ /bla 'og tha dad gsal bya'i phyir/ /bde gshegs bsdu don 'di skad brjod/ /oM bde bar gshegs pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ /skyob pa dngos su bzhugs pa rnams/ /bdag la slar yang brtse ba'i phyir/ /rgyal ba sras bcas la mi

mnga'/ /bdag don grub par 'gro ba la/ /brtse phyir slar yang byon par mdzod/ /de nas gtor ma me tog dri/ /dkyil 'khor rgyan dang rdul tshon rnams/ /dngos grub dam tshig gnod spang phyir/ /lag pas reg par mi bya ste/ /gos kyi phur ma la

sogs pa/ /ci bde pas ni phyags nas kyang / /skye 'gag med pa'i sngags brjod nas/ /chu bo la ni dor bar bya/ /'bras dang 'o ma sha kha ra/ /mar dang bcas pa bskol byas te/ /'bras zan dang ni lhan cig tu/ /dga' bskyed phyir du dge 'dun dang / /

bram ze la ni ston mo bya/ /de nas bris sku brtan par ni/ /gsang ba'i gnas su mchod par bya/ /khyad par tshes brgyad dus su mchod/ /bla ma la ni yon dbul zhing / /rtag tu sngags 'dzin thams cad kyang / /mnyes par bya zhing khros pa min/ /sems

can ma mos spang bar bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la nges bskyed de/ /the tshom le lo spang bar bya'o/ /rang gi phung po bsnyen bkur phyir/ /khrus dang gtsang sbra ldan byas nas/ /gos sbra dri ma med pa bgo/ /zas kyang 'bras sogs dri med la/ /nyung du

bza' zhing btung bar bya/ /pas gnyid dang le lo dang / /dri nga ba ni bskyed par 'gyur/ /tho rangs dang por langs nas ni/ /srod thal bar du brtson par bya/ /nam gyi gung la gnyid pa'i tshe/ /'gro la phan bya'i sems kyis nyal/ /'phags

pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las bris sku'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ste/ /lha bsgom pa yi rim pa ni/ /rang gzugs stong par byas nas su/ /yi ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo las/ /sgra grags pa na rig

pa che/ /zla ba'i gzugs brnyan lta bur snang / /der son pa ni rdo rje sogs/ /rang gi phyag rgya nyid yin no/ /de las gyur pa'i sku mchog ni/ /'ja' tshon shar ba ji lta bar/ /mtshan dpe mdangs 'od yang dag ldan/ /brjid cing dgyes pa'i mdangs dang

ldan/ /sgeg cing rol pa'i cha byad ni/ /byis pa gzhon nu'i lang tsho 'dra/ /rin chen rgyan dang na bza' ni/ /gzugs mdzes lha yi ci lta ba/ /khros pa'i srin po lta bu ste/ /skra dang kha spu la sogs pa/ /spu sogs ser zhing rtsub la 'khyil/ /sna

tshogs dur khrod rgyan rnams ni/ /rtsub cing blo ldan rab tu khros/ /na bza' rlon pa khrag can ni/ /steng gi khyams su yod par mdzad/ /ha ha hUM hUM phaT phaT kyi/ /ngar skad 'brug sgra spyugs glu ni/ /ri rab 'bum bsnyil chal chom ltar/ /lus rab ltos 'gros

brgyan pa ni/ /gzi ldan 'khyud cing phuT sgra 'don/ /'phro 'du 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /nyi 'bum dus me'i bskal pa 'dra/ /rab gdug mtshon cha du ma ni/ /lha min dus kyi 'khrug pa'i cha/ /khro bo khro mo'i tshogs 'byung ba/ /thams cad yi ge hUM sgra can/ /

ma mo dang ni mkha' 'gro rnams/ /b+h+yo yig drag po'i bdag nyid can/ /thub pa yi ge mu~M las bskyed/ /rgyal sras rig ma nyan thos dang / /'jig rten skyong rnams sngags 'dis bskyed/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sa pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM sarba saM ska ra

pa ri shud+d+he/ d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te swa b+hA ba pa ri shud+d+he/ ma hA na ya pa ri wA re swA hA/ rang gi lus la sems bcug nas/ /sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi/ /ngang tshul bzang por yang dag byung / /rig par gyur pa'i sems ldan nas/ /drang srong rdzu 'phrul

can du 'gyur/ /gzhan yang sdug bsngal zhi nus na/ /rang gi bde thob smos ci dgos/ /rang rang rigs kyi lha rnams kyi/ /gzugs brnyan phyag mtshan kha dog ni/ /dkyil 'khor ram ni ris ma las/ /gsung ba ji ltar bsgom par bya/ /de nas

mi g.yo khro bo che/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa phyag 'tshal nas/ /dag cing gsal la snyan pa yis/ /tshig gi yang ni 'di gsol to/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa bcom ldan 'das/ /gtum mo mtshan nyid rab ldan pa'i/ /nga yi mtshan nyid khyod bshad nas/ /de tshe rdo rje

'dzin rgyal pos/ /gtum mo'i cha byad ldan byas nas/ /rang gzugs sngags dang bcas pa yis/ /gsang chen brda 'di bka' stsal to/ /dag pa'i sems nyid hUM rdo rje/ /mthing ga'i mdog las rdo rje 'dzin/ /mthing ga brkyang bskum khro sems can/ /

na ra'i rgyan bcas 'jigs byed sku/ /gyen skra kha spu gyon ser dmar/ /pad+ma zla ba'i steng du ni/ /me yi nang bzhugs rdor dril 'chang / /rnam snang 'dzin dang gnyis dang po/ /bzhi pa'i lnga pa de'i gsum pa/ /lnga pa'i lnga pa bdun pa'i bzhi/ /me

yi sa bon dgug pas mnan/ /bdun pa'i dang po gsum pa yin/ /gsum pas bteg go hU~M phaT bcas/ /gsang sngags rgyal po bla med 'di/ /dgos pa thams cad 'grub pa dang / /khyad par du ni 'byung po sel/ /klu 'dul ba ni dkar po che/ /nam mkha'

lding gi cha byad che/ /grub pa'i gter gyi don du ni/ /ser po 'od dang ldan pa yi/ /dmar po dag ni ljang nag dag /drag po'i gdon rnams sel ba dang / /tshe ring ba la shis pa'o/ /lhag pa bskyed pa'i sku mchog ni/ /'byung bar gyur pa de ma thag /sa steng thams cad

mun nag 'khrigs/ /bdud rnams thams cad rab tu tshig /ye shes me 'od chen po 'di/ /bzod par sla la gcig ma mchis/ /bgegs chen log par 'dren pa rnams/ /dogs pa'i sems kyi thag ring 'bros/ /gsang sngags yi ge hU~M sgra can/ /glog

'khrug pa yi 'od zer 'dra/ /klad par yi ge ha~M gi gzugs/ /gru gsum me yi gzugs brnyan can/ /'od dmar tshal pa rab 'thor bas/ /bgegs tshogs sreg cing bros par byed/ /bong bu rnga mo khyi spre'u gzugs/ /ro langs ma lus

thams cad kun/ /ha ha brjod cing bros par byed/ /rlung gis g.yengs pa'i rdul dang mtshungs/ /gyen thur hU~M gi 'phro 'du dang / /khro bcu sa bon yi ge hU~M/ /me dang rlung gi tshul du 'bar/ /mngon sum rtswa la me bzhin du/ /snying gi hU~M gis 'das

nas kyang / /klad pa'i hU~M gis sreg par byed/ /'od dang phyag rgya lha yi sku/ /bskrad dang bcing dang myos byed bsam/ /seng ge dang ni glang chen 'brug /drag po'i sgra skad ci 'dra bar/ /rtsa ba'i gsang sngags zlos pa ni/ /bgegs dang log 'dren

ma lus pa/ /sreg cing phye ma rdul du rlog /snying nang snying po bstan pa ni/ /'od 'bar 'od kyis sdig pa'i tshogs/ /du ma rnams kyang zad par mdzad/ /lus ngag yid brtan 'khor lo sngags/ /oM dang AHdang hUM sbyor gyis/ /dpal 'phel dbang phyug bskyed pa dang / /go cha chen po

bskon par byed/ /na ma s+t+rai ya d+d+hI kA nAM/ ta thA ga tA nAM haM/ go cha chen po'i gsang sngags 'di/ /rgyal sras rnams kyang 'dar 'gyur na/ /bgegs rnams sreg pa smos ci dgos/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM gis/ /ye shes lha dang 'brel par bya/ /rgyal bas dbang bskur sbyor bas ni/ /

ye shes dbu rgyan brtag par bya/ /gtso la mi bskyod dbu rgyan can/ /'khor kun mi g.yos rgyas gdab bya/ /bdag nyid yi ger byas nas su/ /me gzugs shin tu phra bas ni/ /mtshan mo dus su nyams par bya/ /sdang ba hUM gi sgra las so/ /'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i

rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las lha 'byung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /sngags spyod tshul gyi cho ga nyon/ /dad pa dang yang mi ldan zhing / /byang chub sems kyang ma bskyed de/ /dbang bskur rjes gnang ma thob la/ /sdom tshul dam tshig bral ba'i mi/ /

gsang sngags rang nyid len pa ni/ /byis pa lcags bsregs mid pa 'dra/ /thog ma med sgrib bkru ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje slob dpon 'di skad brjod/ /oM sngags mchog ting 'dzin rnam dag chu/ /bskal pa du mar bsags pa yi/ /sdig pa'i tshogs rnams dag gyur nas/ /rang bzhin dag

pa'i sems su byed/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra a d+hiSh+ThA na kA ya bA ka tsit+ta bi sho d+ha na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM sangs rgyas kun gyis rab bsngags pa'i/ /rin chen sngags las byung ba yi/ /dbu rgyan lha rdzas cod pan 'dis/ /dbang bskur rin chen mchog tu 'gyur/ /oM badzra d+ha ra shrI badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM/ rat+na

mu ku Ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ rdo rje chen po bla na med/ /bzung bas phyogs las rgyal gyur te/ /rdo rje lta bur brtan byed pas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung / /oM sarba badzra a b+hi Shany+tsi hUM/ dril bu dbyangs snyan bla na med/ /sku yi rdo rje rab bskyed pas/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung / /khams

gsum srid pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /oM sa ma ya g+haN+Ta badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM snying rje shes rab dbyer med rgya/ /gang gis thos pa nang gi su/ /de yi ming mtshan bdag por 'gyur/ /rtag pa'i ngang gnas blang bar mdzod/ /oM badzra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/ thog mtha' med

pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje snyems bdag bdag mdzod cig /sangs rgyas kun gyi dril bu rgya/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad/ /rtag tu khyod kyis bzung byas na/ /byang chub mchog thob rgyal bas

gsungs/ /oM shes rab ral gri bla na med/ /gang gis 'chang ba rgyal 'gyur te/ /bdud kyi dpung ni gshegs nas kyang / /mkha' la ye shes 'od 'bar 'gyur/ /oM sarba ta thA ga tA badzra dz+nyA na khaD+ga a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ a rdo rje zhags pa thugs rje can/ /nyon mongs srid pa'i sdong po

rnams/ /thabs kyi zhags pas bcings nas kyang / /srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol mdzod/ /oM sarba ta thA ga tA badzra pA she na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ dbang dang rjes gnang ma thob cing / /dam tshig sdom pa mi ldan la/ /bla ma mnyes par mi byed na/ /sgrub pa 'bras med ngan song 'gro/ /

log lta can gang bla ma 'tshe/ /dmyal ba'i gnas su 'gro bar nges/ /'dir nyams pas ni nad yams dang / /dgra bo mu ges rtag tu 'tshe/ /dkyil 'khor sa gzhi nyams dga' ba/ /chu klung mtsho 'gram ri ljongs dang / /'bras bu me tog skyed mos tshal/ /kun dga' ra ba khang

mchog /bzhi mdo ri sul shing gcig drung / /phyugs lhas khang brtsegs glang chen bres/ /gtsug lag khang dang dgon pa dang / /chu gling mtshe'u 'gram ne'u gsing du/ /bsnyen dang dbang bskur byed pa dang / /dur khrod sogs su las rnams bsgrub/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor khru

gang ste/ /dbang gi dkyil 'khor chen po la/ /thub pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa/ /yang na drug gam brgyad kyang bya/ /gzhan ni khru gsum tshad du bya/ /yang na lnga'am bdun du bya/ /gza' yi dkyil 'khor khru gnyis te/ /yang na phyed dang gsum par bya/ /kun du bzhi cha pho brang

ste/ /khang pas tshad kyi phyed yin te/ /khang pa gnyis pa cha gsum pa/ /rta babs rdo rje pad+ma'o/ /lha snam bzhi cha dag tu 'gyur/ /thub pa'i sgo ni bzhi yin te/ /gzhan du sgo gcig pa nyid shis/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni byang gi sgo/ /chos ni nub sgo rdo rje lho/ /gza' dang 'jig rten skyong

sogs shar/ /dbang sgyur lha yi gnas rnams su/ /bum pa phyag rgyar bcas pa'am/ /sku'am rang rang phyag rgya gzhag /thub pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /bad dkar steng du lhung bzed do/ /gtso bo'i sa ni sor drug ste/ /lhag ma rnams ni sor bzhi'o/ /rigs kyi mtshan mas

yang yang bskor/ /byang du 'jig rten dbang sdud ni/ /pad dkar rdo rje gdengs por bcas/ /dbang ldan spyi blugs byams pa'i'o/ /shar du 'jam dpal ut+pal sngo/ /mer ni kun bzang yid bzhin nor/ /lhor ni rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin/ /bden bral mkha' snying pad dkar te/ /nub tu pad ser

rdo rje chos/ /nub byang sa snying pad+ma dmar/ /gtsug tor gnod mdzes steng 'og char/ /gtsug tor dang ni gtun shing ngo / /shar du rnam rgyal thod pa ste/ /mer ni 'dod rgyal rtse gsum mo/ /rdo rje rtse gcig gshin gshed lhor/ /bden bral ral gri stobs po che/ /nub tu rta

mgrin pad+ma ste/ /byang du bgegs dgra rdo rje rgya/ /nub tu dbyug pa sngon po ste/ /dbang ldan du ni mi g.yo ba/ /de yi rgyab tu nyan thos ni/ /shA ri'i bu dang rab 'byor dang / /maud gal bu dang 'od srung dang / /rgyal mchog dang ni sa steng skyong / /rta thul dang ni ba glang bdag /

drag shul dbang chen changs bu can/ /b+ha ra d+h+wa dza lteng rgyas dang / /dga' bo nye dga' sgra gcan no/ /de ltar bcu drug phyag rgya'o/ /pad+ma'i steng du lhung bzed do/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /'jam dpal dkyil 'khor bzang po yi/ /dbus su ral gri

me 'od can/ /rin chen rdo brag steng du bri/ /byang du rdo rjes mtshan pa yi/ /bum pa bri ba byams pa'o/ /shar du kun tu bzang po yi/ /rdo rje dkar po bri bar bya/ /lhor ni me 'od ldan pa yi/ /lag na rdo rje'i rdo rje bri/ /nub tu 'jig rten dbang po ste/ /

bad dkar 'od dang ldan pa bri/ /yid bzhin nor 'dzin mdzes gzugs can/ /rin chen rdo steng dbang ldan bri/ /mer ni rab 'bar rdo rje yi/ /bgrang phreng pad+ma la gnas bri/ /bden bral du ni rab brjid pa'i/ /go cha 'bar ba bri bar bya/ /rlung du

mdzes pa gzhon nu'i lha/ /rin chen sgrom ni bri bar bya/ /steng du brtul phod ces khro bo'o/ /pad+ma'i steng du khro bo yi/ /'og tu khro rgyal mngag gzhug gi/ /rdo rje brag steng zhags pa bri/ /khro bo lhag ma sngon gyi ni/ /tshul gyis rgyal bar dgod par bya/ /brtan pa

zhes pa'i pho nya mo'i/ /chu gri byang du bri bar bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'chang ba yi/ /mkha' sor ma ni shar du'o/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'chang ba yi/ /rnam 'jigs ma ni lho ru'o/ /nub kyi phyogs su bri bar bya/ /mdzod spu ma zhes rin phreng 'dzin/ /rin

chen rdo steng shar lhor bri/ /shar lhor bgegs 'dzin ma zhes pa/ /'khor lo me 'bar rdo rje bri/ /'bar ba'i gtun shing bden bral du/ /'joms pa'i tho ba rlung du bri/ /thal sbyar gung mo nang du bcug /pad+ma mdzod kyi phyag rgya dang / /sngags 'dis dkyil

'khor byin gyis brlab/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ hUM hUM ba maM maM swA hA/ spyan drangs gshegs su gsol ba dang / /srung ba mchog gi sngags yin no/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaH/ he he he/ A dz+nyA pa ra ma ra ga ga na

A gats+tshA gats+tsha b+ha ga bA na shI g+h+raM swA hA/ bsnyen pa 'bum la byin brlabs dang / /lha bsgrub pa dang mchod pa'o/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /rdo rje chos kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /dbus su 'jig rten dbang sdud nyid/ /pad+ma dmar po 'chang ba'o/ /shar du don

yod zhags pa ni/ /bgrang phreng sngon po 'chang ba'o/ /lhor ni nam mkha' dri med de/ /rdo rje sngon po 'chang ba'o/ /nub tu gar gyi dbang pad+ma/ /byang du thugs rje shugs po che/ /rdo rje nag po 'dzin pa bri/ /sgrol ma khro gnyer ral gcig dang / /yid ma ni

mtshams su bri/ /khro bo dang ni pho nya mo/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis rim pas dgod/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje yi/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag bshad par bya/ /dbus su phyag na rdo rje nyid/ /rdo rje dkar po 'chang ba'o/ /shar du sangs rgyas spyan ma yin/ /lhor ni pad 'dzin

mA ma kI/ /nub tu gos 'chang na bza' dkar/ /byang du sgrol ma ut+pal 'chang / /phyogs bzhir nam mkha' dri med dang / /shugs po che dang rdo rje tog /snyems tshul chen po zhes pa rnams/ /rigs kyi mtshan ma 'dzin pa'o/ /der yang sngon ltar khro bo rnams/ /

rim pa bzhin du bri bar bya/ /de yi cha rgyab dkyil 'khor la/ /drag po lha rnams bkod pa ni/ /dpung la sogs rdo rje can/ /brgyad po byang gi phyogs su bri/ /tshogs 'chang bshes gnyen 'gro skyong dang / /mthong dkar rig byed bden bral med/ /ngan

spong brgyad de drang srong shar/ /lhor ni rdo rje dgra sta ma/ /rdo rje tho ba drag shul ma/ /rta rna ma dang khro gnyer ma/ /ro langs ma dang lcags sgrog ma/ /mthong dkar ma ste brgyad po bri/ /dug sel rma bya 'od zer can/ /nor rgyun ral gcig dpung rgyan ma/ /dbyangs

ldan dril sgrol brgyad nub phyogs/ /kun kyang rang rig phyag rgya can/ /sgo yi phyogs su dgod bya ba/ /thub pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi/ /brgya byin khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/ /tshangs pa 'jam dpal dkyil 'khor la'o/ /rgyal dang rnam rgyal mi thub ma/ /gzhan mi thub

ma spyan ras gzigs/ /nag mo che dag uts+tshuSh+ma/ gzhon nu 'phrog mo gter 'dzin gyi/ /khro bo mi g.yo sgo bzhi la/ /nag po che dang dga' byed dang / /ngan spong dang ni tshogs bdag go/ /mi g.yo dbang bskur dgyes pa yi/ /dbus su khro bo mi g.yo ba'i/ /ral gri me 'od 'bar ba'o/ /phyogs

bzhir khro bo mdog bzhi'o/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i cha byad can/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang / /rgya gram g.yas pa'i phyag tu 'chang / /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa 'chang / /rin chen brag la sku bzhugs nas/ /zhabs gnyis pad+ma'i steng du'o/ /mtshams su khro mo bzhi po yang / /gtso bo dang

mtshungs sgeg pa'i nyams/ /de rgyab sngon ltar khro bo bcu/ /sku 'am phyag rgya'i phreng ba bri/ /dkyil 'khor cha yi rgyab tu ni/ /'jig rten skyong bcu drag shul can/ /khros pas rang rig 'khor bcas bri/ /bum pa tshad ldan ras kyis dkri/ /dri chus bkang lha grangs sam/ /

bcu gnyis sam ni drug kyang rung / /kha rgyan dang bcas gzhag par bya/ /bla re ba dan gdugs rgyal mtshan/ /yon chab bdug spos me tog dang / /sgron ma byug chab zhal zas dang / /gling bu sil snyan na bza'i tshogs/ /gtor ma'i dri sman dang bcas/ /yid 'ong dri zhim zas skom

tshogs/ /dkyil 'khor spros nas mchod par bya/ /sa la pus mo tshad brkos nas/ /'bu srin shing rdo dum bu sogs/ /skyon mang bral nas sa yis dgang / /ba yi rnam lngas byugs pa'i sar/ /me tog gcal bkram mchod sogs bkod/ /lha ni spyan drangs mchod nas kyang / /dge mi

dge ba'i rmi lam brtag /rmi lam bzang na spro gyur nas/ /sa bdag mo la gsol ba gdab/ /khyad par du yang gtor mas mchod/ /bu tshur shog ces theg chen gyi/ /tshul chen khyod ni snod yin pas/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga rnams/ /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /dus

gsum sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnams/ /mi g.yo mgon por rab bsgoms pas/ /ye shes mtshungs pa med pa brnyes/ /skyob pa shAkya seng ges kyang / /gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med 'dis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa/ /dpung chen rnams kyang dpa' bos bcom/ /'jig rten

'dul phyir chos rnams kyi/ /'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das/ /de 'dra kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu khyod blo gros 'di gyis shig /u dum bA ra'i me tog ltar/ /brgya lam na ni re 'ga' zhig /'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ste/ /skyob pa 'jig rten mgon po che/ /rnyed dka'

rnyed par gyur na yang / /gsang sngags skyob pa'i tshul 'byung ba/ /shin tu dka' ste rmad byung phyir/ /sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad pa/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho cher 'jigs las/ /myur du sgrol ba gsang sngags las/ /sa steng gsang sngags nor bu 'dra/ /rga nad 'chi 'jigs

spong ba dang / /nyes mdzad grogs gcugs mthun 'dod dang / /mu ge dgra chom bral bde dang / /zas skom gos rgyan longs spyod rtag /bde bskyed dpal 'byor thob pa dang / /myur du sangs rgyas 'dod pa yi/ /gsang sngags thabs la myur brtson bsgrubs/ /ji ltar dus

gsum mgon po rnams/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bya/ /sdom pa yi ni tshul khrims dang / /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /deng nas mchog tu brtan par bzung / /'gro

la lhag pa'i sems bskyed nas/ /bla ma la ni yon phul zhu/ /yid bzhin nor 'dra bla med sku/ /zhi ba sangs rgyas go 'phang thob/ /srog gcod rku mi tshangs spyod/ /myos byed 'thung dang glu gar rol/ /rgyan byug mal chen mtho ba dang / /phyi dro kha zas spangs pa ste/ /brgyad dang bcu

gcig bco lnga dang / /khyad par du ni gnam stong la/ /dal 'byor thob pa shin tu dkon/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa shin tu dkon/ /sdom pa blangs nas srog bzhin du/ /g.yeng med bsdams te bsrung bar bya/ /gsum la rtag tu skyabs 'gro bya/ /lha mi bde ldan lus thob nas/ /dmyal ba dud 'gro yi

dgas gnas/ /thob nas spang dka' de dag ni/ /nam yang thob par mi bya'o/ /bdag ni dpa' bo ral gri 'chang / /gsang ba'i 'khor lo sbyor byed pas/ /bka' las 'das pa'i gdug can rnams/ /dum bu phye mar 'gas par 'gyur/ /slob ma gzung phyir thog mar ni/ /bsnyen pas sngags kyi mthu

bskyed bya/ /longs spyod 'phel phyir gtor ma gtang / /bsod nams 'dod phyir mchod pa brtson/ /bla ma thos bsam sgom la gnas/ /gtong phod dul zhing chos spyod mkhas/ /nad med bzod des snying rje che/ /sngags sgrub brtson dpa' shes rab can/ /brtags nas slob ma lnga 'am bdun/ /dad brtson

zhi dul bla ma bkur/ /sdig 'jigs nad med dbang po tshang / /dbyibs sdug snying rjer ldan pa gzung / /'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las skye bo gzung ba'i thabs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /rig 'dzin pa yi dngos grub che/ /gzhan du med

pa phul byung ba/ /rgyud 'dir bshad pa mnyan par byos/ /mi ni rin chen dang po ste/ /gang gang bsgrub pa de dang de/ /'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/ /ral gri lcags sam shing nyid la/ /sor bzhi pa'am sor brgyad bya/ /yu bar rigs kyi rgya lnga bri/ /ba yi rnam lnga dri zhim chus/ /bkrus

te dri dang me tog mchod/ /zla drug sngags bzlas khro bo sgom/ /ral gri dud 'thul 'od du 'bar/ /blangs pas mkha' spyod yul 'gro 'gyur/ /tshe ni bar gyi bskal pa ste/ /lha yi bzhon pa sna tshogs bcibs/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gser dngul zangs kyi zhags pa'am/ /

shing gi zhags pa'ang de ltar 'grub/ /rgyal mtshan nor bu gi'u wang gdugs/ /lcags kyu rnams kyang de bzhin bsgrub/ /lha rnams bsgrub na thang shing la/ /gang 'dod lha yi gzugs byas te/ /sngags bzlas tsam gyis mdun du 'ong / /ci 'dod gsol 'debs 'dod pa smra/ /klu la nA ga ge

sar shing / /gnod sbyin la ni gser las gzugs/ /dri za la ni 'o ma'i shing / /mkha' lding 'jim pa'i gzugs kyis so/ /srin po la ni dur khrod shing / /gang yang gzugs byas rkang pa ni/ /g.yon pas de yi ske mnan te/ /sum 'bum bzlas na mdun du 'ong / /ci 'dod smra tshe dgos pa blang / /

shar du ras ris kha sprad drung / /dus gsum khrus bya gos rlon gyon/ /sum 'bum bzlas na mar ngo yi/ /brgyad la 'byung po gtor ma sbyin/ /maN+Dal steng du ro bzhag nas/ /rang nyid rin chen khri steng du/ /snying po khri brjod ro 'gul 'gyur/ /mi skrag kha yi nang du lce/ /pad+ma kha phye lte can mthong / /

bcad na ral gri rig 'dzin 'gyur/ /lha yi gzugs kyis tshangs pa yi/ /'jig rten khams kyi gnas rnams rgyu/ /gi'u wang bdun bzlas thig les ni/ /skye bo kun gyis mi mthong ngo / /mi g.yo pus mo btsugs pa'am/ /'jam dpal ris ma'i drung du ni/ /'jam dpal sngags 'di sa

ya bzlas/ /nya la khyad par mchod pa bya/ /mtshan rangs bzlas pa'i tho rangs nas/ /dang po rtags sa g.yo bar 'gyur/ /gnyis pa nyi ma 'gyur ldog byed/ /phyogs bzhir mkha' la sgra chen po/ /ha ha 'brug skad grag par 'gyur/ /gsum par mkha' la rig 'dzin rnams/ /me tog

char 'bebs chun 'phyang sgreng / /de rjes rig 'dzin ma lus dang / /'jig rten skyong bas rab bskor nas/ /khro rgyal byon nas gsung snyan gyis/ /ci 'dod bu khyod gsung bar 'gyur/ /rig 'dzin rgyal po mi snang sogs/ /ci 'dod par ni smra bar bya/ /'grub nas brgyad gnyis cha byad can/ /

rgyan bzang lag na ral gri thogs/ /lha yi bzhon pa la bcibs nas/ /rig 'dzin tshogs mang lhan cig tu/ /sangs rgyas zhing mang phyin pa'i tshe/ /rgyal sras rnams kyis phyag byas nas/ /mchod pa chen po thob 'gyur te/ /bskal pa du mar tshe gnas 'gyur/ /ut+pal sngon

po lig bu mig /ru rta zangs snod ril bu gzhag /zla ba gzas zin par bzlas nas/ /mig bskus 'dod pa'i khams gsal 'gyur/ /bdag ni sus kyang mi mthong ngo / /gnam lcags rdo rje sor bcu drug /ngos gnyis rtse gsum dbyibs can te/ /tsan+dan dmar dang dri

byug /cho 'phrul tshes gnyis nya yi bar/ /mchod cing bzlas na tha mar ni/ /mar me brgya sogs kyis mchod de/ /ku sha khres kyi steng 'dug nas/ /rdo rje lag gnyis gzung ma thag /dud 'thul 'od du 'bar nas kyang / /'khor bcas rig pa 'dzin pa yi/ /'khor los sgyur

ba thob par 'gyur/ /'khor lo bdun sogs mtshon cha dang / /gser dang mal lham tshangs skud sogs/ /dgos pa thams cad de ltar sgrub/ /sngon gyi tshul du dngos grub 'byung / /tshes gcig nyin par sku gzugs kyi/ /mthe bor dza ti sngags brjod brdeg /stong phrag brgyad

kyis mthe bo las/ /'od zer phyung nas reg ma thag /dbu skra lcang lo 'khyil gyur nas/ /'khor bcas rig 'dzin rgyal po 'thob/ /sus kyang mi thub lus grub 'gyur/ /tshe ni bskal pa'i bar du gnas/ /sa la pad 'dab brgyad pa bri/ /bum pa skud pa nag pos dkri/ /tsan+dan gyis

byugs dris kyang dgang / /pad+ma'i steng bzhag pad steng 'dug /stong phrag brgyad bzlas sa gzhi gas/ /pad+mar snang zhing sa gzhir snang / /chu des gtor la khru gang brko/ /blangs pas bskal ba'i tshe tshad 'thob/ /grog mkhar sa la seng ge bya/ /gi'u wang gis byugs dkyil 'khor

gzhag /g.yo 'gul bar du mchod cing bzla/ /seng ger gyur nas rgyab zhon nas/ /'dod gzugs lha gnas kun du 'gro/ /sangs rgyas zhing yang mthong bar 'gyur/ /tshe lo khri phrag gcig bskor nas/ /rig 'dzin chen po'i gnas su 'gro/ /'dir gsungs pa'am

ma gsungs pa/ /sngags dang lha 'di bsgrubs pa yis/ /rig 'dzin grub par grags pa rnams/ /ma lus thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i rtog pa bsdus pa las rig 'dzin bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /

phran tshegs las kyi sbyor ba gtso/ /gza' yi cho ga 'di yin te/ /gnod pa sel dang phan skyed mdzad/ /ba yi rnam lngas byugs pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su pad+ma ni/ /kha dog sna tshogs nyis brtsegs kyi/ /dbus su sangs rgyas de bzhin lhor/ /chos ni rdo rje chos dkar

po/ /shar du dge 'dun ljang gu'o/ /nub tu 'jig rten dbang phyug dmar/ /byang du phyag na rdo rje ste/ /byang shar du ni 'jam dpal ser/ /mer ni gshin rje'i gshed ngo gnag /dbyug 'chang ma he zhon pa'o/ /mi g.yo mgon po srin po phyogs/ /rta mgrin rlung gi phyogs su'o/ /dkon mchog

gsum po chos 'chad rgya/ /sems dpa' khro bo rang rtags so/ /kun kyang rin chen khri la bzhugs/ /de rgyab cha la gza' rnams te/ /shar du nyi ma dkar ser ni/ /rta la zhon te pad+ma 'chang / /nub tu zla ba dkar po ni/ /ku mu da 'chang ngang pa zhon/ /lhor ni mig dmar kha dog dmar/ /ril

ba'i steng bzhugs me sgron bsnams/ /lag pa mdog ser ut+pal 'chang / /byang du pad steng bzhugs pa yi/ /phur bu mdog sngon glegs bam thogs/ /shar lho phyogs su klu la bcibs/ /pa wa sangs dkar shing thog 'chang / /lho nub gser gyi khri la bzhugs/ /byang shar spen pa

mdog nag ni/ /tshangs pa'i steng na dbyug pa thogs/ /nub byang sgra gcan dud ka ni/ /sbrul gyi steng na 'khor lo 'dzin/ /rnon po ljang gu ral gri 'chang / /gtso bo'i drung du pad steng bzhugs/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarbA pa ri pA ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM b+ha gi nAM swA hA/

nyi ma'i snying po'o/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarbA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH sarba thA/ oM sarba tra yaM a swA hA/ zla ba'i 'o/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarbA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH sarba thA/ oM a b+hir+ya ya swA hA/ rnon pa'i 'o/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarbA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH sarba thA/ oM sub+hi shud+d+hA swA hA/ mig

dmar gyi'o/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarbA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH sarba thA/ oM bi su tra pa kA ya swA hA/ gza' lhag gi'o/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarbA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH sarba thA/ oM b+hi ka mya d+hA ya swA hA/ phur bu'i'o/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sardA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH sarba thA/ oM su d+harmAr+Na

ra ho swA hA/ /pa ba sangs kyi'o/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarbA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH sarba thA/ oM kr-iSh+Na bar+Na pha ka swA hA/ sben pa'i 'o/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarbA pa ri pU ra ke b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM bi kr-i ta la ku ru tsi swA hA/ sgra gcan gyi'o/ /sngags re brgyad stong brgyad brgya bzlas/ /ci

'byor mchod de gsol ba gdab/ /longs spyod spel cing 'jigs pa sel/ /nad med bgegs rigs 'joms par 'gyur/ /rims sogs gzas zin nad la yang / /sku yi drung du gsol btab sel/ /zhi rgyas dbang drag gang sbyar ba/ /de dag thams cad 'grub

par 'gyur/ /mi dang bya rgod sbrul rus pa/ /skabs su btums nas dgra khyim sba/ /dgra bo nad bskyed nor rnams brlag /rtag tu 'thab mo 'byung bar nges/ /stag spu thod rus 'ug pa'i spu/ /dgra bo'i sgor sbas skrod par byed/ /ne'u le nag po wa sbal rus/ /

rang khrag rtsangs pa'i mgo bo rnams/ /gong bu ming bcas dgra sgor sba/ /dgra bo 'khor bcas shi bar 'gyur/ /mi tshil dur thal rgya skyegs ni/ /thod pa so can nang blugs nas/ /gang gi sgor bzhag khang pa 'jig /ku sha'i gzugs brnyan rkang pas mnan/ /

dbang sbyar 'dod pa'i sngags bzlas na/ /rgyal po che yang dbang 'gyur na/ /'byung po gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /bud med skyes phyugs la sogs la/ /rang ming ldan pa'i gzugs byas te/ /rkang pa g.yon mnan ming bcas bzla/ /gang dang gang yang nges par 'grub/ /

sa la bgegs kyi gzugs bris te/ /sngags kyis brdungs na brlag par 'gyur/ /'jim pas bgegs kyi gzugs byas te/ /gdab cing brdungs na sel bar nges/ /phur bu gdab dang mtshon chas brab/ /rdo rje ri rab cog brgyad ldan/ /sa la byas pa'i them bar du/ /

gzugs brnyan bcug ste rkang pas mnan/ /gzas zin nub mo ba'i maN+Dal/ /dri me tog sil ma bkram/ /pha rol phyin pa'i glegs bam bzhugs/ /zangs ma'i snod du mar bzhag ste/ /seng ldeng mes ni bskol bar bya/ /dngos grub rnam gsum 'grub pa dang / /gter mthong

bar yang 'di 'gyur ro/ /khros pas spyan gyi phyag rgya bya/ /hUM mtha' gsang sngags drag tu brjod/ /dur khrod thal ba gang byin pa/ /gdon gyis 'dzin nam bran du 'gyur/ /de nas mi g.yo spyan gcig pa'i/ /sngags kyi cho ga bshad par bya/ /ris ma'i drung du 'bum phrag gsum/ /

brjod pas 'di yi bsnyen pa rdzogs/ /dben par zan gyi chang bu sbyin/ /des na rtag tu 'brel bar 'gyur/ /mdzub mo'i rtse la hUM bkod nas/ /brjod pas sprin rnams 'dral bar byed/ /dgra bo lhar bcas gzugs brnyan la/ /rkang g.yon mnan bzlas lcags phur gdab/ /bka'

nyan 'gyur ro gtubs na shi/ /skud pa ser pos bcing nad dag /spang leb mnan na mnan par 'gyur/ /ra lpags brabs na bka' nyan 'gyur/ /srad bu yungs kar la bzlas te/ /'chang na gang 'dod srung bar byed/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga b+h+yaH/ /sarba bi shwa mu khe b+h+yoH/ sarba thA/ oM tsaN+Da

ma hA ro Sha Na hUM traM thA ma hA tsaN+Da/ a tsa la ka na hUM hUM hUM a pra ti ha ta/ ta thA ga ta dz+nyA sma ra hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du/ /tsan+dan sbags pa'i pad+ma ni/ /sngags bcas ci tsam bsgyur ba'i grangs/ /gser gyi dong tse rnyed par 'gyur/ /bram ze 'am ni dge 'dun

ras/ /rgyal po ras sam gro ga la/ /pad+ma mu khyud gnyis ldan bri/ /lte bar oM hU~M ming dang bcas/ /tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na/ /phaT dang bcas pa 'dab mar bkod/ /mu khyud dang por rtsa sngags te/ /gnyis pa 'jam dpal sngags nyid bri/ /dri dang me tog sogs mchod

nas/ /skabs kyis dril nas lus la bcangs/ /gdon dang nad dang mu ge sel/ /g.yul du phyin na rgyal bar 'gyur/ /yang na ral gri sor bzhir bri/ /'od kyi ri mo nang chud pa/ /ye d+harmA la sogs kyis bskor/ /dbus su ming dang bcas pa yi/ /snying po sngags ni

khrigs su bri/ /'dis kyang sngon gyi yon tan 'gyur/ /mtho lngas 'khor ba'i par bu ni/ /mtho gang 'phang du yod par bya/ /nang du mtshal gyis 'jam dpal sngags/ /mgo ni gyen du bltas pa bri/ /kha la nye bar rten 'brel sngags/ /spra tshil las byas dgra yi

gzugs/ /dug dang gri khrag gis bris nas/ ming yig bsod par bcas pa ni/ /ling ga'i snying gar bcug byas te/ /dkyil 'khor gru gsum nag po yi/ /dbus su mtho gang brus byas te/ /nang bzhag steng du par bu sbub/ /ci srid mar gyi tshes gcig nas/ /

zla ba mi snang zhag bar du/ /nyin mo rten 'brel sngags bzlas te/ /mtshan dus khro bo spyan gcig pa'i/ /sngags ni drag tu brjod par bya/ /mtshams dang ci srid mtshams bar du/ /g.yon du bskor zhing rtsa ba'i sngags/ /drug cu rtsa bzhi'i grangs su brjod/ /'jam

dpal sngags kyis chos gos srung / /bde gshegs yi ge brgya pas ni/ /mchod rten la ni gseg shang bsil/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig pa dang / /sngags la 'phya zhing sems can 'tshe/ /log lta log par spyod byed cing / /sems can la 'tshe byed pa ni/ /

rgyal po khro bo che bcu dang / /'jig rten skyong dang rgyal chen bzhi/ /ma tshogs gza' dang rgyu skar tshogs/ /bstan dga' rnams kyis myur du sgrol/ /rgyud gzhan dag la grags pa yi/ /bden pa'i mthu yang du ma brjod/ /dur khrod sa la mchod rten ni/ /

nag po gru gsum khru gang ba'i/ /srog shing nag po gru gsum la/ /bde gshegs yi ge brgya pas dkri/ /gur kum li khris bris pa'o/ /mya ngan med shing gru gsum la/ /rgya gram dbang chen rim par bca'/ /la~M dang staM b+ha ya nan brgyad/ /phyogs brgyad bri ba'i

rwa dbus la/ /nye snying ming dang bcas pa bri/ /de yi lte bar snying po ni/ /bsad pa ming bcas bri ba'o/ /tshogs kyi bdag po gtor mas mchod/ /ma mo rnams dang legs ldan sras/ /sha khrag me tog nag pos mchod/ /ji srid gsum dang bdun bar du/ /le lo med

par byas gyur na/ /dge slong dge tshul bsnyen ldan gang / /sdom brtson de ni ldan gyur te/ /sdig ldan myur du shi bar 'gyur/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /gtum po rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ /sna tshogs las rnams thun mong ste/ /khyad par sbyor ba cung zad bshad/ /yungs kar

bsnun pas 'byung po 'bros/ /ser ba bsrung na 'khor lo'am/ /rnga dang dung la bri bar bya/ /g.yul du 'jug na ral gri sogs/ /nad la 'khor lo chu yungs kar/ /thod lo kor gyis sa phor la/ /bris te sgor dbyangs sri'u bsrung / /spra tshil gzugs brnyan sor bzhi pa/ /dur khrod

thal bzlas sgo steng bzhag /nad pa gdon las bsrung bar nges/ /snying gar ming sngags spel bcug nas/ /tsher ma khar btsugs ngag rengs byed/ /snying la btsugs na khros pa zhi/ /nan tan sems kyis gsod par nges/ /ling gas rtags kyi nus pa med/ /yang na rabs chad thod

pa la/ /ming sngags bris te mi khrag bkang / /rabs chad dur sbas rigs rgyud 'chad/ /khyi nag thod par ming sngags bcas/ /dug bkang klu gnas sbas mdzes 'dzin/ /dgra yi sgor sbas 'byed par byed/ /zhing du sbas na lo nyis byed/ /phyugs gnas god 'byung zla dang 'byed/ /chu dong

sbas na chu skems 'gyur/ /me dur sbas na rims kyis 'dzin/ /yang na dgra ming khrag gis bri/ /spra tshil gzugs kyi snying gar bcug /mchod rten nag po mtho gang ba'i/ /nang bcug dong bzhag lhung bzed sbub/ /bram ze rigs bzhis sngags brjod cing / /nag po tshes nas phyis

bskor zhing / /bden pa'i mthu brjod gzugs brnyan bsreg /dgra bo shi 'gyur the tshom med/ /gri khrag bya rog 'ug pa'i khrag /ka ta yi lte ba la/ /ka ro ka yi dus su ni/ /gzugs la ming dang sngags bcas bris/ /rkang pas mnyes na rdul du 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhin

no/ /mtshon gyis bsad pa'i thod pa la/ /sngags dang yul lha'i ming spel bri/ /lha yi gnas bcug de steng du/ /sngags bzlas phur pa snying gar gdab/ /gdug pa'i tsher ma'i hom sbar te/ /mi rta ba lang khyi ma he/ /sna tshogs khrag bsres 'di skad brjod/ /lha khyod yul 'dir thog ser

phob/ /med na bskal bar khyod nyid sreg /de rjes dkar dang mngar mchod do/ /'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las sbyor ba phran tshegs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas sbyin sreg las rnams kun/ /myur 'grub thabs ni bshad par bya/ /mngar

gsum dUr ba bsregs pa yis/ /gnod rigs thams cad sel bar byed/ /yam shing 'bras bu gsum bsregs shing / /gdon nad thams cad zhi bar byed/ /'o ma can gyi yam shing la/ /'o ma dUr ba til dang 'bras/ /snying rje'i sems kyis brgya bsregs na/ /gnod pa thams cad

zhi bar 'gyur/ /ga bur mngar gsum 'bru thams cad/ /dUr ba dkar po'i yam shing rnams/ /'o ma can gyi shing la bsreg /nad dang gdon rnams thams cad zhi/ /'o ma sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad/ /phyugs ngas chen po zhi bar 'gyur/ /dUr ba mngar gsum ming bcas pas/ /

bsregs pas rta phyugs nad zhi byed/ /shar lho nub byang phyogs kyi ni/ /dkar nag dmar ser kha dog 'grub/ /khru gang khru gnyis tshad kyi thab/ /sor bzhi kha khyer rim pas btang / /sems dpa' pad+ma'i rdo rje dang / /gcig pus zhi rgyas dbang drag 'grub/ /de nas rgyas pa'i

sbyin sreg ni/ /ci 'dod thob pa bshad par bya/ /pad+ma'i chu la 'bum phrag gcig /rgyal po 'thob ste blon po ni/ /ku mu da la 'bum phrag gsum/ /zho dang mngar gsum dang bcas pa'o/ /a pa marga'i 'bras bu dang / /mngar gsum 'bum gyis yul bdag 'thob/ /rigs

bzang 'bum phrag bdun gyis ni/ /yid la ci 'dod thob par 'gyur/ /dUr ba til dang 'bras sogs bsreg /bud med bu bzang thob par 'gyur/ /nor 'dod pas ni rkun po yi/ /lag pa g.yas pa mdzod bzhag nas/ /mchod cing gsol ba btab pas ni/ /nor

rnams myur du thob par 'gyur/ /yang na rgya yi pags pa la/ /gur gum gi'u wang yung bas ni/ /byi ba cher brjid ser po bri/ /shar na mdzod phugs bltas par gzhag /zas kyi lhag mas mchod bya zhing / /gsol ba btab pas nor rnyed 'gyur/ /pad+ma'i ze ba ka li ka/ /

pri yang ku ni nor rnyed do/ /'bras bsregs pas kyang nor chen 'thob/ /ku mu da yi 'bras sogs bsregs/ /longs spyod che dang sa gzhi 'thob/ /pad+ma zho dang sbrang rtsi mar/ /sbyin sreg 'bum gyis mchog stsol ba/ /gsum pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ /bil ba'i 'bras bu mngar

gsum bcas/ /'bum phrag gsum du bsregs pas ni/ /rang nyid rgyal po chen por 'gyur/ /mar dang yungs kar dkar pos ni/ /nim pa'i shing la 'bum bsregs na/ /snying po rnying pa rgyas par 'gyur/ /nas la sogs pa 'bru rigs rnams/ /gang bsregs gsol btab

de rgyas 'gyur/ /gang 'dod gos kyi kha dog can/ /me tog bsregs na gos rnyed 'gyur/ /spos shing bsregs na 'khor g.yog 'phel/ /zho mar seng ldeng me la stong / /bsregs na nor rnams rnyed par 'gyur/ /de nas dbang gi bsreg lugs bshad/ /til dang 'bras

sogs phub ma bsregs/ /bud med dbang du byed pa'o/ /pri yang ku yi sbyin sreg gis/ /byis pa rnams ni dbang du 'gyur/ /'o ma sbrang rtsi a ru ra'i/ /shing la bsregs na lha dbang byed/ /gsum po de dang gu gul bsregs/ /gnod sbyin rnams ni dbang du 'gyur/ /mya ngan

med pa'i yam shing gis/ /gnod sbyin mo rnams dbang du 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i yungs kar yungs mar bcas/ /bsregs pas rgyal po dbang du 'gyur/ /de nas drag po'i las grub pa'i/ /sbyin sreg yang dag bshad par bya/ /ming bcas tshad dang nim pa bsregs/ /bstan

sdang dgra bo myur du 'chi/ /dgra ming dug gis nim pa la/ /bris te dug dang lhan cig tu/ /sbrul shun thum po lnga byas nas/ /thod pa lnga yi nang bzhag ste/ /lnga po yungs mar gyis bkang nas/ /gsum ni sgyed pu gnyis brtseg la/ /khros pas gcig tu skra grol bas/ /

sngags brjod thal bar gyur par du/ /nyin phyed bsregs na dgra 'chi nges/ /'chi ltas 'dab ma rtsa ba shun/ /ra khrag yungs mar tshwa rgya skyegs/ /tsha ba'i bud shing yam shing la/ /bdun phrag ming dang bcas pa bsregs/ /stong phrag gnyis kyis rta phyugs 'chi/ /bzhis ni

bu dang chung ma 'chi/ /drug gis nye du gnyen 'dun brlag /brgyad kyis dgra yi rang srog 'chad/ /gal te skyabs su 'ong gyur na/ /'o ma stong bsregs rnal du sos/ /khrag dang dug phye nim pa'i 'bras/ /yungs mar la sbags brgya rtsa brgyad/ /myos byed la bsregs dgra bo 'chi/ /

yang na rus phye nim pa'i lnga/ /rang gi khrag gam yungs mar sbag /yang na ske che dug dang ni/ /nim ba'i 'bras bus gsad par bya/ /yang na gri khrag gis bsregs pas/ /byad ma myur du gsod par 'gyur/ /nim pa'i lnga dang ra khrag dug /dri ma lnga bcas gzugs snying

gar/ /ming yig bcug nas phur bus gdab/ /rig sngags byad ma nyid ldog 'gyur/ /rgya skyegs mi rus phye ma yis/ /mi lpags rlon la dgra gzugs bri/ /dug dang ske tshe cung zad byugs/ /nim pa'i me la khros pas bsro/ /bsregs pas tsha ba'i rims kyis 'chi/ /

dUr ba 'o mas sos par 'gyur/ /dug dang nim pa sgog skya dang / /mi rus phye bsregs phyugs rnams brlag /tsha gsum lan tshwa dUr rang skyur/ /yungs mar ro skra sbrul shun dang / /nim pa'i lnga dang mi rus phye/ /skye tshe dug phye sgog btsong dang / /sgog skya tsher ma'i me la

bsregs/ /dgra bo khrag tu skyug ste 'chi/ /rgya skyegs lan tshwa ba lang mkhris/ /bsregs na mchin gas nad kyis 'chi/ /sge'u gsher lan tshwa tsha ba gsum/ /gzugs brnyan dur khrod mgal dum la/ /mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du bsregs/ /thig nag gis ni gsod

par 'gyur/ /'o ma can gyi yam shing la/ /dkar gsum bsregs na sos par 'gyur/ /dri chus spangs pa'i sa las ni/ /thab khung byas te dug gis byugs/ /nim pa'i 'dab mar dgra bo'i ming / /ra khrag gis bris rgyus pas dkris/ /tsha gsum shing gi mer

bsregs pas/ /rgyal po myur du 'chi bar nges/ /dug khrag lan tshwa tsha ba gsum/ /ming bcas gzugs brnyan ni ma pa'i mer/ /bsregs na dgra bo dmu rdzing ngam/ /mdze nad kyis ni gsod par 'gyur/ /tsha gsum ni ma pa dug dang dUr/ /khrag

dang lan tshwa'i gzugs brnyan ni/ /lan tshwa ni ma pa tsha ba'i mar/ /byugs nas arga'i shing la bsregs/ /mdze nad chen pos bzung nas 'chi/ /ra khrag tsha gsum yungs mar spos/ /nim pa'i lo ma na le sham/ /yungs mar dug bsregs tsha bas 'chi/ /

na le sham mam dug dang tshwa/ /d+ha du ra lnga tsha ba gsum/ /sol ba la ni dgra gzugs bya/ /yungs mar byugs te bsregs na 'chi/ /tsha gsum pa yi 'bras bu yis/ /nim pa'i 'dab ma dgra ming bri/ /thod par dug yungs lhan cig bzhag /d+ha du ra lnga btsos

nas 'ching / /rig ma byang du bltas nas kyang / /rang nyid lho phyogs blta bar bya/ /tshangs pa la sogs lha tshogs dang / /'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul can/ /ma mo mkha' 'gro sha za sogs/ /sa bcu'i dbang phyug byang chub sems/ /rig 'dzin khro bo'i rgyal

po dang / /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor lha rnams gson/ /sdig can nga rgyal gdug cing khro/ /chad lta sngags 'phya dkon mchog bcom/ /bstan la sdang zhing sems can 'tshe/ /mtshams med can 'di bsgral du gsol/ /rlung gis 'dar zhing char gyis gsher/ /

mes gdung rdul tshub skam 'dir skye/ /seng ge mkha' lding stag khro bos/ /bcom zhing 'bu sbrang bung rgod kyis/ /khrag 'jib bya tshogs mkha' la khyer/ /mngon spyod las kyi bsam gtan no/ /de nas sna tshogs las bshad pa/ /mi rus phye ma tshe skye tshe/ /gnod sbyin

'khrig pa dug shing la/ /tha dad ming bcas bsregs pas ni/ /bskrad dang dbye dang smyo bar byed/ /dUr ba 'o mar bcas pas sos/ /d+ha dur yan lag lnga 'bras bu/ /tsher ma'i mes bsregs smyo bar byed/ /tsha gsum lan tshwas tsha rims bskyed/ /yang na shing skam

lta bur skams/ /dzam ba'i ra dang rang skyur bcas/ /dgra bo grang ba'i rims kyis 'debs/ /khwa'i sgro e raN+Da'i mar khus/ /byugs pa d+ha dur ma la bsregs/ /lag stobs khwa ta lta bur ni/ /dgra bos mtha' kun tu 'khyam/ /ske tshe mi rus lan tshwa dug /yungs mar

nim pa'i me la bsregs/ /dgra bo rtag tu 'thab pa dang / /nad rnams kun gyis 'debs par 'gyur/ /dur khrod thal ba sol bar bcas/ /dgra bo'i gzugs byas dum bur gnon/ /tsham ngam phur bur 'debs pa ni/ /phol mig nad ngan skyed par byed/ /bya rgod

'ug pa byi la sha/ /ne'u le'i spu rnams khyer ba'i mer/ /drug cu rtsa brgyad bsregs pa yis/ /thun gnyis myur du 'byed par nges/ /khrag can ras la gzugs bris na/ /rkang g.yon sker mnan tsham ngam bcas/ /'dod bcas sngags ni drag po yis/ /brgyal dang

rims nad mcher nad bskyed/ /dgra yi skra dang rkang rjes sa/ /dgra gzugs dug dang ske tshes byugs/ /tsher mes bsregs na rengs par 'gyur/ /dgra yi pha rus dug rang skyur/ /gzugs byad nim pa'i mer bsregs na/ /dgra bo gdon chen nad kyis 'debs/ /phag

rtug snu ha arga'i shing / /tsher mes bsregs na mgo 'khor 'gyur/ /ne'u le byi la byi tsher spu/ /bsregs na bud med bu brlag 'gyur/ /mi dang ne'u le khwa rus pa/ /yungs mar nim pa'i me la bsregs/ /grong dang grong khyer skrod par byed/ /stag spu thod rus

'ug pa'i spu/ /sa ha me tog na le sham/ /nim pa'i lo ma dug bsregs byed/ /nim pa'i 'bras bu dug lan tshwa/ d+ha dur 'bru bsregs nad skyed byed/ /dug khrag d+ha dur 'bras bu yis/ /nim pa'i shing la dgra ming bri/ /tsha gsum lan tshwa khrag gis byugs/ /

lcags snod yungs mar nang bzhag nas/ /nim pa'i shing gi me yis btso/ /dgra bo lha dang 'byed par 'gyur/ /mi khyi bya rgod rus phye dug /ske tshe yungs mar sbrul shun dang / /nim pa'i lnga dang skags lan tshwa/ /tsher mes bsregs na nad kyis 'debs/ /ske tshe dug

skegs sbrul shun tsha ba'i mar/ /gzugs byas tsha ba'i me la gdung / /char ches pa dang thog 'bab 'gyur/ /'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa'i rgyud las sbyin sreg gi le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas tshangs pa khyab 'jug sogs/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor

thams cad kyis/ /bzhengs te thal mo sbyar nas kyang / /snyan pas ched du 'di brjod do/ /e ma sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /thabs dang shes rab bsam du med/ /thugs rjes gyur pa'i thugs kyis ni/ /mtshungs med rgya che dam chos gsungs/ /dug gi 'jigs pas sa steng 'khrigs/ /

nyon mongs mun 'jigs med pa yi/ /bdud rtsi 'od bzang 'dir gus na/ /ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa stong bar 'gyur/ /de nas tshangs sogs 'jig rten skyong / /rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kun 'dus nas/ /ngom zhing ched du brjod pa 'di/ /snyan pa'i tshig gis rab tu gsol/ /

e ma sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag /sems can kun la sman par dgyes/ /skyob chen 'jig rten mgon po yi/ /mtshungs med bsam gyis mi khyab thabs/ /gsungs pa 'di la gang gnas pa/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho sbyong / /'gro la sman mthong bsgrubs pas ni/ /lhag pa'i

bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa sogs/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /ngo mtshar spyan ni gdangs nas su/ /ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /gdod nas thugs su 'gro don chud/ /rtog med rang bzhin las grol

nas/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i go 'phang gsungs/ /'chang byed dang po ngan 'gro gcod/ /gnyis pa mthong chos dngos grub byed/ /de rjes 'jigs med nga yi med/ /dogs pa spangs na zad par gyi/ /sa la bzhugs nas sems can don/ /ma bsams thogs pa med par byed/ /gsang

sngags rgyal po skyob kun la/ /sbyangs nas 'dod don kun grub ste/ /nam mkha' chu gser dag pa ltar/ /bsgom pa bla med yid rgyas byed/ /de nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs/ /ma lus pa rnams 'dus nas kyang / /gtso la me tog gtor byas te/ /ched du brjod pa 'di brjod

do/ /e ma sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /dam pa'i chos kyang bsam mi khyab/ /'gro la phan dang don byed pa'i/ /cho ga'i ming dang shes rab dang / /snying rje'i dbye bas rgyas gyur nas/ /mnar med la sogs ngan 'gro yi/ /'jigs rnams las brgal pad+ma ltar/ /rnal 'byor can de mdzes par

spyod/ /de nas mthu stobs cher ldan pa'i/ /phyogs bcu'i khro bo kun 'dus nas/ /shin tu ngom pas snyan tshig gis/ /ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma sangs rgyas chos chen dang / /dge 'dun dkon mchog bsam mi khyab/ /'khor ba'i mun pa chen por ni/ /bying bas blta dka' rtogs

pa yis/ /sngags dang phyag rgya bsam mi khyab/ /mthong dang thos pa tsam gyis kyang / /blta dka' 'byung po drag po rnams/ /lhag pa'i sems ni skyes par 'gyur/ /de nas rig pa'i lha mo che/ /spyan la sogs pa rgya chen rnams/ /ngo mtshar gyur nas spyan gdangs te/ /snyan pas ched du 'di brjod do/ /

e ma sangs rgyas rmad du byung / /e ma sangs rgyas dpa' bo che/ /e ma sangs rgyas rab tu zab/ /chos rnams skye med 'gag pa med/ /sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs rol ba ltar/ /sgyu ma gdul bya tshim mdzad pa/ /spros pa dang bral spros pa bral/ /sgyu ma rab tu 'phel bar mdzad/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i

sangs rgyas rnams/ /stong gsum mi mjed 'jig rten khams/ /gdul ba dag la rab gzigs nas/ /'dul mdzad rdo rje 'chang ba la/ /ngo mtshar rmad kyi gsung gis ni/ /ched du brjod pa 'dis bstod do/ /oM zhes dang po phyag 'tshal bkra shis ster byed pa/ /ser sna rnam par dag nas yo

byad dbang thob dang / /gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ni/ /rab dga' ye shes khro bo khams gsum rnam rgyal 'dud/ /tsaN yig dri tsan+dan byugs dang ngang tshul mtshungs/ /tshul khrims rnam par dag pas tshe la dbang ba dang / /las dang rnam par smin pa

mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ni/ /dri med ye shes khro rgyal mi g.yo phyag 'tshal lo/ /Da yig nyon mongs sgrib pa gtor ba'i zhi gnas dang / /bzod pa dag pa skye ba la dbang thob pa dang / /mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa zhes pa'i stobs dang ni/ /'od 'phro ye shes khro bo dbyug sngon phyag

'tshal lo/ /ma yig sgyu 'phrul chen po lhag mthong che ba'i bdag /brtson 'grus dag pas sems la yang dag dbang thob dang / /khams kyi rnam pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ni/ /'od byed ye shes gshin rje gshed po phyag 'tshal lo/ /hA yig ma chags

shes bya'i sgrib 'phrog sbyangs pa che/ /bsam gtan dag pas rdzu 'phrul la ni dbang thob dang / /thams cad dag tu 'gro ba'i lam dag stobs dang ni/ /sbyang dka' ye shes rta mgrin khro bo phyag 'tshal lo/ /ro yig 'khor 'das nad bral shes dag las dbang thob/ /bsam

gtan rnam thar ting 'dzin dang ni snyoms zhugs pa'i/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang lta ba kun mkhyen stobs/ /mngon gyur ye shes 'dod pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal lo/ /Sha yig mnyam nyid sdom chen dbang phyug chen po rgyal/ /stobs chen dag las mos pa la ni dbang thob dang / /

sngon gyi gnas rnams rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs/ /ring du song ba'i ye shes bdud rtsi 'khyil la 'dud/ /Na yig skyes bu chen po sgra chen klu mchog gtso/ /smon lam dag pas smon lam che la dbang thob dang / /dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs/ /

mi g.yo ye shes khro bo stobs chen phyag 'tshal lo/ /hUM yig hu lu sprin gdengs 'brug sgra gad rgyangs can/ /thabs dag pas ni ye shes che la dbang thob dang / /'chi 'pho dang ni gang zhig skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs/ /legs pa'i blo gros ye shes khro bo hUM mdzad 'dud/ /

phaT sgras bag chags kun gtor dag pas shel dang mtshungs/ /ye shes dag pas chos la dbang ni thob pa dang / /zag pa thams cad yang dag zad pas mkhyen pa'i stobs/ /chos kyi sprin gyi ye shes khro bo gnod mdzes 'dud/ /de nas chos rje thub pas ni/ /

ljags kyi dbang po bkram byas nas/ /'dzum pa mdzad pas rab gzigs te/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus/ /lag na rdo rje mthu chen la/ /snyan pa'i gsung gis bka' stsal pa/ /mchog tu brtan par rab bsngags pa/ /rdo rje theg pa bla

na med/ /mi gang bsod nams dman pa'am/ /mtshams med la sogs byed pa yang / /rgyud 'dir zhugs pa'i de ma thag /gser 'gyur gyi ni rtsi bzhin du/ /log rtog ma lus dag nas kyang / /rtog med bde ba'i skur byung ste/ /rmi lam bzang po'i sems bzhin

du/ /rnam 'phrul sna tshogs cir yang snang / /mu mtha' med pa'i 'khor ba'i mtsho/ /brgal ba'i gzings chen bla med 'di/ /chags gsang med pa'i tshul du ni/ /khyod kyis rtag tu gzung bar bya/ /lag na rdo rje stobs po ches/ /ston pa la ni 'di gsol

to/ /rgyud 'di phyung ma thag tu ni/ /gdul dka' ba ni rab tu zhi/ /sa steng nad dang gdon mu ge /bar chad gnod pa kun dang bral/ /slar yang bstan pa 'phel ba'i phyir/ /brtan por bdag gis gzung bar bgyi/ /dpa' bo mkha' 'gro drag po rnams/ /yid kyis brtul zhugs

phyung nas kyang / /rgyud 'di 'dzin pa'i rjes su 'brang / /lha dang 'jig rten pa dang ni/ /ma mo srin mo mkha' 'gro ma/ /sha za gnod sbyin srin mo rnams/ /rgyud 'di 'dzin pa skyong bar byed/ /rgyud 'dzin longs spyod spel bar byed/ /ston pas gsungs pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /legs so

shin tu cher legs so/ /rgyud 'dzin rnal 'byor can chen de/ /rgyun du bsrung zhing blo 'phel mdzod/ /de skad kyi ni gsung thos nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang / /mkha' 'gro ma mo 'jig rten skyong / /lha klu gnod sbyin dri zar bcas/ /thams cad

ldan pa'i 'khor de rnams/ /dgyes te thal sbyar mngon par dga'i/ /mi g.yo thugs rje'i lcags kyu bzung bas 'khor ba'i btson ra nas/ /lha klu 'bum phrag 'tshe bral dkar po dge ba'i kun slong sems/ /skye gnas byang chub rin chen nor thob mdzad pas rmad

byung mtshar/ /rgyal ba'i tshul bsdus bstan pa'i chos 'di dman la shin tu gsang / /'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa las mngon par dga' ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //'phags pa rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog pa bsdus pa rdzogs so// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya kAny+tsa ba ti nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lhas

ma lta bu na gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig

tu 'dug nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag g.yul ngor mchis te g.yul 'gyed pa na lha ma yin gyi sgyu dang rig sngags rnams dang / gsang sngags dang / sman dag gis pham par gyur pa mkhyen

lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rjes su gzung ba dang / bdag cag la thugs brtse ba dang / lha ma yin rnams kyi sgyu dang / rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman rab tu gzhom pa dang / rab tu gzhig pa'i smad du rnam par rgyal ba chen po'i

gsang sngags chen po legs par bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka de de bzhin no/ /lha ma yin dang g.yul sprad pa na rig sngags rnams dang / gsang sngags rnams dang sman

rnams kyis pham pa de de bzhin te/ /kau shi ka snying brtse ba'i phyir da 'dir rig sngags brjod par bya ste/ sgyu thams cad rengs par byed pa/ rig sngags thams cad zlog pa/ gsang sngags thams cad rengs par byed pa/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mtshang

'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ gsang sngags dang / sman thams cad gcod pa'i rig sngags bshad par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rig sngags chen po gser can bka' stsal pa/ gang bskal

pa grangs med pa gsum du gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu ba dang gcer bu pa rnams kyis ngan du bsams shing bar chad du byas pa las/ ngas de tshun chad sgyu dang ldan pa rnams kyis rig sngags thams cad bzlog nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs

par byas te gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun du rgyu dang / gcer bu pa dang / 'tshe ba rnams kyi sgyu dang / rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman dang / bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i rig pa chen mo de ngas bshad par byas/ kau shi

ka khyod kyis sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir gsang sngags chen po rnam par rgyal ba chen po zung shig /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe

rig sngags chen po gser can 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /tad+ya thA/ oM hi ni hi ni/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ hi li mi li/ ni hi ni hi/ ni hi ra pi ni/ kAny+tsa nA pa ti/ lo kA mA te/ b+hu te/ b+hu ku ta man+t+ra/ a d+hi kr-i te/ be de be de be ta man+t+ra/ a d+hi kr-i te/

ha na ha na/ ha sa ha sa/ tshin+d+ha tshin+d+ha/ b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha/ b+ha ga ba ti/ dza ye bi dza ye/ dzam+b+ha ni/ stam+b+ha ni/ ban+d+ha ni/ mo ha ni/ a mo g+ha shag+ti d+hA ra Ni/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ kA Da ma mA na si/ dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya/ b+hany+dza ya b+hany+dza ya/ stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/ ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ mo

ha ya mo ha ya/ lha'i sgyu dang / klu'i sgyu dang / gnod sbyin gyi sgyu dang / srin po'i sgyu dang / nam mkha' lding gi sgyu dang / dri za'i sgyu dang / lha ma yin gyi sgyu dang / mi'am ci'i sgyu dang / lto 'phye chen po'i sgyu dang / rig sngags 'chang gi sgyu dang / rig sngags

'chang grub pa'i rgyal po'i sgyu dang / drang srong gi sgyu dang / sems can rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi sgyu dang / 'byung po'i sgyu dang / sgyu thams cad ra la ra la/ radz+dza radz+dza/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ d+hu d+hu ma/ rA ba rA ba/ rA ba na/ tsakrAn tan/ grAn tha ni/ ha na ha na/

sarba bid+yA/ sha trU nAM/ stam+b+ha ya/ ba yuM stam+b+ha ya/ sUr+yAM stam+b+ha ya/ so maM stam+b+ha ya/ ba ru NAM stam+b+ha ya/ ag+Nin stam+b+ha ya/ ud da kaM d+hi ti d+hi ti/ d+hA ra NI pA sha ha ste/ beSh+Ta ya pA sha ne/ gang dag bdag la phyir rgol ba rnams dang / dgra rnams dang / sdang ba dang /

rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / 'thab pa dang / rab tu 'thab pa dang / mi phan par 'dod pa thams cad/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ p+hany+dza ya p+hany+dza ya/ dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya/ stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/ b+han+d+ha ya b+han+d+ha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya/ ma hA mo ha ni/

b+ha ga ba ti swA hA/ bdag 'jigs pa dang gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig phaT swA hA/ kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ rgyal po'am/ rgyal po'i blon po chen po gang la la zhig /gser can gyi rig sngags 'di rjes

su dran par byed na de la pha rol gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / /de'i sde la pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi tshugs so/ /lhas ma yin/ klus ma yin/ gnod sbyin gyis ma yin/ srin pos ma yin/ dri zas ma yin/ lha ma yin gyis ma yin/ nam mkha' lding gis ma yin/

mi'am cis ma yin/ rig sngags 'chang gis ma yin/ mkha' 'gro mas ma yin/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman rnams kyis mi tshugs/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi tshugs/ pha rol

gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ lus la me dang / chu dang / dug dang / rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman rnams kyis mi tshugs so/ /gang gis sdig pa byas pa dang / byed du bcug pa

dang / rjes su yi rang ba de nyid slar 'bab par 'gyur/ de nyid du slar 'gro bar 'gyur/ kau shi ka de lta bas na dad pa'i dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos rig sngags 'di chu la

lan bdun bzlas te bdag gi lus la byugs na bdag gi lus srung bar 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / yams kyi nad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang / rig sngags thams cad dang / gsang sngags dang / sman thams

cad dang / byad thams cad las shin tu 'da' bar 'dod pas gser can gyi rig sngags 'di dran par bya'o/ /rgyal po'am/ rgyal po'i blon po pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gzhom pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gdul bar 'dod pas gser can gyi rig sngags

'di dran par bya'o/ /lan bdun bzlas te mdud pa bdun bor ba'i srad bu gdags par bya ba'am/ chu la lan bdun bzlas pas bdag bsrung bar bya'o/ /'jigs pa thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i gzungs yi ger bris te bcang bar bya/ mgul du

gdags par bya'o/ /yi ger bris nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te g.yul du zhugs na dge ba dang bde bar thar bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'di'i stobs kyis nang mi dang / g.yog 'khor dang / sde dang bcas te dge ba dang bde bar rgal bar 'gyur

ro/ /ma grub pa rnams kyang grub par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags rengs par byed par 'dod pas srad bu dkar po la lan bdun bzlas te/ mdud pa bdun bor na bcings pa dang rengs par byas par 'gyur ro/ /sgyu rengs par byed par 'dod pas dur khrod kyi sa

la lan bdun bzlas te gtor na rgyu rengs par byas par 'gyur ro/ /'gyed pa'i tshe kha lkugs par byed par 'dod pa'i zin thig le la lan bdun bzlas te 'chos na smra ba thams cad kyi lan thebs par 'gyur ro/ /bklag par bya/ kha ton du bya/ brjod par bya ste/ brjod

pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gis byas par gyur pa dang / gang gis bsams par gyur pa de nyid la slar 'gro'o/ /srad bu btags sam/ chus bdag bsrung ba byas na de'i lus la rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / sman

thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /ma grub pa rnams grub par 'gyur ro/ /de'i don thams cad kyang mthun par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yi rangs te/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs

pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra aSh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka nA ma d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /namaH sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ sa man+ta a mog+ha/ a pra ti ha ta/ shA sa nA nAM/ na ma Ar+ya a pa lo ki te shwa rA ya/ ma hA bo d+hi satwA ya/ badzra satwA ya/ badzra bi pu lA ya/ pad+ma saM b+ha bA ya/ pad+ma yon ye/ tad+ya thA/ oM

hrIHka ra shrI ka ra/ pra b+hA ka ra/ badzra satwa/ badzra saM b+ha ba/ pad+ma saM b+ha ba/ pad+ma sA ga ra/ pad+ma go tsa ra/ ba ra da mahA kA ru Ni ka/ kA ru Na saM b+ha ba/ hUM hUM/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ da ra da ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka ma hA shud+d+ha satwa swA hA/ de nas phyogs bcu'i

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mgo bo la byugs nas bka' stsal pa/ yon tan rin po che'i phung po chen po khyod kyis gzungs sngags 'di bshad pas sems can rnams

la sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i chos bstan pa legs so legs so/ /'di ni thos pa tsam gyis kyang sems can rnams shin tu rnam par dag par byed pa'o/ /gang la la nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa des ni yon tan phun sum

tshogs pa thams cad dang / dag pa'i mchog kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i dbang po dbang phyug chen po dpag tshad 'bum phrag du mar khyab cing 'jig rten gsum po kun tu rgyas ko lta ste/ 'khor dang bcas pa dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa'i byang

chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mgo bo btud nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sa'i dbang phyug dpa' bo rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas mngon par bstod pa/ sa yi dbang phyug rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ba/ /srid gsum ma lus yon

tan chen po'i bdag /dri med skyon bral gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor can/ /snying rjes khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya che ba/ /rab dga' rab dgyes rab tu ston pa po/ /skal ba bzang po rnam thar zhi ba'i mchog /shin tu rnam dag yon tan chen po'i bdag /rnam

dag du mar grags pa'i me tog thod/ /rab mchog srid gsum dag gi mig gcig pa/ /mchog sbyin 'gro ba kun gyi 'byor pa mdzes/ /dpag med pas kyang dpag med bskal par 'byung / /skabs dang yid 'phrog dag cing gsal bar mdzad/ /nor bu'i

thod can rdo rje las byung ba/ /srid gsum gcig pu dpa' bo pad+ma'i spyan/ /thos pa'i rgya mtsho sems can kun bas dpa'/ /'gro ba thams cad rnam par grol mdzad mchog /snyan cha mgul zhing pad+ma dag pa bsnams/ /dbang phyug bde gshegs bzhugs

pa'i thor tshugs can/ /tshul bzang yon tan rgyan du 'tsham pa'i gzugs/ /'jigs pa'i rlung chen 'tshub pa'i mtshon cha can/ /dge ba'i rgyu ste dam pa rtsol ba'i rgyu/ /tshul gyis longs spyod bde chen mchog gi rgyu/ /dkyil 'khor mchog gi

spyod yul rgyu gcig pa/ /srid gsum sgrol ba'i zom pa gcig pu lags/ /dkyil 'khor mchog gi rgyan te sdig med pa/ /gser mdog 'od rgyan rten du gyur pa ste/ /mnyam pa nyid kyis mi mnyam mtshungs par 'gyur/ /sa brnyes 'od zer

rgyas pa rgyan phreng mnga'/ /chen po'i che ba thogs pa med pa ste/ /snga ma mun pa kun bsal nyon mongs med/ /dge ba dag pa spyod yul rnam par dag /tshul gyis dkyil 'khor yangs shing rnam par dag /srid gsum dbang phyug pad+ma las byung

ba/ /srid gsum bde can yangs pa'i dbang phyug ste/ /dbang phyug mi g.yo rnal 'byor mkhas pa po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chen po rab mchog yangs/ /nor bu'i rgyan gyi rdo rje rgyan du thogs/ /pad+mas brgyan pa lhun po las byung ba/ /dge snod yon tan chen

po'i snod gcig pa/ /bde la longs spyod rnam 'dren chen po'i bdag /smon lam rgya chen rgya mtsho ldan pa ste/ /'gro ba srid par lhung ba grol mdzad pa/ /sa dang mnyam pa thams cad gzigs par mdzad/ /skal bzang bskal pa stong gi snang ba po/ /rdo rje mchog

gis sgeg pa'i dkyil 'khor can/ /yon tan rnam grangs khyad par dkyil 'khor ba/ /dge ba'i mtshan nyid dpa' bo'i rtsal mnga' ba/ /de bzhin nyid chos ro mkhyen spyod yul can/ /cod pan thig le dmar po'i dkyil 'khor ldan/ /lha chen brgya mnga' sum cu

gsum bdag dbang / /lha dang lha min dbang byas rnams kyis btud/ /brtson 'grus brgya dang ldan zhing rtsal stong mnga'/ /bsod nams brgya mnga' mtshon cha brgya 'chang ba/ /pad+ma brgya pa pad+ma nyid las byung / /dkyil 'khor brgya yi dbus na mdzes pa ste/ /chos

brgya ldan pa mchog stong ston pa po/ /sangs rgyas stong phrag mang pos yongs bstod pa/ /bskal pa rab 'byam mang por mkhas pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor mang po dag na dpa' ba'i sku/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i mthu mnga' ston pa po/ /rgya chen dri med dkyil 'khor dbus

na bzhugs/ /rab dga' bsgyings pa 'thor mdzad me tog thod/ /na bza' dar dkar la mnabs 'od mdzad pa/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor thugs rjes brgyan pa las/ /cha phrar gser mdzad mtha' yas zad mi shes/ /dpa' bo nyi ma'i 'od zer brgya mnga' ba/ /nor

bu'i dkyil 'khor zla 'dra 'od gsal zhing / /nyi mas kha phye pad+ma mchog bsnams pa/ /me tog mtshon cha thogs pa'i lha zhes grags/ /gtsug phud gsum pa tshangs sras skye dgu'i bdag /btsun rigs mchog ste rigs chen nang du skyes/ /rang gi rigs gsal dbang

chen dkyil 'khor pa/ /pad+ma bzang ba'i rigs mchog thig les mtshan/ /spyan bzang dge ba'i lha rnams rten gyur pa/ /gsang sngags mang po 'dzin pa'i dbang phyug po/ /tshogs chen mdun na 'dus pa'i mnga' bdag lags/ /spyan gsum dag gis dkyil 'khor

mdzes gyur pa/ /ka la ping ka'i skad kyis sdang ba 'dul/ /mda' dang ru gzhu stobs chen mtshon cha bsnams/ /stobs kyi lha ste stobs dang brtson pas 'dul/ /rgyan rnams sna tshogs legs par spras pa ste/ /rgyal ba rig sngags 'chang ba mang pos bstod/ /

tshogs mchod dga' byed rnams kyis rab bstod pa/ /chu srin 'dzin khri'i 'jigs las rab grol mdzad/ /gzugs mang mnga' zhing bde skyid rab sbyin pa/ /lha yul 'gro ba'i khyad par dkyil 'khor can/ /mtshungs med pas kyang mtshungs med mthu rtsal mnga'/ /

stabs gshegs yon tan che mchog 'od zer ldan/ /'jig rten nang na mkhas pa spyan ras gzigs/ /sa gzhi'i dkyil 'khor dbus kyi dkyil 'khor can/ /'od zer mang po stong phrag zad mi shes/ /nyon mongs rdul rnams thams cad sel mdzad pa/ /

mtha' dang bral ba kun tu gzigs pa ste/ /rab zhi kun las 'phags pa'i spyod yul can/ /don dang tshul la sems can gcig dpa' ba/ /theg pa bzang po 'dzin pa'i nyi ma lags/ /dul dang sbyin dang tshul la dad pa brnyes/ /skye dgu rnams kyi dri ma ma lus

bcom/ /blo gros bzang po rab dgyes ston pa po/ /bde ldan gos brgyan yang ba sna tshogs can/ /bcom ldan 'byung ba 'jigs pa med par mdzad/ /rtag tu dge ba kun mchog sbyin pa po/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i rnam thar brnyes pa'i blo/ /bde

ba longs spyod cher 'gyur dri ma med/ /zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas shing dri med pa/ /mi dang sred med brgya byin lag pa'i mchog /'jig rten mang po gzigs pa'i dbang phyug po/ /stobs dang rigs dang mthu stobs che ba lags/ /sangs rgyas

mtshungs shing chos mchog rin chen mtshungs/ /dge 'dun mtshungs shing chags bral thub par dka'/ /khyad par gsum 'phags rin chen mchog chen mtshungs/ /khyab bdag nyon mongs rnam gsum rdul bsal ba/ /rdo rje sems mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /pad+ma dri med phyag gi dbus bsnams pa/ /thor tshugs can la gzugs ldan cod pan thogs/ /spyi bo 'od dpag med rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal/ /de nas bcom ldan rang byung mun sel ba/ /rnga chen sgra ltar brtan pas bka' stsal pa/ /mchog chen rdo rje

glu la bstod pa yi/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad skyon sel legs pa mnga'/ /ji ste la la rtag tu dge mchog 'dod/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang la ni stod byed pa/ /des ni ring por mi thogs yon tan gyi/ /longs spyod mchog chen chos ni thob par 'gyur/ /

mi ni gang zhig rtag tu 'dis bstod la/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang dam pa sbyin par byed/ /sdig pa rnams kyang de la 'byung mi 'gyur/ /'dod pa gang yin bde blag de yis 'thob/ /de ni sdig pa'i dri mas mi gos te/ /lam srang bzang por dmigs te

'gro bar 'gyur/ /srid gsum skyabs 'os gcig pu pad+ma skyes/ /de 'drar chos kyi mchog la spyod par 'gyur/ /de ltar ming gi khyad par grub 'dod cing / /gang zhig rtag tu bde ba 'dod pa yis/ /'gro kun skye dgu'i bdag po spyan ras gzigs/ /
pad+ma las byung rtag tu bstod par gyis/ /bcom ldan 'das bla ma 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ /Ar+ya mai tri nA ma aSh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas rang gi snying po smras pa/ na ma s+t+rai yA d+h+wi kA nAM/ sarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM sa ra sa ra/ su ru su ru/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA d+ha ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ma hA tsa ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ma hA b+ha ra/ kam+pa kam+pa/ ma hra

kam+pa hUM/ ma hA s+pha ra Na d+harma a gra sA ga ra swA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye ma gzungs chen mo 'di ni yon tan che ba ste mtha' yas par khyab pa/ bskal pa bye ba phrag mang por yang shin tu thos par dka' ba/

sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snyed kyis bsnyen bkur mdzad mdzad pa/ sgrib pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad

las thar bar byed pa/ sems can gyi khams mtha' yas mu med po yongs su thar bar byed pa ste shin tu dkon pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa/ nor bu'i cod pan gyis bsgyings pa/ rgyan phreng rab tu g.yo ba rnams kyis

spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa'i mchog 'phags pa byams pa la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ dpa' bo chen po thabs brnyes pa/ /rgyal tshab mi yi bdag po ste/ /'jig rten bdag po rnam par gsal/ /dar ba chen po

mngon par rgyas/ /tshan chen stobs ldan che ba ste/ /de bzhin yangs shing rdul dang bral/ /dbang chen brtse ldan 'od ldan pa/ /sa yi dbang phyug rnam par gnon/ /rgyal chen mtshon cha brgya pa ste/ /mtshon cha chen po rdo rje'i mtshon/ /yon tan 'od brgyas

bsgyings pa ste/ /nor bu'i rna cha'i rgyan thogs pa/ /srid gsum dag na dpa' ba'i sku/ /rgya mtsho lta bu'i spyod yul can/ /lhun po zla 'byin ti se yi/ /rtse nas dkyil 'khor 'char ba po/ /dkyil 'khor chen po longs spyod pa/ /rab tu dga'

ba de bzhin des/ /yongs su dga' ldan chen po'i lha/ /che ba lha rnams kun gyi mchog /sangs rgyas gdung rgyud rgyas mdzad cing / /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rgyan dang ldan/ /sangs rgyas longs spyod longs par spyod/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa ston pa po/ /

ti se zla 'byin bzhin du yangs/ /sa yi dbang phyug bde mdzad pa/ /pad+ma 'dab stong rtse mo can/ /rdo rje'i pad+ma legs par skyes/ /chos kyi longs spyod longs par spyod/ /sa dang mnyam pa thub par dka'/ /snang bar byed pa 'byung ba po/ /srid gsum

ye shes nyi ma lags/ /gtso bo chen po cher grags pa/ /seng ge chen po stobs po che/ /cha lugs chen po zhal che ba/ /skye bo ngan dang sdug bsngal 'dul/ /rdo rje byi ru bai DUr+ya/ /nor bu'i dbu thod rgyan du thogs/ /byi ru gser gyi gcal bkram la/ /

sku chen zhabs kyi stabs kyis gshegs/ /zhal mdangs nyi ma du ma'i gzi/ /lcang lo cod pan dbu thod can/ /rig sngags 'chang brgyas zhabs la btud/ /rjed par bya ba rnams kyis mchod/ /nor bu brgya 'gul 'od zer gyis/ /brang gi phyogs

rnams dag par byas/ /cod pan can te 'od 'tsher ba/ /nyi ma bye ba brgya 'od ldan/ /rin chen sna tshogs mchog bkram zhing / /dri med dkyil 'khor rab tu 'phro/ /rlung gis ma lus bskyod pa yi/ /'bar ba chen po'i lta ba can/ /'od zer mang

pos phog pa yi/ /phan pa'i thabs ni rab ston pa/ /brjid pa'i tshul gyis bzhad pa yi/ /'od kyis zhal gsal rnga yab bskyod/ /dpung rgyan 'od zer spel mar bkod/ /tshon bris shin tu mdzes par 'tsher/ /lhun po phrad cing 'khrugs pa

ltar/ /ha ha zhes pa'i sgra chen sgrogs/ /rdo rje chen po rtse mo can/ /shin tu dga' mdzad bde sbyin pa/ /byams pa'i dkyil 'khor go char bgos/ /brtson pa kun las rnam par rgyal/ /snying rje'i stobs las byung ba ste/ /mtshon cha chen po shin tu

'bar/ /byams pa byams pa'i rtog pa can/ /kun nas sba ba'i dkyil 'khor ba/ /ma pham thub med dag pa ste/ /sangs rgyas cha lugs mnyam med che/ /byams pa'i snying po snying po che/ /byams pa'i pad+ma las byung ba/ /rdo rje 'chang chen rdo rje can/ /rdo rje'i

bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor pa/ /rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis btud/ /de bzhin bsnyen cing bstod pa po/ /grub pa chen po rig sngags grub/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mdzes par mdzad/ /thams cad grub mdzad grub pa po/ /sangs rgyas gdung gi sdong chen

lags/ /gsang sngags chen po'i rnam par nges/ /mdo sde'i bkod pa mdo sdud pa/ /nges gyur nges pa'i 'od sgron gyi/ /snang bas dri ma sel bar mdzad/ /'bar ba rtsa dmar 'od snang ba/ /dkyil 'khor dkar po che ba ste/ /gzhung dang mthun pa'i chos

dbyings dang / /nye bar gyur cing shin tu nges/ /swA hA swA hA'i bdag po mchog /'od zer bde legs bde legs mdzad/ /stobs chen 'chang ba bkra shis pa/ /nyi ma 'dra ste snyoms pa lags/ /stobs byed rgyal ba'i longs spyod ldan/ /

mkha' ltar dri med spyod yul can/ /dpa' bo rdo rjes 'joms par mdzad/ /rdo rje chen po rab bsgrub pa/ /sgrub pa po ste rtsod pa med/ /dkyil 'khor ldan pa rdo rjes ston/ /rlung chen shugs kyis bskyod pa yi/ /g.yo dang 'brug sgrogs sgra ldan pa/ /

sangs rgyas spyod yul pad+ma ste/ /de bzhin nyid kyi mtsho las skyes/ /mngon shes chen po mngon shes brnyes/ /khyab bdag sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /de nas sa yi dbang phyug po/ /byams pa'i dkyil 'khor byams pa la/ /bstod nas kun mkhyen

gnod bral ba/ /thub pa nyi mas bka' stsal pa/ /kye ma ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog /ming gi yon tan 'od ldan pa/ /bde dang phun sum tshogs bsgrub pa/ /thabs chen bla na med pa ste/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni/ /'jig rten kun gyi

bde skyed pa/ /'di ni bton pa tsam gyis kyang / /sdig pa thams cad dag par 'gyur/ /sdig pa dag las rgyal ba yi/ /byams pa bstod pa'i gnas pa la/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'dis/ /mi ni la la gang bstod pa/ /de la lha la sogs kun dang / /

lag na rdo rje stobs chen rnams/ /rtag pa nyid du sdug bsngal kun/ /gtan du bsal phyir brtson par byed/ /gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog /myur du 'don pa'i mi de ni/ /sangs rgyas sa yang thob 'gyur te/ /'di la the tshom yong med do/ /nang par

mal nas langs nas ni/ /gang zhig byams pa'i sems kyis bstod/ /de la byams pa rtogs pa yi/ /byams pa bde legs byed par 'gyur/ /de phyir dri ma thams cad sel byed cing / /sdig 'joms yon tan thams cad bskyed pa dang / /de bzhin 'jig

rten sdug bsngal sel ba yi/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad ched du dag par lhogs/ /'phags pa byams pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya kha gar+b+ha aSh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka nA ma d+hA ra NI man+t+ra

sa hi ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po zhal ras rgya che zhing spyan gyi 'od 'phro bas nam mkha'i dkyil dri zhim par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha'i spyod

yul can sa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM swa sti ka mA lAk+Shi bi pu la sam+b+ha ba/ d+harma d+hA tu go tsa ra swA hA/ gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu ngan song dang ngan 'gro thams cad ni rab tu zhi bar gyur/ sa yang g.yos par gyur/ rnga bo

che dag gi sgra yang grag par gyur/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams nam mkha'i snying po'i snying po dkyil

'khor mngon sum pa rnams kyi swA hA'i mchog gi gzungs 'byung bar shin tu dka' ba/ bsod nams chen po sdig pa dang nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ma/ rin po che'i phung por gyur pa 'di nyon cig dang / 'di thos pas

dri ma med par 'gyur zhing legs par khrus byas par 'gyur la shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma lta bur 'gyur te 'khor ba'i 'dam gyis mi gos so/ /nyi ma lta bur 'gyur te sems can thams cad snang bar byed do/ /zla ba la bur 'gyur te sems

can thams cad rab tu sim par byed do/ /nam mkha' lta bur 'gyur te ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi gos so/ /sa gzhi lta bur 'gyur te mtho dman med do/ /lhun po lta bur 'gyur te sems can thams cad kyis bskyod par mi nus so/ /
