thar pa lta bur 'gyur te bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis mi gos so/ /de la sogs pa yon tan stong phrag bgrang ba tshad med grangs med pa dag thob par 'gyur te/ nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / brjod pa dang / ston pa tsam dang / bzlas brjod

byas pa tsam gyis gang ci yang rung ste/ de'i 'dod pa dang / smon pa dang / re ba de dag 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis kyang char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / sdang bas dkrugs pa dang / mi nad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang /

gnod pa 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa'i dus dang / 'chi ba dang / chom rkun dang / dgon pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / gcan gzan dang / mu ge'i sdug bsngal rnams las yongs su srung bar byed la/ bde ba dang / 'byor pa dang / ci 'dod

pa dang / /ci la dga' ba thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'khor de dag thams cad kyis ha ha zhes ca co dang ga zha bton te/ sgra ring zhes byas nas gos dang / rgyan sna tshogs bskyod de snying nas phyag 'tshal nas/ byang chub sems

dpa' thams cad la dbang byed pa/ 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i bsngags pa rgya mtsho'i bstod pa yang dag par brjod pa/ nam mkha'i snying po srid gsum sems can mchog /'byor ldan blo gros rin chen rgya mtsho mnga'/ /

sems can dag pa bla med rin chen mchog /thar pa'i sa bon 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sel/ /kun mkhyen tshul mkhyen legs dang legs min mkhyen/ /thar mkhyen chos mkhyen bde dang mi bde mkhyen/ /lam mkhyen gces mkhyen dge dang mi dge mkhyen/ /

dus mkhyen dge mkhyen stobs dang stobs min mkhyen/ /'gro mchog chos mchog sems can yon tan mchog /lam mchog sngags mchog tshul dang tshul min mchog /rgyan mchog chos mchog 'dzin dang 'dzin min mchog /dag mchog rtogs mchog

mchog dang mchog min mchog /zhi rab snying rje'i rab ste 'khor gyi rab/ /'od rab thar pa'i rab ste rten gyi rab/ /rgya rab sngags kyi rab ste thugs brtse'i rab/ /mnyam rab sems can rab ste gsum rig rab/ /legs sgron mchog sgron stobs dang stobs min

sgron/ /thar sgron rigs sgron rgyal dang rgyal min sgron/ /dge sgron gzi sgron nor bu'i 'od kyi sgron/ /rgyu skar zla ba'i brgyan las shar ba'i sgron/ /mchog 'od yon tan kun gyi 'od zer 'od/ /legs 'od thar pa'i pho brang rten gyi 'od/ /'od chen gti mug rab tu

'byed pa'i 'od/ /rdo rje'i 'od 'bar bde ba'i 'od 'chang ba/ /rdo rje'i dbang po 'dren dbang sems can dbang / /rin chen 'od kyi dkyil 'khor brgyan dbang po/ /rgyal dbang rgyal ba'i stobs rgyun tshad med dbang / /dpa' bo rig sngags 'chang dbang srid

gsum dbang / /rdo rje bzang po rdor 'od rdo rje 'bar/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'bar bas brgyan/ /rdo rje 'od can rdor 'dzin rdo rje drag /rdo rje rgya chen rdo rje rab mchog dbang / /na bza' sngo zhing sku yi cha lugs sngo/ /sku mdog sngo zhing sngo ba'i 'od kyis brgyan/ /

ral gri rno 'jebs sngo zhing brtan pa bsnams/ /mkha' sngo gzhal med khang 'bar nang na bzhugs/ /lha zhal dri med shin tu mi bzad 'bar/ /rab tu drag la 'od zer 'phro zhing 'gyur/ /sdig sel rdul ltar 'khrug byed phreng mchog can/ /glog gi stobs kyi

snang bas sgeg la brtan/ /ral gri mtshon thogs dbang ldan mthu stobs mtshon/ /rdo rje'i mtshon thogs mda' dang mdung thung 'jigs/ /'khor lo'i mtshon thogs bcibs pa ri dang 'khrul/ /gsal shing mtshon thogs bgegs kyi stobs 'joms

pa/ /bde 'byung 'jig rten gsum bdag rdo rje'i dbyug /sku rnams thams cad nyi ma'i 'od kyis brgyan/ /grags pa'i rigs su byung bas rgyal po mdzad/ /mu tig phreng bas sgeg cing mdzes par bgyis/ /sku mdzes brnyes shing phun sum tshogs pa

brnyes/ /rab 'byam mchog brnyes sa la 'jug pa brnyes/ /mthu stobs lhag pa brnyes shing grub brnyes la/ /rig pa gsum gyi stobs brnyes mthu brnyes pa/ /bde 'dren zhi ba 'dren cing 'od 'dren pa/ /cha lugs gsal mchog dar ba chen po 'dren/ /

byams 'dren nyi ma 'dren cing skye dgu 'dren/ /legs 'dren zhing gi stobs 'dren snying rje can/ /dri med cha lugs gsal ba cha lugs 'bar/ /rnam grags sgeg pas grags pa'i ba dan can/ /'gro ba'i skabs 'byed 'jug dang ldog pa mkhyen/ /longs

spyod gsal bar ston pa'i sems kyis 'jug /sku dmar sku mthon sku mdzes sku bzang ba/ /sku ser sku dkar dar ba chen po'i sku/ /sku rol rdo rje'i sku mnga' spyan legs sku/ /rigs sku rig sngags 'chang ba rin chen bsnams/ /gtsug gi nor bu gtsug

can cod pan mchog /cod pan can te chos 'dzin rdo rje mchog /dpal 'dzin rin chen dam pa 'chang ba'i mchog /sngags gzhi phyag rgya 'chang ba phun sum tshogs/ /rab mdzes mkha' la gshegs shing rab tu rgyu/ /srid gsum nyi ma gcig pu

'od stong mnga'/ /ri rtse 'char ba bdal legs bkra shis pa/ /yon tan mthu stobs khyad par rnam par grags/ /nor bu chen po nor sdug nor bu'i 'od/ /nyi ma'i nor bu tshul spyod nor bu 'bar/ /yid bzhin nor bu 'gro kun mgon gcig pu/ /nam mkha'i

dkyil na nor bu gcig snang ba/ /sems can rnam dag yangs shing rnam par grags/ /srid gsum srung ma gcig pu rgyal sras mchog /zhi ba rab tu zhi ba skyabs 'os rtag /skye dgu'i bdag po pad byung pad+ma skyes/ /kun nas 'od bzang legs

bshad chos mnga' ba/ /dar ba legs bshad rab dul legs bshad phyag /blo bzang 'od bzang bde ldan skye gnas bzang / /mkhas rab zhi rab mchog gi chos dang ldan/ /zhi mdzad rgyal 'byung bde ba 'byung ba'i gnas/ /'od kyi 'byung gnas

bde mdzad dbang du mdzad/ /legs 'byung shes rab 'byung gnas stobs bskyed pa/ /snying rje'i 'byung gnas blo bzang rnam grags mdzad/ /rnam grol nges grol shin tu grol ba'i blo/ /blo yangs rnam par bkram zhing rnam par grags/ /kun tu longs

spyod sgo ste blo yi mchog /blo gros brtan pa dkon mchog gsum las bsgrubs/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma 'dab rgyas 'dra ba'i zhal/ /dag cing spyan yangs cha lugs yid du 'thad/ /snying po gsal ba'i snying po brtan zhing dul/ /ngo bo nyid kyis rgyun brnyes rab gsal ba/ /

spyan zur mnga' ni rab tu gtang legs pa/ /'jigs med zhal ras ston gyi zla ba 'dra/ /mdung thung brgya yi mtshon mchog mtshon cha rdzogs/ /drag po 'jigs pa sdig sel gsum las skyes/ /rab dul mkhas pa 'grogs dga' 'dris par sla/ /rab tu drag

pa gnyen rab gser mdog can/ /lha chen bde byed gsal shing phyag na bsnams/ /spyan gsum rig pa gsum ldan me gsum sel/ /'dod bzang me tog mtshon thogs me tog mda'/ /na bza' bzang mnabs g.yas 'phen tshabs cher 'phen/ /legs bris

sna tshogs mtshon cha sna tshogs mnga'/ /na bza' sna tshogs sna tshogs rgyan gyi dpal/ /zhal ras zla ba 'od zer rgyas pa 'dra/ /zhal mdangs bstan pas 'jig rten kun 'byor mdzad/ /bzhad pa nyi ma'i 'od zer rab 'jebs mnga'/ /zhal mdangs rgya mtsho gsal

mdzad lam me ba/ /dbang chen rdo rje'i thog lags 'jigs pa'i sgra/ /rdo rje drag po nor bu g.yo ba 'dzin/ /sgra brnyan snang bar mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan/ /blo gros chen po blo gros rno ba'i mchog /rgyan 'dzin dpal 'dzin rin chen zhal dang ldan/ /rgyu dang mi

rgyu 'gro ba kun gyi gnas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mgon sras phreng ba bzang / /stobs chen 'jig rten blo gros ngo bo nyid/ /skye dgu'i bdag po bka' lung mnyam zhing brtags/ /mi yi mnga' bdag mtho ris bskyed pa'i rgyu/ /sgyu 'dra 'dod pa'i mda' dang

rdo rje can/ /mthu stobs mnga' zhing spyan bzang sdug par ldan/ /ston pa bzang po stong nyid lam gyi stegs/ /gces gsum 'phel ba'i rgyu la 'jug pa mdzad/ /brtan po rgyu la rab tu nges gyur pa/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa kun gyi slob dpon lags/ /gcig

pu skye dgu'i dkyil 'khor cho ga mkhyen/ /rnam par snang mdzad zhing gi gnas nas skyes/ /dbang bskur brnyes shing sa bcur legs par gnas/ /gnas chen son pa mchog gnas gcig pu lags/ /skye dgu rnams kyi nyon mongs sel ba dang / sdig 'joms

mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di thos nas/ /bde gshegs sras mchog su zhig 'don byed pa/ /'jig rten zla ba gcig shar bzhin du snang / /nam mkha'i snying po sems can gcig pu yi/ /mdun 'dug nang par bstod pa 'di brjod gang / /de ni srid gsum

sems can mchog 'gyur zhing / /dri ma'i gnas kun las kyang thar bar 'gyur/ /g.yul dang 'thab rtsod shin tu mi bzad dang / /mu ge'i gnod pa mi nad byung ba na/ /mkhas pa su zhig sngar langs dad bskyed nas/ /nam mkha'i snying po la ni

stod byed pa/ /de ni 'jigs pa'i 'byung gnas thams cad dang / /sdug bsngal 'byung 'dren sdig pa rnams las grol/ /de ni zhi mchog mchog bde kun gnas dang / /bde ba rgya chen nges par thob par 'gyur/ /bde 'thob longs spyod 'phel bar bya ba 'am/ /

rgyal srid 'thob dang byad gzugs nor 'thob dang / /rigs 'thob yon tan kun gyi gzhi bsgrub phyir/ /bton na 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /de phyir ji ste rtag tu 'dod bde kun/ /'dod na 'gro ba kun la gcig dpa' ba/ /nam mkha'i snying po srid gsum
mgon po la/ /rtag tu bsten cing sngags kyang bsten par bgyi/ /'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya

sa man+ta b+ha dra aSh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka nA ma d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa kun tu bzang po nam

mkha'i dkyil kun tu rab 'byam ma lus pa dang mnyam pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos kyi snang ba gsal ba brnyes pa/ sa'i dkyil 'khor kun tu 'phros pa'i sku tha dad pa med cing dus gsum gyi sku mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ gzugs sna tshogs can byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po'i mchog dang / rab mchog dam pa sbyin pa/ yon tan chen po'i sku sa kun tu mnga' mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog kun tu bzang po gzugs sna tshogs can/

byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rab 'byam sa'i dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po snyoms par zhugs ma thag pa de'i tshe stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra

rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sku rab 'byam kun tu yongs su rgyas par gyur te/ nam mkha'i khams kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sku rnams sa'i dkyil 'khor du ma dag tu kun nas 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i de

bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i mgo bo la byugs nas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi snying po gzungs chen mo shod cig /

de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i mchog lus 'od zer 'bum gyis snang bar byas pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad g.yo bar byas nas gzungs 'di bshad do/ /tad+ya thA/ oM na mo na ma s+t+ri b+hu ba ne shwa re/ ma hA b+ho gA ya/ a sa ma sa ma/ a mi

ta sa ma/ a nan+ta sa ma/ ga ga na sa ma/ tri b+hu ba na sa ma/ a she Sha sa ma/ be Sha sa ma/ pa ra ma ar+tha sa ma/ swa b+hA ba sa ma/ ta thA tA sa ma/ a ra dzaHsa ma/ shud d+hi sa ma/ bud d+hi sa ma/ d+harma ta thA tA sa ma/ a b+hi Sha ma sa ma/ sa ma sa ma/ e kA

nA ya/ sA ga ra/ bi shud+d+he/ A lo ka /hI hI/ lab+d+ha lab+d+ha/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ oM pra sa ga ta/ na ya na ya/ hi ni ra a d+hiSh+ThA na/ saM b+ho ga /aM a na la ya la ya/ d+harma a gra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ dza ya dza ya/ hUM hUM/ d+ha ma d+ha ma swA hA/ de nas

rgyal ba'i sras kyi thu bo 'jig rten thams cad kyi mgon po gcig pu sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te/ sa'i dkyil 'khor g.yo bar byas nas de skad ces smras te/ 'jig

rten gsum po kun tu gang bar byas so/ /de nas lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gang ba'i dkyil 'khor nas gser gyi 'od zer 'bar zhing snang la rab tu g.yo bas brgyan pa'i lus can sa steng kun gyi rdo rje me tog

thod stan chen po las bskyod de/ dkyil 'khor nas langs nas ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ste smras pa/ kye ma snying rje chen po dang yon tan grangs med pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu 'byam pa'i gzungs chen mo/ kye ma sangs rgyas 'byung ba chen mo/ mtha' dang dbus med

pa'i sa gsum dang mnyam zhing sems can gyi khams grangs med pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir gnas pa/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor gnas pa med pa'i gzungs chen mo/ /kye ma bskal pa mtha' yas pa nas 'phangs pa'i sdig pa'i bag chags sel cing nyon

mongs pa'i rgya mtsho skems la lta ba'i ri bo 'thor bar byed pa'i gzungs chen mo bskal pa mtha' yas par dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs 'byung ba yang dag par ma bsags shing bde bar gshegs pa 'bum phrag du ma mngon sum du mthong bas byang chub kyis bon ma bsgrubs la/

thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa'i khyad par gyi yon tan rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs pa rjes su thob pa ma yin pa gzhan ni sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gzungs chen mo 'di mnyan par yang mi nus na/ gzung ba'am/ bklag pa'am/ kun chub

par bya ba lta ci smos/ gzungs chen mo 'di'i ming tsam yang bskal pa bye ba phrag stong gi bar du thos par dka'o/ /kye ma gzungs chen mo 'di sems can gang dag gi lag na 'dug pa de dag ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa'o/ /'tsho ba bzang pos 'tsho ba'o/ /

mngon par shes pa rnams kyi gzhi bzang po'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa'o/ /yon tan thams cad yang dag par rdzogs pa'o/ /'di lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis ngan song gi sdug

bsngal thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /lan gnyis brjod pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /lan gsum brjod pa tsam gyis nyon mongs pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar na brjod pa tsam gyis gong nas gong du yon tan

rnams 'thob par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'chag bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /shing gcig 'greng gi drung du bzlas brjod byas na grub pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /

'gro bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /nags tshal chen po'i nang du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la lan bdun brjod na bsam gtan chen po 'thob par 'gyur la nyon mongs pa dang yang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa kun tu

bzang po'i sku gzugs kyi drung du skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la me tog la sogs pa ji snyed pas mchod nas lus ngal bar gyur gyi bar du gzungs chen mo 'di brjod la/ ngal bar gyur nas de nyid du nyal na rmi lam du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po mthong bar

'gyur te/ phyag g.yas pas de la byugs nas yang dag par dbugs 'byin par mdzad de chos kyi snang ba chen po yang stsol bar mdzad do/ /'di skad du rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so/ /khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa yin te/

khyod tshe brjes nas sa chen po thob par 'gyur ro zhes kyang gsung ngo / /de nas lus bde ba dang / sems bde ba dang / dga' ba chen po dang / dang ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po dang ldan bzhin du sad par 'gyur ro/ /mthu che ba dang / dbang che bar

grags par yang 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams kyang de la blta ba'i phyir 'ong ngo / /nang bar langs nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yang dag par bsdus pa'i mdo sde rnams bklag par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la yang phan pa dang bde ba'i sems bskyed par

bya'o/ /de nas pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing sdig pa thams cad dang bral te/ nyon mongs pa'i phyogs rnams bcom la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang bsngags par 'gyur ro/ /lha la sogs pa yang de la bsrung ba dang /

bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir brtson par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar ji skad bstan pa bzhin du byed pa'i rgyal ba'i sras de ni ring po mi thogs par kun tu bzang po'i sa chen po la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdo rje gtsug phud la sogs pa stong gsum gyi bdag po rig sngags

'chang chen po rnams dang / spyan chen mo la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang chen mo rnams dang / rdo rje snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rdo rje zhags pa la sogs pa rig sngags kyi lha chen po rnams dang / rin chen

dra ba can la sogs pa rig sngags kyi lha mo chen mo rnams dang / lha mo sgrol ma la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams dang / dar chen dang / gzugs bzang dang / shin tu blta na sdug pa la sogs pa gzhon nu rnams

dang / gzhon nu ma rnams dang / bran rnams dang / bran mo rnams dang / mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa log 'dren chen po rnams dang / lus mchog la sogs pa srin po'i dbang po rnams dang / ma mo la sogs pa srin mo rnams dang / dbang

phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i dbang phyug rnams dang / rdo rje me tog thod la sogs pa dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad langs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mchog 'phags

pa kun tu bzang po la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa bla na med pa'i yon tan gyi snang ba zhes bya bas bstod pa/ kun tu bzang po kun gyi mchog /sna tshogs kun gyi 'byor pa che/ /dkyil 'khor chen po rdo rje mchog /sna tshogs gzugs can phyogs kyi

bdag /rdo rje chen po dgyes pa che/ /gzi brjid chen po stobs po che/ /gnon dang rab gnon dpal gyi rab/ /khyab bdag rgyal ba'i blo gros rgyal/ /rdo rje chen po rab tu bzhad/ /bsgrub dka' chen po sgrub mdzad pa/ /rol mo chen pos rnam par rol/ /

rab dga' chen po 'dul ba po/ /lha chen dbang phyug chen po ste/ /btsan po khyab 'jug skye dgu'i bdag /sa steng sa 'og sa la dgyes/ /de bzhin sa 'dzin sa gsum pa/ /dul dang sbyin pa'i thabs/ /rab mkhyen stong gi mnga' bdag lags/ /

shes nyen can te bzod la dgyes/ /brtson 'grus 'byung ba 'byor pa che/ /brtson 'grus bcu dang thabs bcu pa/ /stobs bcu'i sras chen thu bo ste/ /mthu stobs stong gis spro ba dang / /yongs su ldan zhing bcu sel ba/ /rdul sel rgyal po chen po

ste/ /rgyal po dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho pa/ /rdul rnams rab tu zhi ba'i thabs/ /cho ga mkhyen pa blo mnga' ba/ /mkhas pa mdzes pa skal ba bzang / /shin tu sdug pa dga' skyed pa/ /snying po chen po las byung ba/ /nyon mongs bral ba thub bar dka'/ /

sa dang mnyam pa mkha' dang mnyam/ /rlung dang mtshungs pa'i spyod yul can/ /gzi brjid nyid de gzi brjid mtshungs/ /rgya mtsho bzhi yi chu dang 'dra/ /rmugs dang smyo ba zhi bar mdzad/ /thub par dka' ba'i nyon mongs 'jil/ /g.yul sel g.yul la dgyes

pa ste/ /g.yul gyi nyes pa rab 'joms pa/ /gsung bzang ngang pa'i gdangs su bzhad/ /dbang po nye dbang dbang chen sras/ /dbang po las lhag thub dang mnyam/ /chos 'dzin 'byor dang ldan par bstan/ /rab dga' bun long zhi mdzad pa/ /nyon

mongs 'dam rdzab skems par mdzad/ /dbang po rgyags pa'i rims nad sel/ /khro bo'i dregs pa rnam par 'joms/ /gsung snyan 'jam pa nyid dang ldan/ /mnyam pa mi mnyam mnyam pa dang / /mnyam med yul las rnam par 'das/ /sangs

rgyas kun dang spyod yul gcig /byang chub snying por rgya cher rol/ /rim pa rab ston dge ba ste/ /spyan bzang phun sum tshogs pa dge /gtsang ma lam bzang sbyin mdzad pa/ /dag mdzad bsreg sbyin mchog sbyin po/ /'joms byed bgegs

rnams rnam par 'joms/ /'thob mdzad dpe med gsung ba po/ /rdo rje'i 'jig rten gcig snang ba/ /skyes pa bud med tshogs kyi bdag /nges par yon tan 'byor mdzad pa/ /sems can 'khor ba zhi mdzad pa/ /brtan po sdig pa rnams dang bral/ /

kun tu rnam rgyal snang ba po/ /kun tu rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor can/ /kun tu rgya mtsho'i snang ba mdzad/ /kun tu nyes pa sel ba lags/ /mi bzad sa 'og rnam par dkrugs/ /de bzhin zad mdzad thug par mdzad/ /nyon mongs rgya mtsho rnam par dkrugs/ /nyon

mongs phyogs rnams zad par mdzad/ /'bar ba'i dka' ba 'phro mdzad pa/ /rgyags shing bdo ba zhi bar mdzad/ /rdo rje chen po stobs skyed pa/ /sdang ba thams cad nges par 'joms/ /pha rol zhugs pa sdig sel ba/ /dag pa nam mkha'i spyod yul can/ /

dag pa sbyin zhing yon tan sbyin/ /'bras bu sbyin zhing kun sbyin pa/ /ye shes sbyin zhing bsod nams sbyin/ /longs spyod sbyin zhing rgyal sbyin pa/ /dbang phyug sbyin zhing tshig sbyin la/ /nor sbyin tshogs ldan rdo rje can/ /gzugs sbyin dpa' bo rnam par

rgyal/ /dag cing dge ba'i tshul sbyin pa/ /bde 'byung gtsug na nor bu thogs/ /sa 'dzin gzung bar dka' ba po/ /dkyil 'khor mgu bar sgrub mdzad pa/ /'bab cing de bzhin 'bebs par mdzad/ /rin chen dra ba rin chen mnyam/ /sgron ma mun sel rgyal ba

can/ /yon tan ye shes theg chen ldan/ /brtan mchog che ba'i chos nyid can/ /gsung ba chen po shes rab che/ /sangs rgyas tshul ni rab ston pa/ /mchod pa chen po theg chen gyi/ /theg pa bla na med par ldan/ /mchod pa chen po'i chos shes pa/ /

'bras bu chen po'i chos kyi mchog /ston mdzad 'dul mdzad ston pa po/ /zhi ba de bzhin zhi mdzad pa/ /bzang po bzang dang mtshungs pa nyid/ /kun tu rab 'byam sel mdzad pa/ /snying rje ye shes snying po mkhyen/ /snying rje'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can/ /snying

rje chen po yongs su rdzogs/ /dus chen rnam par dag par mdzad/ /mtshon mchog dang ba rab mtho ba/ /rtsod chen 'das pa'i spyod yul can/ /skye dgu srung zhing spyan yangs pa/ /rnyed par dka' ba'i dal 'byor can/ /kun tu spyod pa khong dge ba/ /dga' ba'i

dam pa sbyin pa po/ /kun du yul kun mnga' ba ste/ /zhe sa bzang po rtag tu mnga'/ /dul ba sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i pad+ma lags/ /zla ba lta bur sim mdzad thabs/ /mkhas pa rgyags spangs cho ga mkhyen/ /spyod yul

gcig la gnas pa ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mnga'/ /dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen/ /slob dpon chen po grags pa che/ /dam pa nyid de bla na med/ /gsang sngags rlabs ni rgyas par mdzad/ /de ltar khyab bdag chen po ni/ /yon

tan brgya yi spos kyis rgyas/ /dag cing byang la mkhas la sogs/ /yon tan 'byung la rig sngags rgyal/ /gtsug na nor bu thogs la sogs/ /mchog rnams kyis ni bstod nas kyang / /sdug bsngal chu bo bcom pa yi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig

'di gsungs/ /kye ma bstod pa chen po brgya/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa yin/ /mi rnams la la gang zhig gis/ /sdig bsal kun tu bzang po la/ /snying nas 'di yis bstod byas na/ /des ni sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob/ /gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad

'don/ /mi de yon tan yongs rdzogs shing / /de bzhin gshegs tshul che ba yi/ /ye shes ma lus smra bar nus/ /de ltar thub mchog sras po yon tan brgya yi spobs las nges par byung gyur cing / /yon tan sna tshogs 'byung dang 'jig rten yan chad dag

gis yon tan rgyas rnams la/ /bstod pa chen po rnams byas rgyal ba'i sras la bstod pas nyin re bstod byas na/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba'i skur 'gyur snang ba thob cing rnam dag yon tan 'byung gnas 'gyur/ /'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i mtshan brgya

rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badzra pA Ni aSh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka nA ma d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa

gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po smras pa/ oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn ta ka /ha na da ha/ pa tsa hUM phaT/ de nas gzungs sngags

'di bshad ma thag tu sa chen po g.yos par gyur te/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyang skrag nas nyam thag pa'i skad phyung ngo / /dkyil 'khor chen por 'dus pa thams cad kyang ha ha zhes 'dzer to/ /lha la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang chen po rnams kyis kyang

rgyan gyi char chen po phab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhal 'dzum bzhin du rdo rje 'chang la gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/ sdang ba sel ba 'khor 'di dag ha cang skrag par ma byed cig /rdo rje 'chang gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gzungs 'di ni mchog

tu gsang ba lags so/ /rig sngags thams cad kyi mchog dang / bgegs thams cad zlog pa dang / sdang ba thams cad sel ba dang / dam pa stsol ba dang / 'byor pa stsol ba dang / sdang ba rnams dga' bar bgyid pa dang / thos na don mchis pa dang / brjod

na don mchis pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis na don mchis pa dang / stobs skyed pa dang / gzugs bzang bar bgyid pa dang / spobs pa skyed pa dang / dbang phyug thob par bgyid pa dang / nor dang ldan par bgyid pa dang / dbang bgyid pa dang / sdang ba 'joms pa

dang / sdang ba 'jig par bgyid pa dang / dug sel ba dang / rgyal bar bgyid pa dang / dga' bar bgyid pa dang / mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa dang / dang bar bgyid pa dang / nga rgyal 'joms pa dang / pha rol pham par bgyid pa dang / sdig pa zhi bar bgyid

pa dang / nongs pa bgyis pa sbyong ba dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / mtshams ma mchis pa zlog pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / bkra mi shis pa zhi bar bgyid pa dang / dpal skyed pa dang / skal ba

bzang po ra bgyid pa dang / sems can thams cad dga' bar bgyid pa dang / gzhan la dbang bgyid pa dang / ci 'tshal ba stsol ba dang / yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyid pa dang / char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus kyi

gnod pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags te/ g.yul chen po dang / mi nad chen po dang / rtsod pa chen po dang / mi ma lags pa la sogs pa 'jigs pa dang / sdang ba dang / byad stems dang / ro langs kyi sbyor ba chen po dang / skrod pa dang / srog

'jig pa'i tshe dang / 'jigs pa chen po byung ba na nang par langs nas lus khrus bgyis la/ gos dkar po 'tshal te/ kha shar phyogs su bltas la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi gdong du lta zhing lan bdun brjod na/ brjod pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad

las thar bar 'gyur zhing grub pa chen po yang thob par 'gyur la/ thams cad du yang rgyal bar 'gyur te/ sems can rnams la srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa ni gzungs chen mo 'di las lhag pa ma mchis so/ /de nas 'khor thams cad

ngo mtshar du gyur nas rdo rje 'chang la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che/ /rdo rje 'jigs pa dgyes pa che/ /rdo rje snying po stobs po che/ /rdo rje 'khrugs pa zhags pa che/ /

rdo rje chen po stobs po che/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par mdzad/ /rdo rje hUM gi hUM lags te/ /rdo rje sa 'og 'jigs pa po/ /chags pa'i rdo rje chags pa che/ /chags pa'i zhags pa mgyogs pa che/ /phyag dmar phyag ni ring ba ste/ /

spyan dmar spyan dang ldan pa lags/ /rdo rje mthon ka mthon ka che/ /mthon mthing dbu skras brgyan pa lags/ /ral gri sngon po ral gri che/ /dkyil 'khor sngon po'i dkyil 'khor can/ /mthon ka'i spyan te dbu sngo ba/ /'od chen mthon ka'i 'od dang

ldan/ /rdo rje sngon po stobs mi mtshungs/ /rdo rje spro ba'i stobs po che/ /khro bo'i rdo rje khro bo che/ /sel mdzad khro bo'i rgyags pa sel/ /khros pa'i spyan ni rab tu bstod/ /khro bo bgegs rigs sel bar mdzad/ /gzhu bsnams zhags pa bsnams

pa ste/ /rdo rje'i mdangs ni nges par 'gums/ /dbyug thogs rdo rje'i ral gri bsnams/ /rdo rje'i zhags pas rab tu 'joms/ /rdo rje'i 'khor lo 'khor lo che/ /'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs rab tu khro/ /sna tshogs sku ste thig les bris/ /gzi brjid skyed

pa grags mdzad pa/ /bzod par dka' ba reg mi bzod/ /sdig dang bgegs rnams gcod mdzad pa/ /drag po chen po rdo rje khro/ /sgyel byed drag po sgyel bar mdzad/ /gting dpag dka' ba ring du gshegs/ /rin chen rgya mtsho rab tu dga'/ /rgya

mtsho lhun po'i dpung dang ldan/ /dam pa'i ti se lhun po'i rtse/ /gad rgyangs chen pos bzhad pa po/ /spyod yul bskal pa grangs med gsum/ /rig sngags 'chang mchog rdo rje can/ /rig sngags 'chang chen mnga' bdag lags/ /na bza' lcang lo rtsa

dmar gsol/ /mthon ka na bza' mthon la dgyes/ /srin po srung po drag po ste/ /me tog phreng ba'i rgyan la dgyes/ /nyi ma chen po nyi ma'i 'od/ /'od zer brgya phrag rab tu 'gyed/ /grol mdzad mgon po ston pa po/ /rab mchog rab mchog

rnams kyis mchod/ /mgrin chen mgrin pa'i mdog sngo ba/ /mgur bzang zhal bzang dam pa lags/ /cod pan chen po rdo rje'i 'od/ /phun sum tshogs ldan sems dag pa/ /ye shes che ldan bsrung ba che/ /rlung mar lags te spyod yul ring / /gtso bo

sgrol mdzad pha rol gshegs/ /'jigs las grol ba rab 'jigs pa/ /rgyal chen gtsug na nor bu thogs/ /mtshon cha chen po sna tshogs mtshon/ /'jig rten gsum gyi tshul chen gcig /gsum gzigs rtse gsum gtsug pud gsum/ /'dod

pa'i lha ste snang chen mtshan/ /za ba po ste 'jigs par mdzad/ /mtho ba sku mchog zhal gsum pa/ /tsham tshom med de srid las byung / /rtag pa skar dgyes dus 'byor pa/ /rgyu skar rgyal rigs 'phel bar mdzad/ /rgyal po sngags 'chang chen po ste/ /

bgegs kun dbang phyug mkhas pa lags/ /bai DUr+ya ltar dri med sku/ /mdzes shing stobs bskyed sna tshogs stobs/ /dga' ba skyed pa dga' bar mdzad/ /dkon mchog gsum po 'dzin pa'i mchog /lha chen dpa' bo chen po ste/ /brtan po

dpa' bo lham me ba/ /bde ba chen po 'ching ba gcod/ /dam du 'ching ba'i rtsal mnga' ba/ /mtshon cha che tshogs cod pan can/ /rig sngags 'chang ba'i tshogs dga' ba/ /pad+ma chen po'i phyag ring ba/ /pad+ma las byung pad+ma'i mchog /nag po

chen po 'byung po che/ /gtum chen thog thog chen po ste/ /rlung chen bzhad mo 'byung ba dang / /rdo rje'i mtshon cha brgya rdzogs pa/ /rtul phod thub dga' brtson pa ste/ /'byung po chen po'i tshogs kyi rje/ /zhi ba dbang po rdo rje'i mtshon/ /brag gi rtse mo rnam par

'gems/ /rgyal ba'i sras po gzugs che ba/ /rdo rje yis ni dkyil 'khor brgyan/ /rdo rje'i lcags mdas bsreg mdzad pa/ /rdo rje'i mdas ni rnam par sbyong / /rdo rje don yod rdo rje'i dbang / /rdo rje dbang po rdo rje'i rtsal/ /ye shes dag pa theg pa che/ /thabs

brnyes snying rje chen po lags/ /rdo rje chen po rtsed mo can/ /spyan bzang rnam par gzigs pa po/ /rdo rje dril bu rnam dag spyan/ /mdza' bo sdug pa dam tshig mkhyen/ /rdo rje chen po mgon po pa/ /rdo rje sa 'og 'jigs par mdzad/ /

rdo rje chen po gad rgyangs sgrogs/ /me tog chun po 'od gsal ba/ /dag pa zas gtsang sras kyi sras/ /des pa skal bzang gtsang ba lags/ /sna tshogs can te lha kun mchog /rdo rje'i dpung gi dkyil 'khor ldan/ /rdo rje gtsug sdug shes rab can/ /rdo rje'i

bkod pa rab tu mdzes/ /mdzes pa shin tu rnam par dag /bskal pa'i rlung chen lta bu lags/ /dpa' bo gsang ba chen po 'chang / /rig sngags 'chang gi mchog gis rjed/ /gsang ba po ste gsang ba gsung / /skyes pa bud med tshogs dga' ba/ /rdo rje

thog thog sgra chen sgrogs/ /rdo rje'i sgra ste rnam par 'joms/ /rdo rje'i lcags kyu dgyes pa che/ /rdo rje 'bar ba cher 'bar ba/ /nor bus spras pa'i na bza' gsol/ /spos dang me tog phreng gis brgyan/ /dbu yi snyan cha gdub kor btags/ /sangs rgyas

bstan pa ston pa po/ /rgyal po sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /dbang phyug chen po grags pa che/ /dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ston pa po/ /dbu rgyan cod pan kun nas bcings/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa lags/ /

de ltar rdo rje dbang phyug mgon/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dag gis bstod/ /de nas rdo rje don yod pas gsungs pa/ /rdo rje gsang bas brgyan pa yi/ /rdo rje mtshan rtsa brgyad pa 'di/ /ming ni rdo rje don yod 'byung / /sdang ba thams cad zlog byed pa/ /ming ni brgya rtsa brgyad

pa 'di/ /dad pa gang zhig 'chang byed pa/ /grub pa thams cad thob 'gyur zhing / /nyes pa kun las rnam par 'grol/ /lag na rdo rje stobs po che/ /rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur/ /lag na rdo rje'i yon tan che/ /gang zhig nang par langs nas brjod/ /de ni sdig pa

kun las 'grol/ /ngan song kun las thar bar 'gyur/ /gsang sngags thog mar smos pa 'di/ /su zhig nang par langs nas 'don/ /rgyal po blon po grong khyer ba/ /gnyen rnams kyang ni dga' bar 'gyur/ /bstod pa'i mchog 'di su 'don pa/ /'jig rten thams

cad de dbang 'gyur/ /sdig pa thams cad zad pa dang / /tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'dod pa dam pa yi/ /bde ba de yis 'thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig nang par langs nas ni/ /lag na rdo rje'i drung du brjod/ /de ni ji ltar 'dod pa dang / /

ldan 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'don pa la/ /bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang / /'jigs byed rgyal po rnams kyis kyang / /zil gyis mnan par mi nus so/ /shes rab can ni gang zhig gis/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog bton

na/ /gzugs bzang stobs ni skye ba dang / /bde ba 'phel ba de yis 'thob/ /gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di/ /nges par gnas shing gtsang mar 'don/ /mdor na yon tan rgyas pa yi/ /bde ba de yis 'thob par 'gyur/ /'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i

mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI ku mA ra b+hU tA Sh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka nA ma d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal

gzhon nur gyur pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ phyogs bcu'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya mtha' dag ma lus par khyab cing mchog tu rmad du byung ba rnam par dag pa'i blo mnga' ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jam dpal gzhon

nur gyur pa thugs dri ma dang skyon thams cad dang bral ba/ yon tan dri ma med pa'i tshogs kyi 'od zer gyis brgyan pa'i sku/ zhabs rten gyi pad+ma la lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / klu dang / rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi thor tshugs dang cod pan gyi rtse mos gtugs

pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dbyangs ngan song gi 'gro ba sna tshogs rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM b+ho ma hA ma Ni ru tsi ra ka lA pa/ bi tsi tra/ muk+ta dA ma/ a laM kr-i ta sha rI ra/ pa ra ma satwa mo tsa ka

ta thA ga ta ma hA d+harma/ ko Sha d+ha ra/ pra ba ra d+harma/ lab+d+ha/ bi dza ya/ su ra ta/ saM b+ho ga u pa de sha ka/ kle sha ga ra/ pra sha ma ka/ shUn+yatA swab+hA ba/ a nu swa ri/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra/ bar ta/ ba ra Na da da/ oM ma hA pA sha pra sa ra/ a sa ma sa ma/ anan+ta sa ma/ sa man+ta b+ha

dra/ sa man+ta san+d+ha ra/ sa man+ta A ka ra/ sa man+ta pra sa ra/ sa ras ra/ he he/ many+dzu ra ba/ ma hA badzra ma hA khaD+ha/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ bir dza bir dza/ karma a ba ga ma ka /ku ru ku ru/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha/ d+hu d+hu d+hu d+hu/ ma hA ma hA ma hA ma hA/

mo ha ya mo ha ya/ b+ho b+ho/ b+hI ma b+hI ma/ nA da nA da/ sa ra sa ra/ ma hA bo d+hi sa twa/ mo tsa ya/ ma ma nA tha ma nu sr-i ta/ a pA ya duHkhaM/ su khaM/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA/ a nA tho haM/ duHkhi to haM/ sa ra dzo haM/ u ba dru to haM/ a bi bik+to haM/ mA ra na d+harmo haM/ twa na b+ha

ga bAM/ duHkhi tA nAM/ su khaM da dA/ a nA thA nAM/ sa nA tha ka ra/ sa ra dza sAM/ bi ra dza ska ra/ u pa dru hA nAM/ swa ra u pa dra ba pra sha ma ka/ a bi bi ka tA nAM/ ku sha la saM b+ha ra/ pa ri pU ra yi tA/ ku sid+hA nAM/ ma hA bir+ya d+ha tA/ mA ra Na/ d+harmi Na/ ma ma ti/ pa dA dA tA/ ma ma

bi b+ha ga bA na/ nA tho b+ha ba/ sha ra NaM/ pa rA ya NaM/ tra tA/ sarba duHkhA ni/ me pra sha ma ya/ sarba kle sha ra dzIM si mi/ a ba na ya/ sarba saM sA ra u pa dra ba/ duHkhA ni me nA sha ya/ sarba ku sha la d+harma pa ri pU ram+me/ ku ru/ sarba karma/ A ba ra Na/ kle sha pa ra ba ta

me bi ki ra/ ma hA bo b+hi satwa si bi d+hi/ bIr+ya pA ra mi tA/ yo ga m+me/ san+ni yo dza ya/ a ra Na d+harma/ bi rA ga bi ra dza/ sany+dza ha/ pra dza ha/ d+ha ri Ni/ sa ma/ kha sa ma/ dza la ni d+hi sa ma/ me ru sa ma/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa pa ra da swA hA/ rig sngags don kun sgrub pa

'di/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa na/ /de ma thag tu sems can rnams/ /skye dang rga ba zad par 'gyur/ /ngan 'gro thams cad zhi gyur nas/ /bdud kyi sde rnams rab tu 'dar/ /lha rnams thams cad rab tu dga'/ /log 'dren rnams ni skrag par

gyur/ /sdig pa zhi bar byed pa yi/ /gzungs 'di bshad pa'i mod la yang / /grangs med phrag ni dung phyur snyed/ /'khor ba'i btson ra dag nas thar/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yis/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rab bsgrags shing / /gang tshe rig sngags

bshad pa na/ /brag dang nags dang tshal du bcas/ /rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba'i/ /sa gzhi de yi tsho na g.yos/ /sangs rgyas 'od kyi snang ba yis/ /sa yi steng yang khyab par gyur/ /bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang / /srin po mi bzad gzugs can rnams/ /

stobs bcu ldan la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /skad phyung tshig ni mthun par smras/ /lha rnams zhi ba'i cha lugs can/ /thams cad yid ni dga' gyur nas/ /gang na rdo rje ral gri che/ /de yi drung lhags smras pa ni/ /phyag 'tshal mchog sbyin rdo rje'i mchog /

'jam pa'i dbyangs ni stobs chen la/ /shugs stong ldan pa rgyal ba can/ /bgegs kyi yul 'khor rab 'joms pa/ /sngags 'chang gsang sngags chen po 'chang / /sna tshogs gzugs can mi yi bdag /shin tu stobs ldan gzugs mdzes 'jigs/ /drag

po drag po rab 'joms pa/ /gzi brjid gzi brjid mnga' ba'i dpal/ /dpal ldan mnyam pa med pa'i dpe/ /rdo rje can te snying sbyong ba/ /mi shes pa yi rab rib sel/ /sgeg pa'i cha lugs mchog mnga' ba/ /skye dgu'i bdag po sgeg par dgyes/ /gzhu

stobs can la phyag ring ba/ /nyon mongs dgra rnams sel bar mdzad/ /mdzes pa na bza' sna tshogs gsol/ /me tog phreng rgyan sna tshogs can/ /spyan bzang dbu ni mdzes pa ste/ /dgyes shing na bza' mdzes par gsol/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs de rab tu

bzhad/ /dkar nag 'byes pa'i spyan mnga' ba/ /ha ha'i sgra ni grags par bsgrags/ /rab tu dang bas bstan pa dga'/ /rgya chen gser gyi mdog dang ldan/ /rgya mtsho'i snying po'i spyod yul can/ /tshul mkhyen tshul ldan 'jigs pa ste/ /sdang

ba'i snying ni 'jigs par mdzad/ /cha lugs sngo la sa skyong ba/ /lha yi bdag po dga' bar mdzad/ /'dod pa'i lha ste 'dod sel bstan/ /rgyal po'i 'jig rten sa 'dzin pa/ /brtan po rnams la brtan par grags/ /yon tan dag gis phyogs su bzhad/ /btud

pa yis btud phyag bgyis pa/ /rtag tu mchod cing rjod pa lags/ /stobs po che la shugs che ba/ /phyag ring g.yul chen mnga' ba po/ /sgeg chen rdo rje dam pa ste/ /'dzem shes rab bsrung ngo tsha shes/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po'i mchog /dkyil

'khor chen po ston pa po/ /dkyil 'khor chen por grags pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor chen po mdzad pa lags/ /dkyil 'khor slob dpon dkyil 'khor can/ /zhabs la rjed pa'i tshegs dang ldan/ /ha ha swA hA'i bdag che ba/ /mchod pa chen po sa dang

mnyam/ /hUM gis 'jigs mdzad 'jigs pa ste/ /'jigs pa'i 'od kyis gsal ba po/ /lha dang lha min rnams kyis btud/ /de bzhin mchod cing ri mor bgyid/ /zhabs 'bring gang rgyangs chen po can/ /rlung drag mun pa sel mdzad pa/ /'jig rten

gsum du snyan par grags/ /gnod sbyin srin pos bsnyen bkur ba/ /drag po dkar mdzad bde 'byung ba/ /mda' bdag gtsug gi nor bu can/ /'dzum zhing sgeg par kun tu ston/ /spyod pa sa ltar brtan pa lags/ /nor bu'i dkyil 'khor 'od

mdzes pa/ /nyi ma gsal ba lam me ba/ /nyi ma'i 'od 'dra 'ja' khugs bzhin/ /tha ler zhugs shing rgya cher bzhad/ /mthong na dga' zhing dga' bar mdzad/ /nor sbyin de bzhin gsang sngags sbyin/ /dbang phyug sbyin zhing rgyal srid sbyin/ /

gzugs sbyin de bzhin stobs sbyin pa/ /dpal ldan dpa' mdzad bgegs gnon ri/ /kun tu rmongs pa sel bar mdzad/ /'dus pa'i nang du gdan gshegs pa/ /zhabs la mchod pa'i tshogs bsags pa/ dpung rgyan snyan cha gdub kor can/ /nor bu'i

rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba'i sgron/ /rab rib sel bar mdzad pa po/ /ston pa ston mdzad skyong mdzad pa/ dbang po mnga' bdag dmag gi mchog /'jigs pa sel bar mdzad pa ste/ /'jigs pa med pa'i gnas sbyin pa/ /dkar ba

sngo ba 'od bzang ba/ /mgrin sngon gyi ni ston pa lags/ /ji ltar 'dul ba 'dul 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin cha lugs rab tu ston/ /shes rab ral gris 'debs par mdzad/ /stong nyid chos ni lhur 'dzin pa/ /byams pa mchog dang tha ma mkhyen/ /rnam par

grags pa gsan pa nges/ /rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis bstod/ /rig sngags 'chang ba stobs po che/ /shin tu rnam rgyal 'khor los sgyur/ /'jigs med blo gros shes rab can/ /de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'dzin pa/ /mgur 'dul

mdzad zhi ba ste/ /zhi ba'i lam ni ston mdzad pa/ /lha dang lha yin bcas pas bkur/ /sems can thams cad 'jigs med mdzad/ /sems can kun la rab ston pa/ /brtan po sems can kun gyi mchog /sems can rnams kyi blo la mkhas/ /

sred med bu ste drag shul stobs/ /me yi 'od dang 'dra ba ste/ /byis pa sku mchog mchog sbyin pa/ /rtsed mo rol mo ston par mdzad/ /phyag rgya mdzad cing gsang sngags mdzad/ /bdag gir mi 'dzin rdul med brtan/ /mkha' 'dra dpe med smra mkhas

pa/ /bdud dpung nges par 'joms pa po/ /mi mchog brtson pa bskyod du med/ /de bzhin thub med rnam par rgyal/ /brtan po sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs/ /mya ngan med cing gnas pa med/ /'joms med tshig bzang cha lugs bzang / /dpa'

bo dgra rnams rab 'joms pa/ /tshan chen nges 'joms rnal 'byor pa/ /'dod pa gnod pa khyab par gshegs/ /mgon po rgyal ba'i sras kyi mchog /gshin rje pham mdzad skye dgu bsrung / /las dang nyon mongs rab bsreg pa/ /ston mdzad

nyon mongs sel ba lags/ /legs pa khyod kyi mchog gi mtshan/ /brgya rtsa brgyad pa rab gsal zhing / /dad pa skyed par byed pa 'di/ /lha mchog rnams kyis rab tu bshad/ /bgegs chen dang ni log 'dren dang / /gnod sbyin lha min srin po dang / /mdangs

'phrog gtum po rgod rnams kyis/ /de ring legs par bstod par gyur/ /'jam dpal rdo rje mchog gis rab/ /bsgyings pas bltas pa'ang bde bar gyur/ /de dag kun la bltas nas kyang / /'di skad du ni shig smras pa/ /khyed kun rtag tu bgegs med

cing / /nges legs thar pa thob gyur la/ /'jigs med bkra yang shis par shog /nga la 'jigs par ma sems shig /de nas rab ta cher bzhang cing / /'brug chen sgra ni sgrogs pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa zhal gsal bas/ /shar phyogs

gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/ /kye ma gsang sngags mchog gi yul/ /sems can gti mug bsal ba'i phyir/ /sems can rnams kye bsod nams tshogs/ /shin tu rgyas pa byung bar gyur/ /kye ma bsod nams cher byas pa'i/ /sems can

rnams ni rab sbyang phyir/ /dam pa sbyin pa'i grub pa'i gzungs/ /'jam pa'i klog gis rab tu bshad/ /la la gang zhig mnyam bzhag nas/ /sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba yi/ /grub pa'i gzungs 'di 'don pa'am/ /yang na nyan tam sems kyang rung / /

de yi don kun 'grub 'gyur zhing / /sdug bsngal kun las thar bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam dag pa/ /de yis nges par thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa chen yang / /ring por mi thogs de yis 'thob/ /byang chub sems dpa'

rnams kyi sa/ /rab dga' shin tu dri ma med/ /'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro can/ /sbyang dka' de bzhin mngon du gyur/ /ring du song dang mi g.yo ba/ /legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin/ /sa chen dam pa de dag kyang / /gang zhig nges gnas 'dod pa yi/ /sems

can chen pos mi thogs par/ che zad nas ni thob par 'gyur/ /sdig pa thams cad rnam dag dang / /sems can kun la sdug pa dang / /spros pa thams cad zhi ba yi/ /byang chub bla med thob par 'gyur/ /rig sngags 'chang kun bskyed pa dang / /sdig pa

thams cad zhi byed cing / /bkra shis mchog tu dge ba yi/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad yid 'ong 'di/ /sor mo bcu yi thal sbyar nas/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi mdun 'dug la/ /shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis su/ /nang par langs nas su brjod pa/ /de la rig sngags

'chang kun dang / /de bzhin lha yi bdag po rnams/ /gnod sbyin srin po mang po dag /rtag tu yang ni srung bar byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kun dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rnams dang / /de bzhin rdo rje'i mtshon 'chang rnams/ /de la nges

par srung bar byed/ /de ni sangs rgyas skur bzhugs shing / /mnyam par gzhag par snang bar 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin lha yi bdag po rnams/ /bgegs dang log 'dren chen po dag /dga' zhing bsam pa dam pa yis/ /rgyang ma dag nas phyag kyang 'tshal/ /

de phyir bgegs rnams dga' gyur pas/ /'tshe bar byed kyang mi nus so/ /lan cig bklags na tshangs chen dang / /bsod nams mnyam pa thob par 'gyur/ /shes rab chen po gang zhig gis/ /nyin re mtshan mchog brjod byas na/ /dri ma med cing

rab dag la/ /rab tu 'od gsal sgra snyan dang / /sems can thams cad dga' ba yi/ /yid du 'ong ba'i gnas kyang 'thob/ /mtshungs pa med cing stobs bskyed lam mchog 'gro ba dang / /'od gsal dam tshig can gyi lha rnams kyis bstod cing / /yid
'phrog lha dang lha min tshogs te 'dun pa yi/ /gzungs 'di rgyal ba rnams kyis legs par gsungs pa yin/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba ni ba ra Na bi skaM b+hi nI nA mA Sh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib

pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a mr-i ta bin+du dza ba ma hA su kha swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam

par sel ba tshim par mdzad nas bka' stsal pa/ yon tan rin po che'i tshogs can khyod kyi gzungs sngags 'di phyung bas sems can rnams kyi bde ba chen po bskyed pa legs so legs so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras gang la la gzungs sngags 'di thos pa de ni de bzhin

gshegs pa gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi spyan sngar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gang la la'i rna lam du grags par gyur pa de yang sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad dam/

tshes bco lnga la smyung bar 'dug cing gso sbyong dang ldan par byas te/ spos dang / bdug pa dang / mar me dang / me tog dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa la sogs pas mchod la bskor ba byas nas bzlas brjod byas na dam pa ci 'dod pa thob par 'gyur te/ sdig pa

thams cad dang sdug bsngal ba dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la spos la sogs pas mchod de bzlas brjod byas na rmi lam du ston par 'gyur te/ bsam pa thams cad yongs

su rdzogs par byed cing / nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal ba thams cad sel bar byed do/ /de nas rdo rje me tog thod chen po sa gsum gyi dbang phyug dang thabs cig tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de'i nang nas stan las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa

thams cad rnam par sel ba la btud nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ sems can kun gyi gtso bo che/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshul che ba/ /nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das/ /chos dbyings khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrib pa kun las nges

par grol/ /nyon mongs ngas dri ma kun sel cing / /nyes pa kun las rnam par grol/ /skyon bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lam srang gcig bu'i tshul ston cing / /theg pa gcig pu'i tshul gcig pa/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul brnyes te/ /theg pa dag pa khyod phyag

'tshal/ /snang ba chen po snang ba brnyes/ /yon tan dkyil 'khor 'jig rten bdag /zla ba bzhin du 'od dkar ba/ /'jig rten 'das pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /theg pa chen po dag pa che/ /sangs rgyas theg pa rtog gyur cing / /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rnam grags pa/ /

rdo rje chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /dpa' bo chen po bdud las rgyal/ /dar ba chen po nyon mongs choms/ /bgegs thub gshin rje thub pa ste/ /rin chen dra ba khyod phyag 'tshal/ /zla ba chen po nyi ma che/ /lhun po chen po dbang phyug che/ /lha chen mgon po chen po ste/ /

'byor pa chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sgrib pa thams cad gcod mdzad cing / /sgrib pa thams cad sel mdzad pa/ /kun mkhyen yon tan bdag nyid che/ /rnam sel khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul zhugs pa ste/ /chos kyi spyod yul gshegs pa

lags/ /ye shes dbang phyug ye shes che/ /sred bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku mdzes yon tan snying po mkhyen/ /rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor brgyan/ /sangs rgyas lam ste don yod che/ /ye shes dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /bsten pa gnas pa

dbang dag po/ /bde mdzad thugs kyang zhib ste/ /yangs pa dri med shes rab can/ /snang ba dag pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /zab cing brtan la rnam par gnon/ /zhi la 'jig rten dag par mdzad/ /ston pa skyabs 'os srid gsum na/ /dpa' btsan

khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skal ba chen po nyon mongs bcom/ /'khor ba'i dkyil 'khor 'joms pa ste/ /zhi ba zhi mdzad bde 'byung ba/ /chu bo zhi mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal/ /thar pa'i rgyu ste chos lugs che/ /bde 'gror gnas pa dri ma med/ /rnam dag thugs mnga'

zhi ba mkhyen/ /nyes sel khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtse mo yangs par rnam par grags/ /sngags chen mang pos 'dul mdzad pa/ /snying po chen po dkyil 'khor mchog /dkyil 'khor mkhyen pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sdug bsngal gsum sel gsum gyi mchog /

dkon mchog gsum dang spyod yul 'dra/ /rnam gsum mkhyen pa rnyed pa'i bdag /rnam thar gsum khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi/ /'byor pa brnyes shing mnyam nyid brnyes/ /bskal pa dag ni grangs med par/ /tshogs chen

bsags pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sa la gnas pa sa chen brnyes/ /sa yi 'bras bu phun sum tshogs/ /yang dag sa 'dzin las byung ba/ /ye shes sa khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /ting nge 'dzin la mnga' brnyes pa/ /nyes gsum spangs shing sdig pa sel/ /

ting 'dzin mkhyen cing rgya che ba/ /mnyam pa nyid mnyam khyod phyag 'tshal/ /mgon po chen po snang ba che/ /sdug bsngal chen po'i dri ma sel/ /zhi gyur ma lus zhi mdzad pa/ /yon tan pha mtha' khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas kun mtshungs gsung ldan pa/ /chos

kun zhi ba phun sum tshogs/ /dkon mchog gsum rigs dpe med pa/ /rin chen mtha' yas khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje chen po dri med mchog /rdo rje'i mtshon bsnams sdig mi mnga'/ /nam mkha' ma lus yul dang ldan/ /ye shes spyod yul rgya mtsho mnga'/ /

de bzhin gshegs dang yul gcig pa/ /sel ba po ste dri ma sbyong / /shes rab chen po rgyal ba'i sras/ /sred gcod khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i mchog /rdo rjes 'dul ba rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje rtsal can rnams kyi rtsal/ /rdo rje snang ba khyod

phyag 'tshal/ /rin chen chen po rin chen blo/ /rin chen rdo rje 'od che ba/ /rin chen 'od mdzes rin chen 'byung / /rin chen bstan pa srung mdzad pa/ /stong pa nyid kyi yul brnyes pa/ /ye shes stong pa nyid kyis ston/ /stong nyid longs spyod yul dang ldan/ /stong nyid

mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes rab mtshungs med shes rab can/ /dge ba rnam dag sa dang bral/ /chos gcig las byung snang pa po/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i tshul chen lags/ /'jig rten snang mdzad smra mkhas pa/ /'jig rten chos las rnam par

'das/ /'jig rten mkhyen pa'i yon tan brnyes/ /brgyan par mdzad pa dkyil 'khor dag /nyes pa ma lus sel ba ste/ /phal chen skye bo kun la phan/ /sa 'dzin rnam par grags pa po/ /kun mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dga' mkhyen dga'

la longs spyod pa/ /dga' ba'i rig mchog rnams kyi mchog /dga' bar mdzad pa'i rtog pa can/ /dga' la snang ba khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sgeg chen 'jom zhing dgongs par ldan/ /rnam par sgeg la spyod pa brtan/ /rdo rje'i rig pa sgeg pa'i mchog /sgeg

chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i mchog /rdo rje mchog gi dkyil 'khor che/ /theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas/ /bla med mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa'i mchog /sgrib pa thams cad sel

mdzad la/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'khor rnams kyis/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas/ /rdo rje'i bstan pa rnam grags pa/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /kye ma 'byor chen snang ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ba/ /gang zhig ming

brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ /'di dag so sor rjod byed na/ /nga ni nyes pa kun zlog cing / /rtag tu de yi phyi bzhin 'brang / /nang par langs nas gtsang ma yis/ /sgrib pa thams cad sel ba la/ /blo ldan gang zhig stod byed pa/ /de yi sdig pa med par

'gyur/ /gang zhig ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog /nang par langs nas rjod byed pa/ /sdang ba thams cad de dbang 'gyur/ /bgegs rnams kyis kyang yongs su gtong / /sdig pa dag pa 'thob pa dang / /de bzhin bsod nams 'phel ba dang / /ye shes rgya mtsho

longs spyod cing / /sa mchog chen po thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig nges par gnas byas la/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog 'don pa/ /des ni 'byor chen sangs rgyas sa/ /ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur/ /rgyud chen ldan zhing blo che ba/ /gang zhig

ming mchog 'don pa ni/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa la/ /ring por mi thogs 'jug par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya k+Shi ti gar+b+ha aSh+Tot+ta ra sha ta ka nA ma d+hA ra NI man+t+ra sa hi ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i

snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha/ ha ra tsa ra/ ma hA pA sha ma ru tA+e/ a mo g+ha badzra satwa swA hA/ de nas yon tan sbyin pa yi/ /gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu yang / /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /ti se'i gangs bcas g.yos par gyur/ /

sa yi snying po tshogs dbang la/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis smras/ /skal ldan chen po legs so legs/ /sa steng khyod kyis yangs par byas/ /khyod kyi gzungs ni rnam grags shing / /yon tan dpag med tshogs bskyed pa/ /sems can kun gyi sdug

bsngal dang / /nyes pa zlog byed thos pa ni/ /'khor bar rab tu rgyu ba na/ /nyes pa kun gyis mi gos te/ /ji ltar 'dam gyi pad+ma dag /'dam gyi nyes pas mi gos bzhin/ /lus can dag las su yang rung / /khyod kyi gsang sngags 'chang byed pa/ /de dag las

ni gcig tsam yang / /byang chub las ni ldog mi 'gyur/ /mkhas pa gang zhig gzungs sngags mchog /thos nas mos par byed pa ni/ /nges par yon tan thams cad kyang / /thob par 'gyur te the tshom med/ /de nas thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor/ /langs te

sa yi dbang phyug po/ /sa yi snying po sa mchog la/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad smras pa ni/ /sa yi snying po gtso bo che/ /glog 'gyu lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba/ /cod pan can te sa bsnyes pa/ /phun sum tshogs ldan 'byor pa mchog /rig ldan rig mdzad mchod pa'i

gnas/ /gtso bo dge sbyong ston pa po/ /gzhi bcas ldan pa'i rlung gi tshul/ /swA hA'i blo ldan snying rje'i rab/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyi ma'i mchog /snying po snying po mkhyen par grags/ /gsang sngags rol cing rgya cher rol/ /sa yi dbang phyug gar thabs

can/ /sgeg po zhal bzang gar mkhan ldan/ /'bras bu mngon sum ston pa po/ /rab 'byor blo gros snying po mkhyen/ /snying po brnyes pa 'jigs pa med/ /mgon po sangs rgyas gzugs mnga' ba/ /shes rab kyis ni ma lus gzigs/ /'dod chags

la sogs skyon bsal cing / /gar thabs chen po ston pa po/ /ston pa dpag bsam shing dang 'dra/ /nam mkha'i dbang phyug gsung snyan pa/ /nyi ma chen po nyid yin te/ /dbang phyug chen po 'bar bas bskor/ /yon tan mtha' yas longs spyod pa/ /

sa yi dbang phyug spyod yul can/ /chos kyi longs spyod longs spyod che/ /yon tan rgya mtsho'i gangs chen mtsho/ /yon tan sna tshogs longs spyod pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchog /thabs tshul zab la mkhas pa ste/ /theg pa chen po

'jigs pa med/ /mchod pa chen po sgra che ba/ /zla ltar grags pa'i dkyil 'khor can/ /rdo rje 'chang chen mtshan brgya ba/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor me tog thod/ /blo gros chen po phyag ring ba/ /pad+ma chen po stobs po che/ /gsang sngags chen

po tshogs chen po/ /sa gzhi chen po lhun po lags/ /lag na rdo rje yon tan nges/ /nor bu'i me tog thod kyis brgyan/ /mnyam nyid 'byam la longs spyod pa/ /rgya chen zhing gi rgya mtsho can/ /rdo rje'i 'od mnga' rdo rje ldan/ /sa yi bdag po lhun po bzhin/ /sa

la longs spyod longs spyod bzang / /mtshon cha g.yo ba phun sum tshogs/ /rab 'byam snod ni rnam par grags/ /smra mkhas rdo rje rab 'joms pa/ /spyan rtsa yid tsam dmar ba ste/ /me tog sngon po'i thod kyis bcings/ /spro ba chen po phyag ring ba/ /brtan po brtan

la bde sbyin pa/ /ded dpon dpal bzang chen po ste/ /gangs can lhun po lta bu lags/ /dbang po gshin rje'i rgyal chen dang / /btsan po khyab 'jug stobs dbang phyug /'jig rten mchog rigs sangs rgyas tshangs/ /de bzhin nyid tshul spyod yul can/ /rin

chen tog ste cher bzhad pa/ /dgyes pa na bza' sna tshogs gsol/ /gzigs pa ring ba spyan yangs pa/ /nam mkha' bzhin du thogs pa med/ /thogs pa mi dpogs rin chen gtsug /srid gsum 'dod pa med pa'i rgyu/ /dul ba nyon mongs dri ma bsal/ /

dag pa gtsang ba gso sbyong can/ /rnam par gnon pa'i g.yul las 'das/ /ljang mdog skyabs mdzad snying rje che/ /stobs kyis grags pa rgya che ba/ /bsams na shes pa'i spyod yul can/ /dpa' bo seng ge 'jigs par byed/ /sdang ba rnams kyi snying

'joms pa/ /mnga' bdag grags pa yul dang ldan/ /dga' ba rgya chen rab 'byung ba/ /rigs mkhyen rigs kyi snying po mkhyen/ /rigs kun du ni mchod pa lags/ /rgyal po rigs mchog skyed pa'i rten/ /rdo rje yi ni dkyil 'khor brgyan/ /rdo rje sa 'og

rab grags pa/ /rig sngags 'chang ba stobs po che/ /mngon par 'phags pa khyab pa mchog /mgrin bzang nad dang bral ba lags/ /skyong mdzad ston pa dag pa ste/ /sangs rgyas lam ni rab ston pa/ /grol ba smin mdzad 'dud par mdzad/ /dkyil

'khor ma lus rnams kyis brgyan/ /rab zhugs dkyil 'khor rnams la mkhas/ /rdo rje'i slob dpon yon tan rten/ /grub pa sbyin ba rnam dag mchog /tshul dang tshul min rtogs pa po/ /dkyil 'khor rtsa ser mnga' ba ste/ /'od zer ljang gu'i 'od dang

ldan/ /ser la na bza' ser po mnabs/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus kun gyis brgyan/ /spyan rtsa dmar ba zla ba'i dpal/ /nor bu sna tshogs 'od 'byung ba/ /rdo rje brgya yi stobs kyis spro/ /mnyam nyid mnyam pa dri ma med/ /sku yang dag cing na bza' dag /dag

pa mkhyen cing dag par ldan/ /dag pa'i chos mnga' snang ba ste/ /'byung ldan sred pa sel mdzad pa/ /'khor ba zad mdzad shes rab can/ /tshul shes tshul la spyod yul ba/ /rdo rje rgya mtsho'i snying po lags/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dge ba che/ /'byung ldan

rab 'byam shes rab can/ /ma lus grags pa'i 'od bzang ba/ /sa yi snying po snying po che/ /rdo rje'i snying po rnam par 'dren/ /dpag tu med pa dpag med rdzogs/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i yul la gnas/ /zab cing gsal ba'i gtso bo ste/ /zla

ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer bsil/ /dga' dang dang ba skyed pa ste/ /ye shes rgya chen spyod yul ba/ /rlung gi drag shul lta bur drag /drag po lags te drag sel gtsang / /rgyal bar byed cing rgyal ba zhi/ /rgyal ba'i dpal mdzad dga' bar mdzad/ /

lhun po ti se ma la yas/ /spyod yul zab mo non pa ste/ /rin chen rdo rje snying po che/ /sa gzhi'i spyod yul mnga' ba lags/ /rin chen brag las byung ba'i 'od/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dag gis brgyan/ /de bzhin gshegs la lhur dgyes pa/ /

shugs drag dpal gyi gzhi rten lags/ /rab gsal dpal mdzad gtsang ma ste/ /phyogs bcu'i dbang phyug dbang phyug che/ /de ltar rdo rje 'chang chen la/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog rnams kyis/ /rdo rje sems dpas bstod nas ni/ /rdo rje

sa gsum dbang mchog smras/ /yon tan snying po shes rnams kyis/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad mchog brjod cing / /nyes pa zlog pa 'di las gzhan/ /sa yi steng na ngas ma mthong / /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di/ /thams cad 'grub byed dga' ba ste/ /

sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang / /dri ma kun bral yon tan nges/ /de phyir sgrim pa thams cad kyis/ /phun sum tshogs pa 'dod pa'i mis/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dge ba 'di/ /rtag tu yang ni brjod par gyis/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di/ /bsam

pa kun dang 'byor pa yi/ /gnas mchog bla na med pa ste/ /dpal yon rgya chen sbyin pa yin/ /yid ni shin tu dang ba yis/ /sa yi snying po'i mtshan gsal ba/ /'dod pa thams cad rab bsgrub pa'i/ /yon tan mchog ni gang brjod dang / /dpal

yon rgya chen 'dzin pa yi/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di/ /mi ni gang zhig rjod byed pa/ /sdug bsngal kun las myur du 'grol/ /'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta kan/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis su/ /thub la mgo bos phyag

'tshal te/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags pa yi/ /mtshan rnams 'dir ni brjod par bgyi/ /gzugs mdzes gzugs dang ldan pa ste/ /gzugs rnams kun gyi bla na med/ /mtshan rnams thams cad kun tu rdzogs/ /'jam dpal dpal gyi dam pa

lags/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bsam dang bral/ /mthu rtsal bsam yas rmad du byung / /sku gsung phrin las bsam mi khyab/ /de bzhin thugs kyang bsam mi khyab/ /stong nyid bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid can/ /stong pa'i chos dang yang dag ldan/ /stong pa nyid la

lhag par mos/ /srid pa gsum po stong par ston/ /thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs/ /sa rnams kun gyi bdag dang ldan/ /sems can kun gyi mchog tu gyur/ /sems can kun gyis phyag bgyis pa/ /ngan 'gro kun dang de bzhin du/ /mu stegs

can rnams thams cad 'joms/ /phas kyi rgo la ba tshar gcod pa/ /smra ba'i seng ge mi yi mchog /dul zhing nyon mongs rnams dang bral/ /sgrib pa dri ma kun mi mnga'/ /sems can thams cad yongs su skyob/ /grol zhing 'jig rten grol mdzad pa/ /

ral pa mun dza brtul zhugs can/ /tshangs pa tshangs pa'i gnas na bzhugs/ /bgrang nor thogs shing phyag mkhar bsnams/ /dag cing dag la rnams dang ldan/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs can mnga' dbang mdzad/ /pad+ma las 'khrungs pad+ma'i spyan/ /pad+ma'i ze

ba'i kha dog 'dra/ /bzhugs pa'i gdan khri pad+ma lags/ /gtsang ma ut+pal sngon po bsnams/ /bsam dag zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan/ /khyod ni sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas/ /khyod ni dang po'i sangs rgyas lags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing mnga' dbang brnyes/ /

bden pa bzhi dag ston pa po/ /'jig rten skyong ba spyan stong mnga'/ /khyod ni dbang phyug skye dgu'i bdag /khyod ni zhi ba'i sems can rnams/ /kun gyi mnga' bdag yon tan gtso/ /khyod ni khyu mchog skye dgu'i gtso/ /thu bo de bzhin tshe rabs dgongs/ /

rnam par 'dren dang 'dul mdzad pa/ /rgyal sras rgyal ba nyid las 'khrungs/ /'od zer stong ldan nyi ma khyod/ /zla ba dang ni phur bu'ang khyod/ /rnam thos bu dang chu lha'ang lags/ /dbang phyug che khyod khyab 'jug khyod/ /klu yi rgyal po mtha' yas khyod/ /

de bzhin sde dpon skems byed lags/ /lha min dbang po thags zangs ris/ /mig dmar gza' lag pa ba sangs/ /spen pa dpa' bo lha kun lags/ /lha rnams kun gyis phyag bgyis pa/ /'jig rten chos kyi dri ma bral/ /khyod ni 'jig

rten gang zag mchog /'jig rten mkhyen pa 'jig rten rig /ye shes can gyi dam mchog pa/ /dam pa sbyin dang gnas dang skyabs/ /bdud kyi las kyis yongs mi rdzi/ /kha na ma tho mi mnga' zab/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen kun tu grags/ /khyod ni sman pa zug

rngu 'byin/ /mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba'i mchog /blo gros ldan zhing rtogs dang ldan/ /blo dang ldan zhing mkhas pa lags/ /khyod ni bsod nams dpag bsam shing / /byang chub yan lag me tog brgyan/ /rnam grol 'bras bu phun sum tshogs/ /lus

can kun gyi mchog tu gyur/ /yid du 'ong zhing yid 'phrog pa/ /sdig pa mi mnga' tshangs par spyod/ /khyod ni mjug gza' mchog lags/ /khyod ni drang srong thub pa mchog /khyod ni rgyal tshab dbang bskur ba/ /sa bcu'i mnga' bdag gtso bo lags/ /

ded dpon 'gro ba rnams kyi gtso/ /mya ngan 'das pa mchog ston bzhin/ /khyod ni nam mkha' sa chu bzhin/ /khyod ni me dang rlung lta bu/ /khyod ni yid bzhin nor bu ltar/ /sems can re ba kun rdzogs mdzad/ /'byung po kun gyis phyag bgyis pa/ /

rin chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jam dpal gyis ni bka' stsal pa/ /oM bA kye da~M na maHswA hA/ ji skad smos pa'i mtshan rnams dang / /rig sngags bcas par 'dzin na ni/ /sdig 'gyur rnam dag rab tu thob/ /brgya las rtsa brgyad lhag pa'i mtshan/ /

skyes bu dus gsum su klog pa/ /de 'dod bsam dgu yid bzhin du/ /gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /bzang po'i mtshan rnams dran na ni/ /mtshams med skal ba mnyam pa yi/ /las rnams mi bzad gang byas pa/ /de dag thams cad myur du byang / /

'jig rten pha rol 'pho ba dang / /'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba'i tshe/ /sems can dag pas dran byas na/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyang thob par 'gyur/ /blo dang ldan pas dran byas te/ /nges par gnas nas su klog pa/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni 'dod na yang / /thob 'gyur

'di la the tshom med/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya mai tri pra ti dz+nyA nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byams pas dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i

gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ shAkya mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a dzi te/ a dzi te/ a pa rA dzi te/ a dzi tan dza ya/ ha

ra ha ra/ mai tri a ba lo ki te/ ka ra ka ra/ ma hA sa ma ya sid+d+he/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ma hA bo d+hi maN+Da bI dze/ smar smar/ asma kaM sa ma ya bo d+hi bo d+hi/ ma hA bo d+hi swA hA/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags so/ /oM mo hi mo hi/ ma hA mo hi swA hA/ snying po'o/ /oM mu ni mu ni sma ra

swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /gzungs 'di nyan pa tsam dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la sems pa dang / bsgom pa tsam gyis gang gi tshe bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par

gyur pa na/ bdag gis sems can de nges par btsal bar bgyi ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bgyi'o/ /tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa'i dang / bya rnams kyi rna khung du sgrogs par byed na/ de dag kyang bla

na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob bo/ /'di thos pa tsam gyis nam du yang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ngan song gi dri mas kyang mi gos so/ /ma'i mngal du yang mi skye'o/ /lha'i bskal pa stong du 'khor los sgyur

ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar bsams shing don du gnyer ba'i longs spyod 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can de bskyud par mi bgyi lags so/ /nges

par bdag byang chub kyi snying po la mchis nas/ de ji ltar gyur kyang rung bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bgyi'o/ /'phags pa byams pas dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra pA Ni

dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya aSh+Ta maN+Da la ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkyil 'khor

brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri gru 'dzin na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas na/ byang

chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de stan las langs nas chos

gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan

'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rin chen snying po zla ba snang ba khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba snang bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig dkyil 'khor brgyad pa bgyid par 'tshal na des ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs

kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la shin tu phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / dus gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes sgrub pa'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod spobs pa skyes pa ni bzang ste/ legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu de'i phyir

snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga 'byung zhing dngos grub thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi snying po nyon cig /oM ma hA hUM ma hA bI ra swA hA/ snying po 'dis ni dbus kyi bcom ldan 'das mchod do/ /oM hrI hUM pad+ma pri ya

swA hA/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'o/ /oM mai hA rA Na swA hA/ byams pa'i snying po'o/ /oM A kA sha gar+b+nA ya swA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po'o/ /oM swA hri rA ya dz+wa swA hA/ kun tu bzang po'i snying po'o/ /oM ku ru b+ha na ra ha swA hA/

lag na rdo rje'i snying po'o/ /oM shrI aM raM ga swA hA/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i snying po'o/ /oM ni swA raM b+ha swA hA/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i snying po'o/ /oM k+Shi ti ha rA dzA swA hA/ sa'i snying po'i snying po'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgyad kyi

snying po de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan pa 'di rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du lan cig brjod na de'i don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs

par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad

pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ a mr-i ta b+ha ba nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i

khab byang chub kyi shing drung na/ 'khor rnam bzhi dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyis bskor nas bzhugs so/ /de nas 'khor rnams kyi nang nas khyim bdag bzang skyong gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor rnam pa bzhi dang / rigs drug gi sems can thams cad la/

spos dang / sman dang / zhal zas kyi mchod pa chen po bshams nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba 'di rnams sems can rnams kyi don du byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas

bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud rtsi 'byung pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhal zas kyi steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du ra~M dkar po la chos thams cad rdul dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba'i sgra byung bas zhal zas kyi dri ma dag par gyur to/ /yang zla ba'i

dkyil 'khor gyi steng du a dkar po bsams te/ zhal zas lha'i bdud rtsi dang / yo byad du gyur to/ /yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du/ oM zhes pas 'phags pa dang sems can thams cad mnyes shing tshim par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis

phyag rdo rje ltar byas te gzungs 'di gzungs so/ /oM sarba d+harma tA badzra sid+d+ha hUM/ oM a mr-i ta hUM/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA khaM ut+ga te s+pha ra Na i maM ga ga na khaM swA hA/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM/ oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wA la

tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ni sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ne swA hA/ zhes gzungs 'di brjod ma thag tu mchod pa'i zhal zas kyis mchod nas/ 'phags pa thams cad mnyes pa dang / sems can thams cad bde bar gyur to/ /de nas khyim bdag bzang skyong gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan

sngar thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mthu dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi mthu dang / bdag gi bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i stobs kyis/ 'phags pa thams cad kyi

pho brang dang / sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang / sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la chos dang zang zing gi longs spyod dpag tu med cing brjod kyis mi khyab pa/ brjod kyis mi rdzogs pa 'byung zhing rgyas par gyur cig /sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi

bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang / gsang sngags dang / rig sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs te chos kyi sbyin pa dang / bdag gi zang zing gi sbyin pa 'dis bde ba dang / dga' bar

gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ khyim bdag bzang skyong legs so/ /dka' ba'i spyod pa 'di lta bu byed pa legs so/ /nga'i 'khor lha dang mi rnams kyis kyang 'di ltar mchod par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'

stsal nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / khyim bdag bzang skyong rjes su yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de dga' bar gyur to/ /bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //

@##/ /kha nas me 'bar ba la skyabs mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya na dge 'dun gyi gnas na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pas yongs su bskor pa la chos ston to/ /

de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo bas mtha' zhig na/ chos yid la byed cing dran pa mngon du bzhag nas 'dug la/ de'i nub mo nam gyi cha smad la kha nas me 'bar ba zhes bya ba gzugs byad mi sdug pa/ shin tu rid cing skems pa/ kha nas me 'bar ba/

mgrin pa mo khab tsam du phra ba/ skra 'dzings pa/ sen mo dang mche ba ring ba rna ba shin tu 'jigs su rung ba zhig dga' bo'i drung du 'ongs nas/ dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod da ste zhag bdun na tshe'i dus byas te kyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/

zhes smras so/ /dga' bos des smras pa de thos nas shin tu 'jigs skrag ste/ de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag tshe'i dus byas nas kyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ba 'di thabs ci byas na sdug bsngal de las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/ de nas

des dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gal te khyod kyis sang gi nyi ma la gang gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la gtor ma byin te/ bram ze dang drang srong brgya stong snyed la yul dbus 'gyur tshal gyi bre tshad ma re re'i zhal zas mchis pa

phul te/ kho bo'i phyir dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byas na tshe ring zhing kyi sdug bsngal dang bral te mtho ris kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe dga' bos kha nas me 'bar ba/ lus mi sdug pa/ shin tu rid cing skems pa dang / kha nas me

'bar ba dang / mgrin pa mo khab tsam la skra 'dzings pa dang / sen mo dang mche ba ring zhing rno ba yang mthong la/ yid du mi 'ong mi 'dod pa'i tshig kyang thos nas/ lus skyi bung zhes byed pa tsam du 'jigs skrag nas 'dug pa las langs te myur bar bcom ldan

'das ga la ba der song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin nas lus smad lnga sa la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lus 'dar bzhin du sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa'i dpung gnyen mdzad du gsol zhes bcom ldan

'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag bas mtha' zhig na chos yid la bgyid cing mchis pa las/ kha nas me 'bar ba zhes bgyi ba de bdag la 'di skad mchi'o/ /khyod da ste zhag bdun na nges par tshe'i dus byas te kyi khams su skye bar

'gyur ro zhes mchi'o/ /bdag gis de la thabs ci bgyis na yi dwags kyi sdug bsngal de las yongs su thar bar 'gyur zhes dris na/ des bdag la khyod kyis gang gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la gtor ma byin te/ bram ze dang drang srong la

sogs pa brgya stong snyed la zhal zas mchog dam pa phul na tshe ring bar 'gyur zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji lta bur dang drang srong la sogs pa de snyed kyi kha zas 'byor par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod

'jigs par ma byed cig khyod kyis gang gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed dang / bram ze dang drang srong la sogs pa la kha zas dang / gtor ma mang po 'byor pa'i thabs nga la yod kyis yid blong bar ma byed cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis

dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ nga la gzungs sngags gzi brjid tshad med pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i 'od zer rnam par rgyal ba'i shugs zhes bya ba yod de/ gang zhig gis gzungs 'di brjod na gang gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed dang / bram ze

dang drang srong la sogs te mang po'i kha zas dang gtor ma mchog dam par 'gyur te/ de dag la sogs pa gcig kyang kha zas yul dbus 'gyur tshal gyi bre tshad mas bcal ba'i bre bdun bdun snyed thob par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo nga yang bram zer gyur pa na byang

chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dbang sgyur yon tan zhes bya ba las gzungs 'di thos pas na/ de'i dbang gis tshad med pa snyed dang / drang srong mang po la kha zas dang / gtor ma byin byin par gyur te/ yi

dgas kyi khams su skyes pa de dag sdug bsngal las rnam par grol nas mtho ris kyi lhar skyes par gyur to/ /dga' bo khyod kyis gzungs 'di zung shig /bsod nams dang tshe'i tshad kyang 'phel zhing skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la gzungs

sngags 'di bka' stsal to/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te/ oM saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig tshe ring bar 'dod dam bsod nams che zhing 'phel ba dang /

sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myur du yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod na ni rtag tu snga dro'i dus sam/ yang na dus thams cad du byas kyang bar chad du 'gyur ba med do/ /snod gtsang ma'i nang du chu gtsang ma blugs la/ chan nam/ phye'am/ khur ba la

sogs pa cig btab ste/ lag pa g.yas pa snod kyi steng du bzhag la gzungs 'di lan bdun bsngags nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i mtshan nas brjod par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa rin chen mang gi mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis thams cad kyi skye ba mang po'i ser sna byas pa'i mi dge ba'i las bcom zhing bsod nams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dam pa'i mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis mang po byad gzugs mi sdug pa bcom zhing gzugs dang mtshan phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sku 'byam klas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa sku 'byam klas kyi mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis mang po'i skom pa spangs shing tshim par 'gyur te/ sbyin pa'i gnas yid bzhin du za ba dang chog cing 'grangs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa dang bral ba la phyag

'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i mtshan nas brjod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis mang po'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral te/ kyi khams thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal

pa/ rigs kyi bu la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i mtshan nas brjod de/ byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'og tu se gol lan gsum byas te/ gtor ma'i snod blangs nas lag pa brkyang ste/ sa gtsang mar blug par bya'o/ /de ltar gtor ma sbyin

par byas na phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa'i gang gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed so so nas yul dbus 'gyur tshal gyi bre tshad mas bcal ba'i bre bdun bdun thob par 'gyur ro/ /kha zas de dag kyis yid bzhin du za ba dang / chog

'grangs pa dang / kyi khams spangs pa dang / mtho ris kyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo gal te dge slong pha dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang zhig rtag tu gzungs 'dis kha zas la bsngags te/

la sbyin pa byin na bsod nams tshad med pa snyed yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / de nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams dang khyad par med de/ tshe ring ba dang / bsod nams dang / mdangs dang / stobs skye zhing

'phel ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / ma rungs pa thams cad kyis gtse zhing gnod par byed mi nus pa dang / gzhan la gzi brjid tshad med pa dang ldan par

'gyur ro/ /gal te gang zhig bram ze dang drang srong la sbyin pa byed 'dod na kha zas yongs su dag pa snod gcig gi nang du bkang ste/ gzungs sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas te 'bab chu gtsang mar gtor na/ de ltar byas pas lha rdzas kyi zhal zas

mchog dam par 'gyur te/ des na bram ze dang / drang srong de dag kyang sngags kyis btab pa'i zas thob nas/ sngags kyi byin gyis so so nas sngon chad ci dang ci la dga' zhing mos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bsod nams yongs su 'gyur bas/ so so nas mthun par

dus gcig tu de la tshe ring ba dang / mdangs dang stobs su ldan te bde zhing skyid par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/ /gzhan yang mi de sems bsam pa bzhin du mthong zhing thos pa'i sgo nas yongs su dag cing shes pa mi nor ba dag tshangs pa lha'i spyod pa mchog

dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong snyed la mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams dang 'dra ste/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis gnod pa byed mi nus par 'gyur ro/ /gal

te dge slong pha dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang zhig sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa byed par 'dod na/ spos dang / me tog dang / zhal zas dam pa la gzungs sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas te/

dkon mchog gsum la dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas rigs kyi bu pho dang / rigs kyi bu mo des phul ba'i zhal zas de lha rdzas kyi zhal zas su gyur te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /

des na bstod pa dang / gsol ba btab pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur te/ rtag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsngags shing dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /lha mang pos rtag tu bsrung zhing skyob pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo khyod kyis 'di'i rjes su chos bzhin yid la byas te/ sems can thams cad kyis mthong zhing thos par bya ba'i phyir yongs su rgyas par ston cig dang / bsod nams tshad med pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /kha
nas me 'bar ba la skyabs mdzad pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// //@#/ /mo kha 'bar ma dbugs dbyung ba'i gtor ma'i cho ga /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ser skya

na shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs te chos ston to/ /de nas kun dga' bo dben par 'dug ste/ nang du yang dag 'jog

cing rtse gcig tu yid la byed pas chos mngon sum du byed pa na/ mtshan mo nam gyi cha smad la de'i mdun du mo kha 'bar ma 'dug nas smras pa/ kye kun dga' bo khyod gnangs 'chi bar 'gyur te/ kyi gnas 'dir skye bar 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bos

smras pa/ brten pa'i thabs ci yod/ mos smras pa/ kun dga' bo gal te nang par gang gA'i klu bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed dag la re re la yang zas dang skom yul ma ga d+hA'i bre bo che bdun bdun tsam byin te/ bram ze'i drang

srong 'bum yang tshim par byas la/ bdag gi ming gis dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byas na/ de lta na khyod kyi tshe yang phyir nur bar 'gyur la/ bdag kyang kyi 'jig rten nas shi 'phos te mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas kun dga' bos
