rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te klu 'am/ klu mo'am/ klu rgan po'am/ klu rgan mo'am/ klu'i bu pho'am/ klu'i bu mo'am/ klu'i 'khor pho'am/ klu'i 'khor mo'am/ klu'i mngag

gzhug pa'am/ klu'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ klu rnams kyi klu 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi tshud

cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang /

kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te lus srul po'am/ lus srul mo'am/ lus srul rgan

po'am/ lus srul rgan mo'am/ lus srul po'i bu pho'am/ lus srul po'i bu mo'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor pho'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor mo'am/ lus srul po'i mngag gzhug pa'am/ lus srul po'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar

bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ lus srul po rnams kyi lus srul po 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo

can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ a be ba ha na ba ti ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis

gnod sbyin rnams dang / gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/ /'di lta ste/ dbang po zla ba chu lha dang / /b+ha ra dwa dza skye dgu'i bdag /dbang ldan tsan+dan 'dod

gtso dang / /mgrin ngan dang ni mgul nges dang / /stobs ldan nor bu nor spyod dang / /sgra rab dang ni nye rnga dang / /ri mnyam gser can gang po dang / /seng ldeng pa dang g.yon can dang / /gnod sbyin ba skyong 'brog gnas dang / /rgyal ba khyu mchog mi

rgyal po/ /dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/ /lcags mdung ring dang ma ldan dang / /tshig lnga ser po yid dga' dang / /gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas/ /'bras bu gsum pa mgul gsum pa/ /'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags/ /de dag ni bdag

gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o/ /gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la bdag go bar bgyid lags so/ /bdag la 'tshe ba'i gnod sbyin dang / /bdag mi gtong ba'i gnod sbyin gyis/ /legs

par smras pa 'di thos na/ /ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin/ /de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ hi le mi le/ hi le mi le/ kIrti mU li/ hi li kIrti mU le/ o tum+be tum+be/ o tum+be/ tum+be/

o g+he mo g+he/ go de hi/ b+h+riM gA re/ r-i Shi sat+ta me swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags

dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo'am/ gnod sbyin rgan pho'am/ gnod sbyin rgan mo'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu pho'am/

gnod sbyin gyi bu mo'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor pho'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mo'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug pa'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye

bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal

pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang /

sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te srin po'am/ srin mo'am/ srin po rgan po'am/ srin po rgan mo'am/ srin po'i bu pho'am/ srin po'i bu mo'am/ srin po'i 'khor pho'am/ srin

po'i 'khor mo'am/ srin po'i mngag gzhug pa'am/ srin po'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ srin po rnams

kyi srin po 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ hu lu hu lu/

yu me yu me le/ yu mi la ba tI ye swA hA/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba

'di nyid rgya cher brjod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtso la gdan bshams pa de nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs

nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ma dang rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu kha dog 'phags pa/ g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang /

g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa/ nam sros pa dang / nga ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams

cad snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /blo ldan khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/ /lha rnams kyis ni de ma 'tshal/ /dpa'

chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa dang / /da ltar byung dang ma byon pa/ /thams cad la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ /khyod la'ang bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge

bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang dag gnas mal dgon pa dag dang / nags 'dab dag dang / bas mtha' dag na gnas pa dag kyang mchis la/ de na gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad

pa dag dang / mngon par ma dad pa dag kyang mchis te/ gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa de dag ni shin tu nyung la/ gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa

gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par ma dad pa de dag ni ches mang lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams 'di ltar bdag nyid bsrung ba dang /

bskyab pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa mngon par ma dad pa dag mngon par dad phar bgyi ba dang / mngon par dad pa rnams kyang slar zhing 'phel bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ kun

tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher 'dzin cing kun chub par bgyid na legs so legs so zhes gsol pa dang / dge slong dag ngas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi

bu la cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad do/ /de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus ngas cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ nga'i spyan sngar kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba

dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher gsol to/ /skye bo gang dag gtang phod cing / /phra ma mi mchi ser sna bral/ /gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchis pa/ /mi de rnams kyis rnyed pa lags/ /gang gi 'char la brten nas ni/ /des ni

nyin mor brjod pa yi/ /nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can/ /nyi gdugs gang nas 'char 'gyur ba'i/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu

dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /dri za rnams kyis yongs bskor cing / /dri za rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed

pa/ /kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/ /rgyang ring

gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/ /khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ /de skad yang dang yang du thos/ /de slad bdag la 'di skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /sangs

rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ /mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/ /de ltar shar gyi phyogs de ni/ /bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/ /gang na zhes bgyi ba/ /rgyab

kyi sha 'tshal phra ma can/ /srog gcod bgyid pa ma rungs pa/ /'jungs shing mi snyan smra bgyid pa'i/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan

cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /grul bum rnams kyis yongs bskor cing / /grul bum rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /

lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ /kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/ /

rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/ /khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ /de skad yang dang yang du thos/ /de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs

ldan pa/ /mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/ /de ltar lho yi phyogs de ni/ /bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/ /gang zhig nub pa kho na las/ /de la mtshan mor brjod pa yi/ /nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can/ /nyi gdugs

gang du nub 'gyur ba/ /de na mtsho chen zab mo 'di/ /shin tu 'da' bar dka' ba ste/ /de ni chu mngon rgya mtsho zhes/ /skye bos rtogs pa mchis pa yi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni mig mi bzang zhes

bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /klu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor cing / /klu rnams kyis ni mdun gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ /

kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/ /rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas

gzigs su gsol/ /khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ /de skad yang dang yang du thos/ /de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ /mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/ /de ltar nub kyi phyogs

de ni/ /bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/ /gang na byang gi sgra mi snyan/ /dga' zhing lhun chen blta mdzes dang / /gang na mi rnams tshe lo ni/ /brgya phrag bcu pa skye 'gyur zhing / /de dag mi rmo mi 'debs la/ /gshol

yang 'cha' bar mi bgyid cing / /tshe ring mdog dang ldan pa dang / /nges par yongs su spyod bgyid cing / /zas su sA lu kha dog dang / /dri dang ro dang ldan pa dang / /dri bda' me tog tshogs 'dra zhing / /lha yi bdud rtsi 'dra ba 'tshal/ /na li ke ra bskol bgyis na/ /tshod mar de 'tshal sran tshod min/ /gang

na me lce rtse 'dra ba'i/ /sman dag 'khrung bar 'gyur ba yi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni lus ngan po zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyis yongs bskor

cing / /gnod sbyin rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad cu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ /kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs

rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/ /rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/ /khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ /de skad

yang dang yang du thos/ /de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ /mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/ /de ltar byang gi phyogs de ni/ /bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon

par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/ /shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung / /lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/ /nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang / /byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/ /rgyal po chen po de bzhi dag /'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs

po che/ /phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid/ /rgyal po dag gi mngag gzhug pa/ /gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams/ /de dag glang po che 'tshal zhing / /phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyu/ /de dag ni chibs rta dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang /

bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma la 'tshal zhing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/ /glang po che gcig gis shing rta drangs shing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/ /chibs rta dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug

dang / sbrul dang / bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma gcig gis shing rta drangs shing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che/ /gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams/ /bzhon pa de dag 'tshal nas ni/ /phyogs bzhi dag

ni skyong bar bgyid/ /rgyal po dag ni grong khyer dag /sna tshogs mkha' la rgyu ba mchis/ /'di lta ste/ kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / sa la kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / gar bcas sa steng kun tu rgyu ba dang / sbubs can dang / grong khyer sbubs can zhes

bgyi bdag lags so/ /byang phyogs na mtsho ka pi bang ka zhes bgyi bdag mchis lags so/ /nub phyogs na grong khyer sar pa gsar ldan dang / gos can dang / gos mchog can dang / pad+ma can dang / pad+ma bzang po can dang / sa gzhi can zhes bgyi ba dag mchis lags so/ /chab rgyun

mang po'i gnas gyur pa/ /'dzin pa zhes bgyi'i mtsho mchis te/ /chab rgyun tha dad de las 'byung / /de las dgung char 'bab par 'gyur/ /btsun pa grong khyer u shi ra'i sbubs kyi pha rol na/ lus gnas dang ni gnas yangs dang / /de bas gnas yang rgyun lugs can/ /rgyun lugs

mang dang de bas mang / /bar snang mkha' la bya ltar gda'/ /btsun pa grong khyer sbubs can gyi pha rol byang phyogs na 'dun sa bya gar can zhes bgyi ba yang mchis te/ der ni gnod sbyin rnams 'du zhing gnas lags so/ /rkang mi sdug la mchu 'phyangs dang / /'jigs rung lto spu can dag mchis/ /

de na ljon shing 'bras bu rtag /rma bya khrung khrung sgra snyan dang / /khu byug sgra skad chen po dang / /shang shang te'u dag sgra 'byin cing / /rma bya rnams kyi sgra dag dang / /kau dum b+ha dang chun lag dang / /bya rnams sna tshogs skad 'byin cing / /me tog sbrang rtsi'i ro la dga'/ /lus ngan po de glu gar gyis/ /

pad+ma can dang lhan cig rtse/ /btsun pa grong khyer lcang lo can gyi pha rol na rgyal po dpa' bo zhes bgyi ba yul 'khor mu khyud na mchis lags so/ /bdag gang na mchis pa'i 'dun sa de ni khyu mchog can zhes bgyi ste/ bdag gi ming ni rnam thos kyi bu zhes bgyi lags so/ /de la gsang sngags

kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ i li mi li i li mi li/ kiT+Ti mU le/ hi li kiT+Ti mU le/ hu du me/ hu du ra du me/ gau ri/ gan+b+ha ri/ go do ha ni/ o ke mo ke swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis dri za rnams dang / dri za chen po rnams dang / dri za'i sde dpon rnams dang / dmag

dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/ /'di lta ste/ 'dod myos dga' bas myos pa dang / /glu yis myos pa spun dang ni/ /phreng bas myos dang sbrang rtsis myos/ /me tog myos pa spun rnams dang / /rtag tu myos dang dpal gyis myos/ /nor gyis myos dang dga' byed dang / /

ut+pal pad+ma zla ba dang / /rnga 'dzin dang ni khyu byug sgra/ /tum bu ru dang gtsug lnga dang / /gser spyod bu mo gser can dang / /pa ba sangs dang phur bu dag /'gro gnas ji snyed rgyal po lags/ /de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag dri za 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o/ /

dri za 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/ /bdag la 'tshe ba'i dri za dang / /bdag mi gtong ba'i dri za yis/ /legs par smras pa 'di thos na/ /ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/ /de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni

'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ kun+tu le/ kun+tu le/ kun+tu le/ kun+tu le/ e hi e hi/ sa dA mad ti ke/ sa dA b+haN+Di ni ke/ tiSh+Tha duSh+Ta bad+d+ho si swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu

rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ /rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te dri za'am/ dri za mo'am/ dri za rgan po'am/ dri za rgan mo'am/ dri

za'i bu pho'am/ dri za'i bu mo'am/ dri za'i 'khor pho'am/ dri za'i 'khor mo'am/ dri za'i mngag gzhug pa'am/ dri za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na

glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ dri za rnams kyi dri za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos

dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ /rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung

mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te sha za'am/ sha za mo'am/ sha za rgan po'am/ sha za rgan mo'am/ sha za'i bu pho'am/ sha za'i bu mo'am/ sha za'i 'khor pho'am/ sha za'i 'khor mo'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug pa'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug

ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ sha za rnams kyi sha za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi

'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ hu me hu me/ hu mi le/ hu mi lA bA tI ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis grul bum rnams

dang / grul bum chen po rnams dang / grul bum gyi sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/ /'di lta ste/ byin dang nye byin kri mi sha/ /rtsib logs che dang gsus po che/ /lag bcu drang ni sa la rgyu/ /g.yon phyogs nag po

dmar po dang / /sprin mdog dang ni dri med dang / /rna ba ring dang 'brug sgra sgrogs/ /ral pa can dang stobs bcu dang / /srid sgrub dang ni 'dod dgur mchi/ /'jog po dang ni bya ba sbed/ /la ba bzang ldan gsum po dang / /tshon kun dang ni mig bkra po/ /'gro gnas ji snyed

mchis pa lags/ /de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag grul bum 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o/ /grul bum 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/ /bdag la 'tshe ba'i grul bum dang / /bdag mi gtong ba'i grul bum gyis/ /

legs par smras pa 'di thos nas/ /ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/ /de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ si re bi si re/ si re bi sa re/ si re bi sa re/ kr-iSh+Na tsha ga le/ ka ra DI/ piM ga le swA hA/ btsun pa bcom

ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing

'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te grul bum mam/ grul bum mo'am/ grul bum rgan po'am/ grul bum rgan mo'am/ grul bum gyi bu pho'am/ grul bum gyi bu mo'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor pho'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor mo'am/ grul bum gyi mngag gzhug

pa'am/ grul bum gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ grul bum rnams kyi grul bum 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing

rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma

lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ /rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te sam/ mo'am/ rgan po'am/ rgan mo'am/

kyi bu pho'am/ kyi bu mo'am/ kyi 'khor pho'am/ kyi 'khor mo'am/ kyi mngag gzhug pa'am/ kyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchi bar

gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ rnams kyi 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi

tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ yu me yu me/ yu mi le/ yu mi la bA ti ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis klu rnams dang / klu chen po rnams dang / klu'i sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/ /'di lta ste/ dga'

dang nye dga' kun dga' dang / /nor rgyas dang ni 'dzam bu bzang / /ser po dang ni zho rna dang / /dbang po'i lag dang bkra shis dang / /mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral/ /rab grol dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag /ngos yangs po dang ngos bkra dang / /yangs ba can dang bkra 'dud rgyal/ /gdengs ka che dang

skar dga' dang / /nag po che dang lag 'gro dang / /ra skyong dang ni 'jog po dang / /g.yon phyogs de bzhin nag po dang / /sngo bsangs dkar dang 'grogs pa ni/ /'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags/ /de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/ /de dag la bdag klu 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o/ /klu 'di ni

bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/ /bdag la 'tshe ba'i klu dag dang / /bdag mi gtong ba'i klu rnams kyis/ /legs par smras pa 'di thos na/ /ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/ /de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags

so/ /tad+ya thA/ tsi le bi tsi le/ tsi le bi tsi le/ gau ri/ gan+d+ha ri/ ma tang+gi/ tsaN+Da li swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa

rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la gal te klu'am/ klu mo'am/ klu rgan po'am/ klu rgan mo'am/ klu'i bu pho'am/ klu'i bu mo'am/ klu'i 'khor pho'am/ klu'i 'khor mo'am/ klu'i mngag gzhug pa'am/ klu'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags

lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ klu rnams kyi klu 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags

so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing

'don par bgyid pa de la gal te lus srul po'am/ lus srul mo'am/ lus srul rgan po'am/ lus srul rgan mo'am/ lus srul po'i bu pho'am/ lus srul po'i bu mo'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor pho'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor mo'am/ lus srul po'i mngag gzhug pa'am/ lus srul po'i

mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ lus srul po rnams kyi lus srul po 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas

mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo a rdza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ a be ba ha ne/ ba ha na ba tI ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis gnod sbyin rnams dang / gnod sbyin

chen po rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/ /'di lta ste/ dbang po zla ba chu lha dang / /b+ha ra dwa dza skye dgu'i bdag /dbang ldan tsan+dan 'dod gtso dang / /mgrin ngan dang ni mgul nges dang / /stobs

ldan nor bu nor spyod dang / /sgra rab dang ni nye rnga dang / /ri mnyam gser can gang po dang / /seng ldeng pa dang g.yon can dang / /gnod sbyin ba skyong 'brog gnas dang / /rgyal ba khyu mchog mi'i rgyal po/ /dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/ /lcags mdung

ring dang ma ldan dang / /tshig lnga ser po yid dga' dang / /gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas/ /'bras bu gsum dang mgul gsum pa/ /'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags/ /de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag

la bdag gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o/ gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/ /bdag la 'tshe ba'i gnod sbyin dang / /bdag mi gtong ba'i gnod sbyin gyis/ /legs par smras pa 'di thos na/ /a rdza

ka yi dog pa bzhin/ /de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ hi le mi le/ kIrti mU le/ hi li kIrti mU le/ o tum+be/ tum+be/ o tum+pe/ tum+be/ o g+he mo g+he/ go de hi/

b+h+riM gA re/ r-i Shi sat+ta me swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ /rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug

pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la gal te gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo'am/ gnod sbyin rgan po'am/ gnod sbyin rgan mo'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu pho'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor pho'am/ gnod sbyin

gyi 'khor mo'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug pa'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod

sbyin 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang

la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la gal te srin po'am/ srin mo'am/ srin po rgan po'am/ srin po rgan mo'am/ srin po'i bu

pho'am/ srin po'i bu mo'am/ srin po'i 'khor pho'am/ srin po'i 'khor mo'am/ srin po'i mngag gzhug pa'am/ srin po'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed

la/ srin po rnams kyi srin po 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ hu lu hu lu/ yu me yu mi le/

yu mi la ba tI ye swA hA/ zhes rgya cher smras nas/ nga'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag khyed kyis 'di ltar bdag nyid bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba dang / gnod sbyin dang mi ma yin pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa mngon

par ma dad pa dag mngon par dad par bya ba dang / mngon par dad pa rnams kyang phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid long shig /zung shig /chong shig /lhogs

shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //bar sdom ni/ i/ ku/ hu/ si/ yu/ tsi/ A/ hi/ hi/ gsang sngags kyi tshig rnam pa dgu smos

pa dang bzhin du sbyar ro/ /mdo chen po kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang mthun pa'i mdo zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA me g+ha/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sprin chen po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga'i gnas na nor

bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po'i tshogs chen po 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' dang / rgya mtsho dang / ma dros pa dang / gzi

can dang / chu lha dang / 'jog po dang / yul 'khor srung dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang / klu'i rgyal po btang bzung dang / sa srung gi bu dang / mdongs bu dang / dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / dpal bzang dang / glog gi phreng ba dang / gtsug na rin po che dang / gtsug na nor bu thogs dang / snang ldan

gtsug phud can dang / gtsug phud 'ja' can dang / klu'i rgyal po dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dang / dbang po'i mchod sdong dang / 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / bkra shis ldan dang / dkyil 'khor chen po dang / lag gis 'gro chen po dang / skar mdog dang / zla ba'i gzi brjid dang / dpal

gyi blo gros dang / zla mthong dang / klu'i rgyal po legs mthong dang / shin tu brtan pa dang / mgul na nor bu dang / sprin byung dang / char rgyun dang / rab 'joms dang / rnam par 'joms dang / mthu bskyengs dang / gdengs ka chen po dang / dbyangs zab dang / klu'i rgyal po cher sgrogs dang /

rnam par sgru 'byin dang / ut+pa la dang / rtsal chen dang / gshol mda' 'dzin dang / sna tshogs sde dang / zhags pa chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab ma dang / kun tu snang dang / rna rtsub dang / dung dang / dar dar dang / klu'i rgyal po u pa dar dar dang / bde byed dang / lag 'gro dang /

lag 'gro chen po dang / dri ma chen po dang / 'phur lding dang / sog ma med dang / 'phyang ba dang / srin bu gnas dang / nag po dang / klu'i rgyal po dbang po sde dang / 'dam bu dang / nye ba'i 'dam bu dang / dung thogs dang / 'gro lding dang / rab mdzes dang / glang chen sna dang / rnon po dang /

ser skya dang / glog 'bar dang / glog 'od chen po dang / stobs lha dang / chu stobs dang / klu'i rgyal po dam pa 'gebs dang / bdud rtsi can dang / mu stegs can dang / bai DUr+ya'i 'od can dang / gser mdog sgra dang / gser 'od dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan 'od dang / nyi 'od dang / 'char

ba dang / bal glang mgo dang / klu'i rgyal po dkar po dang / nag po dang / gshin rje dang / dge tshul dang / sbal pa dang / ngang pa'i gzi brjid dang / mu khyud 'dzin dang / sa 'dzin dang / mgo stong can dang / gtsug na nor bu dang / klu'i rgyal po don yod mthong dang / sprin chen dang / sde

bzang dang / sa skyong dang / mis byin dang / rnam par dul dang / dga' ba 'byung dang / chu srin kum+b+hi ra'i gdong dang / dug 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po myur gdug dang / pad+ma ka dang / mjug ma dang / rab 'phyang dang / 'jigs byed dang / gzi brjid mdzes dang / mgo lnga pa dang / bal

li ra dang / shing rtas rgyal dang / klu'i rgyal po bla ma dang / klu'i rgyal po mjug dang / mgo bo che dang / pim bi ka dang / bi ta ra dang / mgyogs 'gro dang / klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa dang / klu sde dang / gzi chen dang / 'dam bu byin dang / klu'i rgyal po skrag byed dang / 'od 'bar dang / mgo bdun pa

dang / stong chen dang / mthong dga' dang / rab tu cher gtum dang / dri med gzi brjid dang / mig dang / drag po chen po dang / 'od 'phro phung po dang / klu'i rgyal po gtum po dang / khro bo drag shul can dang / rin chen chu sbyin dang / chu sbyin sprin chen po dang / dbang po'i 'od dang / rkang pas

'thung dang / sprin zla dang / rgya mtsho'i sprin dang / me tog dri chen dang / ku mu da'i 'byung gnas dang / klu'i rgyal po rin chen mig dang / tog chen po'i rgyal mtshan dang / sprin chen snying po dang / kha ba can dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / sprin mthu can dang / mtshan mo 'dzin dang / chu sbyin dang /

chu sbyin chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi brjid me 'dra dang / sprin gyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / khro med dang sa'i bum pa dang / klu dpal dang / chu 'dzin dang / sprin gdugs dang / ang gi ra'i gdong dang / gzi brjid can dang / sprin las mngon byung dang / klu'i rgyal mo gom stabs

mtha' yas dang / cha byad mdzes dang / lus chen dang / spyad lto dang / zhi ba dang / dpa' ba dang / gser ngad can dang / mchog tu brtson dang / dug can dang / dbyangs snyan dang / klu'i rgyal po bdud rtsi snying po dang / rab tu char 'bebs chen po dang / rnam par g.yo

dang / 'brug sgra dang / rnga sgra dang / bdud rtsi'i rgyun dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / 'brug sgrogs dang / dpa' sde dang / sred med kyi bu dang / rgya mtsho'i klong dang / klu'i rgyal po yon po dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po de dag la sogs pa klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dag 'dus

te 'khod pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po de dag 'khor dang bcas te stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bla ma la gus pa

dang / phu dud chen po byed pas/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dar gyi lda ldi dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs dang / rin po che'i

me tog dang / rin po che'i lda ldi dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / klu'i me tog dang / mu tig gi dra ba mchog tu mdzes pa rnam pa sna tshogs dpag tu med pa grangs med pa dag /bcom ldan 'das la phul nas bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas

smon lam rnams btab pa/ lus rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho thams cad dang / sa dang / chu dang / me dang /

rlung thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams dang / gzugs su snang ba thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams las rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la yang lus kyi sprin rgya mtsho bgrang ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ grangs med/ dpag tu med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/

gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa las yang dag par 'das pa dag dang / lus re re la yang lag pa rgya mtsho'i sprin phyogs kun gyi rgyun du mngon par phyogs pa dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag byin gyis brlabs nas/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyi cha re re las kyang mchod pa thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtsho phyogs

kun gyi gzhi rgyas par 'gengs pa ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mchod pa bya'o snyam pa 'di lta ste/ kun tu spyod pa'i lus rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa

dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang 'od zer stug po dang nyi ma dang zla ba thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che

thams cad kyi phreng ba dang me tog gi rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi snang pa chen po'i snying po khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / phye ma dang / shing ljon pa thams cad kyi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos dang / bdug pa thams cad kyi gzugs kun tu ston pa rgya mtsho

sprin rnams dang / sgra thams cad sgrogs pa'i rol mo'i sgra rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang / spos thams cad kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas/ de la sogs pa mchod pa thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtsho dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis

mi khyab/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa/ ma 'dres pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /yul thams cad du bkod pa rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can gyi nor

bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /thams cad kun du snang ba'i nor bu rin po che'i char 'bab pa bkod

pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba 'bar ba dang ldan pa sangs rgyas la nges par gyur pa'i dbyangs kyi nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun du sgras 'gengs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal

po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgo rin po che 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa snang bar byed pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ma 'dres pa rnams su bkod pa thams cad snang ba kun du ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'od 'phro ba sgron ma sangs

rgyas kyi yul thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang snang ba kun du ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs thams cad

kyi rdul la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku snang ba rnam par byed pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/ nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /

mchod par bya'o/ /rin po che dang / spos dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po kha dog mtha' yas pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i sgron ma

dang / spos kyi 'od 'phro ba can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig thams cad kyis rnam par spras pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog thams cad kyi ze ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i phreng ba mtha' yas pas legs par brgyan pa'i

khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas phyogs bcu kun du 'od zer snang ba'i snying po can bkod pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rdul gyis rab tu brgyan

bkod pa du ma kun tu ston pa khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sgo kun du me tog gi rta babs dril bu'i dra ba dbyangs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs

par byin gyis brlabs te sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /gser dang rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshong tshong dang phreng ba dang / rin po che'i mgul gdub kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams

dang / me tog snang ba ltar sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / an+da rnyil dang 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i sgron ma'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /

nor bu rin po che snang gsal rgyal mtshan gyi pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po ches brgyan pa'i pad+ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / an+da rnyil mdzes par 'bar ba'i 'od zer ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi

seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'od zer 'bar ba zad mi shes pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'bar ba thams cad byung ba'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'bar ba mchog

dam pa thams cad byung ba'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung sgra'i 'od zer dang ldan pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang /

byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /spos dang / nor bu sna tshogs thams cad kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgo lo ma las thal mo sbyar ba'i sprin 'byung ba'i spos kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin

rnams dang / shing ljon pa thams cad kyi gzugs mtha' yas pa bkod pa kun du ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog thams cad kyi sprin rab tu 'phyang ba'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad 'byung ba'i mdzod mtha' yas pa dang

ldan pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang bar byed pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus phyed tsan+dan thams cad kyi phye mar kun du ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / byang chub kyi

snying po thams cad kyi bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od can gyi shing ljon pa'i rin po che'i gos thams cad kyi mdzod nyi ma ltar snang bar byas pa dang ldan pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sgra dbyangs thams cad sgrogs pa yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kun du gtong ba'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho

sprin rnams dang / rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i pad+ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun du mngon par phyogs pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po snang bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rgyan bkod pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying

bo can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma'i phreng ba'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgra rin po che'i shing ljon pa 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos dang / me tog dang /

pad+ma thams cad kyi phreng ba rin po che'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdan bkod pa kun du ston pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad kyi phreng ba rab tu dpyangs pa'i rta babs

stegs bus rab tu brgyan pa rin po che'i sprin gyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i yal ga dang phye ma'i mdzod yod pa'i sdong po thams cad kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba kun

nas brgyan pa nyi ma snang bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /

yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi gzhal med khang rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / an+da rnyil gyi ze ba can gyi me tog bkod pa thams cad kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos dang nor bu thams cad kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma'i gzugs kyi bla

re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par ston par snang ba'i dbyangs can gyi nor bu'i rgyal po'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu sna tshogs kyi gos bkod pa thams cad snang ba kun du ston pa'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog thams cad kyi chu bo 'bar bar snang ba'i rin po che'i

bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / dril bu sna tshogs kyi sgras kun du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dra ba'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / pad+ma 'bar ba kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogs su snang ba'i nor bu'i snying po can gyi pad+ma'i dra ba'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / gser gyi dra ba can gyi 'od zer snang

ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab par snang ba'i 'od zer mtha' yas pa bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang chen

mtsho sprin rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi/ gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun du khebs par byin gyis brlabs la/ rin po che bcu'i 'od zer snang ba bkod

pa'i me tog gi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig kha dog mtha' yas pa'i mdzod kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje'i sgo'i sgra'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs

kyi 'od 'phro ba'i phreng ba'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i rdul kun du snang bas rab tu brgyan pa'i dril bu'i dra ba dpyangs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu thams cad kyi sdong po yal ga'i rgyan gyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nyi ma rnam

par snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po dang / spos dang / bdug pa thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i mdzod kun du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul chen po snang bar byed pa kun du bkod

pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /rin po che thams cad snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /

rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi gzugs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams dang / me tog gi sprin snang bar byed pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa rgya mtsho sprin

rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gtogs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgo sangs rgyas kyi yul sgrogs pa rin po che'i yal ga'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bai DUr+ya dang / rin po che'i rigs dang / nor bu rin

po che'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'od zer kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sems can gyi gzugs mtha' yas pa dag sems kyi skad cig la kun du ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam las byung ba yid

du 'ong ba'i sgra rab tu 'byin pa dang ldan pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can 'dul ba'i dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la

bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /nor bu thams cad kyi mdzod kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od

'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos sgrogs pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi 'od

zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rdul gyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa sgrogs pa can gyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che mi

zad pa thams cad bstan pa dang me tog thams cad kyi ze ba'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / khri stan bkod pa thams cad kun du ston pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar

bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i kha dog mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams dang / kun du 'od kyi nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing rgya chen po bkod pa snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phro

ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi ze ba'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /

gos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa'i spyod pa dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig gi sgron ma thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems

dpa' gang chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /spos dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad

kyi pad+ma'i dra ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang ldan pa'i mu tig gi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che dang / spos dang / tsan+dan thams cad kyi phye ma rgya mtsho sprin

rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu'i rgyal po yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa mdzes pa'i dbyangs can rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nyi ma'i 'od kyi nor bu'i tshogs kyi phreng ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i mdzod mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams

dang / thams cad kun du bzang po'i lus ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho thams cad la bsti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /zhes de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas/

klu'i rgyal po de dag gis yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rang rang gi stan la 'khod do/ /de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i klu'i bdag po chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i smon lam gyi stobs can

g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir 'ongs so/ /de nas klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha'

yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di

skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang /

bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /klu'i bdag po ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs

par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams

cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'phebs par 'gyur/ rtswa dang / shing shel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal thams cad 'khrungs par 'gyur/ 'bru thams cad skye bar 'gyur/

bcud thams cad yang dag par skye bar 'gyur/ gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la

'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /klu'i bdag po khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa legs so legs so/ /klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod

la bshad do/ /klu'i bdag po chos gcig dang ldan na klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /chos gcig po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa'o/ /klu'i bdag po byams pa de la gnas pa'i lha dang mi rnams ni mes mi

tshig /mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ chus mi khyer/ dug gis mi tshugs/ pha rol kyi dmag tshogs kyis zil gyis mi non/ /bde bar gnyid kyis log par 'gyur/ bde bar sad par 'gyur/ rang gi bsod nams kyis yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur/ bsod

nams chen pos gzi brjid kyis gzi can du 'gyur/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang mthong na dga' bar 'gyur/ 'gro ba thams cad du thags thogs med par 'gyur/ sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad pa dang / rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/

bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / mi'i chos bla ma rtogs nas lus zhig pa'i 'og tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te/ klu'i bdag po lha dang mi byams pa la gnas pa rnams kyi phan yon ni 'di dag go/ /klu'i bdag po de bas na byams pa'i lus kyi las dang / byams pa'i

ngag gi las dang / byams pa'i yid kyi las kyis gnas par bya'o/ /klu'i bdag po gzhan yang bde ba thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs brjod par bya ste/ des klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun gcod par byed/ bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed de/ 'dzam bu'i

gling 'dir dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs par byed/ rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / lo tog thams cad skye bar byed do/ /klu'i bdag po de la bde ba thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs gang zhe na/ tad+ya thA/ d+hA ra NI d+hA ra NI/ ut+tA ra Ni/ saM pra

tiSh+Thi te/ bi dza ya brna/ sat+ya pra ti dz+nyA sa ra ha/ dz+nyA na ba ti/ ud de pA da ni bi nA ma ni/ a b+hi She tsa ni/ a b+hi bya hA ra/ shu b+ha ba ti/ a dzi ma tu/ e hi ku ma ba la ni/ ba ha hA ra kle sha na/ d+hu na pA paM/ sho d+ha ya marga Na/ ni ra ti ka /d+harma ta shud+d+ha/ lo ka bi ti mi ra ra tsa sa/

duHkha sha ma na sarba bud+d+ha a ba lo ka na a d+hiSh+Thi ti/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na bi swA hA/ klu'i bdag po gzungs kyi tshig don thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ chos kyi sku la 'jug pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ bde ba thams cad sbyin pa 'di dag gzung bar bya/ brjod par

bya'o/ /klu'i bdag po gzhan yang sprin gyi rigs las 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs bkod pa gzi brjid kyi snying po sprul par snang bar byed pa/ ye shes kyi tog gi chu'i rgyun gyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khor dpal dang ldan pa/ gser gyi 'od zer rnam par snang bar byed pa/ skra'i rtse mo'i cha

shas gcig las byung ba'i rus dang / rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan gzung bar bya/ yid la bya'o/ /de dag gis klu thams cad dang / klu'i rigs thams cad dang / klu'i rus thams cad dang / klu'i cho rigs thams cad dang / klu'i 'byung ba thams

cad dang / klu'i skye gnas thams cad dang / klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang / klu'i bu mo thams cad dang / klu'i g.yog thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun gcod par byed pa/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad sgrub par byed do/ /klu'i bdag po de la de bzhin

gshegs pa'i mtshan de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad snying po can gyi sprin chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rigs las byung ba'i sprin gyis rnam par mdzes la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi chu 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ldan sprin gyi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'byung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa klung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i glog 'bar ba'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen mthu rtsal dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sdud chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen

gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blta sdug sprin chen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen pos khebs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin las byung ba snang bar byed pa'i

dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu mtho 'gebs rnga'i sgra dbyangs shin tu rab tu sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen bsil 'byung mi dga' rab 'joms sgra zab sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen dpal

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i chu sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtsal gyi sprin ltar dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra bsgrags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen kun du ston la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rgya chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 'dzag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar rnam par

sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin lta bu'i na bza' mnabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyis lo tog bskyed la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi gnas la gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa char gyi sprin gyi sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 'du bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa sprin rnam par rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen ut+pal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen spos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'phags la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'od mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen byin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che chen po'i sprin lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi chu bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa sprin sdud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang lce 'bab pa rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po ltar nam mkha' mtho nas bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen sgra 'byin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen char chu skyes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa snyems pa'i gzi brjid sgrub pa'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa ro bro ba drug dang ldan pa'i chu chen po'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chu 'thor sprin chen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen rgya mtsho 'gengs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa char mi 'bab pa na sprin gyis kun du 'gebs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gzugs mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas sprin chen po thams cad rnam par sgrub pa 'dzam bu'i sprin gyi dpal gyi gzi brjid 'od mdzad pa sprin gyi 'od zer can rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag brjod pas klu thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad

rgyun chad pa dang / bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char pa'i rgyun 'bab pa dang / rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal dang / lo tog thams cad skyed par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i

klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho'i sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal pos gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char mi 'bab pa'i tshe gang dag brjod na char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par bgyid pa dang /

mi bzad pa'i dus kyi tshe dang / gnod pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe dang / chos ma lags pas skye bo 'thab pa'i dus kyi tshe dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe dang / nad dang 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe dang / skar ma ma rungs pa gnas pa'i dus kyi tshe dang / yams kyi nad dang /

'tshe ba dang / gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang / de lta bu'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams bshad du gsol/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlab par gsol/ gang dag klu thams cad la yang dag par bskul ma 'debs par 'gyur ba dang / lha

thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ba dang / gnod pa thams cad zlog par 'gyur ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyid pa dang /

rgyu skar ma rungs pas bgyis pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis char pa'i bar chad lnga gsungs pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad sel bar 'gyur ba dang / 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char pa'i rgyun legs par 'bab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags

kyi gzhi rnams bcom ldan 'das mchog tu thugs rje dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan par thugs brtse ba dang ldan pas bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'tshal lo/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis

klu'i rgyal po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /klu'i bdag po khyod sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa

legs so legs so/ /klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / snying rje chen po las byung ba/ 'brug chen po'i sgra can bsgyings pa dpa' ba'i tog ces bya ba'i gzungs sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir sangs rgyas

thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa/ rjes su yi rang ba bshad par bya ste/ de ni char med pa'i tshe char pa bab par byed/ char ches pa gcod/ 'chi ba'i gnod pa rab tu zhi bar byed/ klu thams cad skul bar byed/ /lha thams cad sim par byed/ bdud

thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed/ sems can thams cad bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byed do/ /tad+ya thA/ ma hA dz+nyA na/ a ba b+hA sa ni/ shrI te dzo lak+Sh+ma dr-iSh+Ta bi kra ma/ badzra sa~M ha ta ne/ pa ra ma bi rA dza/ nirma la gu Na ke tu sU r+ya pra b+he/ bi ma lAng+ga yaSh+Ti/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sa~M b+ha ra

sa~M b+ha ra/ du du~M bu/ ha na ha na/ ma hA pra b+he bi d+hA ta ma hA mo ha a~M d+ha ka re/ padz+nyA gra shud+d+he/ ba ri pU ra Na mai tre/ mai tri bi ra ma na skan+d+ha/ mai tre ma bud+d+ha re/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ dz+wa lA~M bud+d+ha re/ dz+wa la~M bud+d+ha re/ dz+wa la~M bud+d+ha re/ bod+h+yaM ga ku su me da sha ba le/ tsa tu ra bai shA ra d+ye/ aSh+Ta da sha /a be ni ka bud+d+ha d+harme/

shu b+ha ma ti/ pu N+ya rA shi/ shu kla d+harma sa ma n+wi ti/ gaM b+hI re/ gaM b+hI re/ b+hi ra dza ske/ bi ma lo/ bi she Sha/ prA ba te/ ni rA pra b+ha d+harme/ sarba lo ka dz+yeSh+Tha dz+yeSh+Tha/ par pra ba re/ a nut+ta re/ a sa~M ge /d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ shAn+ta ma te/ shAn+ta ma te/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ pa ra

ma bud+d+hA nu mi te/ ma hA pra dz+nyA pA ra mi te swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ye shes rgya mtsho dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char dbab

pa'i phyir klu thams cad kyi snying po brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bden pas char pa'i bar chad byed pa lnga bsal bar bya'o/ /s+yAd ya the dan/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ nA gA nAM/ dza ba dza ba/ dzi bi dzi bi/ dzu bu dzu bu/ klu

chen po dag tshur sheg /sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig /tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ klu'i bdag po chen po dag tshur sheg /kye klu chen po dag sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig /ba ra ba ra/

bi ri bi ri/ bu ru bu ru/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pas klu thams cad dgug par bya'o/ /byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / btang snyoms kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis

brlabs dang / bden pa dang / bsam pa chen pos klu'i bdag po dag tshur sheg /sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rnams dran par gyis shig /b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ chu chen po'i chu dang / sprin

gyi chu 'chang ba can lag gis 'gro ba chen po'i g.yog rnams byams pa'i sems kyis tshur sheg /ston pa'i bstan pa dam pa dran par gyis shig /g+ha Da g+ha Da/ g+hi Di g+hi Di/ d+hu Du g+hu Du/ drag shul can/ khro ba shugs chen po dang ldan pa/ dug chen po'i lce 'byin pa rnams

byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa tshur sheg /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char phob cig swA hA/ ta Tata Ta/ ti Ti ti Ti/ tu Tu tu Tu/ nor bu rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa dang ldan pa/ sbrul gdug pa'i gzugs can rnams dkon mchog gsum gyi

byin gyis brlabs dran par gyis la/ rdo rje 'chang gi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char phob cig swA hA/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ chu chen po la gnas pa dang ldan pa sprin chen po brtsegs pa'i bzhon pa la zhon nas mngon par 'gro ba rnams tshur sheg /byams

pa'i sems kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char gyi rgyun thong shig /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bden pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis lag na rdo rjes bsgo ba/ ra la ra la/ ri li ri li/ ru lu ru lu/ lag gis 'gro thams cad khyed rnams gnyid med par

dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bden pas/ g+ha ma g+ha ma/ g+hi mi g+hi mi/ g+hu mu g+hu mu swA hA/ klu thams cad dgug go/ /byams pa'i sems kyis byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro bas/ na ra na ra/ ni ri ni ri/ nu ru nu ru swA hA/ yon po sna tshogs su gyur pa'i mgo stong pa/

mgo dang mig dmar ba/ stobs che ba'i lto 'phye chen po rnams dgug par bya'o/ /kye kye lag gis 'gro chen po dag mchog tu thugs rje can/ bsod nams thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyis brjid pa/ nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs

dran par gyis shig /ga Da ga Da/ gi Di gi Di/ gu Du gu Du swA hA/ stobs dang / pha rol gnon pa dang / gzi brjid thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char gyi rgyun rnams phob cig /sha ra sha ra/ shi ri shi ri/ shu ru shu ru swA hA/ kye kye klu chen po

rnams rang rang gi rigs dang / cho rigs dran par gyis la/ ma shol bar lha thams cad kyi bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char gyi rgyun phob cig swA hA/ tshangs pa'i bden pas byin gyis brlabs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/

brgya byin gyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu chen po dag brgyad po'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu chen po dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i

bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu chen po dag lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu chen po dag phyir mi 'ong ba'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu chen po

dag dgra bcom pa'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu chen po dag rang sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu chen po dag sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling

'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu chen po dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pa dang / byin gyis brlabs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ lha thams cad kyi bden pas gnod pa thams cad zhi bar gyis shig swA hA/ klu thams cad kyi bden pas

sa chen po 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ gnod sbyin thams cad kyi bden pas sems can thams cad srungs shig swA hA/ dri za thams cad kyi bden pas mi rnams kyi 'khrug pa dang / gnod pa thams cad sol cig swA hA/ lha ma yin thams cad kyi bden pas rgyu skar ma rungs pa

thams cad rnam par zlog shig swA hA/ nam mkha' lding thams cad kyi bden pas klu thams cad byams par byos la 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char chen po'i rgyun phob cig swA hA/ mi'am ci thams cad kyi bden pas sdig pa thams cad zhi bar gyis shig swA hA/ sems can thams

cad ni tshim par gyis shig swA hA/ lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi bden pas yangs shing rgya che bas char gyi rgyun phob cig swA hA/ 'dir char la sgrib pa lnga po dag yang dag par zung shig swA hA/ mi thams cad kyi bden pas mi thams cad la yongs su srungs shig swA hA/ ka ra

ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ da ra da ra/ di ri di ri/ du ru du ru/ na ta na ta/ ni ti ni ti/ nu tu nu tu/ shin tu mgyogs par bzhud ma/ sprin chen po'i chu 'dzin ma/ sprin ldan ma/ sprin chen ldan ma/ sprin chen chu 'dzin ma/ sprin gsal ma/ sprin 'byung ma/ dus sprin

ma/ sprin gyi 'byung gnas ma/ sprin sgrogs ma/ sprin bzhugs ma/ sprin gyi cod pan ldan ma/ sprin gyi phreng ba mnga' ma/ sprin gyis rnam par brgyan ma/ sprin bcibs ma/ sprin la gnas bcas ma/ sprin gyi snying po'i sprin gyi ral pa can/ sprin 'od ma/ sprin gyi 'khor ldan

ma/ rgya chen sprin bzhugs ma/ mchod phyir sprin thogs ma/ lo tog 'ongs sgrub ma/ ri sul na bzhugs ma/ klu'i yum bcom ldan 'das ma/ sprin chen dpal ldan skar mdog can/ bsil reg ma/ tshub ma chen po'i spyod yul ma/ klu chen rnam par rol mdzad ma/ bcom

ldan 'das ma/ pon tra bcud kyis len drug 'dzin ma/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu dbab tu gsol swA hA/ g+har g+har/ g+hi ri g+hi ri/ g+hu ru g+hu ru/ g+hi ri ni/ g+hi ri ni/ g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma/ g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma ri/ dbu

dgu dang ldan ma/ sprin phreng ldan ma/ glog tshogs phreng ldan ma/ lag gis 'gro thams cad 'dzin ma/ sprin lta bu'i na bza' mnabs ma/ dug drag po thams cad spyod yul ma/ sprin bkod ma la bcibs ma/ 'brug sgrogs ma/ sgra sgrogs ma/ klu tshogs la

skul ma/ lha mo sprin chen phreng ldan ma/ klu thams cad la ma shol bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char phob shig ces bskul du gsol swA hA/ ya ra ya ra/ yi ri yi ri/ yu ru yu ru/ dza ra dza ra/ dzi ri dzi ri/ dzu ru dzu ru/ dz+ha ra dz+ha

ra/ gu Du gu Du/ gu gu Du/ ga Da ga Da/ gi Di gi Di/ ha ra ha ra/ hi li hi li/ mu lu mu lu/ ta la ta la/ ti li ti li/ tu lu tu lu/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ grih+Na grih+Na/ marda marda/ pra marda/ pra bar sha big+ha NAM/ mai tre yA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/

bu bud+d+he/ bu bud+d+he/ ha ra pA paM/ sarba satwA nAM/ a g+hiSh+Thi ya pa N+ya ma/ sarba bud d+hA nAM/ d+ha ri ni d+ha re/ shu b+ha ma te gu NA gra prA pa Ne/ ma hA dz+nyA no/ la ge/ shu kla d+harme sat+ya pa ti dz+nye/ ma hA ya nA d+hu Sh+Thi trai lo ka dz+yeSh+Tha b+ha ga ba ti/ bud+d+ha mai tri A pU ra ya sarba k+She trA ni/ shukle shwe tA ma/ ba ra da

re/ pan+ta ra ba si ni/ d+hu d+hu re/ d+hu d+hu ru/ sha ma sha ma/ shAn+ta ma nA se/ char gyi bgegs thams cad rnam par bsal bar gsol swA hA/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pas byams pa'i thugs kyis yang dag par brtul

zhugs dang dka' thub kyi thugs skyon med pas klu chen po rnams la yang dag par bskul lo/ /klu'i rgyal po chen po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char

rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po ma

dros pa la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po gzi can la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po chu lha la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir

char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po 'jog po la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas

kyi bu la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po btang bzung la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob gcig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling

'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po nu ta la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po dpal gyi gzi brjid la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po dpal

bzang la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po glog gi phreng ba la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po gtsug na nor bu chen po la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam

bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu pheb cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po gtsug na nor bu thogs la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ klu'i rgyal po snang ldan gtsug phud can la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/

de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po chen po thams cad la yang dag par bskul lo/ /'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ nA ge nA ge/ ma hA nA ge/ b+ho ra ma na se/ nA ga hr-i da ya/ d+hU mA ku le/ u gro ro She pra tsaN+Da te dze/ bi Sho gre/ a She bi she/ a hi go re/ kr-iSh+Na ping+ga le/

tsany+tsa le/ lo la dzi he/ ma hA pha Na ka re/ ka lA bA she/ rau dra bA se ni/ Du Du ma be g+ha na g+ha na/ shi ki ni/ ka na ka na/ ga Na ga Na/ ma hA ga Na ga Ni/ pa ra pa ra/ pi ri pi ri/ pu ru pu ru/ bis+hArdza ni/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ ma hA b+ho ge/ ma Ni da re/ phi ri phi ri/ phu ru phu ru/ pha ra pha ra/

bar+Sha bar+Sha/ dza lAm+bu da re/ sham+bu sham+bu/ ba ta tu Tu ma me/ d+huM d+huM/ d+huM d+huM be/ me g+ha pra b+he/ me g+ha g+ha hi ni/ D+ha ka D+ha ka /D+ha ka D+hu D+hu m+be/ g+ha nA g+ha nA/ shi ki ni/ ka na ka na/ ga Na ga Na/ ma hA nA ga ga ne/ ni ra trU N+tu/ badzra dar ka ri ma hA nA d+hi da ye/ g+hu ma g+hu ma/ g+hu ma pa

yA sti ka/ dzAM gi ri b+hu dzaM ga me/ bi ka Ta saM ka Te/ go ri bi s+phU rdza ni/ bi dzr-i ma b+ha ne/ klu thams cad dgug go/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pa dang / byams pa'i thugs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir

char rab tu phob cig swA hA/ na maHsarba bud+d+he b+h+yaHsid+d+h+yan+tu/ man+t+ra pa dA ni swA hA/ 'phags pa sprin chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo stong phrag brgya pa las char dbab pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //cho ga ni char cher dbab par 'dod na bla

gab med pa'i sa phyogs gtsang mar bla re sngon po bre/ ba dan sngon po dpyang ngo / chos smra ba lus bkrus la yan lag brgyad pa la nye bar gnas shing / gos gtsang ma sngon po bgos la/ spos dri zhim pos bskus nas/ zas dkar gsum zos la/ stan sngon

po'i steng du 'dug nas/ kha shar phyogs su bltas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab nas sprin chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u 'di nyin mtshan rgyun mi 'chad par bklag par bya'o/ /chu sngon pos bka' ba'i bum pa gang ba bzhi gzhag par bya'o/ /gtor

ma dang / bdug pa dang / me tog ci nus kyis sbyar ro/ /de la chos smra bas phyogs bzhir ba'i lci ba'i khu bas bri bar bya ste/ shar phyogs su khru gsum tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa/ klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa ba'i lci bas bri bar bya'o/ /lho

phyogs su khru lnga tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo lnga pa klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ /nub phyogs su khru bdun tsam du klu'i rgyal po mgo bdun pa klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ /byang phyogs su khru dgu tsam du klu'i rgyal po

mgo dgu pa klu'i g.yog 'khor sna tshogs dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ /chos smra ba rang gi lus bsrungs la byams pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad la snying rje'i sems nye bar bzhag nas/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la gsol ba btab

la klu rnams dang dge ba'i rtsa ba bgo bar bya ste/ 'di ni cho ga'o/ /gang zhig char mi 'bab pa'i tshe sprin chen po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u 'di klog na/ nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis nas nyin zhag bdun tshun chad gdon mi za bar char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /rgya mtsho ni

dus las yol yang srid kyi/ thub pa chen po'i gsung rab char gyi cho ga 'di ni gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /de lta mod kyi tshul khrims dang / yon tan la gnas te 'chal ba'i tshul khrims dang / sha dang nya sha la sogs pa yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /'o thug dang / zho dang / 'o ma
