ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo ste 'di yi ger 'dri'am/ yi gir 'drir 'jug na/ de'i mtshams med pa lnga yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/

saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug na/ de'i sdig pa'i phung po ri rab tsam yang yongs

su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu

med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug na/ de la bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha dang gnod sbyin dang / srin pos glags btsal kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/

ar+ha te/ saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug na/ de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sangs

rgyas bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa dgus mngon sum du lung ston par mdzad de/ sangs rgyas stong gis de la phyag rkyong bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar mdzad par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tshom dang som nyi dang / yid gnyis ma byed cig /o~M na mo b+ha

ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger

'dri'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug na/ rgyal po chen po bzhis de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang zhing bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed par 'gyur ro/ /o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M sarba saM skA ra

pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye

par 'gyur ro/ /o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ sa phyogs gang du mdo sde 'di 'dri

ba'i sa phyogs de yang mchod rten du 'gyur te/ phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i bya dang gang dag gi rna lam du grag par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang

rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag

tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug na/ de bud med kyi dngos por nam du yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri

shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i phyir kA r+ShA pa Na gcig sbyin pa byin na/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su

bkang ste sbyin pa byin par 'gyur ro/ /o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang zhig chos kyi

rnam grangs 'di la mchod par byed pa de dag gis dam pa'i chos thams cad khong du chud par 'gyur ro/ /o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa

mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / log par dad sel dang / 'khor ba 'jig dang / gser thub dang / 'od srung dang / shAkya thub pa la rin po che sna

bdun gyis mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar nus kyi/ tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi nus so/ /o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ saM myak+saM

bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang mnyam pa'i rin po che'i phung por byas te/ sbyin pa byin pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar nus

kyi/ tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi nus so/ /o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi

shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi chus yongs su gang ba'i thigs pa re re nas bgrang bar nus kyi/ tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni bgrang bar mi nus so/ /o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na

su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ gang zhig tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ gus

par byas te/ mchod par byed pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa yin no/ /o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ saM myak+saM bud

d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ sbyin pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng ge sbyin pa'i stobs rtogs nas/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /sbyin pa'i stobs kyi sgra ni

grag par 'gyur/ /tshul khrims stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng ge tshul khrims stobs rtogs nas/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /tshul khrims stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/ /bzod pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /

mi yi seng ge bzod pa'i stobs rtogs nas/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /bzod pa'i stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/ /brtson 'grus stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng ge brtson 'grus stobs rtogs nas/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /

brtson 'grus stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/ /bsam gtan stobs kyis sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng ge bsam gtan stobs rtogs nas/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /bsam gtan stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/ /shes rab stobs kyis

sangs rgyas yang dag 'phags/ /mi yi seng ge shes rab stobs rtogs nas/ /snying rje can gyi grong khyer 'jug pa na/ /shes rab stobs kyi sgra ni grag par 'gyur/ /o~M na mo b+ha ga ba te a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na su bi ni sh+tsi ta te dzo rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/

tad+ya thA/ o~M sarba saM skA ra pa ri shud+d+ha d+har+m+ma te ga ga na sa mung+ga te swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he ma hA na ya pa ri bA re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar

bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a pa ri mi ta A yur dz+nyA na hr-i da ya nA ma d+hA ra NI/

bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gA tas bskor ba'i rdzing bu'i 'gram na/ dge

slong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la

'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'di nas nub kyi phyogs rol na/ /bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams/ /de na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med/ /su zhig de yi mtshan brjod na/ /de ni de ru skye bar 'gyur/ /'chi ba'i dus su ston pa ni/ /

dge slong dge 'dun bcas te mthong / /de na bud med yod ma yin/ /mngal na gnas pa yod ma yin/ /rin chen rnams kyi pad+mo las/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zas dang gos dang sman rnams dang / /chos gos mal cha lhung bzed rnams/ /sems kyis bsam ma thag

tu ni/ /de dag mod las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /bde ba can gyi bsngags pa brjod/ /de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/ /sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab/ /'phags pa'i dge 'dun bsam mi khyab/ /bsam mi khyab la dad byas

na/ /rnam par smin pa bsam mi khyab/ /rnam dag zhing du skye bar 'gyur/ /dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi pho brang 'khor dang bcas pa zhes bya ba rgyar dpag tshad khri yod pa zhig yod de/ rgyal rigs su skyes so/ /

dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi yab ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzang po'i mchog ces bya bar gyur to/ /de'i yum ni gzi brjid can zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de'i btsun mo rgyal rigs bzang skyong ma zhes bya bar gyur to/ /

dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi sras ni zla ba'i 'od ces bya bar gyur to/ /rim gro ba ni snyan pa dri ma med ces bya bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi shes rab can gyi mchog tu gyur pa ni bzang po'i tog ces bya bar gyur to/ /rdzu 'phrul dang

ldan pa'i mchog dang / /brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa'i mchog ni bkod pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi bdud ni mchod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar gyur to/ /lhas byin gyi ming ni dang ba zhes bya bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe

dpag med kyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po ni nyan thos chen po drug khri yod do/ /dge slong dag sems can thams cad kyis legs par bsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi mtshan legs par bzung la/ zhag bcur sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yid la ma yengs par sgom zhing

'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med rgyun du yid la bya'o/ /dpal 'chi med rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di yang rtag tu bzlas brjod bya'o/ /nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum yan lag lngas phyag byas la sems can thams cad kyis

de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med bsams na/ zhag bcu 'das pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi

khams bde ba can du yongs su bsngos na/ de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag 'chi med rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs de gang zhe na/

tad+ya thA/ sha ba le/ a ba le/ sa ma dza le/ nirde she/ nir dzA te/ ni ru k+te/ nir mu khe/ dz+wa la ba ri ts+tshe da ni/ su kha ba ti nirde she/ a mr-i te/ A yur gar+b+ha ni ra hA ni/ a mr-i te/ A yuHpra sA d+ha ni/ nir bud d+hi/ A kA sha ni rdzAte/ A kA sha ni rde she/ A kA sha nir ku sha ye/ A kA sha nir dar+sha ne/ A kA sha a

d+hi Sh+ThAne/ su kha ba ti a d+hiSh+ShA ne/ rU pa ni rde she/ tsa twA ri d+harma pra sA d+ha ne/ tsa twA ri Ar+ya sat+ya pra sA d+ha ne/ tsa twA ni mA rga b+ha ba na pra sA d+ha ne/ ba la bIr+ya pra sA d+ha ne/ d+harmA ts+tshe da ne/ ku sha le/ ku sha la ni rde she/ ku sha la pra tiSh+ThA ne/ bud d+ha ku sha le/ bi shud d+ha pra b+hA sa/ d+harma ka ra Ne/ ni rdza te/ ni ra bud d+he/ bi ma le/ bi ra dze/ rA

dza se/ ra sA gre/ ra sA gra ba la/ ra sA gra/ a d+hiSh+Thi te/ ku le pra ti ku le/ bi ku le/ dan+te su dan+ta tsit+te/ su pra shAn+ta tsit+te/ su pra tiSh+Thi te/ su le su mu khI/ d+harme tsa d+harme/ ba le tsa ba le/ a nu sha a ba le/ bud d+ha A kA sha gu Ne/ bud d+ha A kA sha ni ra gu Ne/ a mr-i ta dun du b+hiHswa re swA hA/ dge slong dag dad pa'i rigs

kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la 'chi med rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di skad bstan pa de bzhin du kha ton byed pa des/ gos gtsang ma bgos te sa phyogs gtsang zhing dri ma med par/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med la me tog dang spos kyis mchod par bya'o/ /byang

chub kyi snying po pad+ma'i gnas dang / byang chub kyi shing phun sum tshogs pa yang yid la bya'o/ /de la yang 'dod pa bskyed par byas te/ 'dod pa dang dad pa byas na de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe

dpag med kyi shing gi rgyal po ni rin po che'i pad+ma rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba shing de me tog dang 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /pad+ma'i gdan ni dag cing gsal la bzang zhing bkra ba'i 'od zer can zhes bya ba ste/ rin po che du mas bskor ba la de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med

bzhugs so/ /g.yas na ni byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go/ /g.yon na ni byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grangs med pas bskor to/ /dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la mos pa dang / dad pa dang /

gus pa mang ba de der skye bar 'gyur te/ gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma chen po dag la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag dge slong pha'am/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen pha'am/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag

med de'i mtshan yang dag par 'dzin pa de la me'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / chu'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / dug gi 'jigs pa mi 'byung / mtshon cha'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / gnod sbyin gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung / srin po'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni gang la yang ma

gtogs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa

tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bu N+ya saM b+ha wa dang / lots+tsha ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis bsgyur ba'o// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga bA na a mi tA b+ha d+hA ra NI man+t+ra/ bod skad du/

bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas kyi gzungs sngags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ a mi te/ a mi tod+b+ha be/ a mi ta saM b+ha be/ a mi ta bi krAn+ta kA re/ a mi ta ga ga na

kIrti ka re sarba kle sha k+Sha yaM ka ri swA hA/ gzungs 'di'i yon tan ni bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yang 'di lan gsum bzlas brjod byas na sgrib pa de rnams zad par 'gyur ro/ /lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na rtsa ba bzhi'i ltung ba'ang yongs su byang bar gyur te/

sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas rjes su dran par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ ma hI du hi ke swA hA/ lus la nad byung ba dang / nad khong skams su gyur kyang

rung ste/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags te/ bsil yab kyis de la g.yabs na nad med par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs sngags de gsungs ma thag tu 'khor thams cad yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas kyi gzungs

rdzogs so// @#/ /bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ a mi te/ a mi tod+b+ha be/ a mi ta saM b+ha be a mi ta bi krAn+ta gA mi nI/ ga ga na kIrti ka re/ sarba kle sha k+Sha yaM ka ri

swA hA/ gzungs 'di'i yon tan ni bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'ang lan gsum bzlas pa byas na de rnams zad par rig par bya'o/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas pa byas na/ rtsa ba bzhi'i ltung ba'ang sdig pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun

par yang 'gyur ro/ /snang ba mtha' yas rjes su dran pa rdzogs so// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA pa ri mi ta gu NA nu shAn+sa nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yon tan bsngags pa dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog

gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ a mi ta b+ha ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M a mi te/ a mi tod+b+ha be/ a mi ta saM b+ha be/ a mi ta bi krAn+te/ a mi ta ga mi ni/ ga ga na kIrti ka ri/ sarba kle sha k+Sha yaM ka ri swA hA/

gzungs 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ lan cig brjod pas bskal pa 'bum du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /nyin re bzhin du dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas stong gis bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba

'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas na ltung ba bzhi 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na 'phags pa byams pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /lan gnyis 'bum bzlas brjod byas na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /lan

sum 'bum bzlas brjod byas na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /phan yon gzhan yang dpag tu med pa yod na yang mdor bsdus te bstan pa yin no/ /'phags pa yon tan bsngags pa dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// @#/ /sangs

rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas rig pa 'di 'dzin gyis/ rig pa 'di bdag la grub par gyur cig /

tad+ya thA/ ha na ha na sA ni/ na ba sA ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la ne/ tsa la tsa la ne/ purba yo gam nu smar phaT/ ma hA ha ta ya swA hA/ gang gi rig pa 'di bklags pa de tshe rabs brgya stong du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang bde ldan gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bde ldan gyi snying po rdzogs so// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra pad+ma dzA la mU la tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs

rje chen po dang ldan pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das hi ma la ya'i tshal chen po tsan+dan sdong po dang myu gu rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan

pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun 'ged gzhon nu dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab

'byor la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'di lta ste/ pad+ma dkar po dang / nyi 'od dang / gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / pad+ma'i spyan dang / ye shes dbang phyug dang / pad+ma'i dbang phyug dang / rdo

rje snying po dang / rin chen snying po dang / kun tu bzang po dang / sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / blo gros mi zad pa dang / nam mkha'i mdzod dang / blo

gros rgya mtsho dang / mthu chen po thob pa dang / zla 'od dang / dra ba can gyi 'od dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad sel ba'i blo gros la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med pa dang / gzhan yang gtsor byams pa la

gnas pa'i dge slong mang po dang / dge slong ma mang po dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma mang po dang / lha'i tshogs dang / klu'i tshogs dang / de bzhin du gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang /

grul bum dang / sha za dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa bye ba phrag drug dang / khro bo chen po rdo rje hU~M mdzad dang / rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang / rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / rdo rje rta mgrin dang / rdo rje bgegs mthar byed dang / rdo rje gtsug tor dang / rdo

rje gnod mdzes rgyal po la sogs pa bdun cu dang / spyan ma dang / mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma dang / 'od zer can dang / dbyangs can ma dang / phag zhal ma dang / khro gnyer can dang / ri khrod ma dang / dug sel ma dang / nor rgyun ma dang / dkar mo

dang / yid bzang ma dang / rnam par rgyal ma dang / dpal phreng mo dang / sa 'dzin bzang mo dang / rdo rje dbang phyug ma la sogs pa stong phrag drug brgya dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe 'khor de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la bla ma dang / bkur sti dang / rim

gror bya ba'i phyir mchod pa du mas mchod cing bsngags pa du mas stod par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen po thugs rje chen po yongs su 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing

ltas bco brgyad du gyur to/ /de'i ltas de mthong nas lang ka'i rgyal po sgra sgrogs shin tu snyems pa dang ldan nas rang gi 'khor du ma dang lhan cig der lhags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das sgra sgrogs kyi sems kyi rtog pa thugs su chud nas sku'i gnas thams cad nas 'od zer bye ba

phrag du ma byung ngo / /'od zer de dang sa g.yos pa de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyang gsal bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe sgra sgrogs snyems pa dang bcas pas de'i 'khor thams cad kyis 'dzam bu'i gling du yams nad la sogs pas rnam par 'tshe ba de thugs kyis

yongs su dgongs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gdong bcu gcig pa drang srong rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag brgya stong dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags nas zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ g.yas phyogs

su bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i tshogs rnams kyi nang nas lha'i bu rin po che pad+ma'i dra bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba bzhengs te thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad

ces smras so/ /kye ma mgon po thugs rje can/ /rig sngags 'chang ba'i tshogs dang bcas/ /che ba'i byin brlabs ldan pa rnams/ /sgra sgrogs snyems pa gzhom pa dang / /nyon mongs rtsad nas gdon pa dang / /sems can rnams la phan pa dang / /bdag la shin tu

sman pa'i phyir/ /sku dang rjes su mthun pa yi/ /rig sngags sbyor ba khyad par can/ /snying po dam pa bshad du gsol/ /de tshe 'khor tshogs thams cad kyis/ /mkha' phyogs me tog char gyis bkang / /bcom ldan thub pa'i dbu la ni/ /rin chen me tog gdugs su

gyur/ /lha rnams gtsang mar sbyar ba yi/ /yon chab bdug spos dri dang bshos/ /ci 'byor dad pa'i stobs kyis phul/ /thub pas nam mkha'i mdzod du brlabs/ /lha yi bu mo du ma yis/ /rol mo sil snyan 'phan gdugs dang / /bla re rgyal mtshan lhab lhub dang / /lda ldi

na bza' du mas mchod/ /de nas mgon po spyan ras gzigs/ /pad+ma gzhon nu'i zhal mnga' bas/ /bzhengs 'dzum thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /ston pa la ni 'di skad gsol/ /sgra sgrogs bzhin gyis snyems pa dang / /mda' dang rtsal gyis dregs pa ste/ /'di ni legs

brtsams las byung min/ /shin tu log pa las kyang min/ /sngon dus sangs rgyas gdong mdzes kyi/ /bstan pa la yang mgo btang ba'i/ /bsod nams grangs kyis byung ba yin/ /lag pa du mar 'khrul pa ni/ /zas dang snod dang gos nor rgyan/ /bskal pa bzhi bcu'i

mchod sbyin te/ /de nas rtsal dang shugs kyang yin/ /mda' ni b+h+ring gi ri ti yi/ /byin brlabs sngon du byed mod kyang / /grangs med tshul khrims bral bas ni/ /srin po'i rigs su 'khrungs pa dang / /'khor bcas gzhan la gnod gyur yin/ /ngas ni ngang tshul rmad byung

ba'i/ /lus kyis bde gshegs sbyin pa dang / /sgrub brtson legs byas mtha' yas pa/ /spyod bzang la gnas bsgral ba'i grangs/ /gang gA klung gi rdul dang mtshungs/ /de skad 'bras bu de tsam ste/ /dang po'i las can ci snyed la/ /phan gdags gzhi

ni bya ba'i phyir/ /cung zad bsdus nas brjod bya ste/ /legs par nyon la yid la zung / /sngon tshe 'das dus bskal pa ni/ /gang gA klung bcu'i snga rol gyi/ /cher 'das ba yi snga rol na/ /bde gshegs rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mtshan/ /man dA ra yi dri zhes bya/ /'jig

rten ston pa byung ba'i tshe/ /bdag ni khyim bdag drag por gyur/ /thub pa de la rig sngags mnos/ /thob ma thag tu bskal pa'i grangs/ /bzhi khri snyed kyi 'khor ba snyil/ /de rjes bskal pa gang gA klung / /bye ba snyed gcig snga rol na/ /bde gshegs rdzogs

sangs rgyas kyi mtshan/ /thogs med pad+ma brgya yi spyan/ /gtsug tor yon tan rab rgyas pa'i/ /'od zer rgyal po zhes bya ba/ /'jig rten ston pa bzhugs pa'i tshe/ /bdag nyid drang srong bdag por gyur/ /rig sngags 'di mnos bsgrubs pa yis/ /phyogs bcu'i

sangs rgyas zhal mthong zhing / /skye med chos la bzod pa thob/ /de rjes 'das dus bskal ba ni/ /bye ba phrag brgya'i snga rol na/ /bde gshegs rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mtshan/ /tshe dpag med ces 'jig rten du/ /ston pa byung ba bdag gis mnos/ /de tshe phyogs

bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /bdag la dbang bskur lung bstan mdzad/ /khyod kyi sngon du bskal pa'i grangs/ /brjod mi lang nas rig sngags phyir/ /yang dag stong phrag stong snyed kyang / /dang po'i mchod sbyin chen po byas/ /bye ba phrag grangs bcu gcig tu/ /phyogs

bcu'i sangs rgyas dbang bskur blangs/ /de dang de yi rnam smin mchog /sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byam du/ /yang dang yang du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /phyis ni 'dren pa shAkya zhes/ /mi mjed 'jig rten khams 'khrungs tshe/ /mi yul las kyang khyad par du/ /

gling du skyes pa 'ga'/ /gtan la 'dud 'phel bya ba'i phyir/ /mtshan mo mun nag sprin rum du/ /skad cig glog 'gyu ci lta bar/ /rig sngags 'chang ba gdong bcu gcig /yan lag stong dang ldan pa la/ /spyan ni chig stong sum cu pa'i/ /mtshan dang

ldan pa'i sku 'byung 'gyur/ /de tshe skal ldan la la zhig /mtshan nas brjod cing sku la mos/ /rig sngags zlos pa po gang zhig /'jig rten 'dod pa kun grub cing / /phyi nas ye shes nyis 'gyur ro/ /lung bstan de skad thos pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas bye

ba phrag bcu gcig /grangs snyed zhal nas gsungs pa yi/ /rig sngags snying po gdong bcu gcig /mthu chen thogs pa med pa ste/ /'gro la sman cing bde ba dang / /nad kun sel byed sdig kun sbyong / /bkra shis med pa kun zlog cing / /rmi lam mtshan

ma ngan kun sel/ /dus min 'chi dang ngan sems zlog /rtag tu dpal dang sems bde thob/ /mya ngan sdug bsngal ngal ba sel/ /rtsod 'khrug thams cad zhi ba dang / /bdud dang gdon bgegs zhi bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten smon pa kun grub cing / /bdud dang

bar chad mtshon cha'i nad/ /dbyig pa brdeg dang bcing ba dang / /btson rar bcug dang mtshon chas brtsal/ /gsod sar khrid dang yan lag bcad/ /mig 'bru mtshon gyis btsab pa dang / /chu dang me dang rlungs g.yos/ /dug dang byad stems ro langs dang / /chom

rkun mi ma yin rnams gnon/ /rig sngags 'di yis bsrungs pa dang / /len dang 'dzin dang 'dri ba dang / /klog dang kha ton bshad sogs rnams/ /brtson la 'jig rten lhar bcas dang / /bdud dang tshangs pa dge sbyong dang / /bram zer bcas pas gnod pa med/ /

sngon gyi las drag yod pa yang / /byang zhing bsrabs te med par 'gyur/ /nges pa'i dngos po 'di lags pas/ /rig nas mngon sum yid ches par/ /rnam par rtog med sems kyis blang / /de slad skyabs dang skyob pa dang / /srung dang dbugs 'byin dpal mgon dang / /

gling dang khang khyim 'di nyid yin/ /nye ring sa phyogs ci srid par/ /mtshams bcad nas ni rig sngags dang / /'byung po rnams kyis 'tshe ba med/ /gang gis sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal mchod/ /skyabs su 'gro zhing sdig pa bshags/ /mngon par dga' zhing

gzungs sngags 'dis/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod pa la/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas ma lus pa/ /mtshungs par yi rang legs par sbyin/ /rtsa ba bzhi dang mtshams med lnga/ /ma lus sdig kun byang bar 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin srin po sogs snang yang / /bzung nas byams

pa snying rje'i sems/ /dang po bskyed nas bla med kyi/ /byang chub sems mchog sa la dgod/ /gang gA klung brgya'i sangs rgyas kyi/ /mtshan nas brjod cing bstod pa bas/ /rigs kyi bu 'am bu mo gang / /bdag gi ming brjod dran byed cing / /rig sngags rgyun du brjod na de/ /

myur du mchog dga'i sa 'thob cing / /lag pa'i mthil nas mthong ba ltar/ /bla med byang chub myur du 'byung / /rtse gcig dran pas gus byas te/ /rtag tu nang par sngar langs nas/ /chos bzhin du ni dge bgyis te/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du gang brjod pa/ /tshe 'dir phan

yon bcu thob 'gyur/ /rtag par lus la nad med dang / /lha dang sangs rgyas kun gyis bsrung / /nor 'bru rin chen gos rnyed dang / /dgra sdang dul zhing 'jigs med dang / /bza' rnams bkur cing rigs btsun thob/ /dug dang 'dre gshin gdon bral dang / /lus la dri

zhim kun dga' dang / /bsam ngan mi snyan rjod byed dang / /rims nad bral zhing dgang sla dang / /dus min 'chi ba sangs par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang yon tan bzhi thob ste/ /'chi khar sangs rgyas zhal mthong dang / /mkha' la 'od 'byung lhas mchod dang / /nam yang ngan 'gror

mi 'gro zhing / /bde ba can nam bde 'gror skye/ /rig sngags 'di dang sangs rgyas kyi/ /ye shes snying po 'dzin pa la/ /byang chub sems dang sangs rgyas kyi/ /rnam par thar pa'i chos sgo 'thob/ /bskal pa du mar dge bsags dang / /rig sngags 'di rnyed 'gyur ba ste/ /dad

ldan khrel yod ngo tsha shes/ /blo bzang brtson ldan snying rje che/ /mdog dkar ngang bzang gsong por smra/ /sems 'jam lus ngag dal bar spyod/ /bla ma la gus brtul zhugs che/ /sred pa chung zhing sbyin la dga'/ /sangs rgyas gus shing sems bcas pas/ /nyin mtshan

rgyun du rig sngags 'don/ /bcu bzhi 'am ni bco lnga dang / /khyad par du ni tshes brgyad la/ /gso sbyong sku yi mdun du blang / /skyon med tsan+dan dkar sogs shing / /rigs bzang las byas sku gzugs sam/ /yang na sa rdo rin chen sogs/ /bzang las bde bar gshegs

gzugs bya/ /yang na ris su bris kyang rung / /sku gcig po 'am lha tshogs kyi/ /dkyil 'khor rgyas par byas pa la/ /mngon sum bzhin du dmigs byas na/ /myur du mngon sum mthong bar 'gyur/ /yon tan kun gyis brgyan pa yi/ /bum pa chu dang bcas pa

la/ /sngags brjod pas ni 'dod don kun/ /'grub 'gyur the tshom mi bya'o/ /nad dang 'phrod pa'i sman rnams la/ /sngags bzlas bza' 'am byugs pas sam/ /bdugs pa tsam yang gnod pa sel/ /srad bu 'am ni gos dag dang / /phyag rgyas gdags kyang de bzhin

no/ /'dod pa gang dang gang la yang / /me yi las kyi sbyor ba bya/ /gsang sngags 'dod 'dzin yid byed pa/ /bdag kyang rjes su 'jug par bya/ /de skad gsungs pa'i de ma thag /byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dbyangs kyis/ /sngags kyi ngo bo nyid la ni/ /ched du brjod

pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma rang bzhin med pa'i chos/ /sna tshogs gzugs su snang ba la/ /brjod rtog bral ba'i skad cig ni/ /zhi ba'i che ba nyid yin no/ /srid pa dngos po med pa la/ /dmigs par byed pa bsgom pa'o/ /dmigs pa mthar thug med mthong ba/ /de

ni bsgom pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /kun tu bzang pos gsang sngags kyi/ /don la ched du 'di ltar brjod/ /e ma sku gsum tha dad par/ /lus ngag yid kyi don las byung / /don gcig pa yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /sku gcig tu ni nges par gzung / /gang la gang

phan bskyed pa la/ /'ja' tshon bzhin du snang mod kyang / /tshig gis brjod pa'i sprul tsam ste/ /ye shes sku la dbye ba med/ /sgrib pa rnam sel las la ni/ /ched du brjod pa 'di ltar brjod/ /e ma dngos po ngo bo nyid/ /ma byung ma skyes ma

'gags pa/ /skye 'gag lta bu'i cho 'phrul ni/ /sku des phyag rgya sngags su snang / /yon tan chu yi rlabs bzhin du/ /skye ba'i ngo la gsal bar byed/ /nan tan gyis ni de nyid kyang / /rgyu ba med cing khong du chud/ /byang chub sems dpa' sa snying gis/ /rgyu la ched

du 'di brjod do/ /e ma rang bzhin rnam dag la/ /thog med blo yi mun pa'i dbyings/ /rnam rtog bag chags kyis dkrugs nas/ /blo bur dkar nag las su snang / /dkar po sangs rgyas chos dge 'dun/ /de la sgro btags byang chub sems/ /de las byung ba'i phrin

las kyis/ /nyon mongs las kyi sgrib pa sbyong / /mgon po byams pas sngags sgrub kyi/ /lam la ched du 'di ltar brjod/ /e ma gdod nas grol zhi'i sems/ /chu ltar dang bar snang mod kyang / /sna tshogs 'gro ba'i gzugs byung bas/ /mun pa thibs pos rnam par

bsgyur/ /de nyid sems kyi snang ba'i phyir/ /'bad rtsol med pa'i sems kyis grol/ /rtsol ba sems kyi dri mas ni/ /dri ma med pa'i sems 'ching 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i snying pos sngags ming la/ /ched du 'di ltar brjod par mdzad/ /e ma stong pa mtshan ma bral/ /kha

dog dbyibs bral chos nyid dag /dga' ba'i sems chen gsal byed pa/ /shes rab chen po'i yi ge min/ /mtshan dpe ye shes bde ldan sku/ /gang gang don du de snang ba/ /snying rje chen po'i ring shugs kyis/ /'byung 'gyur yi ge ta yi don/ /byang chub sems dpa' pad

mos ni/ /gnas lam 'di ltar ched du brjod/ /e ma rgyu rkyen nam mkha' la/ /nyi zla skar rgyun 'khor ba yis/ /gsal nas nyin mtshan bye brag brjod/ /nyon mongs ma rig sred len gyis/ /'du byed srid pa'i las bskul te/ /rnam shes ming gzugs skye mched drug /reg

tshor skye rga shi sdug bsngal/ /gsal byed dag pa gnyis kyis dag /phyag na rdo rjes 'bras don la/ /ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma zab cing rgya che ba/ /sngags mthu bla na med pa ni/ /sangs rgyas mu stegs kyis mi shes/ /shes pa nyid kyang rdzas med la/ /

shes bya rdzas su ga la yod/ /shes pa yul gyi rnam par ni/ /rtog pa'i gzung 'dzin gyis bsgos pa/ /de zad nas ni grol bar 'gyur/ /de nas rig pa'i lha mo'i tshogs/ /spos dang me tog 'thor byed cing / /snyan pa'i sngags kyi glu yis ni/ /mgon po

spyan ras gzigs la bstod/ /o~M bcom ldan mgon po thugs rje spyan ras gzigs/ /zhal grangs mdog dbyibs du ma cir yang snang / /stong dang brgya dang bcu gcig drug dang gcig /byams pa'i zhal bzang mnga' ba'i mgon la 'dud/ /spyan ma'i'o/ /o~M

rab dgyes zhal mdog du ma cir yang 'gyur/ /la la byams pa snying rje dga' ba'i zhal/ /la la 'dod rmongs ser sna chen po'i zhal/ /khro sdang gtum chags lta ldan phyag 'tshal lo/ /mA ma kI'i'o/ /o~M phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dbang bskur rdzogs pa'i zhal/ /

bstan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin rgyal po'i phyag /mdzad pa grangs med chub pa'i phyag rgyar ldan/ /gdan gnyis zhabs gnyis gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na bza' dkar mo'i'o/ o~M mdzad pa thugs rje'i dbyings la thug med kyang / /rtsom pa rgya mtsho rgyun mi chad

mdzad pas/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par spyod pa yi/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrol ma'i'o/ /o~M nyi ma gzi ldan 'od zer 'gyed pa ltar/ /'jug dgongs mi mnga' kun rtog mun bral yang / /bskal pa rgya mtshor khyad par don gsal ba'i/ /

mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'od zer can ma'i'o/ /o~M sems kyi rgyud 'gags mya ngan 'das pa'i tshe/ /'dod chags byung ma thag tu yal ba ste/ /nyon mongs rtsa ba bcad nas pha mtha' med/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbyangs

can ma'i'o/ /o~M nyon mongs bdag tu bzung na 'khor bar skye/ /de la yang yang brtags na ngan 'gror skye/ /rang bzhin med par shes nas grol bar 'gyur/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phag gdong ma'i'o/ /o~M chos rnams dag

par mthong na mtho ris thob/ /gnyis 'dzin rtog pa chad na mya ngan 'da'/ /sgyu ma'i sems dang ldan na gzhan don 'byung / /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khro gnyer can ma'i'o/ /o~M rang tshul spyod la chags pas sa bon rul/ /gzhan tshul dman par brjod

pas zhing sa tshig /lus ngag gtsang sbra tsam las byang chub rig /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sa 'dzin ma'i'o/ /o~M bdag lta mun pa'i dug gis brgyal ba la/ /bdag med phyogs bral ye shes bdud rtsi sman/ /pha rol phyin bcu spyod dang rtogs

stsol mdzad/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dug sel ma'i'o/ /oM ngang tshul bzang spyod nga rgyal zhen pa med/ /gzhan spyod btang snyoms byas nas rang sems spyod/ /sred med bzod ldan ngang gis rgol ba lags/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /ri khrod ma'i'o/ /o~M khrel yod ngo tsha shes shing gtong la dga'/ /dad dang thos ldan tshul khrims shes rab bzang / /chog shes 'dod chung 'di dang gzhan du phyug /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nor rgyun ma'i'o/ /o~M yi ge

'dri mchod sbyin nyan klog dang 'chad/ /kha don 'dzin sems bsgom brtson de la chu'i/ /khrus sogs smyung gnas dkar gtsang yon tan stsol/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkar mo'i'o/ /o~M rang sems dul zhing lus ngag bag yod spyod/ /

'jig rten 'jig rten 'das mchod dam pa 'dzin/ /thos bsam bsgom brtson de ni dgra las rgyal/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par rgyal ma'i glu'o/ /o~M tha dad kyis 'ching dbyer med grol ba yi/ /thabs dang shes rab bde chen byang chub lam/ /rnam

thar ye shes mtha' yas dpal ster ba/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal phreng ma'i glu'o/ /o~M bsam pa bzang po gser gyi sa gzhi la/ /byang chub phyogs chos dpag bsam shing chen 'khrungs/ /ye shes thugs rje rgyun chu rlan mdzad pa'i/ /

mgon po spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yid bzang ma'i glu'o/ /sgra sgrogs 'khor bcas 'dar gyur te/ /rlung gis btab pa'i rtswa dang mtshungs/ /thal mo spyi bor sbyar nas su/ /ched du brjod pas 'di gsol to/ /o~M mgon po rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /

gtso bo rab tu che ba'i lha/ /bsod nams du mas skyed pa'i sku/ /ye shes mtha' yas thugs mnga' ba/ /blo ldan srid mthar mdzad pa po/ /tshul ldan tshul khrims la sbyor mdzad/ /gtsang ldan bram ze tshangs pa che/ /mdzad spyod mkha' mnyam spyod phyag 'tshal/ /

de nas bcom ldan thub pa che/ /'khor la legs so legs so zhes/ /o~M AHhrIHhU~M swA hA bcas/ /yang yang brjod pas byin gyis brlabs/ /lcags kyu can gyis nya ra nas/ /klu phyugs 'bum phrag 'dren pa ltar/ /dge sbyong kun slong dkar pos ni/ /byang chub

rin chen gling 'jog mdzad/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas bcom ldan thub pa che/ /mgon po yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sna tshogs snang ba zhes bya

ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms bzhugs nas/ /yan lag cha shas thams cad las/ /'od zer sna lnga bye ba phrag /drug cu drug cu'i mtha' gzhal ba/ /grangs med dag ni bkye bar mdzad/ /zhing khams grangs med bdun gyi mtha'/ /phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad du/ /

'od kyis gang nas 'od de las/ /snyan pa'i tshigs bcad 'di snang ngo / /sangs rgyas dang ni chos la brnyas pa spang / /le lo che dang spyod pa chog 'dzin spang / /'gyod dang chos la ma nges 'byed pa spang / /nga rgyal che dang 'dod chags spyod pa spang / /'gro rnams med na byang chub lam med

do/ /'gro la brten nas byang chub che thob 'gyur/ /byang chub che lam thugs rje chen po ste/ /'gro rnams med na gang la skye bar 'gyur/ /de skad grags pa'i de ma thag /phyogs bcu'i zhing bzhugs sangs rgyas sras/ /brjod kyis mi lang gtso bo mchog /

spyan ras gzigs dbang grangs med gtso/ /thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /mi mjed zhing 'dir lhags par gyur/ /'di nas shar phyogs zhing khams ni/ /grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid nas/ /zhing khams seng ge spungs par ni/ /sangs rgyas seng ge rol pa

yi/ /drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang seng ge'i sgra/ /mdog dkar shel gyi ri 'dra ba/ /byang chub sems mchog bye ba phrag /bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ /glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /bcom ldan mgon po thub

pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/ /dngul gyi me tog du mas gtor/ /bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / /rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/ /zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par

'gyur/ /'gro ba'i gti mug mun pa bcom/ /shes rab mtha' yas gsal bar mdzad/ /bdag kyang snying po 'di yi mthus/ /phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/ /o~M hrIHsiM ha nA da hU~M phaT/ /snying po de skad phul nas kyang / /thub pa'i ga la de logs su/ /

'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/ /lho yi phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog /grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi/ /zhing khams rin chen brtsegs pa na/ /sangs rgyas rin chen dpal bzhugs pa'i/ /drung du byang

chub sems dpa'i gtso/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang yid bzhin gyi/ /nor bu 'khor los skyur ba byed/ /gser gyi ri bo mdog 'dra ba/ /byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag /bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ /glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /bcom ldan

mgon po thub pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/ /rin chen gser gyi me tog ni/ /rgya che du ma 'thor bar byed/ /bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / /rmad byung che ba'i tshigs bcad

kyis/ /zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i ser sna 'ching ba bcad/ /sbyin pa'i 'byung gnas gter chen rdol/ /bdag kyang snying po 'di yi mthus/ /phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/ /o~M pad+ma d+hA ra d+ha ke hU~M phaT/ snying po de skad phul nas

kyang / thub pa'i ga la de logs su/ /'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/ /nub kyi phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog /grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi/ /zhing khams pad+mo brtsegs pa na/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma'i 'byung

gnas bzhugs/ /drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje can/ /pad+ma nir te shwa ri gtso/ /pad+ma rA ga'i ri 'dra ba/ /byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag /bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ /glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /

bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/ /pad+ma rA ga'i me tog ni/ /rgya che du ma 'thor bar mdzad/ /bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / /rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad

kyis/ /zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i 'dod chags 'dam rdzab bskams/ /tshul khrims byug spos char du phab/ /bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus/ /phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/ /o~M pad+ma nir te shwA ra hrIHhU~M phaT/ snying po de skad phul

nas kyang / /thub pa'i ga la de logs su/ /'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/ /byang gi phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog /grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi/ /zhing khams rdo rje bkod pa na/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje thogs

med bzhugs/ /drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/ /thugs rje chen po mi gshol ba/ /rin chen mar gad ri bo 'dra/ /byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag /bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ /

glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/ /mar ga ta yi me tog ni/ /rgya che du ma 'thor bar mdzad/ /bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'od zer ngo mtshar

ldan pa dang / /rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/ /zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i le lo'i nags tshal bsregs/ /brtson 'grus bskul ba'i me phungasbar/ /bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus/ /phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/ /o~M

rat+na a gra a pra ti ha ta hU~M phaT/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang / /thub pa'i ga la de logs su/ /'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/ /byang shar phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog /grangs med bdun gyi

mtha' nyid kyi/ /zhing khams gter chen brtsegs pa na/ /sangs rgyas don yod 'byung gnas bzhugs/ /drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/ /rje btsun don yod zhags pa can/ /shel gyi ri bo'i mdog 'dra ba/ /byang

chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag /bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ /glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/ /rin chen shel gyi me tog ni/ /rgya che du ma

'thor bar byed/ /bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / /rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/ /zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i zhe sdang ri bo bcom/ /bzod pa'i nyi ma lhang nger mdzad/ /bdag

kyang snying po 'di yi mthus/ /phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/ /o~M hrIHtrai lo kya bi dza ya a mo g+ha pA sha a pra ti ha ta hrIHha hU~M phaT swA hA/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang / /thub pa'i ga la de logs su/ /'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /pus btsugs

thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/ /shar lho'i phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog /grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid kyi/ /zhing khams bdud rtsi brtsegs pa na/ /sangs rgyas sman gyi 'byung gnas bzhugs/ /drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/ /mgon po

spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/ /rje btsun ha la ha la che/ /pu sha ra ka'i ri bo 'dra/ /byang chub sems mchog bye ba phrag /bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ /glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/ /phyag 'tshal

bskor ba du ma byas/ /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/ /pu sha ra ka'i me tog ni/ /rgya che du ma 'thor bar byed/ /bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / /rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/ /zhing rnams rnam

par g.yos par 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i phrag dog dug sdong sprul/ /bsam gtan bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho rlabs/ /bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus/ /phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/ /o~M ha la ha la hrI pad+ma gar+b+ha hU~M phaT swA hA/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang / /thub

pa'i ga la de logs su/ /'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/ /lho nub phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog /grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid na/ /zhing khams pad+mas brgyan pa na/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma'i snying po

bzhugs/ /drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/ /rje btsun pad+ma spyan gyi lung / /zangs ma zhun gyi ri bo 'dra/ /byang chub sems mchog bye ba phrag /bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ /glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /

bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/ /zangs ma zhun gyi me tog ni/ /rgya che du ma 'thor bar byed/ /bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / /rmad

byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/ /zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur/ /'gro ba rmongs pa'i thibs po bcom/ /sna tshogs thabs kyi rlung chen 'phyo/ /bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus/ /phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/ /o~M pad+ma a laM kA ra hU~M phaT swA hA/

snying po de skad phul nas kyang / /thub pa'i ga la de logs su/ /'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/ /nub byang phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog /grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid na/ /zhing khams stong brgya zhes bya bar/ /

sangs rgyas dam tshig dpal bzhugs so/ /drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/ /rje btsun rdo rje chos dbang phyug /nor bu spug gi kha dog 'dra/ /byang chub sems mchog bye ba phrag /bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ /

glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/ /spug gi snying po'i me tog ni/ /rgya che du ma 'thor bar byed/ /bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'od zer ngo mtshar ldan

pa dang / /rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/ /zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i mnar sems zhen pa bsal/ /mthu stobs chen po'i rdo rjes btab/ /bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus/ /phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/ /o~M badzra d+harma d+hA tu

hU~M swA hA/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang / /thub pa'i ga la de logs su/ /'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/ /steng gi phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog /grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid na/ /zhing khams gtsug tor

brtsegs pa na/ /sangs rgyas gtsug tor rgyal po bzhugs/ /drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/ /ha ri ha ri ha ri la/ /zhen zhes rab tu grags pa yi/ /rje btsun chos kyi gtsug tor de/ /in+d+ra nI la'i ri bo mdog /

byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag /bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ /glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/ /in+d+ra nI la'i me tog ni/ /rgya che du ma

'thor bar mdzad/ /bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / /rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/ /zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i log lta'i sgrib g.yogs sel/ /dag pa'i smon lam 'khor lo

bskor/ /bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus/ /phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/ /oM b+h+rU~M hrIHha hU~M swA hA/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang / /thub pa'i ga la de logs su/ /'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/ /'og gi

phyogs kyi zhing khams mchog /grangs med bdun gyi mtha' nyid na/ /zhing khams za ma tog mdzes na/ /sangs rgyas gnon pa'i dpal bzhugs so/ /drung du byang chub sems dpa'i gtso/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang ni/ /rje btsun mgrin pa sngon po rgyal/ /an+da

rnyil gyi ri bo 'dra/ /byang chub sems tshogs bye ba phrag /bcu dang lhan cig mkha' la gshegs/ /glog 'gyu bzhin du zhing 'dir byon/ /bcom ldan mgon po thub pa la/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /'dab ma stong dang ldan pa yi/ /an+da rnyil gyi me tog ni/ /

rgya che du ma 'thor bar mdzad/ /bde bar gshegs so rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /'od zer ngo mtshar ldan pa dang / /rmad byung chen po'i tshigs bcad kyis/ /zhing rnams rnam par g.yos par 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i shes bya'i sgrib nags sel/ /ye shes ral gris rtsa ba bregs/ /

bdag kyang snying po de yi mthus/ /phrin las 'di nyid grogs bgyid do/ /o~M ma Ni pad+me hU~M/ snying po de skad phul nas kyang / /thub pa'i ga la de logs su/ /'khor bcas dga' ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /pus btsugs thal mo sbyar nas bzhugs/ /spyan ras

gzigs dbang tshogs 'dus nas/ /rig sngags mthu chen 'chad pa dang / /gzhan don rdzogs par mdzad pa de'i/ /shin tu dga' bar mdzad pa la/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kun/ /phyag rgya rnams ni spyi bor bzhag /'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis legs so

byin/ /nam mkha' snyan pa yis kyang bkang / /de tshe phyogs bcur bzhugs pa yi/ /khro bo'i rgyal po ma lus rnams/ /sa steng thams cad gar gyis bkang / /g.yas brkyang g.yon brkyang zla gam dang / /zlum po gru bzhi gru gsum 'gros/ /mchong dang gyed mchongs hril

po dang / /rdebs dang btsir ba'i tshul gyis su/ /bgegs rnams stabs kyis tshar gcod mdzad/ /lag pa thal sbyar phye btsum bskyed/ /sor mo gcig bsnol gcig 'khyud dang / /kun bsnol kun 'khyud kun gdengs dang / /rgyab bsnol res 'khyud kun 'khyud

dang / /re mos 'khyud sgreng kun sgreng dang / /mnyam gzhag dang ni mchog gi rgya/ /sa gnon skyabs sbyin mchog sbyin sogs/ /phyag rgya du ma bgegs sel mdzad/ /gzhan yang 'jig rten skyong ba'i tshogs/ /ma lus 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /gdong bcu gcig

pa zhes bya ba'i/ /snga na med pa'i rig sngags rmad/ /ngo mtshar 'byung zhes thos ma thag /lus kyang shin tu 'dar gyur nas/ /rgyal mchog gtso bo drung lhags te/ /phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol/ /gang zhig gdong ni bcu gcig

pa'i/ /rig sngags lan cing 'dzin pa dang / /rgyun du 'don dang yid la byed/ /'jig rten mgon po spyan ras gzigs/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshogs 'di rnams/ /gang gis yid la byed pa'am/ /yang na ji tsam dran yang rung / /dge ldan rigs kyi bu de ni/ /phyogs

bcu rgyal ba rnams kyi sras/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bshes/ /rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyi yab/ /byis pa rnams kyi gnyen yin no/ /bdag cag rnams ni de yi 'bangs/ /skyes bu khyu mchog chen po ste/ /bsod nams rnams kyi gter ldan zhing / /de yi tshul

khrims ral ba med/ /mi de skye ba don yod de/ /lha gnas dag nas spu gseb tu/ /ye shes 'od zer bdud rtsi 'dzud/ /'jig rten 'di yi nad rigs dang / /gdon rigs ci snyed yod pa 'am/ /rig sngags byad stems ma lus pas/ /de la tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /

cho ga bzhin du spyad pa yis/ /tshangs pa'i tshe tshad gnas nas kyang / /shi ba sems brgyal med par ni/ /gnas 'pho tshul gyis mtho ras 'jug /rgyal ba'i zhing du gshegs nas kyang / /rgyal ba rnams la chos nyan cing / /rgyal sras rnams dang stabs gcig tu/ /

stobs dang mi 'jigs pa brnyes te/ /mtshan dang dpe byad ldan gyur nas/ /skad cig glog 'gyu ji bzhin du/ /'gro ba ma lus dag byed cing / /zhing rnams ma lus dag par byed/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las lha byung ba'i

le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas lag na rdo rje 'dzin/ /bzhengs te thal sbyar thub pa la/ /phyag 'tshal phyogs su 'khod nas ni/ /gsang ba bstod nas tshig 'di gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rgyal dbang po/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang kun/ /

rang rang gnas nas gshegs nas byon/ /'gro ba thugs brtse chen po yis/ /snying po byin brlabs ldan la gsol/ /rmad du byung ba'i snying po la/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras bcas dang / /rig pa 'dzin rnams mthun par dgyes/ /'on kyang 'gro rnams bzung ba dang / /

dngos grub thams cad myur ba dang / /snying po mthu dang ldan pa'i phyir/ /mgon po thugs rje che rnams kyi/ /byin brlabs ldan pa rtsa ba'i sngags/ /'dren pa de ring bshad du gsol/ /rig sngags nyi ma zla ba'i 'od/ /rtsa ba'i sngags kyis sprin bral byed/ /'gro la thugs

brtse mdzad pa dang / /bdag la phan pa'i don slad du/ /rgyal ba mya ngan kun bral ba/ /rtsa ba'i gzungs sngags bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ /sdig pa kun myur sgrol bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /sku

gsung thugs kyi thugs rje las/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang seng ge'i sgra/ /rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ /na maHAr+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA /o~M a ka Te bi ka Te/ ni ka Te/ Ti

ka Te/ ka TaM ka Te/ ka ro Te bI r+ya swA hA/ yon tan ye shes tshogs rnams kun/ /rig sngags 'dis ni nges par bskyed/ /khyad par du ni mdzen dal/ /rtswa las byung ba'i me bzhin no/ /rtog ldan rnam shes brgyad kyi gzhi/ /sbyor phyir maN+Dal lha ma pa brgyad/ /ba ser

skya yi bdud rtsis byugs/ /yan lag bcu gnyis mgor bcas pa'i/ /sngags grangs byin gyis brlabs byugs nas/ /lhag ma yan lag thig ler bya/ /cung zad lce la myang bas ni/ /dus dus sum brgya drug cu'i tshad/ /nyi ma grangs kyis dag nas ni/ /lo gcig dus su

rtogs ldan 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa che/ /dpal bskyed 'tshe ba bzlog pa yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /mgon po yid bzhin 'khor lo yi/ /rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA

ya/ na maHAr+yA ba lo ki te shwa rwa ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M tsakra warti bad+ma tsin+ta ma Ni dzA la ma hA pad+me ru ru tiSh+tha dz+wA la A kar+Sha ya hrIHhU~M phaT swA hA/ 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /glo bur gnod pa bsal ba'i phyir/ /bdun phrag

sngags grangs dang mnyam pa'i/ /yungs kar ser po brgya rtsa brgyad/ /rang gi lus sam yan lag la/ /mchod dang bcas pas gdags par bya/ /de la yang yang gsol ba btab/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ /khams gsum dbang du bya ba yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms zhugs nas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /mgon po pad+ma gar dbang gi/ /rtsa ba'i gsang sngags 'di gsungs so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHAr+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ sarba satwA bA sa nA gA d+hi pa

ti ni/ /na maHsarba satwA bi sa na/ A ha ra Ni/ na maHsarba satwA ba yo d+ha ra NA ya/ na maHstaM b+ha pra sha ma nA ya/ na maHsarba satwA bo d+hi tsit+ta tsi ka ti sa na ka rA ya/ na maHsarba satwA ba na d+ha na ts+tshe da na ka rA ya/ na maHsarba satwA duHkha bi mo k+Sha Na ka rA ya/ na maHsarba an+ta kA ra ba'i d+ha nA ma kA ra/

na maHsarba bid+yA d+ha ra rA dzA pra sha pra sta ye/ ma hA yo ga yo gI shwa rA ya/ ha sa ha s+ya nA ya/ na ma skr-i twA i daM Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra mu khong gir+N+Na ri shi bi ri dA/ nA ga yak+Sha rA k+Sha sa/ shAkya brah+ma lo ka pA lA ya/ biSh+Na ma he shwa ra/ nA rA ya Na skan d+ha/ ku ber/ a su re n+d+ra/ ma tr-i ga Na/

na ma skr-i twA/ badzra badzra khu Na sa hr-i da ya/ ha ya grI ba nA ma ya ma hr-i da ya m+nga/ war+t+ya Sh+yA mi/ a ba pra me yo ta sA d+ha ka na a ba ha na/ sarba pi nA ya kaM a mo g+haM/ sarba karmA b+hi Shiny+tsa/ bi nA ya kaM/ tad+ya thA/ o~M ta ru la/ ta nu ta la/ bi ta ru la/ sarba bi Sha ka ka/ sarba bud+d+ha bid ni/

pra dzA ba ti ta/ a na la bi s+phu li ka/ aT+Ta hA sa ke shwa rA ya/ a to pa pra bi tA ya/ badzra khu ra ni rge ti ta/ tsa li ta pra pu da ta la/ badzrod shIn+taM ta ti/ si ta ma du to ga ta pra na ma Na pa kA ra ba ra duSh+TaM/ bid+yA ka ma ga saM b+ha k+Sha na kA ra/ sarba bid+yau ba twa he sha kA ra/ pa ra ma shAn+tiM kA ra/ bud+d+ha bo d+hA

ya ma ti/ b+ha ga bA na ha ya grI ba sarba bid+yA hr-i da ya/ mA par ta yi Sh+ya mi/ kha tra kha dra/ ma hA ro Ta/ ma na traM rak+Sha rak+Sha At+ma swa sti taM man+taM/ sid+d+ha sA d+ha/ sarba karma su me/ sid+d+he sid+d+he/ de hi de hi/ A be sha a be sha/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ sarba gra he Shu a pra te ha ta/ d+hu na d+hu na/ bi d+hu na

bi d+hu na/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ sarba pa ra kra ma kr-i tA n+t+ra gra/ ka khor da du ra laM g+hi ta hi ba shi ka bi shi ka ta/ sA sha diSh+TA/ bi Sha tsUr+Na yo ga a b+hi tsa ra/ ba shI/ ka ra NaHsid+d+ha any+dza na/ tsa ku mo ha na tsin+ta/ piM she sa na kA ra/ nir+ya a pa ra br-i Sha ka ra na/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ ma

hA bo d+hi sa twa/ rin d+ha di sha na~M/ sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaHsarba satwA nAM/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mA ma nu twa d+harma saM b+ha a nu dz+nyA taM me karma shI g+h+raM/ ku ru ku ru phaT/ ha ya grI ba phaT/ badzra daM Sh+T+ro ta ka Ta b+hA ya pa ra se nA phaT/ ye ke tsita mA ma e hid shi go pa kA ya kra min to/ man+t+ra yan+t+ra sa man

ti/ dza pa ya ri dzu hu ti/ ka khor da ku rban di nAM/ sarba dza mu khen+d+ra pra ta na tA ya phaT/ na maHsarba duSh+Ta gra ho ta sA da nA ya ha ya grI ba sid d+h+ya n+tu me man+t+ra pa dA ni swA hA/ o~M a mr-i tod b+ha bA ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ na maHsarba sa twAM sh+tsa sid d+h+ya na tu/ me man+t+ra pa dA Ni swA hA/ gang zhig klus non

spyi la ni/ /dung gi me tog sngags stong gis/ /byin gyis brlabs nas gu gul bdug /lus la thogs na legs par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ /thogs med sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje

las/ /mgon po thugs rje mi bshol ba'i/ /rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHA r+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ na maHsarba b+hi ma tsa ka raM/ sarba rog pra sha ma na ka raM/ /sarba byA

da na b+ha da ka ra~M/ uSh+T+rak+Sha Na pa dis sa twe b+h+yaHtA rA saM mya ka tA rA NaM/ da sha di ka bo d+hi satwe b+h+yaHna maHsaM myak+saM bud+d+ha ko TI NAM/ a he na ma s+t+ri da Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra shud+d+ha d+hA ra Ni/ ma hA ru Ni kA ya a gra bI sh+ya ti/ mahA kA ru Ni kA ya/ a gra nA ma dz+wa la sa ti kA ra/ ma hA kA ru NA byu pa sa man+ta ha ra na

tu/ tad+ya thA/ oM dza Ta dza Ta/ dzi Ti dzi Ti/ dzu Tu dzu Tu/ ra ra ra ra/ ri ri ri ri/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ ma hA saMgra ha/ a nu ha raM tu/ e h+ye hi sa na d+hA ya/ e h+ye hi/ tsa ta tsa ta/ tsi ti tsi ti/ tsu tu tsu tu/ sarba

bo d+hi satwa/ pra Ni d+ha na gr-ih+Na/ kA ra a nu sa na d+hA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sa b+hu ba e h+ye hi/ ra la ra la/ ru lu ru lu/ d+h+ya na bi mok+Sha sa mA d+hi/ sa ma ba tI b+hish+tsa ra/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ tsa la tsa la/ tsi li tsi li/ tsu lu tsu lu/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ e h+ye e h+ye/ bud+d+ho bud+d+ho/ bud+d+ha sat+yen/

d+harma sat+yen/ saM ga sat+yen/ o~M Te/ s+thA Te s+thA sarba ma hA mai tri b+hu ni pa ran tu/ ma hA kA ru Na me g+haM mA ma sarba rA ga ni ba ra yan+tu/ bu na bu na/ bi bu na bi bu na/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pram tha/ o~M Ta s+tho Ta s+tha/ e h+ye e h+ye/ mA ma sarba sha pu yan+tu/ karma bi sho d+ha ya/ ma hA kA

ru ni kA ya/ ma hA pad+ma nA dA ya/ pad+ma a pA ya swA hA/ shwe ta Adz+nyA u pa bi d+hA ya swA hA/ ka ru ri ni swA hA/ shu ba dz+nyA+e swA hA/ tsakra NAM swA hA/ ya me ye swA hA/ oM da tse bi bud+d+he b+h+yaHswA hA/ saM s+phe tshe b+h+yoHbud+d+he b+h+yaHswA hA/ a du pa du ke b+h+yoHbyA d+hi de swA hA/ bi de ke b+h+yo byA te b+h+yaHswA hA/ bai d+ha de b+h+yoH

byA de b+h+yaHswA hA/ swa na ni pradz+nyA+e ke b+h+yoHbyA de b+h+yaHswA hA/ b+hU mi aM ti ri ka sha tsa re b+h+yo byA d+he b+h+yaHswA hA/ tad+ya thA/ o~M na tra Ta ta T+ra/ tri ti tri ti/ tu tu tu tu/ nA ma ma sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaHsa a pa tra be b+h+yaHrak+Sha rak+Sha ku ru swA hA/ gra sa gra sa swA hA/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ ha na ha na/ da

ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ na maHAr+yA pa lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ Adz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ sha ra ka ri'i sa bon las/ /stong du bzlas nas dri chu dang / /lhan cig skrangs la byugs pas ni/ /lhog nad drag po 'joms par byed/ /

de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ /rig sngags sbod gtong gzhom pa yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /mgon po don yod zhags pa yi/ /rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so/ /na ma s+t+rai yad+h+ra a nu ga ta pra tiSh+Thi te b+h+yaHsarba bud+d+hA bo d+hi

satwe b+h+yaHna maHpra t+ye ka bud+d+ha Ar+ya shrA pa ka saM g+he b+h+yo a tI ta anA ga ta pra t+yAta pan ne b+h+yaHna maHsaM myak+ga tA nAM/ na maHsaM myaka pra ti pan+na nAM/ na maHshA ra dA tI pu trA ya ma hA ma ta ye/ na maHArgya mai tre ya pra mu khe b+h+yo/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa saM g+he b+h+yaHna maHsu pra tiSh+Tha ta shai len+d+ra rA dza pra mu khe b+h+yaHsarba

ta thA ga te b+h+yaHa ra ha da b+h+yaHsaM myak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yo b+ha ga bang b+h+yaHna maHsu par+Na par+Na su pra ti b+hA sa bi na rti he shwa ra rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsiM ha bi krI Di ta rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHAr+ya a mi tA b+hA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsu pra tiSh+Thi ta/ ma Ni kU Ta rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsa man+ta ra smyud

ga ta shrI Ta rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bi pa sh+yi ne ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHshi khi ne ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bi shwa b+hu je ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHkra kuts+tsha na dA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHka na ka mun ye ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHkA sh+ya pA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maH

shAkya mu na ye ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M mu ne mu ne ma hA mun ye swA hA/ o~M sa se ma me ma hA sa me rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sarba satwAM sh+tsa sarba pA paM pra sha ma ne swA hA/ na maHsu pa ri kI rti nA ma d+he yA ya shri ye ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHsa man+ta a wa b+hA sa bi dzi ta saM grA ma

shri ye ta thA ga tA yu/ na maHin+d+ra ke tu d+h+wa dza shri ye ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo rat+na pra b+hA se shwa ra rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo a pra ti ha ta b+hai Sha dz+ya rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bi krAn+ta gA mi ne ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsaM g+hA ya/ na ma a tI ta a nA ga ta

pra t+yud ban+ne b+h+yaHsarba bud+d+he b+ho d+hi sa twe b+h+yo/ b+ha ga bad b+h+yaH/ tad+ya thA/ smr-i ti bar+d+ha ni/ ma ti bar+d+ha ni/ ga ti bar+d+ha ni/ d+h+r-i ti bar+d+ha ni/ pradz+nyA bar+d+ha ni/ pra ti b+hA na bar+d+ha ni/ d+h+yA na bar+d+ha ni/ sa mar+th+ya bar+d+ha ni/ bi pA sh+ya nA bar+d+ha ni/ sarba bo d+hi bak+Sha d+harma bar+d+ha ni/ sa ka la bud+d+ha d+harma pa ri pU ra NI

ye swA hA/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shU rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo ma hA s+thA ma prAp+tA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ e b+h+yo na maskr-i twA i daM Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra mu khod gi rna a mo

g+ha pA sha rA dza nA ma hr-i da yaM ta thA ga tA saM mu khaM b+hA Shi taM ma hA tAM pa ra Sha ma d+h+ye a ha mi dA nI mA brta ta yi Sh+ya mi sid+d+h+ya na mu me man+ta pa dAHsarba kA rA Ni/ sarba b+ha ye b+h+yo/ ma ma sarba satwA nAny+tsa rak+Sha b+ha ba tu/ tad+ya thA/ o~M tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma ra ma ra/ mi ri mi ri/ mu ru mu

ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ pi ri pi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ mahA pad+ma hasta/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hA shud+d+ha satwa/ bud+d+h+ya bud+d+h+ya/ bo d+ha bo d+ha/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ bo d+ha ya

bo d+ha ya/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ pa ra ma shud+d+ha satwa/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA s+thA ma prAp+ta/ tsa la tsa la/ sany+tsa la sany+tsa la/ bi tsa la bi tsa la/ pra tsa la pra tsa la/ e Ta Ta/ e Ta Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/

ta ra ta ra/ ti ri ti ri/ tu ru tu ru/ e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ ma hA pa shu pa ti be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ pa ra pa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ma ra ma ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ hA hA hI hI/ hU hU/ o~M kA ra prah+ma be Sha

d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ na ra na ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ha ra ha ra/ rasmi sha ta sa ha sra pra ti maN+Di ta sha rI ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ta pa ta pa/ b+hA sa b+hA sa/ b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/ b+ha ga wa na so ma/ A di t+ya/ ya ma ba ru Na/ ku be

ra/ brah+men+d+ra/ bA yu/ ag+ni/ d+ha na da/ de pa r-i Shi ga Na a b+h+ya ra tsi ta tsa ra Na/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ g+hu ru g+hu ru/ sa nad ku mA ra/ ru dra/ bA sa la/ biSh+Nu/ d+ha na da/ bA yu/ ag+ni/ r-i Shi/ nA ya ka/ bi nA ya ka /ba hu bi bi d+ha be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha

ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ tha ra tha ra/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/ ya ra ya ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ pa ra pa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra dA ya ka /sa man+taM a wa lo ki ta/ bi lo ki ta/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ tri b+hu ba ne shwa ra/ sarba gu Na sa ma

a laM kr-i ta/ a ba lo ki te shwa ra/ mu hu mu hu/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM sarba satwAMsh+tsa/ sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaH/ sarbo pa dra be b+h+yaH/ sarbo pa sarge b+h+yaH/ sarba gra he b+h+yaH/ sarba byA d+hi b+h+yaH/ sarba bi She b+h+yaH/ sarba dz+wa re b+h+yaH/ e baM/ ba na d+ha ba na d+ha na/ tA Ta na/ tardza na/ rA dza/ taska

ra/ ag+ni/ u dka /bi Sha/ shas+t+ra pa ri mo tsa ka /ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ in+d+ri ya/ ba la/ bo d+h+yaM ga /tsa tu ra/ Ar+ya sat+ya saM pra kA sha ka ta pa ta pa/ ta ma ta ma/ da ma da ma/ sa ma sa ma/ ma sa ma

sa/ /d+ha ma d+ha ma/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA/ ma hA ta mo an d+ha ka ra bi d+ha ma na/ Sha Ta pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra ka /ma la ma la/ mi li mi li/ mu lu mu lu/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ Tha Tha Tha Tha/ Ti Ti Ti Ti/ Tu Tu Tu Tu/ Thi Thi Thi Thi/ Thu Thu Thu Thu/ e ne ya tsarma kr-i ta pa ri ke ra/ e h+ye

hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka I shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ ma hA b+hu ta ga Na saM b+hany+dza ka/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ pa ra pa ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ba ra ba ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ki Ti ki Ti/ ku Tu ku Tu/ ma Ta ma Ta/ ma hA bi shud+d+ha bi Sha ya ni bA si na/ ma

hA kA ru Ni ka shwe ta ya dz+nyo pa bI ta/ rat+na mu ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ sarba dz+nyA shi sa si kr-i ta dza TA mu ku Ta/ ma hA ang b+hu ta/ ka ma la a laM kr-i ta ke ra ta la d+h+yA na sa mA d+hi/ bi mok+Sha a pra kaM bya/ ba hu satwa san+ta ti pa ti pA tsa ka /ma hA kA ru Ni ka sarba karma A wa ra Na ba sho d+ha ka /sarba dz+nyA dz+nyA

na ba ri pU ra ka /sarba byA d+hi pa ri mo tsa ka /sarba satwa A shA pa ri pU ra ka /sarba satwa sa mA shwA sa na ka ra na moHstu te swA hA/ a mo g+hA ya swA hA/ a mo g+ha pA shA ya swA hA/ a dzi tA ya swA hA/ a pa rA dzi tA ya swA hA/ a mi tA b+hA ya swA hA/ a mi tA b+ha su tA ya swA hA/ ma ra sa

n+ya pra marda nA ya swA hA/ a b+ha yA ya swA hA/ a b+ha ya pra dA ya swA hA/ dza yA ya swA hA/ bi dza yA ya swA hA/ dza ya bi dza yA ya swA hA/ ba ra dA ya swA hA/ ba ra pra dA ya swA hA/ a kA la mr-i t+yu pra sha ma nA ya swA hA/ i dany+tsa me karma ku ru na mo stu te swA hA/ o~M ra Na ra Na hU~M phaT

swA hA/ o~M dza ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M dza dzriM dzU swA hA/ o~M hU~M dza ya swA hA/ o~M hrIHtrai lo kya bi dza ya a mo g+ha pA sha a pra ti ha ta hrIHhaHhU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M ba su ba ti swA hA/ o~M A ro li ka swA hA/ o~M ba hu le ba hu le swA hA/ o~M A ro li ka hrIHhrIHhU~M phaT swA hA/ ni ya ta

a ni ya ta be da nI ya a shu b+ha s+ya me b+ha ga bA na karma No a she Sha taHk+Sha yaM ku ru swA hA/ o~M pad+ma hastA ya swA hA/ o~M bud+d+ha d+harma saM g+hA ya swA hA/ rabs chang thod par ro bsregs sa/ /yungs kar ser po dri chur bcas/ /bskyed de myu gus sngags stong brjod/ /'bras bu la ni

khri brjod bya/ /lus la thogs na byad stems sogs/ /nad dang gdon rnams myur du sel/ /gzhan dag las rnams gang la yang / /bdun bdun grangs kyi sngags kyis sbyar/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ /ltos 'gro bas ni rab rgyal ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms zhugs nas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /mgon po ha la ha la yi/ /rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA ya/ sarba su re shwa rA ya/ na maHAr+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/

ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo ma hA s+thA ma prAp+ta/ Ar+ya mai tri Ar+ya many+dzu shrI/ Ar+ya badzra pA Ni a d+hi kaM /bo d+hi satwa ma hA satwe b+h+yaHa te na maHkr-i to b+ha ga bA na/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra taM hr-i da ya sarba karma pa daHsarba gra ho ts+tshe da na ka raM/ b+ha ba a ma ra Ni bi nA sha ka pa shI taM/ s+yAd ya the daM he bo d+hi

sa twa/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ bri ya bo d+hi satwa/ he hA lo Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ ba ra ma mai tri tsit+ti ta/ tsit+ta kA ru Ni ka /ku ru ku ru/ k+Sha ma ga ma bi haM ga ma bi ya ti/ bi dza yan+ti ma hA bi dza yan+ti/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ tsa yan+t+ra man+t+ra/ na mo me h+ya d+hi/ sarba satwA pA

ya/ pra da sa/ ha ra ha ra/ ha ri b+ha h+ya nod b+ha/ bA bA bA bA/ b+hA ba nA ga/ ku ru ku ru/ tu ru tu ru/ g+hu ru g+hu ru/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ su pra si d+ha/ satwa ma bi ma la/ pha la pha la/ mUrte/ Ar+yA ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ pa ra ma kA ru Ni ka ru kr-iSh+Na dz+nyA na d+ha/

dza TA mu ku Ta bi laM ba/ pra laM ba/ tsa le tsa le/ ma la ma la/ ka la ka la/ ha la ha la/ ga la ga la/ ta la ta la/ da la da la/ tu lu tu lu/ hu lu hu lu/ hi li hi li/ he bo d+hi satA/ na ma s+t+ya d+h+rA nu/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ hrIHku ru ku ru/ hr-i da ya/ a n+ya sma ra/ sa ma

ya a nu sma ra/ dzA ti a nu sma ra/ i daM me ka r+yaM ku ru/ ma nor thaM me/ pa ri pU ra ya/ sid+d+h+yan+tu/ me man+t+ra pa dA ni swA hA/ snga bar khrus byas gos gtsang gyon/ /bcom ldan spyan sngar nyin re bzhin/ /ba lci sa la ma lhung pas/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa ni/ /bcu gsum

bzlas nas byug par bya/ /lhag mas nad rnams thams cad la/ /byugs pa tsam gyis sos par nges/ /zla ba drug gis bdud rnams zhi/ /'dod pa thams cad skongs gyur te/ /mtshams med lnga byas mis kyang 'grub/ /gal te grub par ma gyur na/ /

bdag gis mtshams med las byas te/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas kun bsrungs yin/ /snying rjes snying rje can 'grub 'gyur/ /sdang bas khro ba grub gyur te/ /rtag pa'i gnas 'dod blo gros can/ /rnam par mi rtog btang snyoms kyis/ /'dod pa kun 'grub zhen pas byin/ /

yid la byed pas 'ching bar 'gyur/ /se'u po che yi lcug ma la/ /ro bsregs thal ba khri phrag bdun/ /sngags nas gtor bas char ches pa/ /char pa myur du 'chad par byed/ /dri chu gla rtsir bcas pas ni/ /sbrul gyi gdug pa sel bar byed/ /lto 'phye'i rigs dang

sbrang rgod sogs/ /'jigs pa rnams ni 'grib ba'i phyir/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ /shes rab rnam grol zhes bya pa'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /mgon po pad+ma rgyan lung gi/ /rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di

gsungs so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ na ma Ar+ya a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/ na mo ma hA s+thA ma prap+tA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma

hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo bi pu la bi ma la/ su pra ti pu la/ sUr+ya sha ta yaM/ a saM khe ya/ sU r+ya sha ta sa ha sra/ a d+hi ke ra/ e b+ha pa te mUrta ye/ ma hA ma Ni mu ku Ta kaN+Da la/ a laM kA ra d+hA ra NI/ b+ha ga ba te pad+ma mA le/ sarba lo ka a pA ya sha ma na ye/ bi bi d+ha

mu khas ma be sha /A bi sha sarba satwa pa ri mo tsa kA ya/ b+hu ra b+hU ba swA hA/ ma hA lo ki shwa rA ya/ na ma s+tha mi ra ba tra bi nA sha ka /rA ga be sha mo hA dz+wa la sha ma ka sha ma sha na kA ra/ rak+Sha ka sarba a b+ha ya durga ti pra sha ma na kA ra/ sarba sa ma sha na kA ra/ sarba A shA

pa ri pU ru ka /sarba ta thA ga tA sarbaM d+ha na kA ra e h+ye hi ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da pad+ma a ba lo ka saM bud+d+ho/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ dza Ta mu ku Ta/ a laM kr-i ta shi ro ma Ni/ ka na kA rA dza ta/ badzra bai DUr+ya a laM kr-i ta sha rI ra a ma ta ta dza na ka ma a laM kr-i te pra b+hA ra Na sha ta sa ha sra a bi

la sha ta kA ya/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da/ bi daM kha da ma/ bi nA sha ya/ bi nA sha ya/ ma ha yan+t+ra ma kle sha ka pa ta/ a ba bo d+hi b+ha/ bo d+hi yaM tra/ g+ha ra tsa ra/ ka pra ma tha na ka ra/ pu ru Sha pad+ma pu ru Sha/ saM pra ra Na/ pu ru Sha siM ha/ bi ra bi ra/ dza su ta na ta Da ba ri

br-i ta/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ sa ma sa ma/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ pra sha sa ma ya/ pra sha sa ma ya/ ki ri ki ri/ b+hi bi ri/ b+hi bi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bi d+hi ri bi d+hi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+dza muny+dza/ d+yu nu d+yu nu/ bi d+yu

bi d+yu/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ga ya ga ya/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ ha sa ha sa/ pra hA sa pra hA sa/ nA ga bi bi d+ha ke sha se sa na/ ha ra ha ra/ saM ha ra saM ha ra/ du ru du ru/ ma hA maM g+ha la sha ra Ni/ sha ta pra se/ ka ba a pa b+hA sa te bi bi d+ha pA sa na sha ma ka sha sa ka /rA ga kA ma hA bo d+hi

satwa/ b+ha ra b+ha ra swA hA/ thub po she dang shu dge la/ /khri phrag bzlas nas 'thungs bas ni/ /shes rab chen po 'phel bar byed/ /nad la mthun pa'i sman dang sbyar/ /pad+ma'i rtsa ba ka rar bcas/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig yang na bdun/ /sngags brjod snga bar mid par bya/ /

de yang dbyangs snyan shes rab 'phel/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ /dgongs pa bla med ces bya ba'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /mgon po rdo rje chen po yi/ /rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/

na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ bai ro tsa na pra b+hA rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/ sarba Adz+nyA ya/ an+d+ha kA ra mA ma yi tra/ tad+ya thA/ oM sA d+ha ni sA d+ha ni/ sid+d+he

sid+d+hi/ sid+d+he d+hA ra/ b+ha ga ba te/ pa raM pa ra/ kle sha da mi na/ a dz+nyA she Sha ma Ni sha ma ya/ sarba pA pa bi shud+d+he/ d+harma ni d+ha ma ni/ mA la dz+nyA go tsa re a paM go tsa ri ni sA shaM mur+d+hi/ su kha ra pra te/ sarba kle sha da ba ni/ bi d+ha ma ni/ bi d+ha ma ni/ bi d+ha ma ni/ bi nA sha bi nA sha /bi nA sha

ya bi nA sha ya/ b+ha ga ba te/ bu ra sa bi ma la ba d+hi/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ bi sa ra bi sa ra/ A dz+nyAM ma i hi sa hA srA NAM/ tsit+ta na kA rA ma/ a ba ra na k+ShA ba yak+ShA ba yA mi ta su b+hU ta bi shA ya/ pA sha bi da ni pA ra mi tA b+hA dz+nyA na go tsa re/ pA sha sha ba ti/

sha sha mA le ni kA ra Na go tsa re/ ma hA dz+nyA na a b+hi She ka ma ti su bi ni sh+tsi ta da d+ha/ he he b+ha ga ba te ma hA kA ru Ni ka ya/ ku ru ku ru/ bi shi d+ha ma ba na/ mA ma sarba satwA b+ho ma hA kA ru No ta sA d+ha ke na/ sany+tsa sany+tsa saM brta ya/ sam+b+ha la pra ro ha ya me/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ bi dza ya ba ri shud+d+ha ya/

a mu ka bi ku ru bi/ dza ya na/ sa ra sa ra/ me g+ha ga te/ mA mA mA/ bo d+hi tsit+taM sa ma bud+d+he ma na san+tu She/ bo d+hi mi ri kA ra ni/ bud+d+ha bo d+hi prA de/ nA ra ka pre ta ti r+ya ka ga ti duHkha gu la ni/ de ba ma nu Sh+ya ga ti saM bi da ni pa ga to kle sha sarbA nurda d+harma/ pa ri pU ra Ni badzra d+harma sid+d+ha n+tu me man+ta pa dA ni swA hA/

snga bar langs nas khrus byas te/ /skyil krung mnyam gzhag phyag rgya can/ /yid kyis phyag 'tshal nyi shu gcig /rdo rje chos las dad pas brjod/ /brgyad dang bcu bzhi bco lnga la/ /gos gsar gyon nas gso sbyong blang / /me tog tsan+dan dkar sogs mtshod/ /don grub sdig

sel shes rab 'phel/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ /bdud rnams 'joms pa rdo rje yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwA rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA

ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ na mo b+ha ga ba te a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a r+ha te saM myak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ ha ri ha ri/ bid+da na d+ha ma ka /bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ i la mi li/ tsi la tsi

li/ tu le tu le/ ku ru me ku ru me/ si ri si ri/ bi si ri/ tsa ra ya/ be sha re/ gau re/ g+ha na d+ha re/ tra mi Ni/ ma taM gi /puk+ka si/ ka Ta ya/ mA la tsaN+DA li/ hu ru mA li ni/ tsi li tsi li/ gra na sau mad r+sha ne ku ru/ tsan+d+ra mu khi/ la g+hu ma Na ya ma ti/ Ar+ya dak+Shi Na bud+d+he/ sarba

bid+yA nAM/ mA ma pra sA d+ha ni/ sarba bid+yA nAM/ I shwa ri swA hA/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ sarba a pa ri pU ra ka na/ tad+ya thA/ oM ha ha ha/ ma ma ma/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ hi ri hi ri/ shAn+te pra shAt+ne/ sarba bA pa k+Sha yaM ka ri/ a ba lo kA ya kA ru Ni ka /bod+hi tsit+ta ma na si ku ru ba ya lo kA ya/

mA ma sma ra sma ra/ sa man+ta ya pUrbe/ sat+t+ya a d+hi Sh+ThA na kri taM te na sat+ya na/ sa tsi ba tsi nA/ sarba ak+Sha mi/ pa ri pU ra ya/ bud+d+ho k+She tra me/ ba ri sho d+ha ya/ ma me kash+tsa/ pi he tha nor+tha bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ShA naM swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ o~M dze te dze te/ ma hA dze te yaM/ ma hA dze te yaM/ mA ma kA ya/ dush+tsa ri staM b+ha/ b+ha ga

dush+tsa ri staM b+ha/ ma no dush+tsa ri staM b+ha/ d+ha ri ta tra staM b+ha/ ta ta sarbaM k+ShA pA ya/ A lo ka ya/ sarba ta thA ga tA/ d+ha ri ShA nAM tsi ma hA biSh+kaM k+Sha mid pod sed d+ha ri ShA NAM/ ma d+hu ma d+hu/ a ba b+hA/ sa me d+ha ri ShA NAM/ sarba ma ku sha la a b+hi ba ra daM da na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/

na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sma ra pra ti dz+nyA ma hA satwa sid+d+h+yan+tu me man+t+ra ba deHswA hA/ sngags 'di gur gum tshan+dan gyis/ /gro ga la bris sku'i mchod rten/ /sku gdung bcas par gzhug par bya/ /yang na sku gdung dang bcas

pa'i/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang sku la gdags/ /tshes brgyad nas ni nya yi bar/ /bum pa mchod pa brgyad bshams te/ /dri dang kha dog sna tshogs pa'i/ /'o thug zho dang 'bras chan mar/ /tsan+dan dkar po dri ga bur/ /gtor ma dkar dang dmar bcas pa'o/ /

gtso bo'i mdun du dpe med sa/ /g.yas su dung can 'jigs sam g.yon/ /sna ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad/ /gtor zhing dus gsum mchod de bkru/ /sdig sbyang rmi lam 'od du 'bar/ /bdud rnams zlog par byed pa la/ /rtse gsum sor brgyad tshad la ni/ /thod pa

skam po ser drug ste/ /dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /seng ldeng yu ba khru gang pa/ /de yi rten yang sor drug ste/ /de ni zur brgyad ldan pa la/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che/ /pad+ma ral gri lcags kyu mda'/ /mdung rnams g.yas nas bskor bar dgod/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig

brjod bya ste/ /mtshan mo sngas su gzugs par bya/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ /dug gi chogs rnams 'joms pa yi/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /rje btsun mgrin pa sngon po yi/ /rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo
