ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ sarba ban+d+ha ts+tshe da na ka rA ya/ sarba pA pa sa mu dro ts+tsho Sha Na ka rA ya/ sarba byA d+hi pra sha ma Na ka rA ya/ sarba i t+yu pa dra ba bi nA sha na ka rA ya/ sarba b+ha ye Shu trA NA ya ta s+ya na ma skr-i taM/ i maM Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra ha ba nI

la kaN+Tha nA ma hr-i da ya mA brta yiSh+yA mi sarba ar+tha sA d+ha naM shu b+ha tse ta naM/ sarba satwA nAM/ pA pa mArga bi sho d+ha kaM/ ta d+ya thA/ a ba lo ki lo ka ma ti/ lo ka ga ti/ e h+ye hi/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ he bo d+hi sa twa/ he ma hA bo d+hi satwa/ he pri ya bo d+hi satwa/ he ma hA kA ru Ni ka /sma ra hr-i da yi/ e h+ye hi/ Ar+yA

ba lo ki te shwa ra/ pa ra ma mai tri tsit+ta kA ru Ni ka /ku ru ku ru karmaM/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bid+yAM/ de hi de hi me/ a rang+ga mang+g+ga ma/ bi haM ga mi ha sid+d+ha/ yo ge shwa ra/ hu du hu du/ bIr+ya n+te/ ma hA bIr+yan+te/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hA ra Ne shwa ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ bi ma la a ma la mUrte/ Ar+yA ba

lo ki te shwa ra kr-iSh+NA dzi na mu ku Ta a laM kr-i ta sha rI ra lam+ba pra lam+ba pi lam+ba/ ma hA sid+d+ha shud+d+ha d+ha ra/ ba la ba la/ ma hA ba la/ ma la ma la ma hA ma la/ dz+wa la dz+wa la ma hA dz+wa la/ kr-iSh+Na pak+Sha kr-iSh+Na bar+N+Na kr-iSh+Na pA sha ni r+g+hA ta na/ he pad+ma ha sta/ dza ya kA ra/ ni shA tsa re shwa ra/ kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ta ya dz+nyo pa bI

ta/ e h+ye hi bA rA ha mu khi/ tri pu ra da ha ne shwa ra/ nA rA yA Na/ ba la rU pa be Sha d+ha ri/ he nI la kaN+Tha/ he ma hA ha la ha la/ bi Sha ni rdza ta/ lo ka s+ya/ rA ga bi Sha nA sha nan/ dwe Sha bi Sha nA sha naM/ mo ha bi Sha nA sha na ni rmo k+Sha Na/ hu lu hu lu/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ mu hu mu hu/ ha la ha

la/ ma hA pad+ma na b+hi/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ bud+h+ya bud+h+ya/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ tawa nI la kaN+Tha/ e h+ye hi/ bA ma s+thi ta saM ha mu kha/ ha sa ha sa/ muny+dza muny+dza/ ma hA aT+TA T+Ta ni/ r+NA di ne/ e h+ye hi/ b+ho b+ho ma hA sid+d+ha/ yo gI shwa ra/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha bA tsaM/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/

bi d+yAM sma ra s+t+waM he b+ha ga bAn/ lo ka bi lo ka s+t+waM/ ta thA ga tAM/ da dA hi me dar+Sha NAM/ pra sAd+ha ya me swA hA/ sid d+hA ya swA hA/ ma hA sid d+hA ya swA hA/ sid+d+ha yo gi shwa rA ya swA hA/ nI la kaN+ThA ya swA hA/ bA rA ha mu khA ya swA hA/ si haM mu khA ya swA hA/ ma hA na ra siM haM mu khA ya swA hA/ sid+d+ha

bid+yA d+ha rA ya swA hA/ pad+ma ha stA ya swA hA/ ma hA pad+ma ha stA ya swA hA/ badzra ha stA ya swA hA/ ma hA badzra hastA ya swA hA/ kr-iSh+Na sarba kr-i ta yadz+nyo ba bI tA ya swA hA/ ma hA kA la mu ku Ta d+ha rA ya swA hA/ tsakra A yu d+ha d+ha rA ya swA hA/ shaM kha shab+da nir+NA da na ka rA ya swA hA/ bo d+ha na ka rA ya swA hA/ bA ma

skan+d+ha dai sha s+thi ta kr-iSh+NA dzi nA ya swA hA/ bA ma hastA byA g+h+ra tsarma ni bA sa nA ya swA hA/ lo ke shwa rA ya swA hA/ ma hA lo ke shwa ra ya swA hA/ sarba sid+d+he shwa rA ya swA hA/ rak+sha rak+Sha mAM swA hA/ ku ru rak+Sha mUrti nAM swA hA/ na mo Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru

Ni kA ya/ sid+d+h+ya n+tu me man+t+ra pa deHswA hA/ smug bu me len sbur len dang / /shel dang bai DUr+ya ka ra ma/ /gser gyi snod du khur bcas ba/ /maN+Dal dbus bzhag sngags khri brjod/ /mug khri rdo yi kong bur ni/ /chur bcas snga dro sngar byas nas/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags brjod

do/ /khong du 'thungs pas dbyig dug dang / /sbyar dug lhan cig skyes dug dang / /bza' nyes tsam yang sel 'gyur na/ /dug rigs gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /dogs pa'i the tshom mi bya'o/ /dad can shes rab ldan pa'i mi/ /rtsa ba'i gsang sngags gang la yang / /nan

tan rtse gcig tu brjod na/ /de yis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /gang zhig dad pa'i lcags kyu dang / /blo yi ra bar ldan pa la/ /lha klu 'bum phrag mthus skyob cing / /dkar po dge ba kun slong sems/ /byang chub rin chen gter thob par/ /sngags kyi mthus ni

mdzad pa ste/ /sngags la nyes dad med pa la/ /bstan na rang nyid nyams par 'gyur/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las rigs kyi khyad par gyi sngags byung ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas

yang dag bshad bya ba/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bsdus pa'i dngos/ /'jig rten mgon po sa bcu'i dbang / /stobs bcu rgyas pa'i rang bzhin can/ /pha rol phyin bcu lhun grub pa/ /sa bcu gcig tu rdzogs nas kyang / /phyogs bcu kun du khyab mdzad pa'i/ /bcu gcig

pa yi mtshan nyid nyid/ /bsod nams skal bar ldan pa'i mis/ /rang gi lus la sngags dgod bya/ /sngags dang bcas pa'i lus la ni/ /sred med bus kyang mi tshugs na/ /'jig rten gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /byad dang sha za ro langs dang / /'byung po mtshon dang grib gnon

dang / /ltas ngan rnams ni myur du sel/ /bla ma las byung rim pas ni/ /myur du bla med byang chub 'gyur/ /bla ma'i lung dang bral bas ni/ /nams kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /spyi bor yi ge o~M dkar po/ /nan tan du ni bsam par bya/ /dpral bar yi ge AHljang gu/ /de bzhin

du ni bsam par bya/ /lce yi steng du yi ge mchog /hrIHyig dmar po 'od ldan bsam/ /snying gi phyogs su hU~M sngon po/ /lte bar ha yig ser po ste/ /de bzhin gsang bar ho ljang gu/ /bshang ba'i gnas su ho sngon po/ /pus mo gnyis la sa ser skya/ /rkang mthil yi ge ha ljang

ser/ /lag mthil gnyis la hU~M dkar po/ /lag ngar la ni hrIHsngon te/ /dpung par yi ge hraM dgod bya/ /yi ge tshogs kyis byin brlabs nas/ /gang dang gang yang rung ba yi/ /rtsol ba rnams la 'jug par bya/ /stsol ba de dang de dag kyang / /sngags kyi byin brlabs las byung

zhing / /lus kyang sngags kyi ngo bo nyid/ /sngags kyis bskyed pa'i lus nyid ni/ /sngags dang bcas pa'i lus su 'gyur/ /sngags kyi lus kyi rigs rnams kyi/ /zhing khams du ma sbyangs nas kyang / /'gro ba rnams kyi lus su ni/ /'gro ba grol ba'i spyod pa ni/ /kun bzang mchog

dang mtshungs pa ste/ /'gro dang dbyer med don rig 'gyur/ /don de ma lus thob pa'i thabs/ /ngag gis rig par gyur ba yis/ /rig 'dzin zhes bya'i dngos po ste/ /de la gang gnas de yi ming / /rig pa 'dzin pa zhes bya ste/ /sangs rgyas mu stegs pas mi shes/ /lhag dang

bcas pa'i rtsom pa ni/ /shin tu ngal ba nyid yin te/ /ngal ba nyid kyis gol ba'i lam/ /bgrod par dka' ba de spangs nas/ /shin tu bag yangs bde ba'i lam/ /skal dman yang dag sgrub 'di la/ /nan tan du ni 'jug par bya/ /ston pas de skad gsungs pa'i tshe/ /'khor

rnams dga' nas thal sbyar te/ /mkha' la me tog gtor nas kyang / /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang gtso/ /thams cad kyis ni phyag 'tshal te/ /bskor ba du ma byas nas kyang / /gdong bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'i/ /zhal dang sku yi 'du byed la/ /'dzum bzhin du ni bltas

nas kyang / /gsang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag /pus btsugs thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /phyogs bcu rang rang bde bar 'khod/ /de nas 'jig rten mgon pos ni/ /'gro ba'i don du rig sngags gsungs/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi don rdzogs phyir/ /las kyi sbyor ba'ang tha dad do/ /

na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ /na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH ar+ha da b+h+yaHsaMmyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaHna ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu

ru d+hu ru/ iT+Te baT+Te/ tsa le tsa le/ pra tsa le pra tsa le/ ku su me ku su ma/ ba re/ i li mi li/ tsi ti dz+wa la ma pa na ya swA hA/ shud d+hA ya swA hA/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya swA hA/ 'di gsungs tshe na sa chen yang / /rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur/ /rtsa ba'i snying po stong brjod pas/ /

dngos grub ci dang ci 'dod 'grub/ /gzhan yang sngags pas kun gyi dbur/ /sngon gyi phyag 'tshal bzhi po brjod/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+ha da b+h+yaHsaM myak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH

na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ha ra ha ra/ i li mi li/ tsi li tsi li/ khe le ha la swA hA/ dkyil 'khor nang du 'dug pa'i sa/ /chu dang gos la bdun bdun brjod/ /khrus byas gos gon

nang du 'jug /snod sogs rdzas gzhan dag kyang bsam/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ ar+ha da b+h+yaHsaM myak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yeH/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/

ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ha ra ha ra swA hA/ bdun phrag re re btab pa yis/ /spos bsregs pa dang mar me sbar/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/ na maH

sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+ha da b+h+yaHsaM myak+saM bud d+he b+h+yaHna ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ si ri si ri/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ si d+hi ri si d+hi ri swA hA/ me tog byug spos me tog phreng / /bdun bdun brjod la sku gzugs la/ /gtor

dang byug dang gdags par bya/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+ha da b+h+yaHsaM myak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaHna ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni

kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M sA d+he sA d+he/ so hi so hi/ so du so du/ bshos gtsang me tog 'bras bur bcas/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod nas ni/ /zhal zas dag gis rnam par mchod/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te

saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+ha da b+h+yaHsaM myak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaHna ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M sA mA d+hi si/ tsa le tsa le/ tsu ru tsu ru/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru swA hA/ me tog dkar po'i shing dum bu/ /sum

cu bzhi mar sbrang rtsir ni/ /zhag gcig sbangs nas nyin gcig gam/ /nang re nub par re re la/ /sngags re btab nas bsregs nas gzod/ /ci dgos pa rnams bsgrubs na 'grub/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te

saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+ha da b+h+yaHsaMmyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaHna ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M i li mi li/ pi li ti li/ tsi li ti li swA hA/ chu 'am thal ba yungs kar la/ /lan bdun sngags nas phyogs

bzhir gtor/ /sa phyogs nye ring gang du yang / /mtshams gcod pa yi mchog lags so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ ar+ha da b+h+yaHsaM myak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaHna ma Ar+yA ba

lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M bi ti bi ti/ ti Te ti Te/ pe de pe de/ ka tsa ka tsa/ b+ha ga bA na/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ sarba sA d+ha naM swA hA/ sku sogs slar yang spyan drang dang / /rang nyid gnas nas ldog don phyir/ /

chu la lan bdun btab pa yis/ /bkrus nas dgongs pa de dag 'grub/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+ha da b+h+yaHsaM myak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaHna ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA

ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M badzra hU~M hriHhoH/ 'jig rten 'pho la rab dga' bas/ /zas skom byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ /ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /mgon po zhal

ni bcu gcig pa/ /rtsa ba'i rig sngags 'di gsungs so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+ha da b+h+yaHsaM myak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaHna ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/

ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ na maHsarba byU ha bi hi sarba a haM bud+d+ha shra ba ke saM g+he b+h+yaH/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te/ saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHar+ha da b+h+yaHsaM myak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te

shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ a b+ha ya dA na/ sarba pa ta g+ha ra twA na ka raM/ sarba Ar+yA ya g+ha ba pany+tsa pra sha ma na ka raM/ sarba bi shud+d+ha/ kA la hi g+hA ba hA/ bi gra hA/ bra ma Na ka raM/ sarba pA paM nA sha ya ka raM/ sarba b+h+ya da be ta la/ pi sha mar+d+he na/ dur swa

pa na/ durni mit+taM/ sarba big+h+NAM bi nA ya kAM/ bo d+hi satwA ka raM/ pa ra tsakra/ dur b+he k+sha/ sha ki b+ha ya ni sa ra ka raM/ sA de ba/ nA ga /yak+sha/ gaM d+harba/ a su ra/ ga ru Da/ kin+na ra/ ma ho ra ga /sarba ts+tshe da na ka raM/ sarba pi shA tse ke Ta b+ha/ su k+Sha d+ha g+ha d+ha/ krats+tsha ka li ra/ be Ta li/

a maM ga la/ bi nA sha kA rA ya/ na mo nA tha ma hA kA ru Ni ka /e ka da sha mu khaM/ sa ha sra b+hu dzaM/ sa ha sra ne traM/ tad+ya thA/ o~M dza ka ri/ yu di ta hA ra Na/ bi tsi tra mu khi/ e ka su mu kha/ sarba saM g+ha ma hA ra Ni dza muN+he/ sa ha sra b+hu dza ma hA ne traM/ ma hA shrI ni na laM kA ra/ ma Ni

kuN+Da ya sa na d+ha hA sa nat+te/ bi tsi tra mU la d+ha re/ tsan+d+ra sUr+ya/ a ti re ka /A kA sha ga ga na tsa ri Ne/ maM ga la sha ri dzI mu te be pit+ta pi na maM ga le/ b+hu ri mi tra kA ra ne/ tsu ru tsu ru shwe ta pA de/ mu ru mu ru/ shat+ta a ba nat+te/ hu ru hu ru/ pa bIt+t+ra mu khi/ ku ru ku ru/ tsi tra mu khi/ A di d+ya pA

shA pa ra Ni ni/ dzaM b+ha ni/ maM ga d+ha ni/ sarba pA Ni ni/ sarba bIr+ya ram+b+he/ ma hA ni/ a mo g+ha pA sha ha sta/ sarba b+ha ya pi tsa yo ni ra tsa ri/ ag+ni bi shwa/ u da ka/ bA ya/ pra sha ma ni/ ka khorda ni/ bA na/ oM hi ri hi ri/ dza ya ka ri/ ba la ka ri/ da na ka ri/ te dzaska ka

ri/ b+hi ba b+hi/ pra sha ma Ni/ yud d+hA ni par tsakra sha ma Ni ni ba ra s+ya/ bi na ni/ mu dot+te ra ni pra b+hu na b+he la/ ma Ni ma Ni/ ma hA ma Ni/ ma Ni d+ha re/ trai lo ka /a laM ka ka ri ti bUrna ka ri/ bi daM sa ni/ ba ra b+he na/ pit+t+ra pA Ni ni/ sarba bIr+ya karma Ni/ su da ni/ sarba byA d+hi ni/ pra

sha ma Ni swA hA/ o~M tsi li mi le swA hA/ tsi li tsi li swA hA/ mi li mi li swA hA/ si li si li swA hA/ tsi li li tsi li li swA hA/ tsin+d+ha li ma ti ni swA hA/ Ur+d+ha ke sha piM ga la ke to d+he ma nu mu khaM swA hA/ o~M ka ra ka ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ muny+tsa muny+tsa

muny+tsa ya/ muny+tsa ya/ pra shA ma ya/ pra shA ma ya/ yu d+ho da d+hA ra Ni phaT/ tsit+ta ni ra mA la ka ri phaT/ a su ra nA ri ki ti ha phaT/ dza ya ka ri phaT/ ska ti ri phaT/ sa ha sra b+hu dze phaT/ sa ha sra ne tre phaT/ sarba b+ha dra d+ha ra na ma sa kr-i te phaT/ sarba b+ha ya bi mok+Sha Ni phaT/ ma ra tsa kra na

pa ra ra Ni phaT/ pa ra sai n+ya si gru pa Ni phaT/ sarba kr-i t+ya ka ma si du ni phaT/ sarba byA d+hi pra sha ma ni phaT/ sarba byA d+hi bi nA sha ya phaT/ sarba gra hota ts+tshin+d+ha ni phaT/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mAM/ sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA nAM/ sa pa ra sa pa ra/ naM te tsa ri sa ma nAM/ sarba bra ya pra te b+h+yaHsarba yut+te b+h+yaH

dus kr-i te b+h+yaHsarba kr-i ta kA khorda/ sarba bi She b+h+yaHsarba kA ya bAk+tsit+ta si tse b+h+yaHrak+Sha rak+Sha mAM swA hA/ sa ha sra b+hu dze/ sa ha sra ne tra/ e ka da sha mu khi/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sid+d+h+ya na tu me man+t+ra pa dA ni swA hA/ rje btsun zhal

ni bcu gcig pa'i/ /sngags 'di yon tan mtha' yas te/ /gang la 'di ni gtsug tor du/ /yid bzhin nor bu thogs dang mtshungs/ /'chang dang klog par byed pa des/ /mtha' yas yon tan rnyed par 'gyur/ /nad dang gdon rnams sel ba dang / /khyad par du ni sdig kun

'byang / /ba dkar mo yi bdud rtsi lngas/ /maN+Da la 'jam po lnga byugs la/ /gtsang sbra ldan pas dbus su ni/ /shing sku ring bsrel ldan pa bzhag /gzhan yang ring bsrel ldan pa yi/ /sku gdung bzhi ni phyogs bzhir te/ /tshad ldan pa yi bum pa ni/ /lnga po dbus dang

mtshams su ste/ /rigs lnga'i mdog dang phyag rgya can/ /sna tshogs rgyan dang mchod pa dang / /srad bu tha dad bre bar bya/ /ci 'dod phyag rgya bri byas te/ /tshes gcig nas ni bcu bzhi'i bar/ /'dod la dmigs nas sngags brjod de/ /bzhi khri rdzogs nas bco lnga la/ /

'dod pa gsol gdab khrus byas nas/ /ci 'dod myur du 'grub pa dang / /bdud dang bar du gcod pa dang / /rnam par 'tshe dang mi mthun pa/ /khrus kyis nges par sel bar 'gyur/ /sngags brjod yon tan mtha' yas rnams/ /bsdus nas sgrub

po bla ldan 'gyur/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/ /sngags gang brjod pa tsam la yang / /gshis ngan shi ba bco lnga med/ /skye bzang bco lnga thob par 'gyur/ /mu ge rgyal po'i chad pa dang / /dug dang mtshon dang g.yul 'gyed dang / /stag sogs

sbrul sogs gcan gzan gdug /dug can zas dang me chus 'chi/ /srog chags mdun du nyal nyes dang / /g.yeng byed dang ni lha 'dres gtses/ /gsor mi rung dang bdag lceb rnams/ /de la nam yang mi 'jigs so/ /rgyal po chos ldan yul skye zhing / /'phags

pa bzhugs dang dus bzang yul/ /bshes gnyen bzang dang dbang po tshang / /dge la dga' zhing tshul khrims ldan/ /bran khol bzang zhing nor mang rtag /gzhan gyis bkur zhing dgos 'dod sbyor/ /sems bder 'jig rten skyong bas bsrung / /sangs rgyas zhal mthong

don zab brtags/ /gzhan yang dman la byams sems bskyed/ /snying rje mchi ma 'khrug pa dang / /yon tan dran nas spro ba dang / /dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang / /phul du byung ba'i blo yis 'phel/ /tshul bzhin ma yin yid bral dang / /bka' lung sde snod dad pa

rnams/ /yang nas yang du skye bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar spros pa'i gnas mthong na/ /sngags 'dis rang bzhin med par byas/ /o~M swa b+hA ba shud d+hAHsarba d+harmaHswa b+hA ba shud d+ho\u0f85 haM/ 'dzin pa drag po'i blo byung tshe/ /sngags 'dis stong pa nyid du bya/ /o~M shU n+yatA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85

haM/ gang gis lus ngag yid g.yo na/ /sngags 'dis brtan par byin gyis brlabs/ /o~M sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ gang la gnod yod sems ldan dang / /ngang gis sa gzhi bgegs yod pa/ /bsal phyir seng ldeng dkar po ni/ /brag la skyes

shing gzhon pa las/ /sor drug tshad ldan phur bu ni/ /brjid ldan rtse mo rno dpal can/ /mgo bo rked pa rgya mdud tshul/ /sor tshad phyed phyed ldan pa la/ /zur ni bcu drug rked pa la/ /sor gnyis zur brgyad ldan pa'o/ /sor gsum zur gsum rtse rno ba/ /dpal mtho cung zad par reg

pa/ /ngos dang skabs ni zab pa ste/ /sngags kyi byin brlabs ldan pa brgyad/ /khang ba'i zur dang phyogs bzhi por/ /g.yas su phyogs par gzugs par bya/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya dz+nyA na sA ga ra bai ro tsa na byU ha rA dzA ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tA ar+ha te b+h+yaHsaM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/

na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mash+tsaN+Da badzra kro d+hA ya/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ a mr-i te hU~M phaT/ ltas ngan thams cad 'joms pa dang / /gnas khang byin gyis

brlab pa dang / /tshe dang longs spyod rtag pa dang / /dal 'byor phun sum tshogs pa dang / /dang po thal mo sbyar byas te/ /phyis ni lag g.yon sdigs mdzub bcas/ /o~M dang a la la la ho/ /zhes brjod rngam cing khang pa yi/ /nang du 'jug pa khro bor bcas/ /de nas hU~M sgras

se gol gtogs/ /de nas o~M AHbadzra dang / /s+thA na pA Ni b+h+yaHa haM/ /rak+Sha rak+Sha hU~M phaT brjod/ /shin tu 'jam pa'i stan la ni/ /rdo rje skyil krung gis gnas nas/ /bsrangs te mig ni sna rtser phab/ /dal ba'i rlung ldan rkan la ni/ /lce ni cung zad reg par bya/ /lte ba cung

zad 'khum pa yis/ /sems ni bag yod gnas par bya/ /rtag pa ma yin mi rtag min/ /gtsang ma ma yin mi gtsang min/ /bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal min/ /bdag dang ngar min bdag med min/ /blang dang dor ba'i 'jig tshogs min/ /sems ma yin zhing sems

byung min/ /phung khams skye mched med ma yin/ /yid min rtag min mi rtag min/ /mun pa ma yin shes rab min/ /'gro min 'ong min gnas ma yin/ /sna tshogs sprin glog du ma ni/ /'dod gzugs du ma sgyur byed pa/ /mkha' byung nam mkha' la ni thim/ /

'gro 'ong ston pa 'dod bskul ba/ /med mod na yang de ltar spyod/ /yul gyis ma skyes dbang po min/ /dus kyis ma yin gtan gyis min/ /rgyu dang de bzhin rten gyis min/ /gnas skabs gzhan yang de la med/ /de la sems pa'i sems nyid

kyang / gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi gnas/ /gar yang ma song brtags na stong / /brtag par byed pa rtog pa tsam/ /dngos rnams brtags pa ming tsam ste/ /kun rdzob tsam du ming yig la/ /brten nas rang gi sems bzung na/ /drod kyi bzhi pa dang por bzung / /phyung ba'i

gnyis pa de la brten/ /de la dang po gnyis pas bskor/ /dang po'i bco lngas mnan pa ste/ /bcu drug pa ni grogs su bzhag /yi ge drug la grub pa ni/ /sangs rgyas drug gi rang bzhin te/ /'od zer rnam pa drug tu bcas/ /rlung drug gis ni dbang byas nas/ /

yul ni rnam pa drug la 'jug /yul drug dag gis dbang byas nas/ /nyon mongs rnam pa drug dang bcas/ /nyon mongs rgyas par 'gyur ba yin/ /phung po rnam pa drug dang ldan/ /phung po grangs kyi dbye bas ni/ /yan lag drug drug 'phel bar 'gyur/ /yan lag rdzogs

pa'i grib mar ni/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems sgrib byed/ /sgrib gnyis go bas mthug po ni/ /bsal dka'i ri bo dang bcas pa/ /rtag chad gnas su zhugs pa'o/ /srog rtsol bsdam pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /phyi rol snang ba nub par 'gyur/ /rtsol dang bral nas dga'

skye ste/ /yi ge la ni sems gnas 'gyur/ /yi ge gsal ba'i 'od zer ni/ /ba spu khung rnams thams cad nas/ /sems dang bcas pa ldang 'jug ste/ /slar yang thig le bsdus nas ni/ /yi ge nyid kyang mi dmigs so/ /'dzin pa de las thos nas kyang / /sgyu

ma'i rnam pa rjes dran bya/ /de la goms nas ting 'dzin ni/ /nyams pa med par thob par 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin de brtan gyur nas ni/ /lus 'dis rig pa 'dzin pa 'thob/ /rig 'dzin de la gnas nas ni/ /bla med byang chub de thob 'gyur/ /skad cig de la dngos rnams

ni/ /nam mkha' lta bur dag nas kyang / /mkha' ltar kun la khyab par spyod/ /rten ni spyan ras gzigs dbang ste/ /lus ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal lo/ /yan lag phyag na rdo rje ste/ /mgo dang thod ni ma pham pa/ /gtsug tor sgrib pa rnam sel nyid/ /nyi

zla kun tu bzang po ste/ /sa chu me rlung nam mkha' dang / /rnam shes nyid dang bcas pa'o/ /thams cad dbyer med 'gyur ba ste/ /bsam gtan la ni gnas pa'i phyir/ /stsal rnams so sor bsdu bar bya/ /sems glong bas ni nges par 'grub/ /'das dang ma 'ongs da

ltar gyi/ /dus ni rtag pa ma yin te/ /mi rtog sems nyid 'brel gyur nas/ /dus la tha dad mi rtog go/ /nyi ma'i 'khor lo chu rgyun dang / /nam mkha'i phyogs na ji lta bar/ /sems kyang sems kyis btsal bar bya/ /gzhan ni go skabs mi byed do/ /'phags pa

spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las/ thun mong gi sngags byung ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas drang srong gnas nas ni/ /sna tshogs gzugs ldan zhes bya ba/ /bskal pa du mar sbyangs pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa'

rig 'dzin zhig /rgya cher rang gi 'khor bcas la/ /dkyil 'khor drung du lhags nas ni/ /rmad byung chen po'i tshogs kyis mchod/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /thal sbyar 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis ni/ /ston pa la ni 'di skad gsol/ /o~M mtha' yas spros pa

nyer zhi zhing / /zhi mdzad dul zhi rab spyod mdzad/ /rtog bcom rtog mkhyen rtog yongs zhugs/ /ye shes kun rgyal phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhi las zhi gyur mtha' 'byung ba/ /chos rnams kun mchog zhi chos che/ /spros med las spros dkar bcu bya/ /mtha' yas chos la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /grol 'gyur grol mdzad dag pa che/ /dag par spyod pa gtsang ma mgon/ /tshogs rdzogs tshogs ldan tshogs spyod rgyal/ /tshogs rtag bdag nyid phyag 'tshal lo/ /rab mdzes thugs rje'i nyi mas brgyan/ /'jig rten rab gsal mdzad pa'o/ /rtag

pa don chen rtag zhugs la/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal/ /khams gsum bag chags kyis dkrugs pa/ /thibs po'i ling tog zhugs pa rnams/ /mngon du snang bar brjod pa dang / /sems la gsal myur shin tu dga'/ /mngon sum

med la brjod bral yang / /lkog tu gyur pa smos kyi dgos/ /lkog don mngon du byed pa la/ /phyag rgya dang ni 'dra 'bag mchog /mngon sum thob ldan ming nas kyang / /don la sems kyis gsal ba skye/ /don gang yang yang goms pa las/ /sems kyi 'jug pa rtog pa ste/ /

de bsal mi rtog blo 'bras bu/ /sgom pa'i pha rol phyin pa'o/ /blo dman rnams kyi 'jug pa dang / /'bring po 'gro bar bya phyir dang / /rnon po rdzogs sangs rgyas 'gyur phyir/ /gzugs brnyan byung tshul bshad du gsol/ /myur du 'jug dang grol ba dang / /myur du byang chub

cher 'gyur cing / /gzugs brnyan dge ba'i tshul 'byung can/ /'dren pas de ring bshad du gsol/ /mkha' sprin rtag pa med pa la/ /mtshan mar gzung du med pa ltar/ /rnam rtog gis dkrugs sems la ni/ /su zhig mtshan mar 'dzin par 'gyur/ /dmigs pa'i mtshan ma

gsal byed pa/ /gzugs brnyan tshad dang ldan pa ste/ /legs par 'gyur ba'i yid 'jug cing / /byin brlabs nges par 'jug par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'dren pa gtsos/ /ljags kyi dbang po rab bkram nas/ /gzugs brnyan dge ba'i tshul byung ba/ /nga las

nyan par brtson pa ni/ /legs pa lha yi drang srong mchog /rig 'dzin byang chub sems khyod legs/ /rtse gcig sems kyis nyan nas kyang / /legs par gsungs pa yid la zhog /khyod la yang dag bshad bya ba/ /byin brlabs dgye ba'i gzugs brnyan ni/ /tshon

gyis ris su bris pa'am/ /rin chen rigs sam sa rdo 'am/ /shing la byas na mchog tu bsngags/ /dang po'i las can sems can la/ /dmigs pa gsal bar 'gyur ba dang / /byin rlabs mchog ni 'jug par 'gyur/ /tsan+dan dkar po gsal zhing drang / /gzhon

zhing chag gas med pa la/ /bsang zhing dud bas bdugs nas ni/ /dad ldan ngang tshul bzang pos bzhag /'jig rten dbang phyug mgon gyi sku/ /bco brgyad sor tshad ldan pa la/ /gdan khri dag ni sor dgu ste/ /rgyab yol sor tshad drug gis bskyed/ /bzhengs te

ldem bag nyams dga' ba/ /rin chen du ma'i gzugs kyis brgyan/ /g.yas kyi dang po bgrang phreng ste/ /gnyis pa mi 'jigs stsol ba'i phyag /g.yon pa dang po pad+ma dmar/ /gnyis pa ril ba spyi blugs thogs/ /zhal gyi grangs ni bcu gcig la/ /mdun

gyi zhal gsum mtshan bzang can/ /byams pa snying rje dga' ba'i mdangs/ /dkar po dkar ser dmar skya bo/ /g.yon gyi gsum ni khro bo'i zhal/ /sgeg pa'i mdangs dang ldan pa ste/ /dmar dang dmar ser le brgan no/ /g.yas su gtum po'i khro zhal

gsum/ /sngo dang ser dang ljang gu'o/ /rgyab tu khro gtum mdog dmar ba/ /rta skad rab tu 'tsher ba'i zhal/ /khro bo'i zhal rnams mche ba gtsigs/ /mig gsum dbu skra ser po ni/ /gyen du thor tshugs bcings pa'o/ /steng du sangs rgyas 'dzum pa'i zhal/ /

byi ru bcag pa'i mtshan 'dra ba'i/ /dbu yi cod pan nang rnams su/ /'di dag phyogs bcu'i thub pa rnams/ /re re bzhin du gzhug par bya/ /dbu rgyan cod pan ldan pa dang / /rna rgyan mgul rgyan dpung rgyan dang / /lag rgyan se mo dor bcas pa/ /do shal

rkang gdub ske rags can/ /rgyan dang na bza' mdzes pas brgyan/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /ri mo dag la dga' 'gyur nas/ /yid gzhungs dal spyod khro ba med/ /sred chung shes rab snying rje che/ /thabs ldan ri mo rgyud la mkhas/ /bsam pa bzang

ldan tshul khrims bsrung / /'dri chos gzob la gzhungs pa yis/ /dben zhing nyams dga'i gnas su bri/ /gzugs bzang yid dal gtsang ldan pa'i/ /bu mos bkal ba'i ras la ni/ /tshon bzang ngur smrig mdog bya'o/ /'thas par bcags te 'jam por

bya/ /thig pir phyogs su bshad nas kyang / /ser skya tshon gyi gzugs brnyan ni/ /tshad la mkhas pa tshad ldan pa'i/ /nan tan du ni bri bar bya/ /dkar po wa yi shel yin te/ /dmar po sems rtso li khri'o/ /sngon po rams dang mthing shing

ste/ /ser po ba bla dag pa yin/ /nag po snag tsha nyid yin te/ /ljang gu rams dang ldong ros sbyar/ /yang na spong ma nyid kyis bya/ /smug rtsi rams dang skags sbyar te/ /gzhan yang ci rigs sbyar bar bya/ /sbyin dang bral na grugs par 'gyur/ /shing spyin

ser dang ka bi ta/ /lo mi ta dang than dza ra/ /de dag so sor sbyar ba yis/ /gsal zhing dkrugs med dag par byed/ /a ta pas ni snum par byed/ /gan to has ni rtag par 'gyur/ /rgyas par gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa/ /yang na sgo gcig pa yang rung / /dkyil

'khor cha rim gsum pa'am/ /yang na gnyis sam gsum yang rung / /dbus su gdong bcu gcig pa ni/ /mdzes pa'i lha mo bzhi ldan bri/ /shar du spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/ /dkyil 'khor rnam snang gtso bo can/ /de yang spyan sogs lha mo bzhi/ /phyag bzhi

pa dang bcas pa'o/ /lhor ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi/ /dkyil 'khor shAka thub gtso bo can/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang / /'bebs pa'i phyag rgya ldan pa'o/ /nub tu rigs ma'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /sems dpa' bzhi bzhir bcas pa'o/ /dbus

su rdo rje dbang mo yang / mdun du rdo rje rtag pa ste/ /g.yas su rdo rje dpal 'byung ngo / /rgyab tu rdo rje dpag med de/ /g.yon du rdo rje don grub po/ /shar du lha mo spyan ma ni/ /mdun du rdo rje sems dpa'o/ /g.yas su rdo rje rgyal bo'o/ /rgyab tu rdo rje chags pa ste/ /

g.yon du rdo rje legs pa'o/ /lhor ni lha mo mA ma kI/ /mdun du rdo rje rin chen no/ /g.yas su rdo rje nyi ma ste/ /rgyab tu rdo rje rgyal mtshan no/ /g.yon du rdo rje bzhad pa yin/ /nub tu na bza' dkar mo yang / /mdun du rdo rje chos yin te/ /g.yas su rdo rje rnon po yin/ /rgyab tu

rdo rje rgyu zhes pa/ /g.yon du rdo rje smra ba'o/ /byang du lha mo sgrol ma yang / /mdun du rdo rje las yin no/ /g.yas su rdo rje srung ba'o/ /rgyab tu rdo rje gnod sbyin te/ /g.yon du rdo rje khu tshur ro/ /'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /kun kyang zhal gcig phyag bzhi ste/ /g.yas

kyi dang po rang rigs rtags/ /gnyis pa thams cad skyabs sbyin te/ /g.yon gyi dang po pad+ma yang / /phyogs kyi kha dog ldan pa'o/ /gnyis pas phyogs kyi mdog ldan pa'i/ /sngags nor phreng yang 'chang ba'o/ /'khor gyi lha mo de dag kun/ /zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi

pa/ /g.yon pa'i tha ma bum pa 'chang / /lhag ma gong ltar shes par bya/ /byang du khro bo'i dkyil 'khor yang / /khro mo bzhi bzhir bcas pa'o/ /dbus su rdo rje hU~M byed de/ /sngon po ut+pa la yi mdog /mdun du sngo bsangs chen po ste/ /g.yas su rdo rje drag mo'o/ /rgyab

tu rdo rje brjed byed pa'o/ /g.yon du rdo rje mthu chen mo/ /shar gyi 'khor lo'i cha rtsibs la/ /khro bo gshin rje gshed po gnag /mdun du rdo rje dbang zhal ma/ /g.yas su rdo rje khyab 'jug mo/ /rgyab tu rdo rje gzhon nu ma/ /g.yon du rdo rje skul byed ma/ /'khor lo rtsibs ni

mnyam pa la/ /khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub ser/ /mdun du rdo rje gnag byed mo/ /g.yas su rdo rje me chen mo/ /rgyab du rdo rje zla ba mo/ g.yon du rdo rje rnon po ma/ /rtsibs gsum rdo rje gtsug tor ser/ /rdo rje khro mo khrag 'thung mo/ /rdo rje rlung 'dzin chen mo dang / /rdo rje sdang

byed mor bcas pa'o/ /nub kyi rtsibs la rta mgrin dmar/ /mdun du rdo rje rmongs byed ma/ /g.yas su rdo rje zhi ba mo/ /g.yon du rdo rje tshol byed ma/ /lnga pa'i rtsibs la de bzhin du/ /khro bo bgegs mthar byed pa ljang / /mdun du rdo rje gsor byed ma/ /g.yas su rdo rje gtum mo

ste/ /rgyab tu rdo rje ro langs ma/ /g.yon du rdo rje rengs byed ma/ /rtsibs drug 'khor lor bri ba ni/ /rdo rje gnod mdzes rgyal ljang sngo/ /mdun du rdo rje chu dbang mo/ /g.yas su dngos grub 'byung ba mo/ /rgyab tu rdo rje mtshan mo dag /g.yon du rdo rje mkha' dbang phyug /de

ltar rdo rje khro bo khro mo rnams/ /kun kyang zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'o/ /khro bo phyag gnyis mda' gzhu bkang / /g.yas na be con kha T+wAM dang / /tho ba rdo rje rgya gram dang / /'khor lo gtun shing rdo rje rnams/ /rang rtags phyag rgya 'chang ba'o/ /g.yon na

sdigs mdzub zhags pa'o/ /kun kyang stag gi sham thabs can/ /khro mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni/ /g.yas na gri gug cang te'u ste/ /g.yon na thod khrag kha T+wAM ngo / /zhing lpags dag gi chos gos te/ /gzig gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ /khro bo'i

g.yon na sgeg pa'i tshogs/ /de rgyab cha yi snam bu la/ /phyogs rer lha mo bzhi bzhi dang / /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' bzhi/ /phyogs rer brgyad brgyad bkod pa ste/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis bzhengs pa'i tshul/ /de bzhin bskor bzhin sems ma mchog /

lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang / /'bebs ma rang rtags phyag rgya g.yas/ /gnyis pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya ste/ /g.yon pa phyogs mdog pad+ma dang / /gnyis pa dar gyi chos gos so/ /kun kyang sgeg nyams ldan pa'o/ /de rgyab dkyil 'khor cha la ni/ /

shar du brgya byin glang chen zhon/ /g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje ste/ /gnyis pa skyabs sbyin phyag rgya can/ /g.yon pa phyogs mdog pad+ma ste/ /gnyis pa rang mdog phreng ba bri/ /de yi g.yon du tshangs pa ser/ /ngang pa'i khri la bzhugs pa la/ /g.yas kyi dang po nyi ma

'chang / /me phyogs su ni me lha ste/ /mdog dmar ra zhon me phung 'dzin/ /lho yi phyogs su gshin rje sngo/ /thod dbyug bzung ba ma he zhon/ /bden bral du ni srin po gnag /rtse gsum bzung nas srin po zhon/ /nub tu chu lha dkar po ni/ /klu yi khri la sbrul

zhags bzung / /de yi g.yon du sa bdag dkar/ /bum pa bzung ste rus sbal zhon/ /lha min phyogs su rlung lha ljang / /ba dan bzung ste sha ba zhon/ /byang du gnod sbyin mi la zhon/ /ljang nag phyag na gter sgrom mo/ /byang shar dbang ldan dkar po ni/ /rtse

gsum bzung ste khyu mchog zhon/ /sgo bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi/ /phyogs kyi kha dog go cha can/ /pi wang ral gri zhags pa can/ /rin chen dbyug tho g.yas kyis 'chang / /gnyis pa skyabs kyi phyag rgya ste/ /g.yon pa ma la bgrang phreng ni/ /phyogs kyi kha

dog ldan pa'o/ /kun kyang sgeg nyams phyogs kyi mdog /rim bzhin stag gzig dom seng ge'i/ /khri la bzhugs pa'i gzigs pa can/ /rang rang phyogs kyi sgo la ni/ /bsrung brtson shin tu 'grus pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor cha brgyad 'khor yug tu/ /bza'

shing me tog spos shing dang / /mdzes pa'i shing tshogs tshal gseb tu/ /mdzes pa'i bya sogs dud 'gro dang / /lha yi bu dang bu mo sogs/ /de bzhin klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /dri za grul bum bu mo'o/ /rol mo byed pa du ma bri/ /'di ltar dad na la las ni/ /

'jig rten skyong ba'i nang rol du/ /gza' dang rgyu skar sum cu drug /rin chen pad+ma la gnas bri/ /smin drug pad+ma dmar po 'chang / /snar ma mgo ni ut+pa la/ /nab so pad dkar lag tri shul/ /rgyal ni bgrang phreng skag sbrul nag /mchu ni pad ser bre mnyam gzhag /

me bzhi pad dkar dbo dbyug pa/ /nag pa pad+ma sa ri ras/ /sa ga po ti lha mtshams bum/ /snron ni rdo rje snubs dbyug ste/ /chu stod ril ba chu smad pad/ /byi bzhin gser gyi 'khor lo ste/ /gro bzhin chu skyogs mon gru dang / /mon gre shel sgong khrums stod kyis/ /ral

gri khrums smad ku mu da/ /nam gru ba dan tha skar gyis/ /shing lo bra nye dbyug sran to/ /zla ba ku mud dkar po ste/ /nyi ma pad+ma dmar po'o/ /mig dmar me yi phung po ste/ /gza' lag ut+pal sngon po'o/ /phur bus chos kyi glegs bam mo/ /pa ba sangs ni bgrang phreng bzung / /

spen pa lag na ral gri 'chang / /sgra gcan bdud rtsi'i gzhong bu'o/ /nang gi grwa yi char gtogs pa/ /bkra shis lha mo brgyad yin te/ /rtag dga' ma dang rgyal ma shar/ /don grub ma dang mi pham lhor/ /nub tu bde ba bde dga' ma/ /myur grub ma dang gtan ma byad/ /rtse lnga

rtse gsum rdo rje dang / /sngon po ser po rin chen dang / /dkar dang dmar dang ut+pal dang / /ut+pal sngo dang ku mu da/ /dang po phyag na rim bzhin 'chang / /skyabs sbyin pad+ma bgrang phreng ni/ /lhag ma rnams kyis rim bzhin 'chang / /de dag thams

cad phyogs mdog go/ /rgyas pa'i spros pas skyo na yang / /lnga bcu brgyad dam sum cu bdun/ /nyi shu dgu 'am nyi shu lnga/ /bco lnga dgu 'am lnga 'am gcig /yi ge phyag rgya gzugs brnyan tshogs/ /sprul pa sku yi cho 'phrul te/ /rang gis ji ltar 'dod pa yi/ /sems

kyi byin brlab nyid du 'gyur/ /bde gshegs sku dang po ti dang / /phyag rgya sogs pa rab gnas bya/ /nyams sam dri mas gos pa ni/ /bkrus dang bshig nas dag byed la/ /rtog pa med pa'i sems kyis su/ /de la bsod nams dpag tu med/ /gzugs sogs sngon

bas dman gyur kyang / /de yis bsod nams mtha' yas 'thob/ /phrin las dang ni sku gsang ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid de/ /de bzhin nyid de stong pa nyid/ /byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid dang / /mtshan dang dpe byad kun rdzob ste/ /sgyu ma rmi lam lta bu'o/ /

sum cu gnyis dang brgyad cu ni/ /yi ge brda dang spros pa'i sku/ /longs sku bsod nams rgyu mthun 'bras/ /sprul sku las kyi rnam smin 'bras/ /kun rdzob don dam mtshan nyid ldan/ /dag dang ma dag skal ldan la/ /bde gshegs phrin las gzugs sku gnyis/ /tshogs

gnyis la ni sku gsum byung / /rnam byang kun nyon mongs pas stong / /lus ngag yid kyi spyod yul min/ /dmigs med nam mkha'i khams rtogs pa/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi chos sku'o/ /rtag chad med pa'i rten 'brel ni/ /skye 'gag med par thugs chud pa/ /yid

kyi rnam shes 'jug lam gyis/ /bsam gtan goms pas shes par bya/ /dad pa'i lcags kyu shes rab can/ /lha klu 'bum phrag dkar po'i sems dge ba/ /kun slong byang chub gter gyi rin chen nor/ /thob par 'dis mdzod 'khor los sgyur ba 'byung / /sems kyi

dbus gces de phyir spyod spyad pas/ /dbang por bya ba'i rgyud kun khyad par du/ /pad+ma'i dra ba phyag stong gis brgyan par/ /myur du sgrub pa'i thabs mang gsungs pa rnams/ /bsdus brtson dang byas ldan pas gces su bya/ /bla ma'i lung yod snying rje gang ldan pa/ /rgyal dang

rgyal sras tshogs rnams kun dgyes nas/ /'jig rten skyong tshogs dga' ba smos ci dgos/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //de nas dga' ldan gnas

'khrungs pa/ /bskal pa du mar tshogs bsags pa/ /rig pa gsum ldan lha yi bu/ /mdzes pa'i tog ces mtshan gsol pa/ /spyan ras gzigs la cher dad nas/ /bzhengs te thal mo sbyar byas shing / /'khor tshogs chen po dang bcas pas/ /mgrin gcig

tu ni 'di skad gsol/ /o~M khams gsum kun gyi bla ma gtso/ /'dren pa mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sa gsum ye shes 'od po che/ /bde bar gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas mchog /rig sngags bde ldan byin brlabs can/ /

g.yung drung rtag pa dam chos gtso/ /kun rtog sel skyob phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtag par brtse ldan spyan ras gzigs/ /byang chub sems tshogs 'byung tshogs rgyal/ /bya ba byas nas bskal par gnas/ /bad 'chang tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bskal pa du mar

bsags pa yi/ /thugs rje ye shes las byung ba/ /rig sngags phreng ba byin brlabs can/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang gis/ /sems can rnams la phan don phyir/ /phyag rgya phrin las ldan par gsungs/ /las kyi dri ma dang ldan zhing / /nyon mongs

bdag rgyal kyis bcings nas/ /le lo ser sna'i 'dab rdzab can/ /khur dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams/ /myur du grol bar bya ba dang / /thugs rje nyi ma bkram byas te/ /srid 'dab stug po skems pa dang / /myur du sangs rgyas 'grub bya'i phyir/ /lha dang gsang sngags

blang ba dang / /phrin las sbyor ba ldan ba dang / /brgyud ba rgyun gzhan med pa yi/ /sbyor ba'i tshul 'byung bshad du gsol/ /rig sngags rjes gnang med pa ni/ /bsgrubs kyang 'bras med ngal pa ste/ /'dren pa med pa'i shing rta ni/ /'khor

lo bzang yang gang du phyin/ /nyon mongs rtsa ba gcad pa'i phyir/ /rig sngags ral gri rno dang mtshungs/ /bdag 'dzin go cha 'bigs pa'i mdung / /sdug bsngal mtsho skems nyi ma che/ /kun rtog rdul phung bsregs pa'i me/ /shes rab me tog 'khrungs pa'i rlan/ /

nad ngan kun sel sman mchog ste/ /bag tshogs sel ba'i sred med bu/ /bag chags bkrus pa'i chu rgyun yin/ /longs spyod 'phel ba'i gter chen nyid/ /'khor ba las brgal gru gzings te/ /nyes pa kun sel rlung dang ma/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa che/ /

mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas chen gyis/ /srab 'jam ring ba'i ljags bkram nas/ /tshangs pa'i gsung snyan dbyangs kyis gsungs/ /'gro la thugs rje chen po yi/ /sngags 'byung brgyud pa'i rim 'byung ba'i/ /cho ga dam pa nyan brtson pa/ /shin tu legs so lha yi

bu/ /nyams dga' dge ba'i sa phyogs su/ /sa yi cha mnyam dkyil 'khor ltar/ /pad+ma gdan 'dra'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /tshon sna ma lus rnams kyis bris/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang sogs/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /rig pa'i lha mo

khro mor bcas/ /'jig rten skyong sogs ma lus pa'i/ /sku 'am phyag rgya bkod pa dang / /mchod pa'i tshogs kyang bkram par bya/ /mar me yon chab byug spos dri/ /zhal zas gtor ma sna tshogs dang / /gzhan yang zas skom sna tshogs dang / /rgyan dang na bza' lhab

lhub dang / /sil snyan me tog phreng du ma/ /yid 'ong mdzes pa'i tshig gis brgyan/ /slob ma gus pas bla ma le/ /yon phul brtson byas 'di skad gsol/ /sems can kun gyi sems kyi gnyen/ /dmus long lam log las 'dren pa/ /rab rib sel ba'i thur ma can/ /

bdag la 'dren pa'i sgrol ma sogs/ /shes rab snying rje'i skya ba can/ /thos bsam bsgom pa'i gru gzings can/ /las can sdug bsngal chu sgrol ba'i/ /thabs brtson nyan pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /byang chub lam mthong dpag yas thugs/ /'gro rnams thar lam rten gzigs

pa/ /dge brtson dge la bskul ba'o/ /dge bcu med pa dag la stsol/ /dam tshig sdom gnas ngang tshul bzang / /bag yod dbyangs mkhas ltung ba med/ /chos don gnyer ba'i don skyabs po/ /skyabs dang sdom gnas bdag la stsol/ /dpa' brtan zhi dul spyad pa

yi/ /dga' slad slob dpon 'di skad brjod/ /o~M gti mug rnam dag bder gshegs thugs/ /rnam par snang mdzad skyabs su mchi/ /zhe sdang rnam dag rdo rje thugs/ /mi bskyod pa la skyabs su mchi/ /ser sna rnam dag longs spyod gter/ /rin chen 'byung ldan skyabs

su mchi/ /'dod chags rnam dag pad+ma'i gsung / /'od dpag med la skyabs su mchi/ /phrag dog rnam dag phrin las rgyal/ /don yod rdo rje skyabs su mchi/ /AHgnas med mkha' dang mnyam spyod pa/ /chos dbyings chos la skyabs su mchi/ /skye med skye snang ltar

grub chos/ /'phags lam brgyad la skyabs su mchi/ /don gcig tshogs lam bcu gnyis grangs/ /gsung rab yan lag skyabs su mchi/ /rgyu 'bras snang ba'i so sor rtog /nyan thos dge 'dun skyabs su mchi/ /gcig gam tshogs spyod rdzu 'phrul che/ /rang

rgyal dge 'dun skyabs su mchi/ /snying rje shes rab byang chub 'brel/ /sems chen tshogs la skyabs su mchi/ /gsod dang rku rdzun 'khrig spyod dang / /tshig rtsub phra ma ngag 'khyal dang / /brnab sems gnod sems log lta spyod/ /thar ba'i srog gcod bcu po spong / /

chang 'thung til mar tshir las dang / /mgar dang rgya skyegs rtswa shing gcod/ /srog chags tshogs dang mgo zlum tshong / /mtho ris lus kyi gags chen spong / /rtags dang phyag rgya 'dra 'bag dang / /rten dang dge 'dun rtags yi ge/ /bgrang phreng 'dzin pa'i yo byad sogs/ /

'gom dang bshig pa gtan du spong / /mchod pa rnying dang sgog pa dang / /'bags dang lhag mar gyur pa dang / /sha dang dman pa'i lag gi zas/ /srog chags yod pa'i chu rnams spong / /deng nas bzung ste ji srid pa/ /byang chub snying po thug bar du/ /

sdom pa yi ni tshul khrims dang / /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims sogs/ /nam du mi dor brtan por gzung / /lha dang slob dpon yid byed cing / /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya gzung / /'gro la zang zing mi 'jigs skyabs/ /chos kyi sbyin

ba ci 'byor stsal/ /theg gsum tha dad chos tshul rnams/ /mi 'gal sbyor bas rgyun du spyod/ /lus ngag yid dang longs spyod bcas/ /ser sna med pas mchod 'os mchod/ /lha dang lha min gsang ba pa'i/ /rig 'byung sku gsung thugs kyi rgya/ /des spyod dam tshig

dam pa rnams/ /sdom tshul brtan por gzung bar bya/ /'gro rnams kun la snying brtse dang / /rnams la gtor ma sbyin/ /'dzam b+ha la ni chu yis mchod/ /dag kyang chus mnyes bya/ /rdo rje slob ma rab dga' nas/ /ci 'byor lha dang bla ma mchod/ /

dga' chen las sbyor slob dpon dgongs/ /snying rje bdag la gzigs nas kyang / /lha dang sngags dang byin brlabs thabs/ /de bdag brtse phyir stsal du gsol/ /rgyal ba sras bcas tshogs bzhugs pa'i/ /nyams dga' thar pa'i grong khyer che/ /yid bzhin longs

sbyod char du 'bab/ /khang chen der ni bdag 'jug 'tshal/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba/ /spros bral dmigs su med pa'i don/ /lam chen bdag la stsal du gsol/ /de nas slob dpon sngags rig pa/ /de nyid bcu sbyar

mkhas pa bos/ /g.yon pas chos gos rtse bzung ste/ /lag pa g.yas chos phyag rgya can/ /gsang bstod 'dzum pa'i mdangs 'od rgyas/ /dad dang ldan pa 'di skad brjod/ /o~M bu shog theg pa chen po yi/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin phyir/ /gsang sngags spyod

tshul cho ga rnams/ /khyod la nges par bstan par bya/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje gsang sngags rab bsgoms pas/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes rnams/ /shAkya seng ge dpa' bos kyang / /gsang

sngags sbyor ba mnyam med kyis/ /bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa'i/ /dbung chen dag kyang 'dis bcom mo/ /'jig rten rjes 'dul rdzogs bya'i phyir/ /'khor lo bskor nas mya ngan 'das/ /de phyir kun thob bya ba'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /

sngags dang rdzas kyi bsrung ba dang / /lha yi rten mig de la mchod/ /u dum bA ra'i me tog ltar/ /'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen dag /brgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig /'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ngo / /sngags kyi spyod tshul 'byung ba ni/ /de bas kyang ni ches dkon

te/ /gang gis mtshungs med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /bskal pa du mar bsags pa'i sdig /gang la sdig khur ci yod pa/ /lha yi dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang / /byin brlabs tsam gyis byang gyur nas/ /blo gros dri ma med pa yis/ /spyod

tshul brlabs bzhugs nas lha/ /ngan 'gro sdug bsngal rgyun bcas nas/ /mtshan ldan sku ni gzhan don spyod/ /bdag nyid chen po khyer rnams kyis/ /rnyed pa mtshungs med de ring rnyed/ /gang phyir rgyal bsras bcas pas/ /bdag nyid chen po khyer rnams ni/ /gang

du skyes kyang gzung ba'i phyir/ /deng nas khyed rnams theg chen rigs/ /sha stag tu ni skye nges te/ /theg pa chen por cher 'byung ba/ /dpal dang ldan pa'i lam mchog 'di/ /gang du rgyas par khrid nas kyang / /bde bar gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de bas spro la

brtson par gyis/ /slob ma ku sha dge ba yi/ /stan la nyal nas rmi lam dri/ /bsang dang sbyang ba byas nas kyang / /chus bkrus 'di rnams bklag pa dang / /bkra shis du ma bklag byas te/ /gdong pa dar gyis bcings nas kyang / /'bras kyi me tog phreng ba ni/ /lha yi

dkyil 'khor dbus su dor/ /slar blangs mgo la bcing bya ste/ /pad+ma ldan rigs mtshan gyis brgyan/ /mig phye de la lha rnams dang / /byang chub phyogs chos mtshan ma yi/ /yon tan ye shes stobs mnga' ba/ /mchod rten lha tshogs bcas

ba bstan/ /yid ches dad ba mngon byas la/ /ci 'byor pa yis mchod par bya/ /de nas dag pa'i sras de la/ /mar me la ni mar me ltar/ /'dod pa'i lha ni stsal bar bya/ /brjod pa dang bcas 'brel pa yis/ /rtsa ba'i snying po nye snying tshogs/ /sngags kyang gsal

bar sbyin par bya/ /zhi ba shel gyi phreng ba ste/ /rgyas pa la ni a ru ra/ /dpar la lung thang dmar po shis/ /drag po rwa 'am ru drAk+Sha/ /po de tses ni las kun byed/ /sngags bcas stsal nas mgo la bcing / /hU~M dang bcas ba'i rdo rje yang / /lag pa g.yas su

gzhag par bya/ /stod g.yogs kriSh+Na sa ri ste/ /smad g.yogs kha dog sngon po'o/ /dbu rgyan rigs lnga'i kha dog ste/ /zhal zas snod ni pad+mas brgyan/ /sems can kun don spyod pa'i rdzas/ /thub pa'i bkra shis bzhes pa'i rtags/ /gdugs nya bum pa

dpal be'u dang / /rgyal mtshan 'khor lo pad+ma stsal/ /nad sel bde byed 'tsho ba'i phyir/ /'dod yon phyogs ris grub pa'i rdzas/ /gi'u wang dU ra pa li khri zho/ /bil ba sbrang rtsi a rur/ /ka ra bI ra'i 'bras bu rnams/ /hrIHzhes dag bas stsal bar bya/ /gur kum

ga pur gla rtsi dang / /ba yi 'o mas sbyar byas nas/ /tshig 'dis lce la gzhag par bya/ /o~M yan gar nges pa'i tshig rig dang / /ming gi rnam grangs chos rig dang / /dri ba lan ldon spobs pa rig /phyi nang mtshan nyid don rig shog /badzra d+harma pra be sha/ /o~M bcas

brjod cing lce la ni/ /lan gsum rdo rje gzhag par bya/ /hIHyig dmar po me 'bar bsam/ /gang la goms pa de 'byung zhing / /goms pa gzhan gyi dbang med na/ /rtog pa'i 'byung ba chad ba'i phyir/ /kun rtog phyag rgya la dmigs bshad/ /dmigs pa'i rten

gyi sngags la yang / byin brlab tha dad 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sa la dbang bskur thob 'dod pas/ /phyag na 'khor lo 'chang la dmigs/ /ting 'dzin brtan la rdo rje ste/ /dpal thob 'dod pas rin chen dmigs/ /gzugs bzang 'od pas pad+ma ste/ /spobs pa

'dongs pas ral gri'o/ /gzhan don 'dod pas rgya gram ste/ /rdo rje dkar pos sems gsal 'gyur/ /shes rab 'dod pas glegs bam mo/ /khang bzang gis ni mi'i rgyal po'o/ /thub gzugs rtag tu sangs rgyas 'jam/ /thal sbyar ba ni 'gro bas bkur/ /

'khar gsil byams dang snying rje skye/ /lcags kyu 'jig rten skyong bas bsrung / /rin chen ze'u 'bru lce bder 'gyur/ /dril bus skad snyan byed par 'gyur/ /bgrang phreng gis ni lung bstan 'thob/ /khri rkang gis ni nyed bang 'gyur/ /lha sogs bdug pa dung yin te/ /mdung

rtse gsum pas g.yul las rgyal/ /pad+ma dmar pos lha ru skye/ /ril pa spri blugs tshangs ris skye/ /sprin mdog lnga ni drang srong skye/ /me long gis ni lha zhal mthong / /pad+ma rA gas ye shes skye/ /pad+ma sngon pos dag ba'i zhing / /pad+ma dkar pos dge tshogs 'phel/ /

ri bos bu dang bu mo 'phel/ /dgra stas bdud kyi bar chad sel/ /'khor dang sems mthun 'bring g+ha ras/ /phub kyis dgra dang gcan gzan 'joms/ /rnga yab dkar pos sdig pa 'phyag /me tog snye mas nad sel byed/ /rin chen mdas ni yid 'ong grogs/ /gzhus

ni nor dang go 'phang rnyed/ /chu shes dug dang tshad rims sel/ /mi 'jigs phyag gis 'jigs skrag 'joms/ /dgra la rdo rje gtun shing ste/ /rdo rje nag po bdud 'dul 'gyur/ /rin chen ral gris rig sngags bzlog /lto ba na las lhung bzed de/ /rims nad sel

byed zhags pa'o/ /'bru 'dod pas ni 'phru'i snye ma/ /nor dbyig 'dod pas rin chen phug /yang na lung bstan 'dod pas na/ /mgo la sangs rgyas dmigs par bya/ /mngon par shes pa lnga 'dod na/ /sangs rgyas lnga po dmigs par bya/ /de nas mgon po spyan ras

gzigs/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis pad+ma'i zhal/ /sa yi snying po la gzigs nas/ /sa yi 'di gsungs so/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i rtog pa ni/ /gsang sngags thams cad sa bdun te/ /gsang sngags sa dang sngags sbyar sa/ /rig

'chang sa dang rig gsal sa/ /rig mchog sa dang rin chen sa/ /phyag rgya chen po'i sa rnams so/ /gtsug tor chen po'i sangs rgyas sa/ /gnas skabs drug tu rgyal bas gsungs/ /kun tu 'od dang pad+ma'i spyan/ /yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen sa/ /rdor 'chang

ye shes bla ma'i sa/ /rdzogs sangs bde ba chen po'i sa/ /sa'i snying pos gsol pa/ mgon po 'phags pa thugs rje'i spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /byin brlabs lcags kyu lta bus 'khor ba'i btson ra nas/ /klu phyugs 'bum phrag drangs ltar dge ba kun

slong gi/ /byang chub rin chen sa la 'jog mdzad ngo mtshar che/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las byin rlabs 'byung ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du/ /rab dga'i

tshul du 'khrungs pa'i lha/ /ting 'dzin yangs pa zhes bya ba/ /rtogs pa rgya che zab pa zhig /'khor dang bcas pa bzhengs byas te/ /me tog rin chen rigs byung ba/ /ston pa'i phyogs su char bzhin phab/ /mkha' la gdugs kyi bla re bkang / /'khor dang

bcas pas mgrin gcig tu/ /gsang bstod nas ni tshig 'di gsol/ /lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje theg pa bla med pa'i/ /rdo rje rig 'dzin mchog grub pa/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung phyir/ /bdag dang sems can kun tu yang / /dngos grub 'byung rim bshad

du gsol/ /la la sems ni g.yengs pa yis/ /bla ma'i rgyud don bral mod kyang / /sngags rgyud sdig pa 'chang byed 'byung / /snyan tshig rmongs rnams ngo mtshar skye/ /gdams ngag med pas 'gro ba bslu/ /dngos grub med pas bstan pa gzhig /sred pas lan cig

sogs par 'gyur/ /gnyis pa dmyal tshogs ngan 'gror 'gro/ /la la las kyi skye mched sgo/ /dbang po rten khang dmar myur la/ /gdams ngag rgyud tshul yod mod kyi/ /chos tshul bzhin du spyod byed cing / /gang la dbang du bzung ba yi/ /bu 'dra bas kyang brnyas gyur

nas/ /sdang ba 'phel nas rtsod par 'gyur/ /des kyang gnyis kar dmyal sogs 'gro/ /la la thos chung shes rab dman/ /rmongs pa gzhan rkyen nga rgyal can/ /bstan pa dang ni 'chang byed la/ /skyon smod smra bas dmyal sogs 'gro/ /la la mi dge'i bshes gnyen

gyis/ /log lam 'jug pa'i nges 'dzin can/ /yang dag lam smod brtson pa dor/ /log sgrub can de dmyal bar 'gro/ /la la bsam med sngags brjod med/ /mar me bdug spos gtor ma sogs/ /'byung pos brlams te bdag nyid dang / /'khor bcas tshe thung longs

spyod 'grib/ /la la 'dod sred gtum rdeb che/ /mkhas gzhan dag la phrag dog gis/ /sgro skur tshul 'chos chos la dmod/ /rang nyid lta ngan bsgrub la rtsod/ /ther zug blo yi mun pa can/ /'byung po drag po'i rigs su skye/ /la la ser sna rab 'jug pas/ /lha dang bla ma

tshig gis bstod/ /zas dang longs spyod rgyan gos dang / /me tog bdug spos gtor ma sogs/ /nyung du mug tshul rgyun stsal na/ /zas skom dag gis gdungs pa yi/ /dman pa'i rigs su ni/ /yang nas yang du skye bar nges/ /de phyir de dag spangs nas ni/ /

ya rabs bsam pa bzang ldan pas/ /tshul bzhin blangs te thos bsam gyis/ /gtan la phab don ma 'khrul bar/ /brjod cing yid la byed pa dang / /the tshom med par brtson byed pas/ /'gro tshogs sgrol byed thabs thob na/ /rang don 'ba' zhig smos ci dgos/ /de nas

lag na rdo rje gtso/ /ye shes mtha' yas mnga' ba'i skus/ /'gro la snying brtser rab gzigs nas/ /gsang ba'i skad kyis 'di skad gsung / /nga la nyan par brtson byed pa/ /shin tu legs so lha yi bu/ /lha dang dngos grub 'byung 'brel ba'i/ /ting 'dzin nga yis bshad

par bya/ /khyod nyid rtse gcig yid kyis ni/ /legs par nyon la yid la zung / /shin tu zab cing rgya che ba'i/ /dam chos thob pa shin tu dka'/ /rgyun chad med pa'i thugs rje can/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon po gtso/ /rang gi sems la bskyed

par bya/ /shin tu gsal na dngos grub 'gyur/ /dang po stong pa'i byang chub sems/ /gnyis pa yi ge byang chub sems/ /gsum pa sgro btags ming tshogs sems/ /bzhi pa gzugs brnyan phyag rgya'i sems/ /lnga pa byin brlab rgyas 'debs sems/ /sgra dang brag

cha'i tshul 'byung bar/ /gtso bo'i 'khor gyis khyad par gsol/ /dbus su yi ge o~M la ste/ /shar du hU~M ste lhor ni swA/ /nub tu hrIHyig byang du hA/ /rigs kyi rigs ni yang yang bskyed/ /lha ni gang du 'pho 'gyur bas/ /dkyil 'khor de yi rigs 'byung yin/ /rigs

kyi phyag rgya de nyid kyi/ /rig pa rigs kyi rgyas 'debs shing / /rigs kyi lha tshogs pho mo rnams/ /nyams dga' dben pa'i tshul gyis su/ /phan tshun du ni bltas nas gnas/ /ldem bag na bza' 'phyang 'phrul dang / /'phur lding sil snyan rin chen tshogs/ /du

ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan bya ste/ /la la ldem bzhengs 'gying dang bcas/ /la la rdo rje skyil krung bcas/ /la la pad+ma'i skyil krung ste/ /la la sems dpa'i skyil krung can/ /la la khro thabs brkyang bskum can/ /la la zhal phyag zhabs kyang mang / /la la zhabs ni gnyis

yin te/ /la la zhal gcig phyag kyang gnyis/ /la la pad sdong pad+ma can/ /la la pad+ma mi 'jigs phyag /gun d+he bum pa 'khar gsil dang / /rnga yab legs so skyabs sbyin phyag /rdo rje dril bu mda' gzhu dang / /'khar rnga shing rnga rdza rnga dung / /zangs lcags rdo dang rus pa'i

rnga/ /ring zlum rked nyag leb phyal che/ /chung phra sbom yangs dog pa dang / /ral gri chu gri gri dang / /gri leb gri zlum gri kyog dang / /sta zur sta leb phyal sta dang / /sta chung gzhog sta 'bigs sta dang / /zlum sta 'phreng sta gzhar sta dang / /mdung dang mdung rtse gsum 'phen

mdung / /'khor lo kha T+wAM gtun shing skyogs/ /snye ma tig bu me tog dang / /sdong bu lo 'dab yal ga dang / /ba dan bad gdugs rgyal mtshan spungs/ /rgya gram pad+ma rin chen sgrom/ /'khor lo glegs bam ut+pal lo/ /de la sogs te mchog mtha' yas/ /

phyag rgya stong snyed tshang pa'am/ /brgya rtsa brgyad dam bzhi bcu drug /nyi shu gnyis sam bcu gnyis drug /bzhi 'am gnyis sogs mos pas 'byung / /phyag rgya bcing ldan phyag rgya ste/ /des ni lha la rgyas 'debs byed/ /goms pa'i stobs kyis phyag rgya che/ /seng

ge'i sgra ni seng ge zhon/ /rgyal po rol pa'i stabs tshul can/ /rtse gsum sbrul dang mi 'jigs phyag /pad+ma sdong bcas ral gri 'bar/ /dpa' bo'i lcags kyu thod pa ni/ /nang ma bdun gyi cha gnas pa/ /gtum po drag po 'od ldan ma/ /g.yon du klu yi dbang

phyug mo/ /pad+ma dang ni zla ba'i steng / /phyogs mdog sems dpa'i skyil krung can/ /yid bzhin nor bu rta la bcibs/ /zhal gsum phyag drug 'khor lo dang / /rdo rje pad+ma rin chen phyag /skyabs gsol mchog sbyin phyag rgya can/ /'khor ni sems dpa'i skyil krung ste/ /

mdog bzang sgeg pa'i lha mo ni/ /yid myur rin chen bzang mo dang / /pad rgyal mo dang rta rna mo/ /rin chen pad+ma zla nyi la/ /'khor lo grogs kyi tshul du'o/ /pad+mo 'byung gnas rma bya zhon/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi ldem bag can/ /pad+ma skyabs sbyin lcags kyu dang / /

ril ba spyi blugs phyag na 'chang / /sgeg mo phreng ma glu gar ma/ /pad zla sems dpa'i skyil krung ngo / /mi bskyod pa ni mkha' lding bcibs/ /ral gri pad+ma mda' gzhu dang / /skyabs sbyin gang ba'i bum pa thogs/ /bzang 'dzin ma dang rnam sbyangs ma/ /sa srung mo dang rab

brtan mo/ /de dag gang gi cha byad mtshungs/ /don yod zhags pa klu steng bzhugs/ /rin po che dang zhags pa dang / /skyabs sbyin lcags kyu 'chang ba'o/ /seng ge mo dang glang po ma/ /stag gdong khyu mchog gdong ldan ma/ /pad+ma zla ba'i gdan la'o/ /ha la ha la ru sbal

steng / /rdo rje dril bu skyabs sbyin dang / /chos kyi za ma tog 'chang ba'o/ /nyi 'od ma dang zla 'od ma/ /chu dbang mo dang nor phreng mo/ /dge ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa'o/ /mgon po pad+ma rgyan lung che/ /chu srin steng du rol pa'i tshul/ /Da ma ru dang bgrang

phreng dang / /mi 'jigs phyag dang lcags sgrog go/ /lu gu rgyud ma 'khor lo ma/ /gsang ba mo dang ring bsrel mo/ /glang sor rdo rje chos dbang phyug /chos kyi 'khor lo chos 'chad rgya/ /skyabs sbyin pad+ma po tir bcas/ /dga' ba dga' skyes snang byed ma/ /sil snyan

ma rnams pad zlar ni/ /phyed krung ldem bag tshul du'o/ /rje btsun chos kyi gtsug tor ni/ /ha ri ha ri ha ri zhon/ /zhal gsum phyag ni brgyad pa la/ /'khor lo rdo rje mda' gzhu dang / /pad dkar bgrang phreng skyabs sbyin dang / /bdud rtsis gang ba'i bum pa 'chang / /

mkha' lding gdong ma shA ri'i gdong / /nyi zhal zla zhal lha mo'o/ /mgrin sngo dga' bo nye dga'i steng / /zhal gsum phyag drug pad+ma dang / /po ti skyabs sbyin bgrang phreng phyag /seng ge gdong mo klu zhal mo/ /dga' byed mo dang srog byed mo/ /pad zlar sems dpa'i skyil

krung ngo / /dbus su mgon po gdong bcu gcig /gsang 'dzin mo dang 'dzin pa mo/ /sngags srung ba dang grub srung ma/ /gong ltar cha byad phyogs mdog go/ /phyogs bzhi 'khor lo'i cha la ni/ /gtso bo sems dpa' bzhi dang bcas/ /shar du rdo rje dbang phyug ni/ /

thogs med yid dang grub dbang phyug /rdo rje phyag rgya gter sgrom can/ /kun kyang pad+ma zla ba la'o/ /lhor ni rin chen dbang phyug ste/ /grub chen dbang phyug dang phag zhal/ /grub pa'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug dang / /gru 'dzin dbang phyug ces bya'o/ /nub tu pad+ma'i dbang

phyug ni/ /skyes bu seng ge'i zhal dang ni/ /pad+ma'i phyag dang sbrul nag phyag /rtse bran rgyas 'dzin zhes bya'o/ /byang du dam tshig dbang phyug dang / /'khor lo 'chang dang stag lpags 'chang / /kun grub dbang phyug sgra dung 'phel/ /phyogs dang phyogs kyi mdog can no/ /

'jig rten skyong ba bcu po dang / /rgyal po chen po sde bzhi po/ /kun tu grags pa'i lha chen rnams/ /bstan la dga' ba dgod par bya/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das don du/ /rigs bzang skye ba bzhes dgongs pa/ /bskal pa bzang po 'di 'byung ba'i/ /sangs

rgyas stong yang dgod par bya/ /de ltar rgyas par spros pa ni/ /lha rnams grangs ni rgya che bar/ /chig stong nyis brgya bzhi bcu bdun/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i lha/ /mgon po gdong bcu gcig pa yi/ /lha grangs dkyil 'khor bkod pa'o/ /spyan ras

gzigs kyi dkyil 'khor bcu/ /'jig rten dbang gi dkyil 'khor lnga/ /rig pa'i lha mo'i dkyil 'khor lnga/ /rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bdun/ /dkyil 'khor de dag re re la/ /sems kyi dkyil 'khor lha mang ste/ /rang bzhin gyis ni nyi shu lnga/ /rgyu 'bras

tshul du rnam pa dgu/ /ye shes cha la lnga yin te/ /chos nyid ngo bos gcig tu rgyal/ /gang gang mos pa de dang de'i/ /dkyil 'khor rnam par spro ba 'am/ /gcig tu mos pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /byang chub rdo rje mchog thob nas/ /khams gsum rgyal por longs

spyod che/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/ /gtsang sbra che zhing dad sems can/ /rtse gcig sgrub la nan tan stsol/ /blo bzang 'gro la 'jug cing spyod/ /ngag snyan ngang gis khro ba med/ /g.yo sgyu 'dod brkam g.yeng ba med/ /lus ngag dal zhing thos pa mang / /

nga rgyal ser sna chags pa med/ /gtong phod snying rje drag ldan pas/ /spyan ras gzigs la gang dmigs nas/ /de yi snying po rtsa sngags la/ /bar chod med pas rab brjod nas/ /gzhan la phan phyir smon lam brjod/ /spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal

lo/ /gang la 'jigs pa brgyad snang tshe/ /khro bo chen po'i rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /de dag myur du sel byed shog /spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang la nad rims gang byung tshe/ /gso dpyad sman dang sman par ni/ /bdag nyid gyur nas myur sel

shog /spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo/ /mu ge'i nang du byung gyur tshe/ /phyogs gcig nas ni rnam g.yos nas/ /zas skom rgyun chad med par shog /spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang du 'khrug pa che byung tshe/ /

rang dbang gis ni sems gyur nas/ /bde bas phan tshun sdum par shog /spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo/ /byol song gcig la gcig za dang / /zas skom dkon dang gzhan 'jigs tshe/ /de dag sel ba'i skyabs gyur cig /spyan ras

gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo/ /zas skom gdungs pa dang / /log par lta ba'i gnas zhugs tshe/ /nad bral bdud rtsi kun snang shog /spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba'i skyabs dang thabs mkhas dang / /shes rab gru

dang ldan nas kyang / /thabs kyis sdug bsngal las grol shog /spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshul khrims zhags ldan lam la rtag /mya ngan 'das pa'i ri bo 'dzeg /'dus ma byas kyi khyim 'jug shog /spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag

'tshal lo/ /ngan song gnas rnams mthong nas kyang / /der phyin de rnams zad pa yi/ /gnyen po sa sar 'byung bar shog /spyan ras gzigs mgon phyag 'tshal lo/ /dmyal rnams tsha grang gcad gtubs tshe/ /go cha che dang bsil grib dang / /drod kyi

'od du gyur par shog /rig sngags yang yang brjod pa yis/ /yang dag lam nyid rtogs par shog /kun 'byung sa bon rul nas ni/ /sdug bsngal phung po skam par shog /mgon po mya ngan 'das thob nas/ /'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags

'gyur/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /bsnyen pas bgegs kyi mthu bcom nas/ /dngos grub myur du rnyed bya'i phyir/ /bsgrub pa la ni brtson par bya/ /zla ba dkar po'i tshes gcig nas/ /khrus byas gos sar gyon byas nas/ /sku gzugs

bzang po'i mdun 'dug nas/ /smyung bar gnas nas nyin gcig la/ /dus gsum sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad/ /brjod cing ci 'byor mchod par bya/ /chos brgyad tho rangs dus nas ni/ /dben par gdan khri bzang po la/ /sku gzugs nub tu gzigs nas

gzhag /bza' btung dang ra bas sbags pas mchod/ /a ka ru dang du ru ska/ /bdug pa rgyun du bsreg par bya/ /'bru dkar 'o ma'i zas bza' zhing / /zhag gsum bzlas pa ci nus bya/ /de nas zhag gsum bar du bdag /'o ma zho dang 'bras chan 'tshal/ /

lha la mchod pa cher bskyed nas/ /byang chub shing drung stong rtsa brgyad/ /du ru ska yi mar du sbang / /dum bu re re sngags re dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i drung du bsreg /sa yang g.yo zhing sku yang g.yo/ /steng zhal nas ni snyan pa'i sgra/ /legs so

legs so rigs kyi bu/ /khyod ni nan tan brtson 'grus can/ /'dod sman don gnyer gang yin pa/ /mkha' la 'bur ram rkang mgyogs sam/ /drang srong rig 'dzin rgyal po la/ /bdag dang skal ba mnyam 'dod na/ /de ring nyid du stsal bar bgyi/ /bco

lnga'i tshes la sku gzugs de/ /bde gshegs ring bsrel yod pa yi/ /mchod rten nang ngam drung du bzhugs/ /gso sbyong blangs nas smyung ba yis/ /skya snar me tog brgya rtsa brgyad/ /sngags re brjod pas sku la brdeg /de tshe mdun zhal rtsa ba nas/ /'brug

sgra chen po lta bu 'byung / /sa chen rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur/ /de cho bdag nyid ma skrag par/ /sngags bsgrub rjes su dran bya ste/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /thugs rje che dang ldan pa la/ /bdag nyid

gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi/ /mgon skyabs re gnas gyur nas kyang / /'gro ba kun gyi re 'dod rnams/ /tshul bzhin du ni skong bar shog /de tshe 'dod pa stsol ba la/ /lha klu tshogs kyi bar chad med/ /sngags kyi 'dod don

kun grub yin/ /bsod nams rdzogs byed smon lam mo/ /phyag 'tshal rten la bskor ba dang / /mchod rten brtsig dang dkyil 'khor ni/ /rnal 'byor yan lag las ldan pas/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir/ /rgyun chad med par brtson pa na/ /

dge byed smon lam rgyas pa ni/ /de dag myur du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de phyir smon lam mchog tu bshad/ /gang la dge spyod g.yel ba yi/ /le lo can ni bdud bzung nas/ /gya tshom smra zhing chos la smod/ /bstan pa 'jig par byed par 'gyur/ /de phyir dmangs

rigs gdol pa can/ /log spyod can ni ring du song / /ser sna le lo nga rgyal can/ /bag med g.yeng dang bcas pa ni/ /bdud kyi 'ching lam log lam pa/ /zhugs dang spar la gtang bar bya/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi

rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las dngos grub 'byung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas nad dang gnod pa sogs/ /sngags brjod tsam gyis bsal bar bshad/ /nad gdon gang dang gang la yang / /sngags pas drag tu gsal btab la/ /rang gis rtse

gcig sems kyis bzla/ /dang por snying rjer bcas pa yi/ /sngags kyis nad dang gdon las grol/ /de tshe mchod la brtson par bya/ /smyo nad nyin re ldang ba dang / /nyin gnyis pa 'am nyin gsum pa/ /nyin bzhi nyin bdun ldang ba'i rims/ /'byung po mkha'

'gro sha za 'am/ /smyo byed brjed byed lus srul po/ /'dre gdon drag pos bgyid mod kyang / /brgya rtsa brgyad kyis sel bar 'gyur/ /yang na srad bu kha dog lnga/ /mdud re sngags re brgya rtsa brgyad/ /mdud ldan mgul lam dpung par gdags/ /kha na ma

tho bsags pa yi/ /sgrib kun zhi zhing byang 'gyur na/ /bgegs sogs nad lta smos ci dgos/ /bde rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab po/ /skrangs dang 'bras kyi phreng ba dang / /shu ba phol mig rma mdze dang / /me dpal lhog pa g.yan la sogs/ /ma rungs

pa yi nad rnams dang / /ral gri mda' mdung la sogs pas/ /myos sam de yis nyen pa dang / /sbrul dang sdig pa rtsangs pa dang / /bung ba mchu rnon la sogs pa/ /gdug pa rnams la lan bdun dang / /brgya rtsa brgyad dang stong du brjod/ /yang na sa ser

'jim pas byugs/ /de yis nad las grol bar nges/ /bgegs sam rlung la sogs pa yi/ /gzhogs gcig phyogs su nad langs sam/ /rna ba 'on nam sna sub na/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa'am/ /'bru mar zho dang ru rta dang / /lan bdun brjod nas

sku byug dang / /zos shing rna ba snar byugs nas/ /sos par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' che/ /nyi 'od kyis kyang rig sngags 'chang / /bsrung dang lam 'gro bskyab pa'i phyir/ /byin brlabs ldan pa'i tshig 'di gsungs/ /na mo

bud d+hA ya gu ra be/ na mo d+harmA ya twa yi ni/ /na maHsang g+hA ya ma hA te/ tri b+h+yo pi swA hA nA ma/ nyin mtshan dus su 'di brjod pas/ /sdig kun byang zhing nad rnams zhi/ /lam du bgegs bdud mi phrad cing / /rtag tu sems dga' dam pas 'thob/ /byang chub sems dpa'

zla 'od kyang / /bsrung ba'i don du sngags 'di gsungs/ /sha ma ta he ru sha ho/ /Adz+nyA pa te/ su ru te/ shaM ke Te/ ba ra ma bya te/ su ru Te/ kA la Ta te/ khi ma te swA hA/ tshon sna lnga yi skud pa la/ /bdun bzlas mdud pa nyi shu gcig /na sar btags na nad sel

'gyur/ /gzhan yang yon tan grangs med 'thob/ /sbrul gyi rma ni sgo phye la/ /bdun bzlas rma khar btab na sos/ /seng ge stag gzig dom dred kyi/ /pags la nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags/ /brjod nas gra khrims can la bskon/ /de ma thag tu rims sel

'gyur/ /blo bur gdon gyis nyen pa la/ /lan bdun brjod pa'i gu gul bdug /ldong ros yungs kar lan tshwa dkar/ /sbyar nas nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod/ /nad pa'i mal bzhag nas bdugs na/ /'byung po 'bros te nad las grol/ /til mar nang du ru rta btsos/ /

byugs pas gzhogs nad rna nad dang / /zha grum myur du sel bar byed/ /yang na rtsi mar nyid la bya/ /til mar lte bar bskus pa yis/ /myur du bu thon 'gyur bar nges/ /lcim rtsas sha ma thon par nges/ /du ru ka dang sbyi mong sbyar/ /snying nad drag po

sel bar 'gyur/ /ba rog mo yi lci dron gyis/ /rma khar bslan na mes tshig sos/ /srin bu ring mo snying la za/ /rta dkar gcin la khyor gang 'thung / /des ni srog chags bud par 'gyur/ /'bras la rams kyi lo ma yi/ /khu ba bskol bas byug par

bya/ /bong bu'i rtug pa gsar pa bcir/ /nyal kar mig tu blugs na sos/ /mtshan ma skrangs la skud dkar ro/ /de ku nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas/ /brgya rtsa brgyad brjod shu dag dkar/ /dpung par btags pas g.yul las rgyal/ /phug ron ril ma nyi shu

brgyad/ /bzlas bcas bskus pas lcags sgrog dang / /shing sgrog la sogs grol bar nges/ /thal ba'am phye ma la ni sngags/ /stong bzlas me tog srin bu grol/ /gdon dang yams nad bzlog pa la/ /dri bzang chu la bzlas nas bkrus/ /bu med

bu 'dod don du ni/ /stong bzlas ba mar btung bar bya/ /byi ba sbrul dang ru sbal sha/ /phye ma gtor na phyugs rnams rengs/ /mar ga ni dang shu dag dang / /lga dang go snyod sbrang rtsi sbyar/ /sngags 'di yis ni shes rab 'phel/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+yA

ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ khA hi khA hi/ ba li te swA hA/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ /na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M pad+me phu/ ma hA pad+me phu/ pad+ma lo tsa ne phu/

a mo g+ha be te/ na mo a do ta ku tA ya/ sa ra sa ra/ gats+tsha gats+tsha/ i maM ma k+Shi ro gaM nA sha ya swA hA/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas kyang / /thal bas mig ni phyi rol bsku/ /mig nad thams cad 'joms par 'gyur/ /skud pa dkar po mdud pa bdun/ /sngags bdun

bzlas pas rna ba yi/ /nad rnams thams cad 'joms par byed/ /gur gum ka ra cha mnyam pas/ /sna yi nad ni sel bar byed/ /a ru ra yi phye ma dang / /sbrang rtsi bsres pa'i 'dag pas ni/ /so yi nad dang lce yi nad/ /thams cad 'joms par shes par bya/ /

o~M hU~M shrI hU~M shu k+She phu/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig chu la bzla/ /'thungs pas ma zhu'i gnod pa sel/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M rat+na she/ ma hA tsaN+Da a su ra marta ka /dz+wA la dz+wA la/ ts+tshin da

ts+tshin da/ hu ru hu ru/ ki ri ki ri/ ha na ha na/ sarba dz+wa reM ru dra ka /ban d+he na/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ sarba gra ha~M swA hA/ sngags 'di mtshal gyis bris nas kyang / /mgul du btags na nad rnams sel/ /gzhan yang rtsa ba'i sngags gang gis/ /las rnams de dang de la sbyar/ /

sbrang bu srin bu sbrul lhog pa/ /g.yen pa shu ba ske nad la/ /sbrang rtsi pi pi ling gis byug /gang zhig brtson du zhugs pa la/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa la/ /tsan+dan lde gu snying gar byug /gang gis mig nad sel ba la/ /shing dngar chu 'am spos chu 'am/ /la la

sha yi khu yis bya/ /rna ba la ni til mar gyis/ /gzhan gyi yi ge gsal ba dang / /'thab mo shags 'gyed 'gyur ba'i tshe/ /bum pa chu yis gdong pa bkru/ /gang yang byis pa bsrung ba ni/ /seng ldeng phur bu sor bzhi pa/ /pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / /don

yod zhags pa'i sngags ring dag /stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas btags na/ /tshe ring nyid du bde bar spyod/ /ba lang rwa dang po so 'cha'/ /shing kun dung sbrul pags pa dang / /ras ba las bon drung po dang / /de bzhin du ni ser po gnyis/ /nas kyi phub ma g.yengs pa'i

skra/ /byi la'i rtug pa bri ha ti/ /shug pa bya rog sgong dang / /ba lang rmig pa na le sham/ /da da ra dang lhan cig sbyar/ /de rnams bsres pa'i dud pa yis/ /bgegs rnams sel phyir du dra yi/ /dud pa bcu drug zhes bya ba'o/ /pu shel tse dang ba bla dang / /btsan

dug gi ni sbrul shun gyis/ /bdugs na rims nad thams cad sel/ /nad gzhan dag kyang sel bar byed/ /ba lang lci ba'i khu bar ni/ /so ma ra dza'i phye ma gdab/ /yi ge hrIHyis byin brlabs nas/ /mgrin pa sngon po'i rtsa ba'i sngags/ /brgya rtsa

brgyad brjod 'thungs pas ni/ /dug dang rims nad sel bar byed/ /skyer pa bskol ba'i khu bar ni/ /so mar dza'i phye mar sbyar/ /ril bu rgya sran tsam gyi tshad/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i sngags brjod nas/ /zos pa tsam gyis dug rigs rnams/ /zos kyang

lus la gnod pa med/ /'o mar yungs pa srang gcig bskol/ /so ma ra dza blugs te blud/ /so so 'chang la ha la'i sngags/ /brgya rtsa brgyad sngags grangs tshang ba/ /brjod de blud na skyugs nas ni/ /dug gis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /khyim gyi dud pa rgyam tshwa dang / /

skye du dmar rtsa lo mar bcas/ /phye ma mar sar sbrang rtsi bcas/ /ha ri chen po rtsa ba'i sngags/ /brgya rtsa brgyad kyis btung bar bya/ /sbrul nad thams cad sel bar byed/ /shu dag ru rta a ga ru/ /yung ba bong dang dkar po rnams/ /don yod zhags pa'i sngags kyis mnye/ /

byugs pas dug rnams thams cad sel/ /rgyam tsha srang gang mar srang gnyis/ /gcin srang brgyad dang lhan cig bskol/ /rdo rje chos kyi sngags kyis 'thungs/ /dug nad thams cad sel bar byed/ /rgyam tsha tshwa gsum mar srang bzhi/ /sbyar te mi shol sngags

brjod nas/ /byugs na reg pa tsam gyis ni/ /sdig pa sbrul gyis zin pa sel/ /ku ma ri dang ser po gnyis/ /lcim rtsa myang tshwa spar bcas la/ /gar dbang sngags dang chu yis btung / /dug nad thams cad sel bar byed/ /ser po gnyis dang ldong

ros dang / /go thal gur gum le brgan rtsi/ /pad+ma rgyan lung bsngags kyi btung / /dbyig dug thams cad 'joms par byed/ /gang la gza' dang rgya skar gyi/ /'tshe ba byung na de bsal phyir/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad maN+Dal gyi/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dbus

rnams su/ /mgon po 'jam pa'i rdo rje ni/ /mkha' lding gzugs su 'gyur ba la/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang bcu gcig gis/ /gus pa'i tshul du mchod byed bkod/ /nyi ma zla ba lag 'dzin pa'i/ /khyab 'jug gis ni byi ba'i gzugs/ /mnan pa'i

mkha' lding mig sman mdog /nor rgyas bu gnyis lha yi gzugs/ /mig gsum ldan pa brjid pa'i lus/ /rin chen lnga yi sder gshog can/ /rdo rje mchu rno khro dang bcas/ /nyi ma bye bas brgyan pa'i 'od/ /snying gar nyi ma 'od 'bar la/ /gaM yig nag po

sngags kyis bskul/ /sbu rnams zings kyis gyur nas kyang / /phyogs bcur rdo rje khyab par 'phro/ /gza' dang rgyu skar mog byas te/ /gdon dang klu rnams sreg par byed/ /thugs rje mi bshol ba yi sngags/ /'brug sgra lta bur gsal bar brjod/ /gang yang

grangs med stong phrag ni/ /las rnams thams cad sngags 'dis 'grub/ /mkha' lding dkar po brjid pa'i lus/ /klu yi gdon las sbyar bar bya/ /de la mgrin pa sngon po yi/ /rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bskul bas ni/ /sa steng gtum po klu yi gdon/ /du ma nges par

sel bar byed/ /klu dang tshangs pa'i srin po bsreg /'gro la mdze nad gtong bar byed/ /mkha' lding dmar po sbrul za ma/ /me tog thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ /g.yon na 'chang ste g.yas pa na/ /ral gri me 'od 'bar ba 'chang / /mgon po seng ge'i sgras bskul nas/ /dpa'

rlabs bskal ba'i me dang mnyam/ /sbrul dang rin chen dbyug tho can/ /mkha' lding sha za'i gdon la ni/ /mgon po ha ra'i sngags kyis bskul/ /mkha' 'gro'i gdon la mkha' lding ni/ /ljang gu ral gri phur pa 'chang / /pad+ma ral gri sngags kyis bskul/ /las

rnams gang dang gang la yang / /sngags dang phyag rgya ldan sbyor ba'o/ /ci ltar mos te phyag rgyar bcas/ /lus kyi phyag rgya sems kyi rgya/ /ngo bo nyid kyis mtshon pa yi/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas rgyas 'debs 'gyur/ /da ni phyag rgya bshad par bya/ /sku yi mdun du langs nas

kyang / /rkang pa g.yas pa yid tsam bskul/ /lag gnyis so sor thur du brkyang / /gung srin so sor mthil du bkug /mtheb mdzub dag ni so sor brkyang / /gru khug lag mthil mdun du bstan/ /'gro 'am 'dug kyang dgra dpung las/ /rgyal

phyir sngags 'di brjod par bya/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ /na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA ku ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M a ba te pa ra te/ e h+ye hi swA hA/ yang na sngon ltar lus bsrang ste/ /snying gar thal sbyar spro ba bsnol/ /mdzub mo gnyis

sbrengs rtse mo sprad/ /mtheb gnyis mdzub tshigs dang por bkug /lag mthil cung zad ma reg pa/ /gzungs sngags gang brjod phyag bya'o/ /bgegs kyi 'tshe ba 'byung ba'i tshe/ /sngags dang phyag rgya 'dis bsal bya/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ /na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te

shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M sarba d+harmA Ni maN+Da lA ya/ e h+ye hi pa ra ma shud+d+ha satwA ya swA hA/ yang na sgom la 'jug pas ni/ /thog mar phyag rgya 'di bcing ngo / /bus btsugs spyi bor thal mo sbyar/ /mdzub gnyis bkug la

rtse sprad nas/ /de la mtheb gnyis sbyar bar bya/ /'di ni bdud las rgyal bar nges/ /yang na lag gnyis rgyab sprad nas/ /sor mo rtse rnams reg par bya/ /mtheb gnyis brkyang nas mdzub nang sbyar/ /smin mtshams su ni gzhag par bya/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nam

Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M sarba duSh+Ta na mo badzrA ya me swA hA/ khyad par du ni lha mthong 'gyur/ /yang na 'greng ste mnyam gzhag rgya/ /snying gar bzhag la sngags 'di brjod/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba

lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M sarba de ba a na le swA hA/ glo bur rtsod pa rgyal byed yin/ /yang ni 'greng ste rting pa sprad/ /lag gnyis 'jigs byed tshul du bya/ /rtsa sngags gang rung brjod pas ni/ /ting 'dzin yan lag brtan par

'gyur/ /yang na pad+ma rgyan lung gi/ /rtsa ba'i sngags kyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag gnyis thal sbyar srin lag gis/ /mthe bo'i sen mo mnan byas te/ /mthe'u chung rtse mo'i gung mo sprang / /gshegs su gsol ba'i phyag rgya ste/ /dgug na mdzub rtse bskul zhing dgug /

yang na g.yas pa'i mdzub mo dgug /g.yon pa slar btang bya ba'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nam Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M brah+ma e h+ye hi swA hA/ yang na sor rtse rnams bskyed na/ /mdzub mo g.yab la lha chen

rnams/ /yang na phyag rgya 'di bcas la/ /nyi zla gza' bzung dus su ni/ /gzungs sngags ba mar la bzlas na/ /phyag rgya btab nas zos pas ni/ /shes rab 'phel dang tshe 'phel 'gyur/ /nad med gzugs bzang 'thob par nges/ /'grang ste rkang gshibs thal

sbyar nas/ /mtheb gnyis lag pa'i nang bkug pa/ /snying gar gzhag bya spyan ras gzigs/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i 'khor lo'i rgya/ /mchod sogs las kyi sdon 'gro ba'o/ /de bzhin sdig bshags la yang ngo / /mdzub bkug mthe bo sen mor bcas/ /lag gnyis

rgyab sprad gar dbang rgya/ /thal sbyar mtheb mdzub so sor brkyang / /mgrin pa sngon po'i phyag rgya'o/ /mdzub mo gnyis bkug lhag ma brkyang / /mi bshol ba yi phyag rgya'o/ /lag gnyis rgyab sprad mtheb gnyis brkyang / /bdug pa bzang la sngags 'di bzlas/ /na mo

rat+na tra yA ya/ nam Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ na mo rat+na sha ri tsan+d+ra a laM kA ra marga te dza su pra tsa ka bi sha rA dzA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M rat+ne rat+ne/ ta ta sha rat+na/ ta ta sha rat+na pri te ma he rat+ne pra b+ha te/ rat+na gar+b+he swA hA/ snga bar brgya rtsa brgyad

brjod do/ /nor yang thob pa'i gter rnyed 'gyur/ /'gro gzhan bdag la byams 'dod na/ /so shing la ni nyi shu gcig /ldob skyen 'dod pa shu dag la/ /stong rtsa brgyad bzlas snying gar bsku/ /gang bshad phyag rgya dang bcas pas/ /gdug pa'i sngags 'dis bgegs

kyang 'bros/ /na maHsarba bud d+ha d+harma saM g+hA ya/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ nam Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M hu pi hu pi/ ka pa du pi/ pra gA ya ni swA hA/ rnam grangs bdug

pas sangs rgyas bdug /lha rnams dag kyang mchod par bya/ /yan lag g.yas pa'i mthe bo ni/ /lag mthil bzhag nas sor mos dgab/ /rna ltag phyar nas mdzub mo ni/ /brkyang bskum bskul bas spro ba dang / /g.yon pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya ste/ /dus ma yin

par 'chi sogs bzlog /lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas kyang / /sor mo bsnol te bkod pa las/ /mthe bong mthe'u chung so sor ni/ /sprad de sprad pa shes rab rgya/ /oM sarba saM sho d+ha ni swA hA/ de bzhin bsnol te bkan pa yi/ /gung gnyis nang du gshibs bsgreng ba/ /

mar me'i rgya ste sngags 'di'o/ o~M dI pa ta lo tsa na swA hA/ de nyid sbubs nas gung mo gnyis/ /rtse sprad sbrengs pa bdug spos so/ /oM d+hU pa d+ha ta swA hA/ rting sprad so so rtsengs sar dgug /byug pa'i tshul ni byug pa'i rgya/ o~M d+ha le be t+ya swA hA/ rting sprad sor mo gyen du

bgrod/ /zhal nas 'thor tshul bshos kyi rgya/ /o~M nai bi d+yi pro k+Sha taM swA hA/ lag gnyis bkug nas rtse brgyad sprad/ /mthe bong gyen du yan pa ni/ /na bza' dam pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /o~M b+hA sa ra Ni swA hA/ snyim pa kha phye bteg pa'i tshul/ /ro ma stsal pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /

o~M A~M krU~M hrIH sa ka la g+ha na pa ri wa re naM/ pa ri ke ra a a/ a pa ta raM te/ a ba ta raM te/ a pa ta ra~M tu/ da sha di ka lo ka pA la/ sa pa ri wa re b+h+yaHi daM ba liM gr-ih+Nan+tu khA daM tu/ pi ban+tu/ ya thai ba~M ya the Sh+TaM/ dzaHhU~M baM hoH/ saM tr-i b+hA sarba satwA ni/ shAn+tiM ku ru/ puSh+TiM ku ru/

ba sha~M ku ru/ A ba ra Na ku ru gup+ti/ ka ro ta kurbAn+nyu/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra s+ya/ A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM Ad+yA nud pan+na twA ta o~M AHhU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M hrI dzaM b+ha la dza len drA ya swA hA/ longs spyod rtag phyir gnod gnas la/ /chu gtsang rtag tu

sbyin par bya/ /oM AHhrIHlo ke shwa ra hu nu smr-i ti ka rA ya swA hA/ rnams la sra ra zas/ /ci phyir chu dang bcas pa stsal/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa'i rnal 'byor grogs/ /lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang / /'byung po kun brtson 'gyur/ /sems kyi lcags

kyu ldan bya ste/ /nyon mongs sems la rab drangs te/ /lha klu 'bum phrag sems dga' ba'i/ /kun slong byang chub rin chen gyi/ /las la bsgyur ba'i lhag bsam bskyed/ /mdzad pa rgya che kun grub 'gyur/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i
