rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud las sngags kyi sbyor ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba/ /'khor gyi tshogs dang btsas pa zhig /mchod pa'i bkod

pa chen po dang / /bstod pa'i dbyangs dang bcas pa yis/ /bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas/ /bskor ba du ma byas nas kyang / /phyag 'tshal gsang bstod phyogs gcig 'khod/ /pus btsugs thal sbyar 'di skad gsol/ /mgon po yon tan kun

gyi rgyal/ /ye shes rmad kyi 'byung gnas gtso/ /thar pa'i lam chen nyi shar rgyal/ /'dren pa rgya mtsho phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan dpe mthar thug med pa'i sku/ /gzi brjid rgya che mkha' khyab la/ /blo gros yangs pa'i nam mkha' can/ /sku yi gsang ba

phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs dbyangs du ma bsam mi khyab/ /nam mkha' yangs pa'i mtha' bkang nas/ /tshad med yan lag bcu gnyis byung / /gsung gi gsang ba phyag 'tshal lo/ /ting 'dzin rnam thar bsam gtan sgo/ /bsam yas bsam du

med bsam pas/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i shes rab dang / /thugs rje'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba'i nyon mongs 'ching gcod pa'i/ /ma rig g.yul las rgyal byed pa/ /kun rtog dra ba sel ba yi/ /sgron ma de ring bshad du gsol/ /byis rnams mun

pa'i 'obs su ltung / /nyan thos 'dod chags tshogs kyis skrag /rang rgyal gsang ba'i bzod dang ldan/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'ching bas 'jigs/ /nyon mongs mnga' bdag gsang sngags la/ /shes rab snying rje'i sbyor ba yis/ /bag chags

bcas pa gtan spong ba'i/ /thabs mchog du ma bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa che/ /'od zer phyogs bcur rgyas byas nas/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs chen gsung snyan pas/ /nam mkha'i khams chen rab bkang nas/ /shes rab

snying rjer 'brel ba yi/ /sbyor ba'i cho ga du ma rnams/ /bsdus pa'i don du byas pa 'di/ /nyi ma'i snying po nyan pa ni/ /legs so byang chub sems dpa' che/ /dpal dang ldan pa khyod legs so/ /rtse gcig gus dang bcas pa yi/ /sems kyis

legs nyon yid la zung / /nyams dga' bde ba'i sa phyogs su/ /shin tu dga' ba'i sa las ni/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa bya/ /gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bcas/ /shar ram lho yi sgo gtod bya/ /dkar po ser po dmar po dang / /ljang gu'i

tshon gyis bri bar bya/ /dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /dkar po'i lte ba 'tsham bar dmar/ /mu khyud gnyis dang ldan pa'o/ /gser dngul zangs sam sa nyid la/ /bum pa lto yangs mgrin pa phra/ /kha g.yel zhabs tshod zhum pa la/ /shin tu gtsang

mar bkrus nas kyang / /ga pur gur gum cu gang dang / /gla rtsi gi'u wang chu yis bkang / /bya gri seng gri ha sa der/ /ka ri kar ni de ba ko/ /nas 'bras til gro mon sran dang / /gser dngul byi ru mu tig dang / /man shel yin te rin chen lnga/ /bum par

stsal nas ras dkar gyis/ /mgul ba bcings nas kha rgyan yang / /dri zhim shing lo me tog gzhag /me tog phreng dang bcas pa de/ /pad+ma'i dbus su bzhag nas kyang / /rgya mtsho chen por 'khrugs pa nas/ /dpag bsam shing chen 'bras bur bcas/ /'jig

rten dbang gis gang ba yi/ /sngags kyang mtha' yas khyab dmigs nas/ /sngags kyi mthu yis sangs rgyas nas/ /dgongs pa rgya chen skyes gyur te/ /legs so bkra shis 'bab par 'gyur/ /rgyal sras rnams dang rig pa yi/ /lha mo tshogs dang glu len

dang / /bkra shis du ma brjod par 'gyur/ /de tshe mkha' la ye shes kyi/ /'od zer bye ba phrag brgya yis/ /shing chen yongs su smin pa las/ /bdud rtsi char chen 'bebs par 'gyur/ /'jig rten skyong la gtor ma sbyin/ /rgyal dang rgyal sras mchod par

bya/ /skar ma la sogs 'bab pa'am/ /tshes gcig nas ni nya yi bar/ /sngags kyi phreng ba brjod par bya/ /lha la yang yang bskor bar bya/ /las rnams gang dang gang la yang / /lha yi dbang gyur sbyar bar bya/ /de dang de ni las rnams la/ /ci bde bar yang

sbyar bar bya/ /phran tshegs las la spyan ma'i sngags/ /lhog pa 'brum bu la sogs la/ /mi bshol ba yi sngags kyis sbyar/ /gdon rigs bzlog la gar dbang ste/ /byad stems rig sngags bzlog pa la/ /don yod zhags pa'i sngags kyis bkru/ /shes

rab 'phel ba rdo rje chos/ /klu nad ha la ha las sel/ /tshe 'phel pad+ma rgyan lung ste/ /mgrin sngon sngags kyis dpal 'phel byed/ /ha ri chen po bdug spos te/ /gdong bcu gcig pas glo bur sel/ /seng ge sgras ni mdze nad sel/ /rnal 'byor yo byad

'dod pas ni/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i sngags kyis bkru/ /bkra shis rol mo du ma dang / /gtsang sbra gos gsar ldan pa yis/ /snyan pa'i gdangs dang ldan pas bkru/ /myur du sgrib pa 'byang ba dang / /'dod yon kun grub sngags phreng ni/ /gang dang gang yang

sbyar bar 'gyur/ /phran tshegs gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /zla ba gzas bzung gyur pa'i tshe/ /mar srang gcig ni dngul snod gzhug /sku gzugs mdun bzhag sngags brjod nas/ /zla ba sos nas mar blangs te/ /zos sam lus la byugs pa yis/ /nad

rnams zhi zhing bde bar 'gyur/ /ldong ros gi'u wang cha mnyam pas/ /sku yi mdun bzhag sngags stong bzla/ /chus sprus dpral bar thig le ni/ /khams gsum mthong zhing 'dod gsum 'grub/ /chu dron sbyar nas lus bkrus na/ /nad dang bgegs

rnams dag par 'gyur/ /bse 'bras la ni brgya rtsa brgyad/ /bzlas nas khro zhal g.yas la byug /dgra dpung phyogs su bstan na ni/ /dgra g.yul shin tu nyes par 'gyur/ /bal bu 'bras bu sngags rer bcas/ /bal bu le la brgya rtsa brgyad/ /sku yi drung du

bsregs pas ni/ /mi yams phyugs nad thams cad 'chad/ /skud pa gtsang ma mdog dmar po/ /sngags re btab pa'i mdud pa bdun/ /zhal gcig steng zhal btags nas ni/ /nad pa la btags rims nad zhi/ /sngags re mdud pa nyi shu gcig /

mdun zhal steng bzhag blangs btags pas/ /mkha' 'gro 'byung po ro langs gdon/ /drag pos zin pa 'joms par byed/ /gal te des kyang ma sos na/ /mdud re brgya rtsa brgyad brjod nas/ /zhal gcig mdun zhal dbur btags te/ /blangs te btags

na nges par grol/ /sdug bsngal nad pa yun gdungs/ /khyim du 'dre gdon 'jigs zhugs nas/ /'bru re sngags re thang 'brom 'bras/ /sku mdun brgya rtsa brgyad grangs te/ /gong ltar bsgrubs pa'i skud pa yang / /lus la btags na grol bar

nges/ /mi mdza' ba dang 'khrug pa dang / /byad stems drag po bzlog pa la/ /sku la spos dang me tog mchod/ /bi nA ya yi gzugs mdun du/ /bra bo'i 'bras bu dgra ming bsreg /sngags re mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad/ /mdud ldan g.yon gyi khro zhal gdags/ /

zhag bzhi lon nas sku las dgrol/ /mdud pa re re'i bar du ni/ /sngags re brjod cing bcang bar bya/ /bdag la sdang byed skyabs su 'ong / /rdzas dang sngags kyi nus pa'o/ /brtson pa'i bar chad bsal ba ni/ /tshon sna lnga yi skud pa la/ /mdud re sngags re brgya

rtsa brgyad/ /mdud nas mdud bzhag steng btags pa/ /zhag gcig lon dgrol lus btags na/ /las rnams bkra shis tshul du 'grub/ /gang zhig bsgribs pa'i gshegs ldan pas/ /las gang 'dod bzhin mi 'grub cing / /dus dus bkra mi shis byung na/ /

gtsang sbra bum chu bzang po gnyis/ /brgya rtsa brgyad bgrangs re re brjod/ /dang pos sku gzugs bkru bar bya/ /gnyis pas bi nA ya ka bkru/ /brgya rtsa brgyad kyis sngags btab nas/ /rang nyid de nas bkru bar bya/ /bar chad byang nas 'dod kun 'grub/ /ci ltar

sprul pa'i gdon bsal phyir/ /byi la'i mgo rus thal ba dang / /sa bzang chu gtsang sbrus pa'i sa/ /byi la yi ni gzugs byas te/ /sku yi mdun du bzhag nas kyang / /khro zhal g.yon par srad bus gdags/ /rta mgrin sngags ni stong phrag brab/ /

gzungs brgya bzlas pa'i ral gri yis/ /dum bu brgya rtsa brgyad du gtub/ /dum bu re re sngags re dang / /dong gi nang du dor bar bya/ /de dag gnod pa gtan du sel/ /mig nad sna tshogs ma rungs la/ /'bras bu gsum pa zhib tu btags/ /sbrang

dkar khye'u 'tsho nu zhor bcas/ /bu btsas gsar pa'i bud med dang / /khyi phag dag gis ma mthong byas/ /thum po 'dzum pa'i zhal la btags/ /sngags stong bzlas nas sbyar ba des/ /mig tu blugs na mig 'bras skye/ /mig nad thams cad sel bar

byed/ /mig rnon dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur/ /lhag ma ma yin khron pa'i chus/ /ga bur gu gul cha mnyam bskol/ /khyor gang bldag par 'gyur ba de/ /rtsa ba'i zhal gdangs sngags stong bzlas/ /bkrol nas ril bu byas mid na/ /ha la ha

la'i dug 'joms 'gyur/ /glang po dkar po'i gi'u wang ni/ /mthing bum bzhag nas sku yi mdun/ /stong rtsa brgyad bzlas yan lag bskul/ /dpral bar thig le byas gyur na/ /lha klu 'byung po mi rnams dga'/ /khyo shug mi mthun brtags pa la/ /dur

pa'i mjug sgro sku'i mdun du/ /stong bzlas lag tu blangs na 'dum/ /chu skam pa 'am char med na/ /ling ga'i drung du sku bzhugs la/ /cher mchod nas ni sku'i mdun du/ /stong brjod chur skyes char chen 'bebs/ /gang zhig char che ring

'dod ni/ /'gog par snyoms zhugs phyag rgya bcing / /sku yi mdun du rtag par ni/ /a ka ru nag bdug pa sogs/ /mchod pas rgyun du mchod bya zhing / /brgyad nas nya bar sngags stong brjod/ /mig gi mngon shes bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /dri zhim

dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la/ /rgyal mtshan ba dan kha dog bzhi/ /bla re yol ba dkar po yi/ /dbus su pad+ma lnga bris te/ /ring bsrel ldan pa'i sku gdung bzhugs/ /tsan+dan dkar po'i dri chu dang / /bdug pas rgyun du mchod par bya/ /ba mdog ser

skya'i mar gyi ni/ /sgron me'i phreng bas mchod par bya/ /man shi ri ka ku shu dang / /pad+ma dmar dang sngon po dang / /rgya mtsho chab kyi dbu ba dang / /nya rkun nag po'i smyu gu dang / /ma brlabs pa dang gu gul dang / /ku ba nas dang gi'u wang dang / /gur

gum dmar dang ser po dang / /tsha ba gsum dang cha mnyam brdungs/ /de rnams phyed tshad gla rtsi dang / /ga bur stsal nas re re'i tshad/ /sngags ni stong phrag re re'i grangs/ /sku yi mdun du brjod par bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor dbus bzhag nas/ /sngags

khrir bcas te nya la ni/ /zangs kyi za ma tog tu stsal/ /sku yi steng zhal btags nas ni/ /mchod pa byas nas gsol ba gdab/ /'khar ba'i thur mas mig tu stsal/ /ling thog gam ni mchi ma 'dzag /sprin dkar sprin dmar g.yos pa dang / /klad pa

na dang mig nad dang / /glo bur long dang thibs pa sel/ /nyin gnyis bskus na lus kyi nad/ /bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi sel bar 'gyur/ /gsum pa gdon rnams 'bros par 'gyur/ /bzhi pas sgrib pa thams cad byang / /lngas ni rtsod pa'i g.yul las rgyal/ /drug

pas rmi ngan byad stems sel/ /bdun pas glo bur 'chi ba med/ /bdun phrag gnyis kyis dbang phyug 'thob/ /gsum gyis 'byung po dbang du 'gyur/ /bzhi pas gnod sbyin lnga pas klu/ /lnga pas lha mi srin po rnams/ /drug pas mkha' lding ri bdun lha/ /bdun

pas nag po chen po 'grub/ /brgyad pas ma mo dgus gter mthong / /bcu pas 'gro ba'i sman par 'gyur/ /bcu gcig lha mo'i khang par phyin/ /bcu gnyis rig 'dzin drang srong khyim/ /bcu gsum klu yi khang par phyin/ /bcu bzhi sum cu gsum pa'i gnas/ /

lnga mtshan mo kun mthong ste/ /bcu drug khams gter mthong bar nges/ /bcu bdun rdo rje sa gzhi dang / /rlung gi dkyil 'khor thogs pa med/ /brgyad pa ni nyi ltar mgyogs/ /bcu dgu rgyal sras kun mthong 'gyur/ /nyi shus spyan ras gzigs nyid kyis/ /

lung bstan dam chos bshad par 'gyur/ /nyi shu gcig gis gzugs khams phyin/ /mngon shes lnga dang ldan par 'gyur/ /lo gcig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi/ /zhing khams du mar phyin pa dang / /dam chos nyan dang zhing spyod 'gyur/ /mig sman sbyor ba bla med 'di/ /

sangs rgyas mu stegs can la gsang / /de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /sna tshogs sman gyi sbyor ba yis/ /bdag dang 'gro ba ma lus pa'i/ /'dod pa'i don kun 'grub byed nyon/ /ga bur gla rtsi gi'u wang dang / /gur gum dzA ti li shi dang / /ka tan la dang sug

smel dang / /tsan+dan dkar dang pad+ma dang / /gser gyi me tog ut+pal sngo/ /re re la yang sngags stong bzla/ /sbrang rtsi dkar po lhan cig sbru/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su sku yi zhal/ /dbu ma la ni gdags bya ste/ /tshes gcig nas ni bcu bzhi'i bar/ /nyin re sngags

stong brjod par bya/ /mchod pa rgya cher mchod par bya/ /bstod dang gsol ba gdab par bya/ /dge slong dge tshul dge bsnyen gang / /lnga'i nyin par lnga stong bzla/ /de nas gtsang ma'i snod bzhag ste/ /dgos pa gang dang gang la yang / /lha ni de dang de dag

sbyar/ /gang la bgegs kyis gnod gyur nas/ /pad+ma gar gyi sngags kyis bdun/ /'go ba'i nad yams bsal ba dang / /ha la ha la'i sngags bzlas pas/ /gos la sogs pa bdug par bya/ /gzhan dag dga' bar 'dod pas ni/ /yid

bzhin nor bu'i phreng sngags kyis/ /mig gi steng du byug par bya/ /rgyal po rgyal mo la sogs pa/ /pho mo dbang du bya 'dod na/ /rdo rje chos kyi phreng sngags kyis/ /dpral bar thig le bya ba'o/ /mdze la sogs pa'i nad la ni/ /seng ge sgra yi phreng

sngags kyis/ /lus la reg pa bde bar byug /long du zhugs pa'i nad la ni/ /ha ri chen po'i sngags dang chus/ /rang gi khong du btung bar bya/ /byad stems rig sngags bzlog pa la/ /don yod zhags pa'i sngags kyis bdug /dug nad sel la mgrin

sngon te/ /sgrib pa sbyong ba'i don du ni/ /gdong bcu gcig pa nyid kyis sbyar/ /rgyal srid thob par byed pa ni/ /mgon po pad+ma rgyan lung ngo / /de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba/ /'byung po sha za mkha' 'gro dang / /lus srul po dang brjed byed kyis/ /nyin gcig

nas ni nyin bdun bar/ /glo bur ba yi rims rnams dang / /rtag pa'i rims dang drag po'i rims/ /brtun byed la sogs rims rigs dang / /glo bur ba dang rtag pa'i gdon/ /nad drag po ni ji snyed dang / /dug rigs rims dang lba ba dang / /'bras dang

lhog pa me dbal dang / /shu ba rngo dang 'brum bu'i rigs/ /phol mig me dbal bal ldog sogs/ /mngon du gang dang gang snang la/ /sngags stong bzlas pa'i 'jim pa ni/ /sku zhal dbus la btags nas ni/ /mchod pas mchod de sngags khri brjod/ /tshes

gcig nas ni tshes brgyad bar/ /gsol ba yang ni gdab byas nas/ /tshes dgu'i snga dro dgrol bar bya/ /bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod/ /dri bzang byugs pas nad rnams sel/ /cho ga de ltar ldan pas ni/ /sna nad ru rta 'bru mar byug /yang na gre bar sngags

bcas gdags/ /byis pa gdon gyis nyen pa la/ /'bru mar ram ni srad bu bya/ /dud 'gro la ni chu nyid dam/ /yang na srang bu bya ba ste/ /rtsi mar dag gis mchog tu 'gyur/ /sbyor rnams gang dang gang la yang / /sku byad mtshan dpe ldan pa ni/ /

me long nang gi gzugs ltar dmigs/ /gsol ba btab pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /dang po skye mched drug ldan sems/ /thun mong rigs can sra ba'i khams/ /gnyis pa mos dang ldan pa ni/ /thun mong kun du zhugs pa'i rigs/ /gsum pa rigs

pa'i rtags ldan pa/ /rig 'dzin gsang sngags 'chang ba'i rigs/ /bzhi pa lhag sems mthun ldan zhing / /gsang sngags sngon du gyur ba yi/ /lnga pa blang dor med pa'i sems/ /drug pa bdag gzhan dbyer med sems/ /bdun pa chos rnams

rgyal ba'i sems/ /brgyad pa 'phags pa'i bden pa'i sems/ /dgu pa rten 'brel zab snang sems/ /bcu pa mtshan bral grub pa'i sems/ /bcu gcig mtshan bral snang ba'i sems/ /bcu gnyis chos kyi sgo yi sems/ /bcu gsum lhag par

'byung ba'i sems/ /bcu bzhi shes bya mthar thug sems/ /rgyas dang gsal dang khyab pa dang / /rtag dang 'gyur med gya nom pa'i/ /gnas skabs bcu bzhir rab tu rtogs/ /sems rtogs gyur nas sangs rgyas chos/ /rgyud kun du ni rgyal bas bshad/ /

'od zer lcags kyu khyud mo'i ri yi bar/ /spros pas lha 'bum phrag dge kun slong sems/ /dkar po skyes nas byang chub rin chen gling / /thob mdzad blos bsgyur 'di ni ngo mtshar che/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba

zhes bya ba las sku la rten pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //de nas 'jig rten skyong ba'i tshogs/ /rgya chen rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /shar lho mtshams na bzhugs pa yi/ /nya na ka zhes la sogs pa/ /drang srong tshogs rnams mgrin

gcig tu/ /bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol/ /oM kun mkhyen ye shes nyi ltar lha/ /mtshan dpe du mas brgyan mdzad pa/ /bdud las rgyal ba rkang gnyis mchog /'dren pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhi ba chags bral

'od gsal ba/ /rgyun chad med pa'i 'khor lo'i tshul/ /skye rga na 'chi las sgrol zhing / /rnam dag bsgrub gsum chos phyag 'tshal/ /sa chen sa chen gzhan rnams kyang / /sa la 'dren mdzad tshogs chen rdzogs/ /rgyun mi 'chad du sku 'byung ba/ /

thal sbyar pus btsugs phyogs gcig 'khod/ /de nas rgyal ba kun gyi yab/ /dbang phyug chen po mchog gi lha/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang thugs rje can/ /'gro la thugs brtse'i slad du ni/ /rig sngags bla na med pa gsung / /sngags de

myur du 'grub pa dang / /skongs dang ngag la sel ba'i phyir/ /me yi las la brten pa'i phyir/ /sbyor ba rim pa bshad du gsol/ /de skad gsol nas drang srong tshogs/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas kyang / /mchod pa'i char chen phab

pa ste/ /thal sbyar pus btsugs phyogs gcig 'khod/ /de nas rgyal sras kun gyi yab/ /'gro ba'i gnyen gcig 'dren pa'i gtso/ /sbyin sreg las kyi cho ga 'di/ /nan tan du ni bka' stsal to/ /sa bzang dri bzang chur bcas pas/ /

dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa bya/ /'bras phye ba mar 'bru bzang rnams/ /shing rtsi shi 'am brgya rtsa brgyad/ /bsgrags pas nad yams gnod pa zhi/ /nad la mar lhag nyung zhig btung / /nad gzer gang yang 'joms par 'gyur/ /yang na

'bru men phye ma 'am/ /sa 'am spra tshil gzugs byas te/ /srad bus khro ba'i zhal btags nas/ /rig sngags brgya rtsa brgyad brjod de/ /ral gris gtubs nas sbyin sreg bya/ /brgya phrag lngas ni sdang byed nyams/ /yang na dug gis gzugs

brnyan btum/ /dug khrag nim pa'i shing la bsreg /drug cu rtsa bzhi grangs kyis ni/ /tshar bcad pa yi dbang du 'gyur/ /'byung po drag po zhen pa la/ /gu gul yungs kar de ltar bsreg /bal po se'u lcug ma la/ /bu ram sbrang rtsi

zho mar sbag /sku yi mdun du bsregs pas ni/ /'go ba'i nad yams 'chad par 'gyur/ /gu gul dkar po nyi shu gcig /bsregs na byang chub sems dpa' 'gugs/ /zho mar sbrang rtsi lung tang shing / /nyi shu rtsa gcig sku mdun

bsreg /sa chen rgyal sras kun mnyam pa'i/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po des rnyed 'gyur/ /gang gi bsod nams rgyas 'dod na/ /dri bzang chu dang sa gtsang la/ /gru bzhi khru gang dkyil 'khor bya/ /dri bzang shing la khru gang brtsig /many+dzu sha ka

yungs kar sbrang / /'o ma zho mar a ka ru/ /tsan+dan dkar po dmar po dang / /dri zhim mtho gang tshad kyi shing / /'bru bzang tshad dang bcas pa dag /dang por sngags stong bzlas nas kyang / /brgya rtsa brgyad du bsgrags pa yis/ /tshe ring nad med

rgyal srid 'thob/ /stong gis 'jig rten pa dag 'grub/ /khris ni 'dod pa'i lha yin te/ /'bum gyis gzugs khams mngon du gyur/ /sa yas rgyal sras kun mthong zhing / /mngon shes drug dang ldan par 'gyur/ /bye bas rgyal ba kun mthong

zhing / /zhing khams du ma spyod par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang phran tshegs las rnams la/ /ci srid nyi shu rtsa gcig nas/ /brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du sbyor/ /sngags dang lha la sems brtan bya/ /nad yams drag po bsal ba la/ /gtso bor 'bras

bu gsum bsreg go/ /gdon chen rnams ni bsal ba la/ /gu gul sgog pa rnga mo'i sha/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bsreg par bya/ /rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan/ /phra mo nad dang gdon rigs la/ /dUr ba yungs kar mchog tu bshad/ /'bru rnams gang dang

gang 'dod la/ /'bru rig de nyid sbyin sreg bya/ /char pa dbab par 'dod pas ni/ /tsam pa ka dang rnam gsum dang / /mngar gsum nA ga ge sar dang / /dbang po lag gi sbyin sreg ni/ /ci 'dod char pa 'bab par 'gyur/ /gal te bcad par

'dod pas ni/ /thal ba de dang yungs kar gyis/ /nan tan phyogs bzhir gar dbang gi/ /sngags kyis yang yang gtor bar bya/ /yungs kar zho mar sbrang rtsi dang / /'bras yos kyis ni byis pa sos/ /gdon nam rims las 'jigs pa dang / /khyim

bsrung bar ni 'dod pa yis/ /pad+ma dmar po'i sbyin sreg ni/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig kho na bya/ /sems bzang gnyugs ring 'dod pas ni/ /tsan+dan dkar po'i sbyin sreg bya/ /phran tshegs yams nad sel ba la/ /lo ma tsam gyi sbyin sreg bya/ /phyugs nad sel

bar 'dod pa'i tshe/ /'o ma me tog dkar bcas bsreg /nad dang gdon bcas sel ba la/ /mngar gsum 'bru bzang ga pur bcas/ /dUr ba dkar po'i yams shing rnams/ /bud shing 'o ma can rnams ni/ /me tog bzang po'i shing la bsreg /

gdon nad zhi bar 'dod pas ni/ /'bras bu gsum sogs shing rnams bsreg /gdon phran la ni mngar gsum dang / /dUr ba dkar po bsregs pas zhi/ /rmi lam ngan dang ltas ngan gang / /'bras phye mar sngags sel bar byed/ /gos dang snod

bcad rdzas dang lus/ /gzhan grib ngan pas gos pa la/ /'bras phye mar dang spos dkar dang / /me tog dkar po bsreg par bya/ /ting lo byid kyi me tog bsreg /mig nad thams cad sel bar byed/ /ma su li ma rtsa bar bcas/ /bsreg

na rna ba'i nad sel 'gyur/ /tsan+dan gla rtsi ba mar bsregs/ /sna yi nad rnams thams cad sel/ /mu zi gu gul ri lu bsregs/ /so dang lce yi nad sel 'gyur/ /so naM dza dang ka ku ra/ /bsregs pas ske nad 'joms par byed/ /sbrang rtsi tsan+dan sha ka

ra/ /bsregs pas glo nad sel bar byed/ /'bras bu gsum dang zho sha lnga/ /bsregs pas snying nad sel bar byed/ /'u su sbrang dang byi dang ka/ /bsregs pas mchin pa'i nad sel 'gyur/ /me tog kha dog lnga bsregs na/ /pho ba

la sogs nang grol nad/ /ma lus thams cad zhi bar byed/ /lus mdzes pa yang thob par 'gyur/ /nor 'dod pas ni seng ldeng mer/ /ba ser zho dang mar bsreg bya/ /gos mdog gang dang gang 'dod la/ /de dang mtshungs pa'i me tog dang / /

srad bu sor ni bcu gnyis pa/ /shing mdog de dang mthun pa yi/ /dri zhim dag la bsreg par bya/ /rnyed 'gyur the tshom mi bya'o/ /pri yang ku dang ka ling ka/ /pad+ma'i ze ba yal sdong la/ /bsregs cing gsol ba gdab pa ni/ /gter gyi longs

spyod rgyas par 'gyur/ /'bras dang myu gu'i 'bras bu sogs/ /bsreg na longs spyod brtan par 'gyur/ /dan Dod pa la 'bras bu gsum/ /brgya bsregs bu dang bu mo 'phel/ /'bras yos 'phel bar 'dod pas kyang / /spri ka dza ti me tog

dkar/ /ba dkar 'o ma zho mar bcas/ /bsregs pas 'khor dang dmag dpung 'phel/ /de 'bum grangs kyis rgyal srid 'thob/ /mngar gsum bil ba'i 'bras bu la/ /'bum gyis rang nyid rgyal por 'gyur/ /sngags mthu rgyas pa'i don

du ni/ /nim pa'i shing la mar dang ni/ /yungs kar dkar po sbrang bcas la/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bsreg par bya/ /gang gis rgyal po 'khor dang bcas/ /dbang du bya bar 'dod pa yis/ /yungs kar rgyal ba'i yungs kar bcas/ /rgya sran

drug tu bsreg par bya/ /gnod sbyin mo rnams dbang 'dod na/ /mya ngan med pa'i yam shing la/ /'bras bu gsum dang gur gum ni/ /stong phrag gcig tu bsreg par bya/ /gnod sbyin tshogs dbang byed pa la/ /'bras bu gsum pa'i shing la

ni/ /'bras bu gsum dang gu gul la/ /stong phrag gnyis su bsreg par bya/ /lha rnams dbang du bya 'dod pas/ /a rur yi shing sa ra la/ /'o ma zho mar sbrang rtsi la/ /sum stong bsregs pas lha dbang 'gyur/ /bud

med dbang du 'dod pas ni/ /til dang 'bras sogs phub ma la/ /'bras dang rang byung brgya rtsa brgyad/ /bsregs pas bzang mo dbang du 'gyur/ /byis pa dbang du 'dod pas ni/ /pri yang ku yi sbyin sreg bya/ /las rnams gang dang gang la

yang / /de dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis sbyor/ /zhi ba zhi ba'i yid kyis te/ /skal bzang blo ni rgyas pa la/ /chags dang 'dun sems ldan pas ni/ /dbang du 'gyur la the tshom med/ /khro dang bcas pa'i yid kyis ni/ /drag po'i las su

'gyur ba yod/ /brtan po dal 'byor ldan pa'i blo/ /rgyun rtag gsal ba yod gyur pas/ /ci ltar bsam pa de 'grub kyi/ /gzhan du yang ni de ltar min/ /mig la skyon zhugs lus kyi ni/ /dngos gang gsal bar blta ba ltar/ /bla ma dang ni

bral gyur na/ /sngags kyi byin brlabs snang ba med/ /lus ngag yid kyi sgo nas kyang / /rnam pa kun du bla ma la/ /smod pa 'bad de spang bar bya/ /smad pas dmyal sogs ngan 'gror 'gro/ /bla ma'i ngag las byung ba dang / /ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag

rgya mchod/ /o~M ru ru s+phu ru dz+wA la tiSh+Tha sid d+ha lo tsa ne sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ bsang gtor dang ku sha dgram pa'i sngags so/ /o~M dz+wA la dz+wA lA na lArka swA hA/ /sbar ba'i sngags so/ /na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA NAM/ o~M ag+na ye A dI pya a bi sha ma hA shri ye ha bya ka bya ba ha nA

ya swA hA/ /mchod mar gyi sngags so/ /o~M sarba pA pa~M da ha na badzrA ye swA hA/ /til gyi sngags so/ /o~M sarba saM pA de swA hA/ /zho dang zan dam pa'i 'o/ /o~M badzra b+ha smiM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ /ut+pa la lo/ /o~M badzra puSh+Ta ye swA hA/ 'bras kyi 'o/ /o~M badzra a

pra ti ha ta badzra swA hA/ ku sha'o/ /o~M badzra bi dzA ya swA hA/ lag pan gyi'o/ /o~M badzra mA le puSh+pa ye swA hA/ mngar gsum dang dkar gyi'o/ /o~M badzra ma hA be gA ya swA hA/ nas kyi'o/ /o~M ma hA ba lA ya swA hA/ /sran ma ma sha'i 'o/ /o~M badzra g+hasma ri swA hA/ gro'o/ o~M

badzra yadz+nyA ya swA hA/ u dum bA ra'o/ /o~M ti ti pri mi swA hA/ /byang chub shing ngo / /o~M badzrA r+thA ya swA hA/ /n+ya gro d+ha'o/ /o~M badzra naM kA ya swA hA/ a mra'i'o/ /o~M AHhrIHhU~M/ thams cad du bsang ba'o/ /chus ni dag par byed pa dang / /rdul sogs mun pa zhi bar

byed/ /zhi ba chu yi dkyil 'khor bar/ /dkar po zlum po kho na'o/ /sas ni rtswa shing 'bru me tog /skyed dang dngos po rgyas par byed/ /rgyas pa'i sa yi dkyil 'khor ltar/ /ser po gru bzhi pa na'o/ /rlung gis sdud dang 'byed pa dang / /dbang du byas nas g.yo bar

byed/ /dbang la rlung gi dkyil 'khor ltar/ /zla gam dmar po'i kha dog go/ /mes ni smin cing sreg pa dang / /drag shul gyis ni yal bar byed/ /drag po gru gsum me'i dkyil 'khor/ /nang dmar rgyab ni nag por bya/ /mkha' la nyi ma shar ba ni/ /mun pa'i

sgrib pa zhi bar byed/ /zhi la shar du bltas pa ste/ /dpal ldan gos kyang dkar po'o/ /nyi ma byang du 'gro ba'i tshe/ /dngos po rgyas par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ /rgyas pa byang du bltas bya ba/ /gos ni ser ram ljang gu shis/ /nyi ma thal nas mtshan mo ni/ /dbang du dngos

po 'gyur ba'i phyir/ /dbang la nub phyogs bltas pa dang / /gos kyang dmar ser rab tu shis/ /nyi ma lhor 'gro'i dus su ni/ /shin tu grang ba'i chu yis ni/ /rtswa sogs dngos rnams bsad nas kyang / /des dang 'thor dang dengs pa dang / /skabs dang g.yar

dang dub ba dang / /rab tu g.yos dang bcas par 'gyur/ /mngon spyod lho yi phyogs bltas nas/ /gos kyang sngo dang nag po bya/ /tsam pa ka dang pu ti ka/ /lag skyes pad+ma dkar po dang / /ku mud dkar po zla seng rnams/ /chu gtsang dang bar bcas pa dag /

zhi ba'i las la mchod par bya/ /many+dzu nA ga bi sha ri/ /su mu le dang a spras dang / /gser mdog chen po chu dung dang / /tsi'u le ser dang pad+ma ser/ /chu bo chen po chur bcas pa/ /rgyas pa'i las la bsngags pa'o/ /mu tsi na dang man du dmar/ /

lo yi che dang nya sha rnams/ /sin d+hu ra dang pad+ma dmar/ /ku mu da rigs dmar po rnams/ /lu ma'i chu dang bcas pa ste/ /dbang gi las la mchod par bya/ /ut+pal k+She pa la ka dang / /ud khye pa dang ma mi shi/ /dzu mod sbyin la mgo bo dang / /phag rna daN+Dota

pa la rnams/ /khron pa'i chu dang lhan cig tu/ /mngon spyod las la mchod par bya/ /sA lu dkar po zan dang zho/ /pri ka spos ni zhi ba la/ /sA lu dmar po'i zan 'o ma/ /tsan+dan dmar po dbang la 'o/ /gro dang ma sa bser ba'i zan/ /hu lu ka ni rgyas pa la'o/ /

nas dang bra bo'i zan gu gul/ /btsos pa'i sha dang lhan cig ste/ /dwag po'i las de zhal zas dang / /bdug spos bye brag shes par bya/ /rtsi mar dang ni a ba se'i/ /sdong bur ldan pa'i mar me ni/ /zhi ba'i las la shin tu shis/ /yang na pad dkar sdong bu'o/ /

til lam shin tu dngas ma dang / /sa ri ha yi sdong bu ni/ /rgyas pa'i las la shin tu shis/ /yang na ba yi lag gi cha/ /na ke la yi mar dang ni/ /pad+ma dmar po'i mar dang ni/ /dbang gi las la shin tu shis/ /yang na ba ya ma ri'o/ /yungs dang tsi la mar dang ni/ /

tsi tra'i sdong bu mar me ni/ /yang na gso ma'i shun pa yis/ /mdog dmar dal zhing gsal ba ni/ /gangs ri'i rtse ltar dkar 'bar ba/ /bar bre smra gul spos dkar dri/ /zhi ba'i las ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /mdog dmar g.yo zhing mog pa la/ /nyi ma thal ka'i ri

rtse 'dra/ /shib sgra ma li ka la'i dri/ /dbang gi las 'grub the tshom med/ /mdog ser mig g.yo dngas pa la/ /nyi ma shar ba'i ri ltar 'bar/ /lha pa sgra tsam pa ka yi dri/ /rgyas pa'i las 'grub the tshom med/ /le brgan mdog ldan 'khyim zhing smug /hur

sgra rul dri bro ba dang / /nags kyi ri bo ltar 'bar ba/ /mngon spyod las la 'grub par 'gyur/ /'jig rten ting 'dzin ldan grub pa'i/ /drang srong rigs la dpag med kyang / /me yi lha ni bzhi bcu bzhi/ /sbyin sreg las la spang bar bya/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i ting

'dzin can/ /bcu gnyis grangs ni gzung bar bya/ /gnya' na ka dang sa bi ki/ /tuk+Shu se'u mya s+ye tro dang / /lto ba yid skyes khro bo dang / /dmar po mr-i ta cho ma li/ /b+hi su ya ki bcu gnyis po/ /phan 'dogs la sogs las la sbyar/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg thal

bas ni/ /'byung po phra mo zhi bar byed/ /dbang gi thal bas 'byung po 'ching / /rgyas pas 'dod pa'i las sbyin byed/ /ri bo'i rtse la gtor bar bya/ /drag pos 'byung po sel bar bya/ /lam gyi gzhung du gtor bar bya/ /zhi dang dbang gi zhing phyogs dang / /ra ba

skyed mos tshal du gtor/ /dag par byed pas chu bo ltar/ /rgyas pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / /gang bar byed pa rgya mtsho ltar/ /sbyin sreg gis ni lha mnyes shing / /sngags bsgrub sngags kyi las rnams 'grub/ /drang srong tshogs rnams thams cad dang / /dri za'i

tshogs rnams thams cad dang / /'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad ni/ /sbyin sreg gis ni rab dga' nas/ /rnal 'byor grogs byed bsrung ba dang / /skyob phyir tshe ring dpal 'phel zhing / /nad med longs spyod rgyas pa dang / /bsam pa bzhin du 'grub

par 'gyur/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las me la brten pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //de nas byang chub sems dpa' che/ /rdzu 'phrul 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ /mkha' la yi ge sprul nas ni/ /

'gro don sna tshogs mdzad pa zhig /'khor bcas dkyil 'khor der lhags nas/ /phyag 'tshal bskor ba du ma byas/ /mchod pa'i sprin gyis rgyas par mchod/ /phyogs gcig 'khod nas ston pa la/ /mgrin gcig gsung ni snyan pa yis/ /'di skad tshig ni gsol

ba 'debs/ /o~M mtshan dang dpe byad brgyan pa'i sku/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /chos kyi longs spyod ji snyed pa/ /rdzogs par longs spyod mdzad phyag 'tshal/ /gang la mkho ba de'i gtso bo/ /'dren pa gzugs brnyan du ma 'chang / /

sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa'i sku/ /bde ba che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi 'gyur rnam dag byang chub lam/ /phyogs chos byang chub sum cu bdun/ /stobs dang mi 'jigs brtson mdzad pa/ /chos rnams lhun grub sku phyag 'tshal/ /rnam dag rgya mtshor ldan rnams la/ /

thugs rje rgya mtsho rgyun byung nas/ /zhing khams rgya mtsho spyod mdzad pa'i/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal/ /sngags dang rdzas dang phyag rgya'i rim/ /sna tshogs kyis ni don mdzad phyir/ /theg pa kun las khyad par du/ /sngags kyi theg pa khyad par 'phags/ /

nan tan sgrub pa smos ci dgos/ /sngags dang phyag rgya 'chang bas kyang / /nad dang gnod sel bskal pa yi/ /sgrib rnams 'byang bas khyad par 'phags/ /dbul po rigs dang dman pa yang / /zhugs ma thag nas bde ldan zhing / /cung zad grub nas nus mthu ni/ /

dpag med 'byung bas khyad par 'phags/ /mgon po bcom ldan rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /dpal chen ye shes kun gyi mdzod/ /'od zer nyi ma 'bum gzi can/ /'gro ba 'dren gtso dad dpon gyi/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang gi/ /sngags dang phyag rgyar bcas pa yis/ /

'gro la sna tshogs phan don du/ /ci ltar 'gyur mdzad bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa che/ /pad+ma'i spyan gdangs 'dzum mdzad nas/ /tshangs pa'i gsung ni snyan pa yis/ /'gro la phan phyir 'di skad gsungs/ /dge byed phyag rgya sngags dang bcas/ /'gro la

phan phyir zhus pa ni/ /legs so rdzu 'phrul 'khor lo che/ /shes rab 'chang ba khyod legs so/ /sems dpa' chen po de phyir ngas/ /khyod la ngo mtshar legs par bshad/ /khyod kyang rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/ /legs par zung la rgya cher spros/ /ras sam gro ga shing shun

gang / /'jam zhing nag ris med pa la/ /gur gum gi'u wang sen rtsi dang / /tsan+dan gyis ni phyag rgya bri/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad mu khyud bcas/ /'od dang ldan pa bri bar bya/ /d+ha ra d+ha ra dang po ste/ /gnyis par d+hi ri d+hi ri spro/ /gsum pa d+hu ru d+ha ru ste/ /iT+Te biT+Te bzhi lnga pa/ /tsa

le tsa le gnyis bri'o/ /pra tsa le gnyis drug par ro/ /ku su me dang ku su ma/ /bdun pa bris te brgyad pa la/ /ba le i li mi li bri/ o~M mi tsi ti dza lam dang / /swA hA ra bcas pa dbus su'o/ /phyag 'tshal bcas sngags mtha' mar bri/ /rab rdzogs sngags kyis lhar

dmigs nas/ /gtsang ma'i mchod pas mchod bya ste/ /sngags stong brjod nas lus la gdags/ /'di ni bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /nad dang yams dang gdon rnams dang / /'jigs pa brgyad las skyob par nges/ /rig sngags bzlog na khyad par du/ /rdo rje dkar po

rtse lnga la/ /'od kyi ra ba zlum po yi/ /ri mo gnyis dang bcas pa bri/ /rwa rnams la ni hU~M gnyis par/ /rig sngags bzlog dang bcas pa bri/ /lte bar o~M hrIHswA hA'i bar/ /bdag nyid bsrung zhes bri bar bya/ /mu khyud dang por bri bar bya/ /gzigs dbang yid bzhin nor sngags so/ /

gnyis par gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags/ /gsum par pad+ma gar dbang gi/ /sngags rnams g.yas su bskor bar bya/ /gal te nad yams bzlog pa la/ /'dab brgyad pad+ma mu khyud gsum/ /sngon ltar yi ge bkod pa la/ /mu khyud gnyis par spyan gyi sngags/ /gsum par

rten 'brel sngags bris nas/ /lus sam mgul du thogs pas ni/ /nad rims dang ni lhog 'brum sogs/ /rlung gis rdul bzhin sel bar 'gyur/ /de nas tshig de thos ma thag /lha min bu mo nad bdag mo/ /sa tu de bi zhes bya ba/ /bzhengs te thal mo sbyar byas te/ /

bu mo khris ni mgrin gcig tu/ /bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol/ /rje btsun 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig po/ /mgon po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ /bdag gi sngags 'di gang 'dzin pa/ /gal te 'brum nad byung na ni/ /bdag ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro/ /

dam bcas 'di ni dran par bya/ /tre ba la bya'i ka ka ba ni ta/ /su ma ya bi lA sa ka ka ra ni/ /ki shun pany+tsa tra li he na yi/ /ke na ka ta tsa ra Ni/ /ya mi rnan da ma na tsa/ /ya mi bar nad bur dwa/ /dwa tsa pid tra tsit+t+ra nad dam/ /sa stu de wi me b+ha ba/ /lha mos de skad gsol ma thag /

mgon pos 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /o~M o~M b+ha bita bit+ti mi ti/ ga tsan+d+ra ka ra ni/ a mu ka s+ya ka s+ya/ lo hi ta ga~M d+ha pa rak+Sha ku ru swA hA/ byin brlabs ldan pa'i sngags de ni/ /rgyun du bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /o~M ha na se rU pa d+ha ri swA hA/ srad bu mnyams dkar po la/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig

mdud par bya/ /bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi bzlas nas kyang / /lus sam mgul du gdags par bya/ /kraM hi ti ka ti ga tra tha pra gshig /ta thA yo thA tsa la he hu~M hU~M phaT/ sran ma rdog po re re la/ /brgya rtsa brgyad brgyad bzlas pa yi/ /'bru bdun thum por byas pa zhig /dri bzang bcas la mgul du thogs/ /

yams nad kun dang 'brum nag nad/ /shin tu gdug pa kun sel 'gyur/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang ba mo/ /dpal phreng mas ni 'di skad gsol/ /bdag gi rig sngags 'di zlos pa/ /rims nad kun dang bral bar 'gyur/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ /na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/

ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ri Ni kA ya/ na mo badzra mA ra bi dza yA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M badzre badzre/ ma ha badzre/ sarba b+hI ra thA/ ha na ha na badzra/ sarba dz+wa ra pra shra ma na ye swA hA/ mi skra mi rus sle tres dang / /gu gul yungs kar sgog skya dang / /shing kun gla rtsi 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs phyed

phyogs bzhir hrIHyig bri/ /mtshams bzhir bris te dbus su ming / /sngags 'di mu khyud dang po la/ /gnyis gdong bcu gcig pa yi sngags/ /bris nas lus sam mgul du thogs/ /nad rims thams cad sel ba dang / /rnal 'byor kun dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de nas spyan ras gzigs

dbang gis/ /'gro ba'i don du 'di skad gsol/ /rang 'byung can gyi ras la ni/ /sen rtsi'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa/ /mu khyud gsum dang ldan pa bri/ /rtsibs bzhi hrIHla g.yon skor du/ /hrIHg+hi wa shiM ku ru hrIH/ /mu khyud dang por mgon po ni/ /pad+ma gar dbang sngags bri'o/ /gnyis pa ut+pal

dmar po phreng / /gsum pa lcags kyu nyi shu gcig /dbus su ba~M yig hrIHra bcas bri/ /lha dam nyid kyang dam byed na/ /'gro ba gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /gsol dang bkra shis brjod pa dang / /bgegs kyi gnod pa sel 'dod pas/ /rtse gsum rdo rje rgya gram ste/ /dbus su spyan ras

gzigs dbang mgon/ /pad+ma gtsug tor sngags bri'o/ /rwa rnams kun la hU~M yig ni/ /bgegs ming ud tsa ta yis bskor/ /mu khyud dang po spyan ras gzigs/ /ha la ha la'i sngags bri'o/ /gnyis pa khro bo rta skad sngags/ /gsum par bgegs dgra'i sngags bris la/ /de rgyab me

yi phung po bri/ /gang zhig 'khor lo 'di bris pas/ /sred med bu ltar mthu che ba/ /gdug pa can yang 'thor byed na/ /phran tshegs dbyer ba smos ci dgos/ /gang la ser sna rnams chags shing / /longs spyod 'phel bar mi 'gyur na/ /phun sum tshogs ldan dpal 'phel phyir/ /skyob

pa'i phyag rgya bshad par bya/ /rgyal po 'am ni dge 'dun la/ /gtsang ldan ras bzang blangs nas kyang / /dag par bkrus te dri bzang byug /legs par brgyan nas thig btab ste/ /gur gum dang ni gla rtsi yis/ /pad+ma 'dab ma bcu drug bri/ /phyogs bzhir 'dab mar dpal be'u ste/ /

mtshams bzhir yid bzhin nor bu bri/ /mtshams brgyad la ni yi ge gaM/ /o~M dang badzra da ke hU~M/ /yi ge drug gis bskor bar bya/ /mu khyud dang por mi bshol sngags/ /gnyis pa gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags/ /gsum pa ut+pal phreng ba ste/ /yang tog rtse 'am mdzod bzhag nas/ /gsol

btab mchod na longs spyod 'phel/ /bud med gang zhig bu 'dod pas/ /de bzhin pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa/ /phyogs bzhir hrIHni mtshams su drang / /dbus su khye'u yi gzigs shig bri/ /phyogs bzhir yid bzhin nor bu bri/ /sngags bu stsol bcas bri bar bya/ /mtshams bzhir

o~M dang a ma ra/ /dzI wa na tI ye swA hAs bskor/ /mu khyud dang po spyan ras gzigs/ /pad+ma rgyan lung can gyi sngags/ /gnyis par gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags/ /gsum par ut+pal dmar po'i phreng / /'od 'phro rtag par mchod pa dang / /phul du byung ba'i bstod pas bstod/ /

gsol ba 'debs shing sngags bzlas na/ /bu stsol 'gyur la the tshom med/ /bsrung dang nor 'phel dbang byed dang / /bu slong ba yi phyag rgya ni/ /smin drug snar ma rgyal la bri/ /lhag ma rnams ni ci bder bri/ /gang zhig sems stor yid mi dga'/ /glo bur yi mug

skye 'gyur na/ /pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi pa yi/ /dbus su rang gzugs mtshan ma bri/ /'dab mar rdo rje mdog bzhi pa/ /gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags kyis bskor/ /mu khyud la ni spyan ras gzigs/ /don yod zhags pa'i sngags bri'o/ /gnyis par rdo rje phreng ba bri/ /de'i rgyab

'od kyi phreng ba bri/ /rtag par mchod cing gsol ba gdab/ /nad sel tshe ring bsod nams 'phel/ /gang zhig shes rab 'dod pas ni/ /dpal be'u rgyal po'i du mar ni/ /tri yig rgyab tu sngags 'dis bskor/ /o~M dang kA la de ka la/ /ma ni swA hA zhes pa bri/ /de rgyab mu khyud

'khor ba la/ /mgrin pa sngon po'i rtsa sngags bri/ /de rgyab 'od kyi ra ba bri/ /gang gis 'di 'chang mchod pa la/ /nad dang gnod pa kun bral te/ /dug dang rims nad 'joms pa dang / /shes rab myur du 'phel bar 'gyur/ /yul du lo thog nyams pa dang / /thog 'brug ser ba rgod pa

dang / /klu dang sa bdag gnod pa ste/ /de bas la sbyor ba bshad par bya/ /shing kun dkar po mnyams pa/ /nyams dga'i sbyor ba nyi rim la/ /rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa/ /mig sman gyis ni bri bar bya/ /grwa rnams la ni hU~M yig la/ /o~M dang dzi ni ti ti te/ /hUM phaT ces pa'i sngags kyis

bskor/ /mu khyud dang po mgon po che/ /gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags phreng bri/ /gnyis par thugs rje chen po mgon/ /mi bshol ba yi sngags kyis bskor/ /gsum par rdo rje phreng ba dang / /me yi 'od dang ldan par bri/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bstan tsam gyis/ /klu yi rgyal po mthu ldan

rnams/ /'khor dang bcas te lus skams 'gyur/ /gang gi khyim du gdod pa dang / /ma he rta sogs yams nad can/ /bsal ba'i thabs kyi phyag rgya ni/ /brtan par drang srong tshogs rnams nyon/ /ko bi da ri'i shing la ni/ /khru gang khru gnyis dbyibs gru bzhi/ /gas grugs chag sogs med

pa la/ /shin tu srab 'jam sor gnyis rngams/ /shing de la ni rta babs gzugs/ /'khor lo gdugs dang bcas pa yi/ /brtsegs pa'i g.yas zur dang po ni/ /rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga ste/ /gnyis pa ut+pal dmar po'o/ /gsum pa 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ser/ /bzhi par pad+ma dkar

po'o/ /g.yon zur dang por pad+ma dmar/ /gnyis pa ut+pal sngon po'o/ /gsum par nor bu bzhi rgya gram/ /nang khang du ni pad+ma bya/ /'dab ma brgyad pa 'od ldan pa'o/ /lte ba dang ni 'dab brgyad la/ /o~M dang pi shA tsi par+Na/ /sha ba ri sarba byA d+hi/ /pra sha ma ni swA hA zhes/ /baMHyig la ni

bskor bar bri/ /mu khyud dang po spyan ras gzigs/ /gdong bcu gcig gi sngags bri'o/ /gnyis par chos kyi gtsug tor gyi/ /rtsa ba'i phreng sngags bri bar bya/ /rgya skyegs dang ni mtshal yin te/ /de la shing spyin byug par bya/ /mchod dang gsol gdab sngags dag ni/ /bdun stong

re re brjod byas nas/ /sgo gong la gdags byung 'jug tshe/ /'jig rten mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rta phyugs yams nad ma lus la/ /rig pa'i lha mo'i tshogs bcas pa'i/ /'jig rten mgon gyi rig sngags mthus/ /myur du sel bar mnan pa dang / /bzlog dang bcing bar mdzod

ces brjod/ /phyugs bdag chen pos skyong ba ltar/ /glang po rta bong ma he'i tshogs/ /brtan zhing nad dang gnod pa med/ /shin tu 'phel zhing rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dmag dpung chen po 'jigs pa la/ /khyad par du ni skyob pa yi/ /phyag rgya sbyor ba mnyan par

gyis/ /yung bas ras sam shing la ni/ /pad dkar steng du kha T+wAM dang / /ral gri 'od ma bri bar bya/ /de la gdu bu gsum gyis bskor/ /dang po gdong bcu gcig pa'i sngags/ /gnyis pa seng ge sgra yi sngags/ /gsum par ha ya chen po'i sngags/ /de rgyab me yi ra ba bri/ /'di la gsol

ba btab nas ni/ /g.yul ngor khyer te zhugs pa gang / /dgra dpung chen po 'bros 'gyur te/ /rang nyid g.yul las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /longs spyod phyir ni byang bltas bri/ /dbang byed pa ni nub tu ste/ /g.yul bzlog pa ni lhor bltas bri/ /lhag ma rnams la shar bltas bri/ /dkar

ser dmar dang sngo ba yi/ /dbye bas zas dang gos shes bya/ /'dzum dang rngam dang dgod dang khro/ /bzhin gyi rnam pa bshad pa yi/ /sngags dang sngags kyi 'od phreng dang / /lha yi kha dog dbye ba dang / /snod la sogs pa'i dbye ba dang / /rgyan yang de ltar shes par bya/ /

kun kyang rin chen pad+ma'i gdan/ /kha dog sna tshogs ldan par ni/ /sngags kyis yig 'bru'i lha rnams bzhugs/ /sngags rdzogs nas ni sngags su dmigs/ /gang gis phyag rgya 'chang byed la/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams dang / /rig pa'i lha mo'i

tshogs rnams dang / /'jig rten 'dren pa'i tshogs bcas dang / /spyan ras gzigs dbang tshogs chen dang / /khro bo tshogs bcas ma lus dang / /'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan rnams/ /ci 'dod las rnams ma lus pa'i/ /grogs dang dpung du byas nas ni/ /tshul bzhin

du ni bsgrub pa la/ /brtson 'grus gang dang gang gis kyang / /the tshom du ni mi bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba las phyag rgya la brten pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas mkha' la gshegs pa yi/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i

drang srong mchog/ /mtshan dpe du ma rgyas pa che/ /nyi ma'i gong bu zhes bya ba/ /drang srong rje dpon tshogs kyi mchog /'gro don rdzogs mdzad thugs rje can/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon po la/ /sangs rgyas tshig gis 'di skad gsol/ /o~M 'od zer du ma ther zug gi/ /srid

'dam stug po sel byed rgyal/ /yon tan ye shes kyis brgyan sku/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal/ /gsung snyan yan lag brjod bral chos/ /bag chags ri bo snyil mdzad rgyal/ /skye 'gag bral ston sde snod gsum/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal/ /

skye 'gag gnod bral mnyam bzhag pa/ /ting 'dzin shes rab 'phel mdzad rgyal/ /ye shes gzigs pa mtha' yas thugs/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs phyag 'tshal/ /sna tshogs sman dang sngags sbyar nas/ /lha yi gong bu'i ril bu ni/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa

yi/ /dngos grub ma lus rdzogs pa yi/ /thugs rje'i nyi ma lham mdzad ba'i/ /mgon po pad+mas bshad du gsol/ /'gro rnams ma rig 'dam la zhen/ /srid pa'i thag pas rgya gram bcings/ /'dod chags zhe sdang mun pas g.yogs/ /nga rgyal phrag dog chu bos g.yengs/ /ngan

rtog log lam g.yang sar ltung / /bag med ser sna'i dug gis myos/ /sdig pa'i grib mas rnam par rgyas/ /bag chags 'thug bo'i ri bos mnan/ /mgon po khyod ni thugs rjes ngal ba med/ /nyes pa'i rgya mtsho bsal ba'i phyir/ /shes rab thabs 'byung bshad du

gsol/ /de nas 'jig rten mgon po rje/ /thugs rje thugs dpal mnga' ba yi/ /thugs dam rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu bcas/ /khyad par gsung 'di bka' stsal to/ /mtha' dag gzugs sgra thos pa dang / /rdzu 'phrul bsgyur dang gzhan sems shes/ /'das dang ma 'ongs

don shes dang / /mtha' yas shes drug las spyod pa/ /dngos dang rtags dang cha mthun gyis/ /rnam pa brgyad dag tu 'gyur/ /phra dang yang dang mchod par bya ba dang / /bdag por gyur dang dbang du 'gyur ba dang / /gar yang phyin yang 'dod dgur ldan pa dang / /dga' mgur

gnas te dbang phyug yon tan no/ /rnam pa brgyad kyis dper bya yis/ /longs spyod dbang dang lus la dbang / /tshe la dbang dang rkang mgyogs dang / /chu la mi 'bying mkha' la 'gro/ /sa 'og 'gro dang mi snang ba/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod sogs/ /dngos po gang dang

gang bsgrub rnams/ /ril bu las ni 'byung 'gyur gyi/ /gzhan ni myur du 'grub mi 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ril bu ni/ /mtshams med la sogs byed pas kyang / /rnyed ma thag tu dngos grub 'gyur/ /nye dang dbang ldan lha yi sras/ /ma mos dbang du byed

gyur na/ /'byung po sha za lha min mi/ /ma mo mkha' 'gro 'byung po klu/ /dud 'gro la sogs rdzogs gzugs can/ /sems can gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /dngos grub bzang po 'dod pa yis/ /khyad par ril bus 'di bsgrub bya/ /gi'u wang dang ni lig

bu mig /ldong ros bzang por sbyar ba yi/ /ril bu rgya sran tshad byas nas/ /snod gtsang nang du gzhag par bya/ /sku yi mdun du sngags brjod na/ /sngan chad ma mthong snang ba'am/ /sgra thos sam ni bde gshegs gzugs/ /yid

'ong mngon du byung ba sogs/ /mar ngo gsum gyis 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas zla ba gzas bzung tshe/ /ci 'byor mchod de snyim par bcug /bzlas brjod byas nas nyi shar na/ /du bar 'thul dang dri can 'gyur/ /dud 'thul lus la byugs pas kyang / /snang

ba dang 'od gzugs can dang / /'dzam gling phyogs rnams rgyu ba dang / /longs spyod che dang ldan 'gyur te/ /shi 'phos nas ni dga' ldan gnas su skye/ /dri ma tsam gyis lus byugs kyang / /'gro ba thams cad dbang byed cing / /thos pa 'dzin cing sgyu rtsal mkhas/ /

shi nas 'dzam gling 'di nyid du/ /lcang lo can gyi gnod sbyin ni/ /'khor la gzhon nu'i rigs su skye/ /yang na mi yi rgyal po'am/ /glang po nyid du skye bar 'gyur/ /'bar ba lus la bskus na blta/ /rig sngags 'chang lus nyi shar mdog /bskal par gnas

te 'dod dgur spyod/ /'jig rten kun du thogs med rgyu/ /mkha' ldings 'og chu bran 'gro/ /sangs rgyas kun nas phyin nas kyang / /dbang por gnas te rgyal por gnas/ /sprul pa'i rdzas kyis bde gshegs mchod/ /'dod nas shi 'phos 'jig

rten khams/ /gzhan 'das sangs rgyas dag tu skye/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yis/ /bdag nyid yid du 'ong 'dod phas/ /gur gum ga pur gla rtsi dang / /gi'u wang bsregs nas sngags stong bzlas/ /brdungs te phye mar byas nas kyang / /sngags

stong bzlas te chu gtsang gis/ /ril bu rgya sran tshad byas nas/ /re re la yang stong stong brjod/ /rlung dang nyi mas ma reg pa/ /bskams nas snod gtsang gzhag par bya/ /ril bu tsam cig mur na yang / /rgyal po blon po 'khor bcas kyis/ /mthong na bu bzhin

gzigs pas na/ /tha mal skyo bo smos ci dgos/ /nor rnams gzhan gyis ster ba dang / /bsgo ba la ni ngag btsan 'gyur/ /ga pur gur gum gi'u wang dang / /tsan+da na gnad brda dang / /gla rtsi dag ste cha mnyam du/ /re re sngags stong bzlas nas su/ /brdungs

te ril bu byas pa da ga /g.yon pa'i zhal la gdags par bya/ /bdun nas nya yi bar du ni/ /sngags bzlas pa dang mchod pa bya/ /bdugs pas nad dang gdon rnams sel/ /mig la byugs pas rgyal po dang / /rgyal mo bu dang bu mo dang / /blon po la sogs dbang

du 'gyur/ /khar bcug tsam gyis grol bar 'ong / /gdams pa thams cad don yod 'gyur/ /spyi bor btags na byad stems dang / /g.yul las shin tu rgyal bar 'gyur/ /gal te phye mas bdugs pas kyang / /sdig pa thams cad byang 'gyur te/ /kun

gyi mthong dang dga' ba dang / /gzi byin 'phags pa kun gyis mchod/ /ga bur gla rtsi gur gum dang / /tsan+dan gla rtsi ka ko la/ /spos kyi rgyal po pad+ma dang / /ut+pal sngo dang tsan+dan dmar/ /re re la yang stong stong bzlas/ /cha mnyam phye ma gi'u wang bcas/ /ril

bu tsa na ka tshad bya/ /grib skams byas nas lus la 'chang / /gling bzhi kun khyab rgyal srid 'thob/ /kra ku la yi thang chu dang / /ldong ros bed dang ut+pal sngo/ /rgya mtsho lbu ba gi'u wang dang / /yungs dang skyer pa gur gum dang / /ga bur dang ni gla rtsi

gsum/ /re re la yang sngags stong bzla/ /de nas sku yi mgul btags te/ /stong bzlas dril nas ril bu bya/ /mig nad sel na chu dang sbyar/ /so nad la ni ka ka ru/ /rna ba'i nad la ru rta ste/ /ut+pal mu tig mig nad la/ /gre ba'i nad la

ba sha ka/ /glo nad la ni ba le ka/ /sha ka ra yi thang dang sbyar/ /rlung nad la ni mar dang sbyar/ /mkhris nad la ni tig ta dang / /bad kan la ni sga dang sbyar/ /mdze nad la ni dug mo nyungs/ /ma zhu ba la kha ru tshwa/ /skrangs nad rnams la thug
po che/ /bgegs dang yams nad sel ba la/ /gu gul dang bcas bdug par bya/ /ril bu'i yon tan mtha' yas ni/ /nam yang brjod par mi nus so/ /gu gul la ni stong bzlas pa'i/ /ril bus bgegs tshogs sel

bar byed/ /ke su rtsa dang sde'u gsher dang / /ba la ta ka tsha ba gsum/ /ser po mu zi phye ma rnams/ /sbrang rtsi dang bcas ril bu bya/ /pad+ma gar dbang sngags stong bzlas/ /zos pa tsam gyis lus rgyas te/ /nad dang gdon dang dgras mi

tshugs/ /'dod rnams thams cad grub par 'gyur/ /ta ka'i rtsa ba ba ru ra/ /skyu ru ra dang ti la til/ /mnyam byas srin bya'i khrag dang ni/ /ril bu byas la mig la byug /klu dang khang pa dang / /sa 'og thams cad mthong

bar nges/ /byis pa zla ba gsum pa'i lce/ /nyin gcig spos por nang du gzhug /gnyis pa ra 'o gsum dang 'byung / /bzhi pa ril bu tshil chen btso/ /lnga pa sbrang rtsi nang du ste/ /drug pa dngul chu'i nang du bzhag /bdun pa rigs ngan

thod par ni/ /byi la'i khrag gis bsku la gzhag /skams nas bya dang spyang ku'i sha/ /lhan cig rang gi khar bcug na/ /de ma thag tu mi snang 'gyur/ /gzhan yang yon tan dpag tu med/ /ldong ros gyen du bcas pa dang / /dza ti lo ma

sa bon bcas/ /ril bu sngags stong bzlas pa yis/ /bar snang la ni 'gro bar nges/ /ban+du ma dang kir ma dang / /ma ka ri dang su mi tam/ /bra pan ta ma'i ril bu ni/ /nyi zla gzas bzung dus su mid/ /shes rab phul du 'byung ba ste/ /

thos pa 'dzin 'gyur smos ci dgos/ /gi'u wang swa hA tsi na dang / /sre ta sbrang gi ril bu bya/ /sngags stong bzlas nas khar bcug na/ /'das pa'i don rnams shes par 'gyur/ /gi'u wang sug pa phye ma dang / /ba ra swA ta ha su ri/ /a ra

hu ri sbrang rtsir bcas/ /ril bu byas nas sngags stong bzla/ /mid pas ma 'ongs don rnams shes/ /gzhan yang nad 'don byed pa yi/ /ril bu chen po bshad par bya/ /rgyal dang rnam rgyal na gu la/ /kan d+ha na gu li dang ni/ /ru Ni a pa

ya ba ni/ /i pa ya na ta ga ra/ /gan d+ha ga dang pri yang ku/ /'khor lo che dang 'khor lo dang / /biSh+Nu ka Ti de bzhin du/ /so ma ra tsa un na ti/ /re re la yang sngags phreng dang / /brgya rtsa brgyad du brjod par bya/ /de nas brdungs te sbrang

dang bcas/ /byis pa la ni dpung par te/ /bu 'dod mo la mgul bar gdags/ /'di btags pa yi de ma thag /'jigs pa brgyad dang nad las grol/ /ba mar shu dag ba lcir bcas/ /lcags kyi snod du btsos pa yi/ /ril bu a mra'i

'bras bu tsam/ /sngags 'di stong phrag brgyad brjod de/ /phyis ni nyi shu gcig brjod nas/ /snga bar mid pas shes rab 'phel/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/

o~M shud+d+he mr-i taM/ ba la bar+d+ha ni swA hA/ srod dang tho rangs dge sbyong dang / /dal smra gsong po dul bag can/ /khrus la dga' zhing dri bzang bsten/ /spyod lam rab zhi khro ba med/ /rtag tu bsngags brjod brtse sems can/ /spyan ras gzigs nyid la

cher dang / /gdung bag gdong la mchi ma can/ /lung thob bla mar rab dga' ba'i/ /skyes mchog de la rab dge zhing / /'jig rten skyong gi lha rnams dang / /'byung ba la sogs smos ci dgos/ /rtag par rang gi yid la ni/ /snying po gsang

sngags bcang bar bya/ /nye ba'i snying po lus dag pa'i/ /lha yang rang la nye bar byed/ /rtsa ba'i sngags rnams brjod mang ba/ /khri dang 'bum dang sa ya dang / /sa ya gsum dang drug brjod de/ /kha cig la yang bzhi dang ni/ /lnga tsam gyis ni de grub

yin/ /las la sbyar ba bdun dang ni/ /bcu bzhi nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / /brgya dang de bzhin stong gis rdzogs/ /de ma thag tu chu yin te/ /cung zad ba ni mar gyis bya/ /brtan par gyur pa ka ra ste/ /ches brtan pa la srad bu yin/ /

sman dang sngags kyis sel byed de/ /ril bus ring du skyong byed yin/ /sngags sgrub pa la mi mos pa'o/ /mdun du rtsom na de dag rnams/ /de skad gsungs pa'i de ma thag /rdo rje snying po nyi 'od dang / /pad dkar rin chen snying po dang / /pad

spyan gzigs kyi snying po dang / /ye shes dbang phyug pad dbang phyug /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams/ /rang rang sde dpung sder bcas pa/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po rnams/ /'jig rten dbang la cher dmigs nas/ /mchod pa'i

tshogs rnams bkram byas te/ /rin chen rigs las 'khrungs pa yi/ /mchod pa nam mkha' gtos par bkang / /rol mo du ma lhab lhub dang / /sil snyan lha yi tshogs rnams kyis/ /sprin mdzes tshogs rnams rab 'khrigs ltar/ /bkod pa

mtha' yas bsham bya ste/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs/ /mgon gyur ye shes mnga' ba rnams/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang gsung snyan la/ /yi rang skyes nas mtshan chen brjod/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang mchog brtan che/ /'jig

rten dbang po dbang phyug che/ /pad+ma sems dpa' pad 'byung che/ /rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dag pa chen po chos rgyal gtso/ /blo gros chen po sems dpa' che/ /pad+ma 'chang dang pad+ma dpa'/ /pad+ma'i mgon khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad+ma las

byung dam pa'i yid/ /pad+ma gsal mdzad dga' mdzad po/ /pad+ma'i rdo rje pad+ma'i sku/ /khyod mchog spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /snang ba kun chen thabs po che/ /che mnyam dga' ba dgongs pa che/ /dpa' bo chen po brtan chen rgyal/ /bde ba chen po khyod

phyag 'tshal/ /bsam chen mkhyen chen theg chen po/ /rnal 'byor chen po mes po che/ /bde stsol bde mdzad dga' mdzad che/ /pad+ma rgyas zhal phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos mnga' don mnga' pad+ma rgyal/ /dag pa chos mnga' chos mchog 'dzin/ /rmad 'byung

chen ldan chos rab 'chang / /chos kyi tshogs khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sems dpa' mchog sems dpa'/ /rin chen sems dpa' chos sems dpa'/ /dam tshig sems dpa' las sems dpa'/ /kun mkhyen sems dpa' khyod phyag

'tshal/ /'jig rten dpa' bo dpa' bo mchog /rnam par gzigs gtso skyob mdzad che/ /'jig rten gsal mdzad 'jig rten don/ /'jig rten mgon po phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten yi ge kha dog che/ /yi ge che mtshungs yig drug mchog /

yi ge'i rang bzhin yi ge gzigs/ /yi ge 'khor lo khyod phyag 'tshal/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya pad+ma'i lag /legs so sbyin mdzad dbugs sbyin ba'o/ /sangs rgyas tshogs de sangs rgyas chos/ /sangs rgyas che khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshad med che sku

sangs rgyas sku/ /gzugs bzang 'chang ldan rdo rje gzugs/ /gzi brjid che mchog chos snang ba/ /snang bar mdzad khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtso mgon rgyal po pad+ma'i dpal/ /chos kyi dpal mgon 'dren mdzad pa/ /tshangs pa'i mgon chen khyab 'jug

mgon/ /tshangs pa'i sras khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /cher gsal gtso bo snang pa mchog /'od chen mdzad pa rang gsal mdzad/ /snang ba chen po kun gsal mgon/ /snang ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas spyan can spyan po che/ /chos kyi

spyan te gzigs pa che/ /ting 'dzin chen po ye shes mtsho/ /rdo rje spyan khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dren pa'i gtso bo dbang sgyur gtso/ /mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas sras/ /rgyal thabs mnyes pa khyu mchog che/ /sangs rgyas dpag med phyag 'tshal lo/ /drag po

chen po rtul chen po/ /ha la chen po seng ge sgra/ /mgrin sngon gar gyi dbang phyug gtso/ /ye shes gtsug tor phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar ming brgya rtsa brgyad gang / /'chang la nad med bgegs med de/ /dpal 'byor 'jig rten dbang phyug mthong / /

yang yang lhar skye mya ngan 'da'/ /de skad gsungs nas blo ldan rnams/ /rang rang stan la mngon par 'khod/ /de tshe phyogs bcu rnam par g.yos/ /bdud rigs thams cad mog por gyur/ /de nas gzungs kyi dbang phyug gis/ /byang chub

sems dpa'i tshogs rnams la/ /rtogs pa'i ye shes ngo bo nyid/ /nga yi mtshan nyid 'di gsungs so/ /kun du bzang po'i spyod yul can/ /dkar lam bcu pa rnam spro ba/ /sems can gang du 'dod sbyor ba'i/ /rigs ni rigs chen thams cad

pa'o/ /lus ngag yid bcu spyod bcu ni/ /rgyun mi chad du sbyor mod kyang / /rags pa yi ni gzugs brnyan mthus/ /sngags sbyor gsang sngags 'dzin pa yi/ /lha la goms pa lha mthong ngam/ /mngon shes dang po sems gsal bas/ /mkha' mnyam

sems kyi rdzu 'phrul che/ /sems snang rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa/ /mtshan ma phra ba la sogs pa'i/ /mngon shes 'jig rten gsal ma thongs/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i snying po ste/ /brtan pa'i ye shes las byung ba'o/ /dam tshig sdom pa mkha' mnyam

spyod/ /sems dang sems dpa' dbyer med dang / /zhi lam sgro skur chad pa dang / /sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'gog dang lam/ /bzhi bzhi lhun gyis grub pa dang / /rten 'brel zab don mngon gyur pa/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs kun mchog /mtshan med ting

'dzin la gnas nas/ /rtsol bcas gzhan don sgrub pa dang / /rtsol med shugs kyis bde 'byung dang / /nges tshig chos don spros pa'i mtha'/ /rdzu 'phrul du ma spyod yul la/ /rigs chen yongs su grub pa'i sa/ /mkha' spyod phun sum tshogs ldan cing / /sems

kyi snang ba du mar sgyur/ /dngos rnams spros spang bsdu spyod pa/ /rig 'dzin phyag rgya chen po yis/ /chos sku kun snang kun du 'od/ /bde skur snang ba pad+ma'i spyan/ /yi ge 'khor lo sprul tshogs che/ /mtshon bya mtshan nyid rdo rje 'dzin/ /zag med ye shes bla ma'i sa/ /'du

'bral med pa'i bde chen sa/ /de ltar drug ni sangs rgyas kyi/ /sa chen bla med mthar gnas so/ /ngo bo spros med chos sems pa/ /gsang sngags bsgrub pa'i rgyu gcig go/ /sems can sems snyoms byang sems 'dzin/ /nges par sgrub pa'i rgyu gnyis so/ /sems

can mi gtong tshul khrims bsrung / /sngags don mi spong nyid dang gsum/ /rang gis sngags bsgrub gzhan gyis sngags/ /bar mi gcod dang 'gro ba la/ /byams pa bsgrub dang snying rje bsgrub/ /grub par byed pa'i rgyu bzhi'o/ /dben pa bsten dang 'du 'dzi spong / /thos pa

bsam zhing de don spyod/ /phyi rol sngags spong zhe sdang skyung / /de dag sngags sgrub rgyu lnga'o/ /dad pa 'dun pa gsol ba dang / /phyi nang sngags la mi spyod dang / /spros med ston pa'i gzhung 'jug dang / /theg chen mdo gzhung 'dzin pa dang / /sngags gzhung tshol ba mi skyo dang / /dge

spyod brtson dang drug pa'o/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg mchod gtor brtson/ /phyi rol dka' thub gdung med dang / /snod bcud 'og min gnas lha dang / /bu mo pha rol phyin yul lha/ /'gro ba mi bslu chos mi 'byed/ /theg dman mi len pa dang bdun/ /nyan thos rang rgyal

blo ldan dang / /rig 'dzin rdzu 'phrul the tshom med/ /lha dang bla ma'i bsnyen bkur dang / /dbang bskur lung nod spro ba dang / /ser sna med dang gtong la dga'/ /gsang ba dga' zhing mi g.yengs dang / /gzi brjid dbang che'i lus thob dang / /grags kun blo

ldan brgyad por blta/ /skur pa med cing bden par smra/ /bag yod tshul 'chos spangs pa ste/ /brgyad pa de yang bsgrub pa'i rgyu/ /rgyu med 'bras bu ga la srid/ /gang zhig lcags kyus bzung bas gnyis re nas/ /klu phrug 'bum phrag 'dren ltar dge ba'i sems/ /

kun slong byang chub rin chen thob mdzad rgyu/ /rtag par 'chang na gnas sgyur byed par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan thub pa ches/ /blo ldan rnams la bka' stsal pa/ /legs so legs so sems dpa' che/ /gang dag de dag de bzhin du/ /

bde 'dod rnam par g.yeng ba dang / /des ni sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das/ /gdung ba chags sdang 'khrug pa dang / /des ni log pa'i chos 'dor yang / /dge sbyong log ltas tshangs pa'i gdon/ /sngags log spyod byed rig 'dzin gdon/ /gdul

dka' dag la rgyun / /skye ngan 'jigs phyir blo zab spyod/ /gang gi khyim du rgyud 'di yod/ /bri dang bklag dang mchod pa dang / /rim gro ched du gsal byed dang / /bkra shis tshe ring dpal 'byor skye/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'

stsal pa dang / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs de dag dang / rig pa'i lha mo dang / khro bo du ma dang / nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad dang / /lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/

bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba las/ sbyor ba sna tshogs kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug gi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad+ma dra ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rig pa'i 'byung gnas rig pa'i 'od zer gyis shes rab pad+ma rgyas pa'i kha che'i yul bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i gtsug lag khang chen por paN+Di
ta chen po so ma shrI b+ha bya zhes bya ba dang / bod kyi lots+tsha ba kyu ra dge slong tshul khrims 'od zer gyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA mo g+ha pA sha hr-i da yaM nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das po ta la ka'i ri'i rtse mo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas sa ma la dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / mya ngan med pa dang / a

ti muk+ta ka la sogs pa mang po dang / sna tshogs pa'i rin po che'i sdong pos yang dag par brgyan par dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po stong phrag brgyad dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu

stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas nas mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams gtsor byas nas chos ston to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags

pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas ba'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ gang bcom ldan 'das la de yis thal mo sbyar zhing phyag 'tshal nas zhal 'dzum par gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces

gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ gang sngon bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na 'jig rten rnam par gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las bdag gis blangs te/ gang yang bdag gis dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po gtsor byas pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong mang po yang 'dus so/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don yod

zhags pa'i ye shes kyi gtso bo'i ting nge 'dzin bcu pa brgya stong bdag gis rab tu rnyed do/ /gzhan yang gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das sa gzhi'i phyogs gcig tu rab tu spyod pa las rtog par bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe sa phyogs de dbang phyug dang /

dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs ris gtsor byas pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag bcu gnyis kyis srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa'i don du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gang 'dir don yod zhags pa'i snying po rab tu spyod na bcom ldan 'das sa'i phyogs gcig po de mchod rten du

'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag don yod zhags pa'i snying po nyan pa de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la mchod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang 'dir don yod zhags pa'i snying po thos pas bdag gis dge

ba'i rtsa bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /gang kha cig bcom ldan 'das sdig pa'i skyon byed pa/ sdig pa'i chos thams cad la yang dag par spyod pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ dam pa'i chos la smod pa/ mnar med pa la gzhol ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub

sems dpa' thams cad dang 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la smod pa po de gal te 'gyod par gyur cing slan chad gcod cing sdom par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das des re zhig de nyid smyung bar gnas pa gcig gis de bzlas na de'i skye ba 'di'i las yongs su dag

cing yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/ /phyir bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /rims nyin gcig pa'am/ nyin gnyis pa'am/ nyin gsum pa'am/ nyin bzhi pa'am/ de'i phyir khrag tu 'khru ba'am/ tshad pa'am/ lag pa na ba'am/ rkang pa na ba'am/ mgo na ba'am/

ha la ha la yis btags pa'am/ mdze'am/ rkang shu'am/ 'brum bu phra mo'am/ lhog pa'am/ 'bras sam/ bye'u 'bras sam/ g.yan pa'am/ mtshan bar rdol ba'am/ 'brum bu'am/ brjed byed dam/ khyab par na ba'am/ gsod pa'am/ 'ching

ba'am/ brdeg pa'am/ bsdigs pa'am/ mi snyan par brjod pa'am/ mdor bsdu na bcom ldan 'das lus kyi na tsha'am/ sems kyi sdug bsngal lam/ rmi lam ngan pa mthong bas de'i las yongs su dag cing zad par 'gyur ro/ /sngar nyid nas dag pa'i

sems dad cing lhag par mos pa rnams shin tu yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi po dang / rigs bzhi pos ji snyed du bdag la sgyu dang g.yos kyang / mchod par byed/ gang 'dir don yod zhags pa'i snying po nyan par byed pa dang / don

'dzin par byed pa/ 'chang bar byed pa/ klog par byed pa/ 'dri bar byed pa/ 'drir 'jug par byed pa/ kun chub par byed pa/ sems can gzhan rnams nyan du 'jug par byed pa'am/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i rna bug tu gtugs te zlos par

byed/ sngags kyi tshig 'di sems par byed pa dang / dor ba med pa/ gzugs med pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ yang dag par 'byung ba med pa/ yun ring du 'byung ba med pa/ sgyu med pa/ gos pa med pa/ mnyam pa'i sems g.yeng ba med pa/ phung po lnga dang bral ba'i

sbyor ba 'dis ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bya'o/ /de dag la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas brgya stong gis zhal ston par 'gyur ro/ /khyed kyis bzlas pas sdig pa bshags par 'gyur ro/ /ji snyed po tir bri ba byas nas khyim du bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o/ /bcom

ldan 'das mang pos ci bya ste/ phan tshun 'gran pas nyan pa'am/ rje dpon gyis 'jigs pas sam/ gzhan gyi rjes su 'jug pas sam/ gzhan smad par bya ba'i ched du nyan pa ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi byin gyis brlabs su mkhas pas

shes par bya'o/ /de dag gi rna bug tu de'i sgra grags par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ gang la la'i skyes bus tsan+dan nam/ ga bur ram/ gur gum mam/ gla rtsi gnur zhing brgyad cing rngo ba'am/ sa la gzhibs nas bdag nyid la byugs na/ de la

tsan+dan nam/ ga bur ram/ gur gum mam/ gla rtsi gnur ba'am brgya dpas de ltar dri 'pho bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yang dri zhim po'ang de nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar kho nar bdag gi don yod zhags pa'i snying po 'di la yang gang la la zhig

gis 'phya zhing smod pa dang / snga ma ltar ji snyed bdag la sgyu dang g.yos mchod pa byed pa de dag ni bcom ldan 'das dmu rgod kyi sems can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /'dod pas dka' bar 'dzin par brjod de phyi ma la'ang ngo / /gang dang

gang du skyes pa de dang de ru tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi dri dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po nyid du byed do/ /gang yang bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong

ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ de las gzhan pa'i kha cig don yod zhags pa'i snying po ched du byas nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad la smyung bar gnas par byas te/ lan bdun du don yod zhags pa'i snying po tshig tu mi brjod

par yongs su bzlas na/ de la bcom ldan 'das mthong ba'i chos nyid la phan yon nyi shu tham pa so sor 'dod par bya'o/ /nyi shu po gang zhe na/ gang de'i lus la nad mi 'byung ba dang / las kyi dbang gis nad byung ba yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /snum zhing yid

du 'ong ba'i lus dkar bar yang 'gyur ro/ /skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po sbubs su nub pa dang nor rnyed par yang 'gyur ro/ /nor yod pa yang rkun pos khyer bar mi nus so/ /mes mi 'tshig go/ /chu yis mi 'khyer ro/ /rgyal po'i

yid kyis kyang 'phrog par mi nus so/ /de'i las kyi mtha' rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus la chu'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rlung dang char pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lan bdun du don yod zhags pa'i snying po chu'am thal ba la yongs

su bsngags te/ phyogs dang mtshams dang steng dang 'og gi zhing la bcing ba byas na nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mdangs za bas mdangs 'phrog par mi nus so/ /sems can thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /dgra yis 'jigs pa 'byung ba yang

myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mi yis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /khyab par na ba'i 'jigs pa dang / /mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs pa drag po'ang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /me dang chu dang mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur

ro/ /lhas kyang rgyun du nye bar srung ba dang / skyob pa dang sbed par 'gyur ro/ /gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de ru byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /phan yon nyi shu po 'di dag so sor 'dod par bya'o/ /gzhan yang chos brgyad so sor

'thob ste/ brgyad po gang zhe na/ 'chi ba'i dus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge slong gi gzugs kyis zhal yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro/ /bde bar tshe'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /mthong ba 'khrul pa med do/ /lag pa g.yob pa med do/ /bshang ba med

do/ /gci ba med do/ /rlung gi rnam pa med do/ /shin tu legs par gnas shing dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /kha 'og tu bltas nas tshe'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /'chi ba'i dus su nyon mongs pa med par rab tu brjod par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang

dang gang du smon lam btab pa de de dang de ru skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nyin re zhing dus gsum du lan gsum du bklag par bya'o/ /chang dang sha dang btsong dang sgog skya dang / bde byed la byin pa'i lhag ma khyad par du bsrung bar 'dod pas

de rnams spang bar bya'o/ /don yod zhags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams la nus sam mi nus shes par byas la mnyan du gzhug par bya'o/ /slob dpon gyis ser sna mi bya ste/ gang gi phyir phrag dog dang ser sna'i dri ma spangs pa ni byang chub

sems dpa' yin no/ /sems can gyi don gyi ched du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun du yang 'gyur ro/ /shes rab ni byang chub tu brjod la sems dpa' ni thabs te/ de gnyis dag gis sems can gyi don nyid thob

par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 'di rjes su zlos shing snying po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdun du rjod par byed pa ni 'khor bzhi po rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir dang / sdig pa byed pa gzhan rnams kyi yang phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ gang 'di dag pa'i sems can la khyod kyis bstan pa'i dus la bab ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang rjes su yi rang ngo / /phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus

na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug spyan mi 'dzums par gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gson cig /

sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di skye bo mang po la phan pa dang skye bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rten la rjes su brtse ba dang skye dgu'i tshogs chen po la phan pa dang bde ba dang rnam par thar pa'i don

gyi phyir yang ngo / /na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wA nu ga ta pra tiSh+Thi te b+h+yaH/ sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twe b+h+yaH/ na maHpra t+ye ka bud d+hAR+Ya shrA ba ka saM g+he b+h+yo\u0f85 tI tA nA ga ta pra t+yat+pan+ne b+h+yaH/ na ma s+samyak+ga tA nAM/ na maHsaM mya k+p+ra t+yut+pan+nA nAM/ na maHsha ra dwa tI pu trA ya/ ma hA ma ta ye/ na maHAr+ya mai tre ya pra mu khe b+h+yo ma hA bo d+hi

satwa sa~M g+he b+h+yaH/ na maHsu pra tiSh+Thi ta shaM len+d+ra rA dza pra mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ ar+ha d+b+h+yaH/ samyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yo b+ha ga bad+b+h+yaH/ na maHsu bar+N+Na bar+N+Na su pra ti b+hA sa bi na rdi te shwa ra rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ namaHsiM ha bi krA Di ta rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ namaHsu pra

tiSh+Thi te ma Ni kU Ta rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ namaHsa man+ta ra smyu t+ga ta shrI kU Ta rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bi pa sh+yi ne ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHshi khi ne ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bi shwa b+hu dze ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHkra kuts+tshA n+dA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHka na ka mu na ye ta thA ga tA ya/ na maHkA sh+ya pA ya

ta thA ga tA ya/ namaHshAkya mu na ye ta thA ga tA yAr+ha te saM myak+saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM mu ne mu ne ma hA mu na ye swA hA/ oM sha me sha me ma hA sha me rak+Sha rak+Sha maM sarba satwAM sh+tsa sarba pA paM pra sha ma ne swA hA/ namaHsu ba ri kIt+ti ta nA ma d+he yA ya shri ye ta thA ga tA ya/ namaHsa man+ta wa b+hA sa

bi dzi ta saM grA ma shri ye ta thA ga tA ya/ na ma in+d+ra ke tu d+h+wa dza shri ye ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo rat+na tra b+hA se shwa ra rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo\u0f85 pra ti ha ta b+hai Sha dz+ya rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bikrAn+ta gA mi ne ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+har+m+mA ya/ namaHsa~M g+hA ya/ na mo\u0f85 tI tA

nA ga ta pra t+yut+pan+ne b+h+yo bud+d+he b+h+ya b+ha ga bad+b+h+yaH/ tad+ya thA/ smr-i ti bar+b+ha ni/ ma ti bar+d+ha ni/ ga ti bar+d+ha ni/ d+h+r-i ti bar+d+ha ni/ pradz+nyA bar+d+ha ni/ pra hi b+hA na bar+d+ha ni/ d+h+yA na bar+d+ha ni/ shA ma tha bar+d+ha ni/ bi pa sh+ya na bar+d+ha ni/ sarba bo d+hi bak+Sha d+har+m+ma bar+d+ha ni/ sa ka la bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma pa ri pU ra NA ya swA hA/ na mo ra t+na tra yA ya/

na ma Ar+yA wa lo ki te shwa rwa ya bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ na mo ma hA s+thA ma bra p+tA ya bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ e b+h+yo na ma skr-i tA i dmAr+yA wa lo ki te shwa ra mu khot+gir+N+NaM/ a mo g+ha pA shwa rA dza nA ma hr-i da yi ta thA ga tA saM mu khaM b+hA Shi taM mahA tAM

baR+Shan+ma d+he a ha mi dA nI mA bat+ta yi Sh+ya mi/ sid+b+h+yan+tu me man+t+ra pa dAH/ sarba kAr+yA Ni sarba b+ha yo b+h+yo ma ma sarba satwA nAny+tsa rak+Sha b+ha ban+tu/ ta d+ya thA/ oM tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma ra ma ra/ mi ri mi ri/ mu ru mu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu

ru/ tsi ri tsi ri/ pi ri pi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ ma hA pad+ma ha sta/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hA shud+d+ha satwa/ bud d+h+ya bud d+h+ya/ bo d+ha bo d+ha/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Na/ ku Nu ku Nu/ pa ra ma shud+d+ha satwa/ ka ra

ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA s+thA ma prAp+ta/ tsa la tsa la/ sany+tsa la sany+tsa la/ bi tsa la bi tsa la/ pra tsa la pra tsa la/ e Ta Ta e Ta Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ ti ri ti ri/ tu ru tu ru/ e h+ye hi

ma hA kA ru Ni ka /ma hA pa shu ba ti be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ pa ra pa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ma ra ma ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ hA hA hI hI hU hU/ oM kA ra brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri

d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ na ra na ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ra smi sha ta sa ha sra pra ti maN+Di ta sha rI ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ta pa ta pa/ b+hA Sha b+hA Sha/ b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/ b+ha ga wAn+sau mA di t+ya/ ya ma/ ba ru Na/ ku be ra/

brah+men+d+ra/ bA yu/ ag+ni/ d+ha na dA/ r-i Shi de ba ga NA b+h+yar+ts+tsi ta tsa ra Na/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ g+hu ru g+hu ru/ sa nat+ku mA ra/ ru dra/ bA sa ba/ piTh+Nu/ d+ha na dA/ bA yu/ ag+ni/ r-i Shi/ nA ya ka /bi nA ya ka /ba hu bi bi d+ha be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha

ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ tha ra tha ra/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/ pa ra pa ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ya ra ya ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra dA ya ka /sa man tA wa lo ki ta/ pi lo ki ta/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ tre b+hu ba ne shwa ra/ sarba

gu Na sa mA laM kr-i ta/ a wa lo ki te shwa ra/ mu hu mu hu/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ ra k+Sha rak+Sha maM sarba sa twAM sh+tsa/ sarba b+ha ye b+h+yaH/ sarbo pa dra be b+h+yaH/ sarbo pa sarge b+h+yaH/ sarbo gra he b+h+yaH/ sarba byA d+hi b+h+yaH/ sarba bi She b+h+yaH/ sarba dz+wa re b+h+yaH/

e pa~M/ baM d+ha ban+d+ha na/ tA Da na/ tardza na/ rA dza/ taska ra/ ag+ni/ ud ka /bi Sha sha s+t+ra pa ri mo tsa ka /ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ in+d+ri ya/ ba la/ bo d+h+yaM ga /tsa tu rA r+ya sat+ya saM pra kA sha ka /ta pa ta pa/ tam

ta ma/ da ma da ma/ sha ma sha ma/ ma sam sa/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka /ma hA ta mo\u0f85n+d+ha ka ri/ bi d+ha ma na/ ShaT+pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra ka /ma la ma la/ mi li mi li/ mu lu mu lu/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ Tha Tha Tha Tha/ Ti Ti Ti Ti/ Tu Tu Tu Tu/ Thi Thi Thi Thi/

Thu Thu Thu Thu/ e Ne ya tsarma kr-i ta pa ri ka ra/ e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka /I shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ ma ha b+hu ta ga Na saM b+hany+dza ka /ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ pa ra pa ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ba ra ba ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ma ra ma ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ki Ti

ki Ti/ ku Tu ku Tu/ ma Ta ma Ta/ ma hA bi shud d+ha bi Sha ya ni bA si ta/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka shwe ta yadz+nyo ba bI ta/ rat+na mu ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ sarba dz+nya shi ra si kr-i ta dza TA mu ku Ta/ ma hA ad+b+hu ta ka ma lA laM kr-i ta ka ra ta la/ d+h+yA na sa mA d+hi bi mok+Sha pra kam+p+ya/ ba hu satwA san+ta ti pa

ri pA tsa ka /ma hA kA ru Ni ka /sarba kar+m+mA wa ra Na bi shwa d+ha ka /sarba dz+nyA dz+nyA na pa ri pU ra ka /sarba byA d+hi pa ri mo tsa ka /sarba satwA shA ba ri pU ra ki /sarba satwa sa mA shwA sa na ka ra na maHstu te swA hA/ a mo g+hA ya swA hA/ a mo g+ha pA shA ya swA hA/ a dzi tA ya swA hA/

a pa rA dzi tA ya swA hA/ a mi tA b+hA ya swA hA/ a mi tA b+hA su tA ya swA hA/ mA ra sai n+ya pra mar+d+da nA ya swA hA/ a b+ha yA ya swA hA/ a b+ha ya pra dA ya swA hA/ dza yA ya swA hA/ bi dza yA ya swA hA/ dza ya bi dza yA ya swA hA/ ba ra dA ya swA hA/ ba ra pra dA ya

swA hA/ a kA la mr-i t+yu pra sha ma nA ya swA hA/ i dany+tsa me kar+m+ma ku ru na maHstu te swA hA/ o~M ra Na ra Na hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M dza ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM dzra dzriM dzuM swA hA/ o~M hU~M dza ya swA hA/ o~M hrIHs+t+rai lo kya bi dza yA mo g+ha pA shA pra ti ha ta hrIHhaHhU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M pa su pa ti

swA hA/ o~M A ro lika swA hA/ o~M ba hu le ba hu le swA hA/ o~M A ro li ka hrIHhrIHhu~M phaT swA hA/ ni ya tA ni ya ta/ bi da nI yA shu b+ha s+ya me b+ha ga wAn karma No\u0f85 she Sha taHk+Sha yaM ku ru swA hA/ o~M pad+ma hastA ya swA hA/ o~M bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma saM g+hA ya swA hA/ bklags pas

las thams cad 'grub pa yin no/ /dus gsum du bzlas na mtshams med pa lnga rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /a ga ru'i bdug spos dang / thal ba dang / chu dang / yungs

kar dang seng ldeng gi phur bu la sogs pas mtshams bcing ngo / /rims nad thams cad la srung skud bcing bar bya'o/ /nad thams cad la mar ram/ mar nag gam/ chu la yongs su bzlas te sbyin par bya'o/ /lus la khyab pa'i nad la mtshon

chas gcad cing srung skud kyang bya'o/ /lto na ba la tshwa chus nyams par byed pa'am/ 'jim bag gam/ chus kyang bya'o/ /mig gi nad la skud pa dkar po rna ba la bcing bar bya'o/ /so'i nad la ka ra bI ra'i so shing gis so/ /mtshams bcing ba la

ni tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du yongs su bzlas nas seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la bcings te phyogs bzhir gdab par byas na mtshams bcings pa yin no/ /thams cad du srung skud dam/ chu'am thal bas bya'o/ /gza'

thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i skud pas bya'o/ /rims thams cad la skud pa dkar pos bya'o/ /sbrul dang / srin bu dang / ba spu byi ba dang / lhog pa dang / gre ba 'gags pa rnams la sbrang rtsi pi pi ling dang ldan pas bya'o/ /mig gi nad la dri zhim po'i chu'am/ rgya skyegs

kyi chu'am/ sbrang rtsi'am/ shing mngar gyis bya'o/ /rtsod pa'i dus thams cad du rtsod pa dang mi snyan par brjod pa la chu la yongs su bzlas te gdong bkru bar bya'o/ /yul gzhan gyi rgyal po'i 'tshe ba la yul 'khor du bum pa gang ba yang dag par bzhag nas

gtsang mas gos gtsang ma gyon te mchod pa chen po byas shing bklags na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /de'i chus kyang gtor bar byas nas sems can thams cad bsrung ba yin no/ /nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad dang / yams rnams zhi ba yin no/ /phyag rgya tsan+dan gyi

thig le la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du yongs su bzlas na mtshams med pa thams cad zad par byed do/ /rtag tu bzlas na khyim bsrung ba'o/ /pad+ma'i sbyin sreg gi sems can thams cad kyi bsrung ba'o/ /tsan+dan gyi sbyin sreg gis gza' dang / 'byung po dang rgyu skar

thams cad las bsrung ba'o/ /rgyal ba dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / na gu li dang / dri'i na gu li dang / d+ha ra ni dang / mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa dang / dbang po'i lag pa dang / dri'i pri yang ku dang / ta ka ra dang /

'khor lo dang / 'khor lo chen po dang / rnam par gnon pa dang / so ma rA dzi dang / su nat+ta zhes bya ba ste/ de dag gang yang rung ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du yongs su bzlas nas nor bu lta bur byas nas mgo bo dang dpung pa la bcing bar bya'o/ /byis pa

rnams kyi ni mgul du'o/ /bud med rnams kyi mdoms su bcangs na rang nyid mchog tu skal ba dang ldan par byed do/ /g.yang med pa nyams nas bu yang ster ro/ /nor bu 'di bcangs pas thams cad du bsrung ba byas pa yin no/ /dug dang mes mi tshugs

so/ /dug gis byas pa yang skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nad byung ba yang mi skye zhing myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gza' rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rlung dang sprin dang thog ni chus rengs par byed do/ /ka ra bI ra'i lcug mas ni las thams cad byed do/ /'phags pa

spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po mchog tu grub pa 'dis ma bsgrubs par yang las 'di rnams byed do/ /de nas bsgrub par 'dod na thang sku'i cho ga ni tshon sna ma lus pas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs mnyam par bri bar bya ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba kyi pags pas smad dkris byas shing phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o/ /lha bzo mkhan gso sbyong dang ldan pas ri mo bri bar bya'o/ /de nas sgrub pa pos sku gzugs de'i mdun du

ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la me tog dkar po bkram ste/ dri zhim po'i chus bkang ba'i bum pa brgyad gzhag par bya'o/ /nye bar spyod pa brgyad dang nye bar mkho ba drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / khrag med pa'i gtor ma sha dang bcas pa bya'o/ /a ga

ru'i bdug spos bsregs la rig pa stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ /nyin zhag gcig tu smyung bar gnas pa'am/ dkar gsum za zhing dus gsum du khrus byas nas gos gtsang ma gyon par gyur pas bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas sku gzugs kyi mdun du rang nyid
